original: As we currently have no designated heir for $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$, we have several options to pick from.
translation: 我国目前尚未为$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$指定继承人，我们有下列人选可以选择。
一位有影响力的改革家

original: The city of $PROVINCENAME$ has grown rich and prosperous. They now want part in our parliament. The argument of their representatives seems to be centered around a statement about 'no taxation without representation'.
translation: $PROVINCENAME$的城市已发展得富裕繁荣。现在他们想加入议会，其代表的观点看起来集中在一份声明上——「无代表，不纳税」。

original: The Spanish Inquisition was very active in the Kingdoms of Castile and Aragon between 1480 and 1530. Forced conversions and expanded inquisitorial powers led to unrest and in 1484 to 1485 there was a revolt in protest of inquisitorial expansion of power.
translation: 1480至1530年，西班牙宗教裁判所在卡斯蒂利亚和阿拉贡影响甚广。强制转变信仰的行为以及宗教审判者权力的扩大最终导致了社会动荡。1484至1485年，一场反对宗教审判者扩权的叛乱爆发了。

original: Explorer Christopher Columbus made two attempts in 1485 and 1488 to convince the King of Portugal, John III, to finance an expedition to try and find a western route to the Orient. After being rejected the second time, Columbus turned his efforts towards the Spanish Crown. Backed up by Italian investors, Columbus finally managed to convince King Ferdinand to agree to the expedition. In August 1492, after having been made 'Admiral of the Seas' and promised a share of the profits, Columbus finally set sail.
translation: 探险者克里斯托弗·哥伦布在1485年和1488年两次试图说服葡萄牙国王若昂三世资助他向西航行，开辟到东方的新航路。第二次尝试失败之后，哥伦布转而求助西班牙王室。他得到了意大利投资者的资助，说服了阿拉贡国王斐迪南批准他探险。1492年8月，哥伦布被封为「海洋提督」开始了他的航行，并且得到从收入中获得提成的承诺。

original: On October 12, 1492, after 34 days out of sight of land, Christopher Columbus and his crew set foot on an island in the Bahamas, which Columbus named San Salvador. They had discovered a New World.
translation: 1492年10月12日，已经34天没有见过陆地的克里斯托弗·哥伦布和他的船员们终于在巴哈马群岛中的一个岛登陆了，哥伦布将这个岛命名为圣萨尔瓦多。他们发现了一个新世界。

original: Our agents report that the revolt was instigated by support from Leinster. We should not let this go unpunished.
translation: 探子报告称叛乱是伦斯特一股势力煽动的，一定给他们点颜色看看。

original: Our great chief is dead and already the vultures are circling, it looks like there will be yet another struggle for the throne.
translation: 我们伟大的酋长宾天了，秃鹰已然高高盘旋，看样子还有一场争夺王位的腥风血雨啊。

original: Rule by the sword, or die by it
No child can be a khan!
The last pretender to my throne has been killed. Order has been restored!
translation: 最后一个觊觎王位的人被诛杀了。国家秩序终于恢复了！

original: The crisis can also end when all pretender armies have been vanquished.
translation: 消灭所有觊觎者叛军也能结束危机。

original: §RSeparatist Rebels§! will rise in any province that is not a core of [Root.GetName].
translation: §R分离主义者§! 可能会在任何一个不是[Root.GetName]核心的省份发动叛乱。

original: Our state is going through a range of changes that is rapidly changing our identity and ideals. Unless we actively work against it we will see the ambitions and traditions of our country change as a result of this.
translation: 我国值此大变，国民之认同观念亦与时推移。除若我积极对抗之，不然我国家传统野心之改变将是大势所趋、不可避免。

original: No, we cannot abandon our roots.

Our strong emphasis on offensive gives our country's army a feeling of strength, because attack is always the best form of defense. Our men charge fearlessly into battle, knowing that victory will be theirs.
translation: 最好的防守便是进攻，我们强有力的进攻提振了我军士气。我们的士兵带着必胜的信念冲锋陷阵，无所畏惧。

original: The humble foot soldier is sometimes looked down upon by the cavalryman, but he is the backbone of any army. A strong infantry attack can prove almost as devastating as a cavalry charge. Our infantry are rising to the fact that they are enjoying their day in the sun.
translation: 军中级别较低的步兵往往被骑兵所不屑，但他们却是任何军队的顶梁柱.强有力的步兵进攻和骑兵冲锋一样威力惊人.我们的步兵逐步认识到自已的地位如日中天。

original: Our horsemen have the skill and ability to be the ultimate arm of decision, just as they had in the times of Alexander the Great. These days, our companions are the cream of the army and are always ready to go on the attack. They are reveling in the attention they get and take pride in their importance.
translation: 一如亚历山大大帝时期那般，我们骑手的战力足以使其成为杀手锏。我们的骑兵是军中骄子，随时厉兵秣马准备冲锋。他们以此为傲，沉醉于他人的瞩目之中。

original: Since the 14th century the wealthy and powerful in the Italian City states have been patronizing artists and scholars willing to explore the old Roman and Greek societies of their forefathers. As a cultural movement the Renaissance already encompasses most of the region and has had a profound impact on literature, art, philosophy and music. Humanist scholars are also analyzing the society in which they live, comparing it to the ideals of the classical philosophers. At the turn of $YEAR$ Renaissance humanism has grown into a more mature movement, ready to permeate all aspects of society. A new ideal for rulers as well as those who are ruled is spreading as quickly as the early printers can distribute copies of these new ideas. A true Renaissance humanist is an expert on everything from politics and philosophy to art, textual analysis, music and architecture. The Renaissance is now ready to reshape the world to better fit the classical ideals.
translation: 自14世纪以来，意大利诸城邦的财阀氏族们就一直对有意探索他们古希腊与古罗马祖先社会的艺术家和学者们进行赞助。文艺复兴作为一场文化运动，其思想已经深入并且广泛传播在意大利各地，同时对文学，艺术，哲学以及音乐产生了深远的影响。人文学家也在也在研究分析他们所生活的社会，将其与古典哲学理想进行比较。在$YEAR$年，文艺复兴人文主义已经发展成熟，即将渗透至社会的各个方面。这种新思想的影响不仅是对统治者的，更是对被统治者的。藉由早期印刷机的帮助，这些全新的理念迅速传播。真正的文艺复兴人文主义者须通晓方方面面，不仅要专精于政治与哲学，更要涉猎艺术，文字分析，音乐，建筑。如今，文艺复兴正准备重塑整个世界，让它朝着其古典主义的理想迈进。

original: Countries that have not yet fully §YEmbraced§! the §YRenaissance§! Institution will receive an increasing technology cost penalty of §R1%§! per year up to at most §R50%§!.
translation: 尚未完全§Y接纳§!§Y文艺复兴§! 思潮的国家每年都会增加§R1%§! 的科技费用惩罚，直到达到 §R50%§!的上限。

original: Since the 14th century the wealthy and powerful in the Italian City states have been patronizing artists and scholars willing to explore the old Roman and Greek societies of their forefathers. As a cultural movement the Renaissance already encompasses most of the region and has had a profound impact on literature, art, philosophy and music. Humanist scholars are also analyzing the society in which they live, comparing it to the ideals of the classical philosophers. At the turn of $YEAR$ Renaissance humanism has grown into a more mature movement, ready to permeate all aspects of society. A new ideal for rulers as well as those who are ruled is spreading as quickly as the early printers can distribute copies of these new ideas. A true Renaissance humanist is an expert on everything from politics and philosophy to art, textual analysis, music and architecture. The Renaissance is now ready to reshape the world to better fit its classical ideals.
translation: 自14世纪以来，意大利诸城邦的财阀氏族们就一直对有意探索他们古希腊与古罗马祖先社会的艺术家和学者们进行赞助。文艺复兴作为一场文化运动，其思想已经深入并且广泛传播在意大利各地，同时对文学，艺术，哲学以及音乐产生了深远的影响。人文学家也在也在研究分析他们所生活的社会，将其与古典哲学理想进行比较。在$YEAR$年，文艺复兴人文主义已经发展成熟，即将渗透至社会的各个方面。对于统治者以及被统治者，一种新的理念开始出现，藉由早期印刷机的帮助，这些全新的理念迅速传播。真正的文艺复兴人文主义者须通晓方方面面，不仅要专精于政治与哲学，更要涉猎艺术，文字分析，音乐，建筑。如今，文艺复兴正准备重塑整个世界，让它朝着其古典主义的理想迈进。

original: Travelers speak of a great rebirth of old ideals in faraway lands. It is hard to treat such rumors seriously though according to the reporters great secrets have been uncovered by the thinkers of this 'renaissance'.
translation: 旅行者提到了在遥远的土地上正在重生的古代思想，我们很难严肃对待这些传闻，但是，根据报告，所谓的“文艺复兴”思想家们的确发掘出了一些巨大的秘密。

original: The discovery of the New World has heralded a new era not only for the colonizers and the colonized. This has led to a spread of materials and techniques as well as a realization of the vast size of the globe. Animals, crop types, silver and diseases spread across the Atlantic the first steps have been taken towards a truly global economy. As foreign lands and people are mapped and documented ideas as well as religious and philosophical debate has become more and more colored by what we have found in overseas societies. Great minds feel the need to question what was once truth and from Valladolid to Fatehpur Sikri the nature of the world is now up for debate.
translation: 新世界的发现预兆着一个新时代的到来，不仅对于殖民者来说是如此，对于被殖民者更是如此。原材料与科技迅速传播，人们对于世界边际的认识也迅速扩大。随着许多动物，农作物，白银，当然还有各类疾病开始穿梭在大西洋两岸的世界，人类终于向经济全球化迈出了第一步。当陌生的土地出现在地图上，当陌生的民族被记载下来，我们的理念，我们的宗教与哲学之辩也越来越受到这些远洋社会的影响。一些伟人开始思考那些人们一度确信的真理是否存伪，于是，从巴利亚多利德至法塔赫布尔西格里，思想家们纷纷开始讨论起世界的本质。

original: The discovery of the New World has heralded a new era not only for the colonizers and the colonized. This has led to a spread of materials and techniques as well as a realization of the vast size of the globe. Animals, crop types, silver and diseases spread across the Pacific the first steps have been taken towards a truly global economy. As foreign lands and people are mapped and documented ideas as well as religious and philosophical debate has become more and more colored by what we have found in overseas societies. Great minds feel the need to question what was once truth and from [From.GetCapitalName] to Fatehpur Sikri the nature of the world is now up for debate.

original: Countries that have not yet fully §YEmbraced§! the §YColonialism§! Institution will receive an increasing technology cost penalty of §R1%§! per year up to at most §R50%§!.
translation: 尚未完全§Y接纳§!§Y殖民主义§! 思潮的国家每年都会增加§R1%§! 的科技费用惩罚，直到达到 §R50%§!的上限。

Great minds feel the need to question what was once truth and from Valladolid to Fatehpur Sikri the nature of the world is now up for debate.

original: Merchants are reporting an increased influx of goods that seem entirely alien to them. These exotic goods are brought by travelers who claim to have met strange men from afar. While it is hard to know what to make of such rumors these men are convinced our world is now changing fundamentally and that these strangers are the bringers of bad fortune.
translation: 商人们报告说有越来越多的新奇商品正在涌入我国。带来这些奇珍异宝的旅行者们声称自己与来自远方的奇人们有过接触。虽然我们难以弄清这些谣言的真相，但这些人都认为，我们的世界正在发生根本性的改变，而这些不速之客乃是我们的灾星。

original: The discovery of the New World has heralded a new era not only for the colonizers and the colonized. This has led to a spread of materials and techniques as well as a realization of the vast size of the globe. Animals, crop types, silver and diseases spread across the seas the first steps have been taken towards a truly global economy. As foreign lands and people are mapped and documented ideas as well as religious and philosophical debate has become more and more colored by what we have found in overseas societies. Great minds feel the need to question what was once truth and from Valladolid to Fatehpur Sikri the nature of the world is now up for debate.
translation: 新世界的发现预兆着一个新时代的到来，不仅对于殖民者来说是如此，对于被殖民者更是如此。原材料与科技迅速传播，人们对于世界边际的认识也迅速扩大。随着许多动物，农作物，白银，当然还有各类疾病开始穿梭在大西洋两岸的世界，人类终于向经济全球化迈出了第一步。当陌生的土地出现在地图上，当陌生的民族被记载下来，我们的理念，我们的宗教与哲学之辩也越来越受到这些远洋社会的影响。一些伟人开始思考那些人们一度确信的真理是否存伪，于是，从巴利亚多利德至法塔赫布尔西格里，思想家们纷纷开始讨论起世界的本质。

original: The ability to mass-produce the written word would revolutionize the spread of information and in many ways the early modern society as a whole. Pioneered by Renaissance men such as Venetian Printer Aldus Manutius, the new art helped fuel the Renaissance by making the translated classics more widely available. Later the Reformation benefitted greatly from the ability to spread critical publications and translations of the Holy Scriptures.\nNow that Printing has matured as a technique and spread throughout Europe editions have grown and hundreds of thousands of copies of everything from religious and political pamphlets to instructions in how to behave or scientific treatises are circulating the continent. With print shops growing evermore commonplace rulers have found it hard to contain the new technique as the comparatively easy means of production means censorship can be sidestepped by moving business across a border or even just changing the name on a title page.
translation: 大量印刷文字的能力将彻底改变信息的传播方式，并在各个方面改变近代社会的整体。在文艺复兴的时代，像威尼斯印刷商阿尔杜斯·马努提乌斯这样的人所发明的新技术让译制经典更加易于传播，进一步推动了那场运动的进程。后来，由于圣经的新译本以及相关的重要著作通过印刷术迅速传播开来，宗教改革的进程也从这项技术中获益。\n如今，印刷技术已经发展成熟，并且已经布及欧洲各地，复印的版次也在不断增加，从宗教、政治手册，到行为指南，到科学论文，成千上万的各式各样的印刷品都在欧洲大陆上广泛流传着。随着印刷行业的逐步壮大，越来越多的统治者发现自己难以管控这一项新技术，因为这些生产技术相对简单，印刷商若想要逃脱审查，只需把生意移到边境线之外，甚至只用改变书的标题，都不是什么难事。

original: Countries that have not yet fully §YEmbraced§! the §YPrinting Press§! Institution will receive an increasing technology cost penalty of §R1%§! per year up to at most §R50%§!.
translation: 尚未完全§Y接纳§!§Y印刷机应用§!思潮的国家每年都会增加§R1%§! 的科技费用惩罚，直到达到 §R50%§!的上限。

Pioneered by Renaissance men such as Venetian Printer Aldus Manutius, the new art helped fuel the Renaissance by making the translated classics more widely available. Later the Reformation benefitted greatly from the ability to spread critical publications and translations of the Holy Scriptures.\nNow that Printing has matured as a technique and spread throughout Europe editions have grown and hundreds of thousands of copies of everything from religious and political pamphlets to instructions in how to behave or scientific treatises are circulating the continent. With print shops growing evermore commonplace rulers have found it hard to contain the new technique as the comparatively easy means of production means censorship can be sidestepped by moving business across a border or even just changing the name on a title page.

original: Rumors have reached us of far-away lands where the written word is mass produced in huge and never before imagined numbers. According to these informants this has reshaped their learned and political world entirely.
translation: 我们听说，在遥远的土地上，文字记录已经能够大量地、以天文数字般地制造出来了。根据知情人的说法，这种能力已经完完全全地改变了他们的认知世界与政治世界。

original: Goods have been moved across continents since antiquity. But where this was previously limited to a set number of routes and goods such as the manufactured goods of India and China finding their way across the Indian Ocean and along the Silk Road, all trade is now increasingly becoming part of a greater world network. With the discovery of the Americas, sea routes around Africa and the crossing of the Pacific Ocean, local trade networks are being connected into one world-spanning interconnected web.\nSilver mined in the Andes is now being boxed and taken via Europe all the way to China and India. Iron mined and wrought in Scandinavia is being sold in West Africa by English Merchants and others are making a fortune just distributing cloth and spices within the South East Asian trade sphere. Local Indian merchants are investing in future European trade ventures. It may still be early to speak of a truly Global Economy but surely the first seeds have been sown.
translation: 自古以来，跨大陆的商品往来就存在了。但是我们曾经贸易线路与货物都屈指可数，比如说，通过丝绸之路和印度洋航线，中国和印度的商品才能来到欧洲。而如今，所有的贸易正在逐渐形成全球贸易网络的一部分。随着美洲的发现，非洲航路的开辟，跨越太平洋的壮举，地方贸易网开始逐渐接入到全球性贸易网当中。\n从安第斯山脉开采的银矿被整箱整箱地装运回欧洲，再流入中国和印度。斯堪的纳维亚半岛上的铁矿制成铁制品，再经由英国商人销往西非。还有一些人仅仅通过在东南亚商圈进行布匹和香料的转销便获利颇丰。印度的本地商人已经开始为未来的欧洲风险贸易做投资。真正的世界经济体可能还没那么快到来，但有一点我们可以确定：它的第一颗种子已经被种下了。

original: Countries that have not yet fully §YEmbraced§! the §YGlobal Trade§! Institution will receive an increasing technology cost penalty of §R1%§! per year up to at most §R50%§!.
translation: 尚未完全§Y接纳§!§Y全球贸易§!思潮的国家每年都会增加§R1%§! 的科技费用惩罚，直到达到 §R50%§!的上限。

original: Goods have been moved across continents since antiquity. But where this was previously limited to a set number of routes and goods such as the manufactured goods of India and China finding their way across the Indian Ocean and along the Silk Road, all trade is now increasingly becoming part of a greater world network. With the discovery of the Americas, sea routes around Africa and the crossing of the Pacific Ocean, local trade networks are being connected into one world-spanning interconnected web.\nSilver mined in the Andes is now being boxed and taken via Europe all the way to China and India. Iron mined and wrought in Scandinavia is being sold in West Africa by English Merchants and others are making a fortune just distributing cloth and spices within the South East Asian trade sphere. Local Indian merchants are investing in future European trade ventures. It may still be early to speak of a truly Global Economy but surely the first seeds have been sown.
translation: 自古以来，跨大陆的商品往来就存在了。但是我们曾经贸易线路与货物都屈指可数，比如说，通过丝绸之路和印度洋航线，中国和印度的商品才能来到欧洲。而如今，所有的贸易正在逐渐形成全球贸易网络的一部分。随着美洲的发现，非洲航路的开辟，跨越太平洋的壮举，地方贸易网开始逐渐接入到全球性贸易网当中。\n从安第斯山脉开采的银矿被整箱整箱地装运回欧洲，再流入中国和印度。斯堪的纳维亚半岛上的铁矿制成铁制品，再经由英国商人销往西非。还有一些人仅仅通过在东南亚商圈进行布匹和香料的转销便获利颇丰。印度的本地商人已经开始为未来的欧洲风险贸易做投资。真正的世界经济体可能还没那么快到来，但有一点我们可以确定：它的第一颗种子已经被种下了。

original: Our long distance trade contacts have begun to produce more and more exotic goods for our markets. They claim it is because their contacts with other lands have in turn increased from a few times a year to an almost constant contact with various trade network and firms. Some have even offered us to invest in their coming deliveries, something they claim is a common custom in their far-away homelands.
translation: 我们长距离的贸易供销商已经开始为我国的市场带来越来越多的异国奇宝。这些外国商人声称道，这是因为他们同其他地方的贸易来往已经从一年几次的活动逐渐发展到一种持久的、通过各种贸易网与贸易事务的联系。他们有些人甚至建议我们投资他们将要运来的货物，他们说，在他们遥远的家乡，这是一种习以为常的事。

original: While a number of technical innovations during the course of the 16th and 17th centuries has increased the output of production for some products such as iron or cloth to an extent the biggest improvement in the field of production has come in the form of new forms of organization. By creating Manufactories, often outside the city limits, merchant capitalists can both bypass the ancient guild laws that prevent mass production in principle as well as pioneer ways to increase production through organizing and specialization of labor in one place. The forerunners of the later Industrialization are able to increase output by facilitating access to raw materials and mass organization of labor rather than by expensive new machinery. This is in itself a huge change over the often heavily regulated methods of old, however, and together with later technical advances this new mode of production will come to revolutionize society.
translation: 十六、十七世纪的一系列技术创新提高了诸如铁、布料等资源的产量，但是生产方面最大的创新却在于各种新的组织方式。商业资本家们在城市之外建立起一座座工厂，规避着那些限制大规模生产的工会规则，同时还能开拓增加生产效率的新方法，比如劳动的组织化和专业化。这些未来工业革命的先驱们并没有依靠昂贵的新机器来提高工业的产出，而是依靠发掘获得原材料的便捷途径，以及组织大规模的生产活动来达到自己的目的。相对于老旧而又限制较多的旧制度，这无疑是一次巨大的革新，伴随着之后的科技革命，这一全新的模式又会为这个社会带来巨大的变革。

original: Countries that have not yet fully §YEmbraced§! the §YManufactories§! Institution will receive an increasing technology cost penalty of §R1%§! per year up to at most §R50%§!.
translation: 尚未完全§Y接纳§!§Y工场生产§!思潮的国家每年都会增加§R1%§! 的科技费用惩罚，直到达到 §R50%§!的上限。

original: While a number of technical innovations during the course of the 16th and 17th centuries has increased the output of production for some products such as iron or cloth to an extent the biggest improvement in the field of production has come in the form of new forms of organization. By creating Manufactories, often outside the city limits, merchant capitalists can both bypass the ancient guild laws that prevent mass production in principle as well as pioneer ways to increase production through organizing and specialization of labor in one place. The forerunners of the later Industrialization are able to increase output by facilitating access to raw materials and mass organization of labor rather than by expensive new machinery. This is in itself a huge change over the often heavily regulated methods of old, however, and together with later technical advances this new mode of production will come to revolutionize society.
translation: 十六、十七世纪的一系列技术创新提高了诸如铁、布料等资源的产量，但是生产方面最大的创新却在于各种新的组织方式。商业资本家们在城市之外建立起一座座工厂，规避着那些限制大规模生产的工会规则，同时还能开拓增加生产效率的新方法，比如劳动的组织化和专业化。这些未来工业革命的先驱们并没有依靠昂贵的新机器来提高工业的产出，而是依靠发掘获得原材料的便捷途径，以及组织大规模的生产活动来达到自己的目的。相对于老旧而又限制较多的旧制度，这无疑是一次巨大的革新，伴随着之后的科技革命，这一全新的模式又会为这个社会带来巨大的变革。

original: Merchants are reporting an influx of greater and greater numbers of foreign goods into our markets. Their point of origin is unclear but it is clear that somewhere production of refined goods has greatly increased.
translation: 商人汇报道越来越多的外国商品正在流入我国市场。我们仍不清楚这些货物的来源，但是它们一定来自某个加工产品生产能力猛增的地方。

original: The last century has seen Rationalism and Empiricism gaining an ever increasing popularity among the great minds of the age. In letters, publications or coffee houses kings, scientists, philosophers and litterateurs are discussing the merits of tolerance, the scientific method and the spreading of enlightenment ideals to all humanity. From universities or courts of enlightened monarchs expeditions are being sent to measure, catalogue, weigh and map the world so that we can better understand the laws that govern the things around us. Others discuss the laws that govern society and try to reach an understanding of the Rights of Man. In [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] a colossal undertaking has begun in the assembly of a complete encyclopedia of all knowledge. The Light of Reason has now been lit and many will not rest until it has been brought to all corners of the earth.
translation: 在上一个世纪，理性主义和经验主义受到了越来越多的伟大思想家的推崇。不论是君主，是科学家，还是文学家，无论在信件中，在书本中，还是在咖啡馆里，都在讨论着开放包容，科学方法以及启蒙思想的传播能够给全人类带来的美好未来。从知名大学，到开明君主的宫廷，四处都有人在给这个世界进行科学衡量、测定、分类和制图，以便于我们更好理解的世界运转的规律。同时亦有许多的人探讨着社会运转的规律，试着去弄明白所谓的“人权”真正的含义。在[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]，一项工程量庞大的任务已然开始：为所有的知识编写一本百科全书。理性之光正在缓缓升起，对许多人而言，他们的使命就是马不停蹄地让这束光芒照亮地球的每个角落。

original: Countries that have not yet fully §YEmbraced§! the §YEnlightenment§! Institution will receive an increasing technology cost penalty of §R1%§! per year up to at most §R50%§!.
translation: 尚未完全§Y接纳§!§Y启蒙主义§!思潮的国家每年都会增加§R1%§! 的科技费用惩罚，直到达到 §R50%§!的上限。

original: The last century has seen Rationalism and Empiricism gaining an ever increasing popularity among the great minds of the age. In letters, publications or coffee houses kings, scientists, philosophers and litterateurs are discussing the merits of tolerance, the scientific method and the spreading of enlightenment ideals to all humanity. From universities or courts of enlightened monarchs expeditions are being sent to measure, catalogue, weigh and map the world so that we can better understand the laws that govern the things around us. Others discuss the laws that govern society and try to reach an understanding of the Rights of Man. In [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] a colossal undertaking has begun in the assembly of a complete encyclopedia of all knowledge. The Light of Reason has now been lit and many will not rest until it has been brought to all corners of the earth.
translation: 在上一个世纪，理性主义和经验主义受到了越来越多的伟大思想家的推崇。不论是君主，是科学家，还是文学家，无论在信件中，在书本中，还是在咖啡馆里，都在讨论着开放包容，科学方法以及启蒙思想的传播能够给全人类带来的美好未来。从知名大学，到开明君主的宫廷，四处都有人在给这个世界进行科学衡量、测定、分类和制图，以便于我们更好理解的世界运转的规律。同时亦有许多的人探讨着社会运转的规律，试着去弄明白所谓的“人权”真正的含义。在[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]，一项工程量庞大的任务已然开始：为所有的知识编写一本百科全书。理性之光正在缓缓升起，对许多人而言，他们的使命就是马不停蹄地让这束光芒照亮地球的每个角落。

original: Strange expeditions of men in powdered wigs have begun to appear at our borders. These travelers seem more interested in our plants, animals and even subjects than they are in our actual [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], our traders or our riches. Our informers tell us these people consider themselves the carriers of an 'Enlightenment', surely a ludicrous statement...
translation: 戴着打粉假发的奇特的探险家开始不断地出现在我们边境上。这些探险者对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]、贸易和财宝漠不关心，但却对我国的动物，植物乃至臣民颇感兴趣。我们的线人告诉我们，这些人认为自己是什么【启蒙】的传播者，听起来真是可笑.......

original: Over time we have managed to strengthen the authority of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] over the provinces. This does mean that the authority of local strong men and petty chiefs is now threatened. Normally such local forces can be handled with ease but at times use of more direct force is necessary to remind others of our right to rule.
translation: 长久以来，我们一直在尝试在地方加强我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的权威，这必定就会威胁到当地豪强和氏族的威信。一般来说，我们可以缓和与他们的关系，但我们也有必要时不时地使用更为直接的武力提醒他们是谁在统治着这个国家。

original: Growing Influence of the Urban Elites
translation: 都市显贵影响力的增长

original: While they lack a formal voice in our government the richer cities have many other ways to make their influence known. In some cases cities can even band together to further increase their power over a province. The leaders of one such conglomeration have recently approached us asking to formalize some of the ways in which they exert control. Allying with the cities would allow us to promote much more durable systems of government but we would likely lose the support of some of the local warrior groups we now rely on for military support.
translation: 虽然在我们的政府里没有什么官方话语权，富有的城市也有很多其他办法来施加他们的影响力。在有些时候，多个城市还会联合起来，以增强它们在当地省份的力量。最近，这样的一个政治联合体的领袖向我们提出一些要求，要我们给予他们一些官方性的权利以方便他们更好的进行管理。与城市的结盟可以让我们拥有一个更加稳定持久的体制，但是这样的举动也由可能让我们失去一些本地贵族的支持，而我们当前依然需要这些人的军事协助。

original: Sometimes progress will be greater farther from the center of power where old elites are too entrenched to desire change. As new modes of government are becoming more commonplace in our country locals are getting increasingly irritated at the elites in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] who refuse to formalize any form of government institutions.
translation: 有时，权力中心因充满着旧有的精英阶层而缺乏变革的动力，一些进步反而会在不是中央的地方发生。在我们的国家里，新形式的地方政府越来越常见，也正因如此，地方也越来越对住在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的精英们越来越不满，因为他们并不愿意让任何新形式的政治制度享有官方地位。

original: Through good policies and simple repetition authority and power can become entrenched enough to promote growth of permanent government institutions. Over time our government practices have progressed from arbitrary demonstrations of power towards consistency.
translation: 通过施行良政和简单的重复实践，我们便能确立我们的威信和权力，从而推动我们固定政府机构的扩张。时至今日，我们政府的施政已不再朝令夕改，而是能做到一以贯之的稳定管理。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has come to take a great interest in the Renaissance, not only for the cultural and artistic merit but also the political and scientific breakthroughs being made in the Italian states. [Root.Heir.GetName] seems oblivious to such things, however, which worries our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. For generations now European princes have been able to further their education through the use of books on how to conduct yourself as a ruler. Renaissance thinkers have been quick to usurp this genre and a number of these 'Mirrors for Princes' now practically reek of the new ideas. We should consider making these books central to the education of [Root.Heir.GetName].
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]在文艺复兴的方方面面产生了巨大的兴趣，不仅仅关注于的文化艺术的好处，也包括意大利诸邦的政治与科技的突破。然而，[Root.Heir.GetName]似乎对这些事莫不关心，这让我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]十分头疼。数个世代以来，欧洲的王子们都能通过一些教育人们如何成为好君主的书籍学到许多东西。文艺复兴的大师们很快地成为了这个领域的主宰者，一系列的“储君通鉴”类书现在迸发着新的思想。我们应考虑让这些书成为[Root.Heir.GetName]教育的核心。

original: Let us foster a wise Prince.
translation: 让我们来培养一位聪明的王子。

original: Let us foster a wise Princess.
translation: 让我们来培养一位聪明的王女。

original: A local tutor will do fine.
translation: 请一位本地的家庭教师就行了。

original: Our colonial governor has written to us imploring us to secure further investors for the growth of our future overseas empire. There are certainly interested parties in the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] financial sector who would be interested but given the high risk they would be expecting to be granted some far-going privileges. They also expect the crown to contribute with a substantial part of the needed funds.
translation: 我们的殖民地总督写了一封信，恳请我们为了我们未来的殖民帝国采取措施保护更多的投资者。在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]金融界肯定会有利益方对此感兴趣，然而由于风险太高，他们还期许一些更大的特权。他们也希望君室能够拿出一些经费来组成他们所需资金的相当一部分。

original: Our conquests overseas have stimulated the growth of financial sector in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]. From all over our home continent investors are bringing funds to invest in an overseas colonial empire. Such speculation can be dangerous, however, and many feel we should regulate the colonial economy more clearly. By formalizing the colonial sector we can bring order to our own and concentrate on bringing civilization to these backward peoples.
translation: 我们的海外征服带动了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]金融界的增长。来自我们母大陆的投资者将许多的资金投入到我们这个海洋殖民帝国中去。这样的风险投资行为却可能引来灾难性后果，许多人也认为我们有这个必要去更加明确地规范我们的殖民地经济。通过规范殖民部门，我们可以给我们的殖民地带去秩序，也能够专注于给那些落后的民族带来文明的曙光。
我们必须等待合适的时机。

original: With the discovery and colonization of the New World a number of new crops have been introduced in the European economy. Potato, corn and tomatoes have slowly begun to spread among the farmers of Europe but old habits die hard and so far these new high yield crops have been spreading very slowly.\nWe could attempt to stimulate this process using the state coffers but those who currently dominate the agricultural markets would likely feel threatened.
translation: 随着新世界的探索和殖民活动，大量的新型农作物被引入欧洲农业经济。土豆、玉米和番茄渐渐开始被欧洲农民所播种，但是农民们旧习难改，因此这些新的高产作物推广得十分缓慢。\n我们可以动用国库来加快这一进程，但这可能会给目前农业市场的既得利益者带来威胁。

original: European merchants are an increasingly common sight in the great ports of Asia and their goods have in time come to penetrate even more distant markets in our country. Among the many new products trickling into our markets are the new crops of the Americas, potatoes, tomatoes and corn could all likely find a place in our diet but our farmers have been slow to adapt them.
translation: 欧洲商人在亚洲各大港口越来越常见，他们的货物也逐渐渗入到我国更深入内陆的市场。在这些流入我们市场的许多新产品中，土豆，番茄和玉米这些美洲作物很可能会在我们的日常饮食中占据一席之地，但我国农民接受它们的过程却非常缓慢。

original: European merchants are an increasingly common sight in the great ports and their goods have in time come to penetrate even more distant markets in our country. Among the many new products trickling into our markets are the new crops of the Americas, potatoes, tomatoes and corn could all likely find a place in our diet but our farmers have been slow to adapt them.
translation: 欧洲商人在亚洲各大港口越来越常见，他们的货物也逐渐进入了我们国家更深入内陆的市场。在这些流入我们市场的许多新产品中，土豆，番茄和玉米这些来自美洲的作物很可能会在我们的餐桌上占据一席之地，但我国的农民接受它们的过程却非常缓慢。
这是一笔肯定划得来的投资。

original: The numbers of [slaver_country.GetAdjective] merchants who seek out our markets have grown from a trickle to a steady stream. Their main interest seems to be in procuring slaves either directly or through procuring trade goods we have that can be traded for slaves. So far this has made a few local chieftains very rich, which is a dangerous development as it both empowers these local potentates and impoverishes the surrounding settlements.\nThe slave traders of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are asking that we create a more consistent framework and regulate the trade through royal monopolies. The [slaver_country.GetAdjective] themselves also seem interested in more formal and permanent arrangements.
translation: [slaver_country.GetAdjective]开拓我们市场的商人的数量已从涓涓小溪变成浩浩大川。他们的主要兴趣似乎是直接购买奴隶或者通过跟我们交易货物来换取奴隶。到目前为止，这使得一些当地酋长非常富有，这样发展下去很危险，因为它既使当地的统治者愈发有权势，又使周边的乡村更加贫瘠。\n[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的奴隶贩子们要求我们建立一种更加稳定的体制，来管理这种通过敕封的垄断权获得的贸易。[slaver_country.GetAdjective]的奴贩看起来也会对这种更正规的更长久的安排感兴趣。

original: We cannot tolerate the sale of human lives.
translation: 我们不能容忍贩卖人口的行为。

original: The [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.GetName] has contacted us and offered our traders in [slaving_point.GetName] a monopoly on the slave trade in [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] lands. In return for trading directly with [From.Monarch.GetHerHim] rather than any of the local chiefs that have supplied us so far [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] offers us a guarantee of a steady and growing supply along with [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] protection.
translation: [From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]已经联系了我们，愿意向我们在[slaving_point.GetName]的商人们提供[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]国土上的奴隶贸易的垄断权。作为交换，[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]要求的条件是我们的商人得直接与[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]进行交易，而不是与其他的能供货的地方酋长们进行交易。[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]向我们保证供应“货物”的数量能稳定增长，还同意为我们的商人提供[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]保护。

original: Our arrangements with the locals are working fine.
translation: 我们和地方的交易一直都进行得很好。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] were delighted at our proposal to regulate the volatile slave trade market and the market in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] is already growing greatly. Not everyone arriving in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are merchants however, a trickle of scribes, missionaries and mercenaries have also begun to settle in our capital. Hoping to ensure a continued growing supply of slaves the [From.GetAdjective] traders are bringing a great number of firearms with them.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]高兴地接受了我们关于规范不稳定的奴隶交易市场的建议，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的奴隶市场已经有了飞速增长。来到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的不只是商人，一小部分抄书员，传教士和雇佣兵也开始在我们首都定居。为了确保奴隶的获取量能够持续稳定的增长，[From.GetAdjective]的贸易者还带来了大量的武器。

original: Let us welcome these friends from far-away lands.
translation: 让我们欢迎来自远方的朋友们。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] have refused to acknowledge our Royal monopoly and are continuing to trade directly with the local chiefs in their area. If we don't act quickly we may soon see local strongmen funding their own private armies against the central authorities in the area.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]拒绝承认我们的敕封垄断权，准备继续直接和他们当地的酋长们直接交易。如果我们不能快速采取行动，很快我们将会看到当地一些强权人物建立其私人武装以对抗中央政府。
我们必须镇压那些悖逆的酋长们！

original: Slavers have devastated the countryside of [Root.GetName]. As a direct result of unsanctioned raids slavers from our capital have turned on our own population to line their own pockets. These traders are not only destroying our own population centers, they are building a powerbase for themselves that will be most dangerous in the long term.
translation: 奴隶贩子们已经严重破坏了[Root.GetName]的乡村。 这些来自我们首都的奴隶贩子们未经我们的允许就开始劫掠我们的土地，把我们的人口变卖成他们的囊中之财。这些贸易者不仅摧毁了我们自己的人口重镇，他们还为自己建立了一些据点，从长远看，这才是最可怕的。

original: When printing was a novelty it first attracted those who would create codices as great works of art or philanthropists who wanted to spread the knowledge of the classics in a more accessible format. Soon, however, others joined their ranks, less scrupulous men who would make a living slandering others. Ever since printing started to mature as a business presses all over Europe have been available for demagogues to spin their webs of lies. Piles of Pamphlets lie ready to be distributed to anyone who will believe them as we speak. In some part of our own lands this otherwise so promising technology has been put to use as a mean to slander our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and undermine the state. This cannot be tolerated!
translation: 当印刷术是一种新奇的事物时，它首先吸引了那些想创造优美艺术品般的法律条文的人，或想以更方便的形式传播经典作品的慈善家。后来一些缺乏良知的以诽谤为生的小人也纷纷加入了他们的行列。印刷术逐渐成熟之后，全欧洲的出版商们都可以被煽动家们用来编造谎言了。在我们讲话的时候，已经有成堆的小册子随时准备传播给任何会轻信谣言的人。 在我们国内的某些地方，这种本应很有前途的技术已经被用作诋毁我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和削弱国家的一种方法。我们决不能容忍这种行为！

original: The time for censorship has come!
We cannot control the free word...
translation: 我们不能控制自由的言论……

original: It has become increasingly fashionable for European youth of a certain quality to go on a Grand Tour to see the sights of Europe. This way the young scions of the great European houses can pay their respect to the great rulers, minds and institutions of our age while also bringing new ideas and contacts with them back to their home. We should consider sending [Root.Heir.GetName] on such a pilgrimage to further [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] education and the future prospects of our country.\nOf course an heir to a country such as ours would be expected to travel in a certain style...
translation: 环欧洲大游学在现在的欧洲年轻人之间越来越流行了。 这些欧洲各大家族的贵子贤孙们通过这条路来树立对我们时代的伟大统治者，伟大思想和伟大制度的敬仰，也会将新的观念和关系一起带回各自的家乡。我们应该考虑让[Root.Heir.GetName]参与一次这样的朝圣之旅，以进一步提升[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的教育，保障我们国家的未来。\n当然我们国家的继承人是得有一个非常体面的出行方式……

original: We have nothing to learn from foreigners.
translation: 我们没什么地方需要向外国人学习。

original: Custom dictates that European youth of quality should go on a grand tour around that continent to see the marvels of their age, meet with great minds and people of influence and generally build learn about the world and those in it. Our European friends have now extended an offer to us to send [Root.Heir.GetName] on a similar journey. To a certain extent their offer reeks of arrogance, but the things [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] could learn there may prove very valuable to [Root.GetName].
translation: 按照惯例，欧洲上流社会的青年应该在这个大陆上进行一次游学旅行，看看他们这个时代的奇迹，拜访伟大的思想家和有影响力的人，普遍地了解世界和世上的人们。我们的欧洲朋友们现在给我们的[Root.Heir.GetName]提供了一次类似的游学机会。从某种程度上来说，他们的这种慷慨散发着傲慢的恶臭，但[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]能在他们那儿学到的东西或许对[Root.GetName]会很有价值。
那就给他来一次大游学！

original: [Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap] has nothing to learn from these savages.

Foreign traders active in our lands have approached the local authorities in one of our ports asking to be allowed to expand an existing factory there by building a fort and being allowed to take up taxes from those of our subjects living within a certain radius of their factory. The traders argue that if we give them these rights they will not only be able to compensate us financially, the increased commerce and traffic to our ports in the province will lead to a general growth of the region in international trade.\nWe would, however, be allowing these Europeans to expand at the expense of our own Merchants...
translation: 在我们土地上活跃着的外国贸易商已经与我们一个港口的地方政府接洽，向其要求扩建一个工厂的权利，好让他们修建一个堡垒，并向其一定范围内的属于我们的臣民收税。这些贸易商们坚称，如果我们给予他们这些权利的话，他们不仅能给我们足够的钱作为补偿，在工厂扩张后，新增的商业活动和港口流通还能帮助当地提升在国际贸易上的发展。\n然而，放纵这些欧洲人进行扩张，是要以我们商人的利益作为代价的...

original: Grant them the right to expand their business.
translation: 给予他们扩大业务的权利。
我们绝不允许这种事的发生！

original: Enterprising traders operating in [From.GetAdjective] ports have managed to acquire substantial concessions from the local ruler. They have expanded their factory and built a small fort from which they control part of the region. This new arrangement allow the local ruler access to the global trade network but it could also be used as an easy excuse for more direct expansion into [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] lands...
translation: 在[From.GetAdjective]港口，我们进取的商人竭尽所能从当地统治者那里获得了显著的特许经营权利。他们扩大了工厂，还修造了一个小堡垒来控制那个地方的部分区域。新的协议使当地统治者得以加入全球贸易网络，但它也可以帮助我们在[From.Monarch.HerHis]领地上进行更直接的扩张…

original: [From.GetAdjective] trade power has been reduced and we have acquired a claim on one of their provinces. Should [From.GetName] chose to expel our traders in the future we may acquire a §YTrade War§! Casus Belli on them.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]贸易竞争力受损，我们获取了他们一个省份的宣称。如果 [From.GetName]未来驱逐我们的贸易商的话，我们就会获得一个为§Y贸易战争§!的宣战借口。

original: Enterprising traders operating in [From.GetAdjective] ports have tried to acquire substantial concessions from the local ruler. Their handling of the situation seems to have been less than diplomatic, however, and has ended with the local ruler denouncing them and us.
translation: 在[From.GetAdjective]港口，我们进取的商人试着从当地统治者那里获得一些实际的特许经营权。然而他们的处理方法似乎不是很灵活，此事最后以当地统治者对他们和我们的谴责而告终。

original: For centuries the mines and forges of [Root.GetName] have been famous beyond the lands of [Root.Owner.GetName] for the high output and quality of the iron produced there. The province is also unique due to the way work has been organized, a method that has been refined and recently adopted in some other parts of the country.
translation: 数百年来[Root.GetName]的采矿业和冶炼业因能产出大量优质的铁矿而名扬[Root.Owner.GetName]内外。该省也由于其组织工作的方式而独具特色。这种经过了改良的协作方法最近也推广到了国家的某些地区。

original: The cannon foundries of [Root.GetName] are famously efficient. It has been suggested that other parts of our country could benefit from adopting the methods pioneered there. Making that happen would be quite an investment but perhaps a worthwhile one...
translation: [Root.GetName]铸炮厂是出了名的效率惊人。如果把这种领先的方法推广到我国的其他地区，说不定会有很好的效果。当然，要做到这一点我们需要相当多的投入，但也许值得一试…

original: As rare and valuable as silk is there is a fair deal of secrecy around 'producing' it and creating the exquisite fabrics the market craves. The Silk weavers in [Root.Owner.GetName] have begun to pioneer a number of new mechanical solutions to some of the more common problems they face which together with a more rigorous work organization has greatly increased output in the province. With the proper support it is possible we could spread these innovations to other sectors but it would not come for free...
translation: 制造丝绸，让这种面料广受市场渴求的秘密技术和丝绸本身一样珍贵。 [Root.Owner.GetName]的丝织工已经开始对一些新的机械编织法进行创新来解决他们遇到的一些很普遍问题，与此同时他们还采用了更严密的组织协作方式，极大地增加该省的丝绸产量。通过进行一些协助，我们或许可以把这些创新方法推广到其他领域，但是它肯定得花上一笔开销…

original: The [Root.GetCapitalName] weavers are famous and have over time come to dominate the economic sector of the entire [Root.GetName] province. Over time production have gone from many small businesses to larger and larger organizations controlled by merchant capitalist investors. This system has been so successful to the investors behind it that they are now looking into ways to spread their methods to other parts of the country. To do so, however, they are asking for our support.
translation: [Root.GetCapitalName]纺织产业远近闻名，随着时间的推移，他们逐渐主导了整个[Root.GetName]省的经济领域。现如今，生产活动已经从很多小企业转移到了被商业资本投资者控制的越来越大的组织了。这一体系对其背后的投资者来说是如此的成功，以至于他们正在研究如何将他们的方法推广到该国的其他地区。为了达成他们的目的，他们现在正寻求我们的支持。

original: We should spread this method to all parts of our country.
translation: 我们应该把这种方法推广到全国各地去。

original: It has become increasingly fashionable for European youth of a certain quality to go on a Grand Tour to see the sights of Europe. This way the young scions of the great European houses can pay their respect to the great rulers, minds and institutions of our age while also bringing new ideas and contacts with them back to their home. We should consider sending [Root.Heir.GetName] on such a pilgrimage to further [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] education and the future prospects of our country.\nOf course an heir to a country such as ours would be expected to travel in a certain style...
translation: 环欧洲大游学在现在的欧洲年轻人之间越来越流行了。 这些欧洲各大家族的贵子贤孙们通过这条路来树立对我们时代的伟大统治者，伟大思想和伟大制度的敬仰，也会将新的观念和关系一起带回各自的家乡。我们应该考虑让[Root.Heir.GetName]参与一次这样的朝圣之旅，以进一步提升[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的教育，保障我们国家的未来。\n当然我们国家的继承人是得有一个非常体面的出行方式…

original: We have nothing to learn from foreigners.
translation: 我们没什么地方需要向外国人学习。

original: Custom dictates that European youth of quality should go on a grand tour around that continent to see the marvels of their age, meet with great minds and people of influence and generally build learn about the world and those in it. Our European friends have now extended an offer to us to send [Root.Heir.GetName] on a similar journey. To a certain extent their offer reeks of arrogance, but the things [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] could learn there may prove very valuable to [Root.GetName].
translation: 按照惯例，欧洲上流社会的青年应该在这个大陆上进行一次游学旅行，看看他们这个时代的奇迹，拜访伟大的思想家和有影响力的人，普遍地了解世界和世上的人们。我们的欧洲朋友们现在给我们的[Root.Heir.GetName]提供了一次类似的游学机会。从某种程度上来说，他们的这种慷慨散发着傲慢的恶臭，但[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]能在他们那儿学到的东西或许对[Root.GetName]会很有价值。
那就给他来一次大游学！

original: [Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap] has nothing to learn from these savages.

Today a most unusual group of people arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] asking for an audience with our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. The leader of the group introduced himself as the representative of an institution of learning in a far away land. They state that their mission in our lands is to document, measure and categorize our plants, wildlife and society. They wish to learn everything they can about our country and then take this knowledge elsewhere so that others may compare what they find to other parts of the world. It is quite clear that these are men of learning and that we could probably put some of that knowledge to good use. If we allow them to travel our lands as freely as they wish, however, we risk dangerous intelligence falling into the hands of what may well be foreign spies...
translation: 今天一群极为特殊的人抵达了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，请求拜见我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。这群人的首领自称是远方大陆上一处学府的代表。他们表示，自己来到这里的任务，是为了考证、测量我们这里的植物、动物及社会现状并进行归类。他们希望尽可能地学习有关我们国度的一切，再把这些知识带往别处，这样一来其他人就可以将他们发现的东西与世界上其他地方的情况相比较。很显然这些人都是饱学之士，而且我们大概也能好好地利用其中的一些知识。但是，如果我们允许他们在我们的土地上随心所欲地游历，我们就会冒着情报工作方面的危险，重要的情报很可能会落入这些还可能是外国间谍的家伙手中……

original: We must learn from these fascinating men.
translation: 我们要向这些有趣的人们学习。

original: We cannot allow them to penetrate our countryside.
translation: 我们不能让他们渗透到我们的乡村。

original: Public houses, coffee houses and other places where the public can convene and discuss have traditionally often also been the place where criticism and discontent brews. This has changed lately, however, as the political discussion has both gotten more general and more engaged. While much of the discussion is not strictly aimed at lambasting the [Root.Owner.GetAdjective] government it seems it still often reflects very poorly on us.\nSome would say that we could benefit from this free discussion but others recommend that we close down these public areas immediately.
translation: 酒馆、咖啡馆以及其他公众们会聚集并讨论一些事情的地方通常也滋生着批评与牢骚的声音。然而，由于近来有关政治的讨论变得更为普遍，更为激烈，这一状况已经变得更糟。我们明白许多的讨论并不完全是直接针对[Root.Owner.GetAdjective]政府的批判，这些讨论似乎还是常常弥漫着对我们的不满。\n一些人会认为，自由的讨论还是有利于我们的政治的，但也有人建议我们立刻关闭这些公共区域。

original: For as long as anyone can remember shadow puppet theatre has been a popular form of entertainment in coffee houses throughout the Near East and South Asia. The comic relief provided by stock characters such as Karagöz and Hacivat coupled with the possibilities for satirical adaption to current events has allowed the genre to outlive many empires.\nRecently, however, local officials in [Root.GetName] are reporting a sharp rise in public ridicule being directed at the government in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]. While this is likely a symptom of a greater dissatisfaction with our inability to adapt to the new ideals spreading in our country the quickest way to address the problem is likely to silence these puppeteers and restore order to the public houses of the area.
translation: 自打人们记事以来，不管是在近东还是在南亚，皮影戏这种咖啡馆娱乐表演就总是广受大众欢迎。像卡拉格兹和哈西瓦特这样的脸谱化角色总能让人开怀大笑，大师们还可以参照时事进行讽刺改编创作，因此，这一艺术类型甚至比许多帝国更为长命。\n然而近来一些[Root.GetName]的本地官员作报告称，针对[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]当局的公开讥讽剧正与日俱增。这或许是一种人们对我们越发不满的征兆，毕竟，我们在那些正在传播的新思想面前表现得顽冥不化，难以适应。不过，让这些皮影技师闭嘴，并恢复这一地区咖啡馆的秩序，或许才是解决问题最快的方法。

original: We cannot control what people think.
translation: 我们不能控制人们的想法。

original: The emphasis on offensive fills our soldiers with zeal and ardor.
translation: 强有力的进攻提振了我军士气

original: Our Infantry men are the backbone of our army and their attack proves almost as devastating as a cavalry charge.
translation: 步兵军队的顶梁柱，强有力的步兵进攻和骑兵冲锋一样威力惊人

original: The Cavalry Companions are the cream of the army, always ready to attack and have the skill and ability to be the ultimate arm of decision.
translation: 王伴骑兵是军中骄子，随时准备战斗，其战斗力足以成为杀手锏

original: Our ships may be made of wood, but the men who sail them are to be seen to believe. Brave and steadfast, they are always willing to engage the enemy in close combat.
translation: 虽然我们的战舰是木制的，但船员却个顶个的强悍.他们英勇无畏，随时准备近身与敌作战.

original: To win this war we must maximize our income and trade is a source we must not forget about. We must ensure that our ships that protect our commerce get the pick of the men when it comes to replacing losses.
translation: 要赢得战争，我们必须尽可能增加收入，而贸易却是条不容忽视的途径.必须保证给保护贸易的战舰补充最好的兵员

original: The quality of our naval crews really stands out and our men know it. Always ready for battle they cannot wait for yet another chance to prove their mettle in combat.
translation: 船员的综合素质的确很突出，他们也清楚这一点.他们摩拳擦掌，跃跃欲试，就等着一个证明他们勇猛的机会

original: Our army's quality manifests itself in the discipline of our troops, our men know it and are ready to show our enemies their mettle.
translation: 我军实力之强从纪律上显露无遗，士兵自己也深知这一点，随时准备痛击敌军

original: A defeat is only a defeat if the army believes it is beaten. Our high quality armies view these events as temporary setbacks before the inevitable victory. Thus our men are not just always ready to return to the fight, these days they are positively keen to do so.
translation: 一息尚存，战斗不止.我们强大的军队只会将其视为通往胜利道路上小挫折而已.因此，这些天，他们不只随时准备再次投入战斗，而是积极求战

original:
Back to the front
You will do what I say when I say
Back to the front
You will die when I say you must die
translation:
重回前线
我的话就是圣旨
重回前线

original: The brave and steadfast men who sail our wooden ships are always willing to engage the enemy.
translation: 驾驶木船英勇无畏的船员，时刻准备痛击敌人

original: The ships that protect our commerce will get the pick of the men when replacing losses.
translation: 保护贸易的战舰将得到最好的兵员补充

original: Our powerful fleet with the quality naval crews is one of the best in the world.
translation: 我们强大的舰队，载着优秀的水兵，在世界上名列前茅

original: The fires of the faith are strong in our [Root.GovernmentName]! Every day people are flocking to join or in some way support our missionaries as they seek to encourage a [Root.Religion.GetName] way of life throughout our lands. Those we seek to convert cannot help but be impressed by the zeal possessed by our subjects.
translation: 信仰之火熊熊燃烧，人心倍受鼓舞，四处传播.即使现在，人们依旧竞相加入传教工作，到处播撒信仰火种.我们试图转化的那些人，也不禁被我们的那份热忱所感染，而那份热忱也正是由信仰所激发.

original: War for the faith is a war that is just and true. Already important monks and clergy are preaching to the masses of the importance of this war. People are rallying to ensure that victory is won.
translation: 信仰之战是一场公平正义的战争.身居要职的修道士和僧侣，早已告诫大众这场战争的意义.人们团结一致，确保胜券在握.

original: Our wayward brothers in one of our provinces have seen the errors of their ways and come back to the one and only true faith. They are all saved.
translation: 我们某省任性的兄弟认识到了他们的错误，回归到了唯一正确的信仰，他们都得救了。

original: The people of one of our provinces having seen the power of our faith have spontaneously chosen to embrace it. It is a proud day for us as yet more souls are saved.
translation: 我们一个省份的人民，见识到了我们信仰的力量，不由自主地选择接受它。今天对我们来说是个值得骄傲的一天，更多的灵魂得到救赎。

original: The current period of uncertainty has been gnawing at the minds of the common people. However, since our religious leaders recently took a stand, declaring these harsh times a test of our faith, matters have stabilized. People all over our [Root.GovernmentName] are now finding comfort in their religious community.
translation: 当前的动荡，侵蚀了大众的思想.然而我们的宗教领袖站出来告诉民众，这只不过是对他们信仰的考验.听到这些，人民倍感欣慰

original: We take strength in each other.
In matters of faith we are second to none. Our support for our religion and the devotion we show impresses people around us.
translation: 我们的宗教无可匹敌.我们对自己宗教的支持以及奉献，感染了周围的民众

original: Our love of the true faith knows no bounds, and our people feel secure and safe knowing this. Their fate after death is our number one concern.
translation: 我们对真正信仰的狂热无可限量，人民深知于心，感到安全.我们最关注他们死后的命运

original: We are deeply devoted to the true faith, making our people feel secure and safe knowing that their fate after death is our number one concern.
translation: 我们深深地奉献给了真正的信仰，使我们人民感到安全，因为他们知道自己死后的命运是我们最关注的

original: Our ambassadors have been very good at spreading a favorable opinion of $COUNTRY$ in foreign courts. The fact that we are at peace certainly helps this matter.
translation: 我国大使非常擅长在外国宫廷传播对$COUNTRY$有利的观点。我国处于太平盛世的事实无疑也证实了这一点。
告诉他们善意的小谎言……

original: We have appointed too many inbred nobles to the position of diplomat. They are making fools of themselves, which was probably expected, but what is worse, they are also embarrassing our country.
translation: 我们任命了太多的近亲贵族担任外交官。他们经常当众出丑，这是可能预料的事。但更糟糕的是，他们也使我们的国家难堪。

original: They are of noble blood though...
Our diplomats have been so incompetent lately, that they simply can't be believed when they are trying to fabricate claims.
translation: 我们的外交官们最近一直无能，他们伪造的宣称根本无法取信于人。

original: One young man in our diplomatic corps has distinguished himself significantly. He is a truly gifted individual and utterly loyal to $COUNTRY$. Our nation will benefit from his work for a long time.
translation: 一个年轻人在外交使团中表现突出.他是个真正终于$COUNTRYNAME$的天才.在很长一段时间里，我们的国家将受益于他的工作.

original: He will be a servant of the Empire!
A brilliant diplomat is maintaining relations with one country basically on his own!
translation: 聪明的外交官有助于和他国保持良好关系

original: Sometimes when countries have different types of governments they just do not understand each other fully. With our competent diplomats we have reconciled differences with one of our neighbors.
translation: 有时，当国家政府形式不同时，他们只是没有充分明白对方.我们与我们的外交官力图和邻居调和分歧

original: Our diplomatic reputation has improved lately, due to our hardworking diplomats.
translation: 因为我们勤奋的外交官，我们的外交声誉近期有所改善。

original: Our babbling buffoons of diplomats have ruined our reputation.
translation: 我们咿呀学语的小丑外交官已经毁了我们的声誉.

original: With the hard work of our diplomats, who have toiled day and night, our reputation has improved and the world looks upon us with favor.
translation: 随着我们的外交官，劳碌一天一夜的辛勤工作，我们的声誉有所改善，世界友善的看待我们。

original: Diplomat after diplomat has failed us, their incompetence so flabbergasting that the world has started to see us in a different light. Our inept diplomats have ruined our reputation!
translation: 一个又一个的外交官让我们失望了，他们的无能让世界看到我们的眼神里充满了诧异.我们不称职的外交官已经毁了我们的信誉！

original: I wish I could execute them

Our enemies have always grumbled about our demands, not quite believing that they are truly justified. With our new, effective diplomatic corps whose administrative ability we deeply believe in we should be able to justify our wars and demands.
translation: 我们的敌人常常对我们的宣称表达不满，他们质疑我们的正当性。随着新的高效外交团队的建立，我们深信其管理能力，能为我们的战争和宣称提供正当化理由。

original: We have the administrative ability in our diplomatic corps to make our demands seem more justified.
translation: 我们的外交使团的出色能力让我们的要求变得更加合理

original: A horse is best bought as a cavalry mount at the age of 3 or 4. Fortunately for us over the last few years we have an above average amount of horses born. This increase in supply has made the recruitment of cavalrymen much cheaper.
translation: 买一匹马作为坐骑的最佳时间大概是马在3或4岁的时候.幸运的是，在过去的几年中，我们马匹的出生率高于平均值，这使得招募骑兵要便宜许多

original: Turning a man into a soldier is expensive and time consuming. One of the biggest costs is the necessary equipment that turns a defenseless man into a relentless killing machine. Fortunately we have found that we have a stockpile of such equipment sitting around. It is in poor condition and won't last long, but if we were to use it now we could get men into uniform much cheaper.
translation: 将一个人训练成士兵是昂贵且耗时的。其中最大的花费之一，就是那些能将一个手无寸铁的人武装成无情的杀人机器所需的装备。幸运的是我们发现我们有一些闲置的武器储备。这些武器状况很差且无法长久使用，但如果我们利用它们的话，组建部队的成本就大大降低了。

original: Let's make use of it while we still can
translation: 趁着它们还能使用，让我们好好利用它们

original: Well, not just iron, but the most expensive part of a cannon is the metal. A recent glut in the market has made metal prices cheap for the time being.
translation: 好了，最近我们市场上廉价的金属价格让大炮的成本降低了

original: We should take advantage of this

Growing trees for timber is a bit of unpredictable business, taking many years before a tree is ready for harvesting. The recent crop of timber has struggled to find a buyer and thus makes the business of ship building timber easier. The wood will not last forever and who knows what future supplies will be like.
translation: 木材种植生意有些不可预料，前几年种下的树木开始收获，植树者艰难的寻找买家，这样，造船木材的生意更容易了.情况不会永远这样，谁知道未来的供应将会怎样

original: Men are flocking to the colors, begging for a chance to serve in our glorious armed forces. God is truly on the side of the big battalions!
translation: 人们争先恐后地乞求加入我们光荣的军队的机会.上帝真的是站在我们这边的！

original: Some sort of strange blight has been affecting our timber. The wood is covered with some sort of fungal growth that renders it useless for anything except burning. It makes sourcing timber for ship construction much harder.
translation: 某种奇怪的疫病一直影响着我们的木材.木材覆盖着某种真菌的，这样的木材除了拿去烧火，一点用也没有.这使得船舶建造更难采购木材.

original: It is becoming increasingly difficult to administer our armies. The men we have in the job are proving inept and far too venal. We search for men who are just corrupt enough to be bought, without being too greedy, until this is done our military administration will prove costly.
translation: 管理我们的军队变得越来越困难.我们的人大多被收买了.我们必须得找那些不那么贪婪，不容易被收买的人.这样，军事管理成本大大增加了

original: The metal used for cannons is usually very expensive, but metal prices has dropped, making it cheaper to make cannons.
translation: 大炮用的金属通常是非常昂贵的，但金属价格有所下降，这使大炮变便宜了

original: More horses than usual have been born over the last few years, which has made the recruitment of cavalrymen much cheaper.
translation: 在过去几年中出生了比平常更多的马，这使得招募骑兵便宜得多.

original: We have a stockpile of the necessary equipment that turns a defenseless man into a relentless killing machine.
translation: 我们储存了大量武器，可以让手无寸铁的人使用

original: We have a surplus of timber as the recent crop of timber has struggled to find a buyer and thus makes the business of ship building timber easier.
translation: 近几个季度，木材商一直在努力寻找买家，从而使造船木材的生意更容易，我们有盈余的木材.

original: We have a shortage of timber as the wood has been deemed unsuitable for ship building due to the fungal growth that covers it, thus making it harder to find enough timber for ship constructing.
translation: 我们正遭遇木材短缺，真菌破坏了木材，造船的时候更难找到足够的木材了

original: Due to inept men, our armies have become increasingly difficult to administer and the solution is very costly, as the new administration is both greedy and corrupt.
translation: 由于无能的人，我们的军队已经变得越来越难以管理，而解决这个问题需要大量金钱

original: The country is feeling the strain of war and people everywhere and looking for hope in this trying time. The nobility has stepped up, offering support and encouragement to those who have suffered.
translation: 国家感受到战争的压力.在这艰难的时刻，贵族愿意为国家提供支持和鼓励.

original: We thank them for their support
Our emphasis on a strong aristocracy has given the nobility means to serve in the army, they are devoting more of their attention to military. One has published a treatise on military thought.
translation: 我们鼓励贵族参军，而他们自己则投入了大量注意力，甚至发表了关于军事思想的论文

original: With word reaching the aristocracy that our national power is not in optimal shape they offered up their serfs for service in the military.
translation: 在征兵命令下达后，贵族让他们的奴仆加入我们的军队

original: Mercenaries always follow the money and our plutocratic traditions make mercenary captains think the profit is here.
translation: 佣兵认为帮助我们的利润更高，于是大量涌入我国

original: Our plutocratic traditions have made the always money-seeking mercenaries flock to our standard.
translation: 我们的财阀传统让寻求赚钱的佣兵涌入我国

original: They come to take our most sacred liberties, they come for our very freedom. We will fight and yes we may die, but we will have the chance to tell our enemies that they may takes our lives but they will never take our freedom.
translation: 他们试图夺走我们最神圣的自由.我们会努力战斗，是的，我们可能会死，但我们要告诉我们的敌人，他们也许可以夺走我们的生命，但他们决不会夺走我们的自由.

original: We will always fight for freedom, our enemies may take our lives as we fight, we might die but they will never take our freedom!
translation: 我们会努力战斗，他们也许可以夺走我们的生命，但他们决不会夺走我们的自由.

original: We don't need to fight for our rights, the plutocratic principles of our government enshrine our rights and protect them. This is something worth standing for and worth cherishing.
translation: 我们不需要去争取我们的权利，财阀原则就是我们的权利，我们要保护她，这是值得守护的东西

original: The plutocratic principles of our government protect our rights and we will never need to fight for them. We stand for this and we cherish this!
translation: 我国政府的财阀法律保护我们的权利.我们守护着他，我们非常珍惜这一切！

original: In Defense of the Mercantile Interest

The Mercantile interest is the underpinning of the plutocratic ideal of our great republic. We must ensure that our laws properly defend the interests of our merchants from unfair foreign competition.
translation: 商业利益是我们伟大共和国的财阀理念的基础。我们必须确保我们的法律在不公平的国际竞争中捍卫我国商人的利益。

original: It is only right and proper
Our farms are enjoying a boom in productivity, this in turn is giving a boost to all areas of our economy. This is good because there is more to tax.
translation: 我们的农场十分兴旺，这反过来又推动我国经济的各个领域的发展.这是好事，因为会有更多的税收.

original: While our farms enjoy a boom in productivity, it gives a boost to all areas of our economy, which in turn gives us more to tax.
translation: 我们的农场十分兴旺，这反过来又推动我国经济的各个领域的发展，这给我国带来更多的税收。

original: Our government is making a special effort to make sure that people of different creeds are tolerated, as long as they have money.
translation: 我们的政府作出了特别的努力，只要有钱，随便你信仰什么。

original: With the war raging, patriots everywhere are flocking to the colors to ensure our proud republic is defended from the enemies of liberty everywhere.
translation: 随着战争的肆虐，爱国者加入军队，以保护我们引以为豪的共和国

original: Patriots flock to defend our proud republic's liberty from enemies.
translation: 随着战争的肆虐，爱国者加入军队，以保护我们引以为豪的共和国

original: People of all creeds are tolerated by the government, as long as they have money.
translation: 我们的政府作出了特别的努力，只要有钱，随便你信仰什么。

original: A man in the General Staff
With the help of an easily bribed man in the General Staff of our enemy, we have secretly laid open the war plans and placement of enemy troops. Our spies have yet again proved their worth.
translation: 我们在收买的总参内应手中知道的敌军的战争计划和军队位置.我们的间谍又一次证明了自己的价值.

original: This will be to our advantage

Due to our excellent spies, our espionage activities are carefully hidden and sealed from both enemy and allied eyes alike. This has proven very useful in the past, and will surely be especially useful in the future.
translation: 由于我们优秀的间谍活动都是经过了惊心策划的.躲过了敌人专业的审查.这在未来将会有大作用的

original: Our agents doing covert operations are rather good at keeping themselves hidden, and minimizing the impact of their actions.
translation: 我们秘密行动的特工潜伏了起来，尽量减少他们的行动会有不错的效果

original: Our spies have presented us with a way to efficiently support rebels in rival or enemy countries with a lower risk of getting discovered. The details are long and boring, but the spies have a persuasive way of explaining the new method.
translation: 我们的间谍发现了支持他国反政府武装的新方法.细节有些漫长而枯燥，但他们的方法还是颇有说服力的

original: As long as our hands do not get dirty...
We have become more efficient when supporting rebels in rival or enemy countries.
translation: 我们的间谍发现了支持他国反政府武装的新方法

original: As our diplomats are sometimes engaged in a bit shadier aspects of international diplomacy, they have gained a certain reputation. This is now having an impact on our nation's prestige.
translation: 由于我们的外交官们有时会卷入阴暗的事务，他们现在已经获得了一定的声誉.现在这对我们国家的声誉造成影响.

original: When you have a diplomatic corps that is experienced with finding information, they find stuff internally as well. It seems our beloved $MONARCHTITLE$ has not been doing his duties to his wife, but instead been out seducing young noblewomen. He has even gotten one of them with child.
translation: 当我们的外交使团在寻找信息的时候，他们偶然间发现我们敬爱的$MONARCHTITLE$并没有忠诚地对待妻子，而是勾引年轻的贵妇.甚至他还和其中一个有了孩子

original: Our $MONARCHTITLE$ have been told that he has to make his wife pregnant for the good of the realm.
translation: 我们的$MONARCHTITLE$被告知，为了国家，他必须让妻子怀孕

original: There has been some irritation among the diplomatic corps lately regarding our focus on covert actions. The diplomats feel that this focus limits their ability and demand that we find more uses for them, some that do not involve covert actions, or else...
translation: 我们最近对秘密行动的关注已经引起了外交使团的不满.外交官们认为这种关注影响了他们自己的发挥.我们必须得让他们参加一些不涉及秘密的行动，否则……

original: Our focus on covert actions is limiting the ability of our diplomatic corps.
translation: 我们最近对秘密行动的关注影响了他们自己的发挥

original: Our spies discover a good bureaucrat
translation: 我们的间谍发现了一个出色的官员

original: Our diplomats are always on the lookout to find good and competent workers for the good of the realm. Now one of our diplomats has found a truly gifted low-born who can be employed in a department of our government.\nWhere shall we employ him?
translation: 我们的外交官一直在努力寻找能干的工人.现在我们的一个外交官发现了一个身份低下，但极有天赋的人，他很适合加入政府部门\n我们要将他掉入哪个部门？

original: Our Colonists have managed to reach out to the Natives and arrive at an understanding with them. This understanding has allowed our colony greater scope for growth without the natives getting upset.
translation: 我们的殖民者接触当地人，并与他们达成谅解.这一认识允许我们的殖民地更快成长，而不会刺激到当地人

original: A pioneer colony is very much a man's place, but as a colony develops we look to switch growth from emigration to new births. The colonial company responsible for one of our colonies has arranged a number of marriageable women, mostly widows, to travel to the colony to see that families are started.
translation: 边远殖民地是男人的地盘，但为了殖民地的发展，我们需要一定的女性.一个殖民地的殖民公司负责安排了许多适婚女性，其中大部分是寡妇，前往殖民地组建新的家庭

original: The Encomienda System gives each colonist a number of natives to tutor and protect and, in return, the natives will provide a number of days of labor to our colonists.
translation: 赐封系统要求每个殖民者为当地人提供教育和保护，作为回报，当地人需要为殖民者提供劳动力

original: The matter of the native population is of a key concern to us. We need to ensure that natives under our care are protected from hostile neighbors, properly civilized and practice the true faith. Our plan is to give our colonists this duty, each will be given a number of natives to tutor and protect. This is obviously not something people will do for free so in return the natives will provide a number of days of labor to our colonists.
translation: 外来人口的问题是我们的一个关键问题.我们需要确保我们的关怀下，当地人免受敌对邻国的影响，拥有正确文明和信仰.我们的计划是给我们的殖民者任务，他们会给当地人提供教育和保护.而当地人则提供劳力作为回报

original: Hoping to do good works, men of faith have been going amongst the population of our colonies spreading the true faith. This gives us a good foothold for a more formal missionary effort.
translation: 为了干好工作，虔信者在殖民地中传播真正的信仰，这给我们的传教工作很好的立足点

original: The true faith has spread throughout the population of our colonies, which gives us a good foothold for a more formal missionary effort.
translation: 真正的信仰已经遍及我们的殖民地，这给我们的传教工作很好的立足点

original: Our colonial efforts are spread thin. One of our colonies has run into trouble, food has become difficult to find, many have died and yet more have left the colony and returned home.
translation: 我们的一个殖民地运营陷入困境，食品匮乏，有些人已经死亡，或离开了殖民地

original: One of our colonies has suffered a run of poor harvests. This has led to food shortages and the colony is looking less attractive to new immigrants, while others are leaving to return home. This is harming the colony's prospects.
translation: 我们的殖民地之一已经遭遇歉收.这导致粮食短缺，减少殖民地对新移民的吸引力，而另一些则离开回国.这损害了殖民地的前景.

original: Our merchants have managed to gain an advantage over other merchants. Although this advantage won't last forever, for now our merchants are cashing in.
translation: 我们的商户已经比其他商家获得优势.虽然这种优势不会永远持续下去，总之现在赚钱了

original: The fight for trade in the world is competitive, but one of our merchants has managed to secure a preferential deal with local suppliers. Although we will not be able to keep this deal forever, for now we are able to bring forward more change.
translation: 在争取世界贸易竞争力的战斗中，我们的一个商人与当地供应商达成了优惠的合同.虽然这种交易未必长久，但是目前已经不错了

original: The biggest problem with collecting income from trade is the smuggling. Our government policy of supporting the mercantile interests has led the merchant class to cooperate more against those who choose to smuggle. At least for a while.
translation: 贸易收入的最大问题是走私.我们的政府政策支持商业利益，这让我们和走私的商人阶层达成合作.
对重商主义政策的支持

original: The mercantile interest has lobbied for an expansion of mercantilist policies. We are considering an expansion in these policies to see if they would be beneficial to our nation.
translation: 重商主义政策扩大商业利益.我们正在考虑推行这些政策，看他们是否将有利于我们的国家.

original: It is hard to fathom but for some reason the amount of income from trade has simply collapsed. The cargoes just don't seem to be landed. Is it smuggling? Is it merchants going elsewhere? We do not know but things are grim...
translation: 出于某种原因，贸易的收入已完全倒塌.货物总是卖不出去.它是走私吗？还是商人离开了呢？我们不知道，但事情是严峻...

original: There is nothing we can do
Due to some unforeseen problems, the trade has collapsed.
translation: 由于一些不可预见的问题，贸易已经崩溃.

original: The merchant class is cooperating against those who choose to smuggle, thanks to our government policy of supporting the mercantile interests.
translation: 商人阶层正在合作打击那些走私的人，这要感谢我们的政府政策支持商业利益.

original: A preferential deal with local suppliers has been secured by one of our merchants, giving us a competitive advantage.
translation: 与当地供应商达成了优惠的交易，这给我们带来竞争优势.

original: Our country's thinkers, encouraged by the open-minded stance of our government are engaged in a burst of thought in the area of administration, asking themselves the question, how can we govern better?
translation: 我国政府开明的态度鼓舞我国的思想家对行政管理领域的思考，我们如何能更好地治理？

original: Our thinkers, taking the cue from the government's relaxed attitude to these things, have started to take interest in those who are not like us. Those who speak a different language or live in another country, these ideas will help them when it comes to dealing with those people.
translation: 我国政府开明的态度鼓舞我国的思想家对行政管理领域的思考.那些说不同语言的人会有怎样的方法，可以更好的和人打交道？

original: Now they are speaking my language...
translation: 现在，他们与我持相同立场……

original: The military arms has always been a fascination for men everywhere. They have turned this fascination into concrete ideas that we can use.
translation: 军事武器一直让世界各地的男人迷恋.我们可以利用这一点

original: One of our colonies has received a surge in immigrants seeking their fortune in our colonies. It will soon be a self-supporting city providing much wealth to our realm.
translation: 我们的殖民地的移民激增.它很快就会成为自收自支的城市，并向我们提供财富

original: Our decision to grant a concession to a merchant company has proven to be wise. Our earning has been greatly enhanced, and this money can be beneficial for other things.
translation: 我们决定授予商人公司特许权的行为已被证明是明智的.我们的收入已经大大提高了

original: 'A new life awaits you in the colonies! A chance to start over in a golden land of opportunity and adventure.' Colonial life isn't like this, but people believe it and are racing to get to the colonies before the opportunities disappear.
translation: “新的生活等待着你在殖民地！利用这个偶然的机会，开始新的世界打拼和冒险.“殖民地的生活不是这样，但人们相信如此，都争着前往殖民地.

original: Our diplomatic corps has been working hard to ensure that our interests are represented in foreign courts. Their efforts have allowed us to spread the net of our influence yet further.
translation: 我们外交使团一直在努力确保我们在外国宫廷的利益.这有助于传播我们的影响力

original: Our ship building industry had experienced a boom in orders for merchant ships. This boom has ended and now there is surplus yard capacity. This will not last long but our navy could profit from it.
translation: 我们的造船业经历了一个繁荣的商船的订单.这股热潮已经结束，现在产能有些过剩.这不会持续很长时间，但我们的海军可以从中获利.

original: For long have our diplomats worked on ensuring that our reputation is the best it can be. A curious constellation of events has led to us enjoying an enhanced diplomatic reputation.
translation: 对于长时间了我们的外交工作，我们的信誉良好.一次简单的时间让我们获得了极好的声誉

original: Our merchant class is enjoying uncanny success around the world. Some say it is just random luck, but we care not, wealth is wealth regardless of how we come by it.
translation: 我们的商人阶层在世界取得了不可思议的成功.有人说这是运气，但我们不在乎，财富就是财富，无论是如何来的.

original: Let them share the wealth....with us
translation: 让他们……和我们共享财富

original: A disaster has struck one of our colonies, many settlers have died and yet more have returned home. This is a disaster and we may even lose our colony.
translation: 灾难降临我们的殖民地，许多定居者已经死亡，更多的已经返回家园.这是一场灾难，我们甚至可能会失去我们的殖民地.

original: Our merchants have been performing poorly as of late, our great emporiums are empty of the goods of the world and more importantly our revenues are down.
translation: 近来我们的商人表现不佳，我们巨大的商场里缺乏来自世界各地的商品，更重要的是我们的营业收入下降了。

original: A surge of requests for ships by various people has led to a surge in demand for shipping from various sources increasing the time and cost of ships. Although no one would dare charge us more for ships, it is taking longer to build them.
translation: 由于船只需求激增，材料的价格也上涨了，增加船舶的建造时间和成本.尽管没人敢向我们收取的船舶的费用，但造船时间被延长了

original: In the middle of a very import state event at the court of one of our neighbors, our ambassador committed the most terrible faux pas. Word of this has spread and our diplomats are finding life more difficult as our neighbors devote a large amount of time to laughing at them.
translation: 在重要邻国的一次活动中，我们的大使犯下可怕的错误.不良影响已蔓延，我们的外交官们发现生活更加困难，因为我们的邻居花了大量时间来嘲笑他们

original: A diplomatic faux pas committed by one of our ambassador has made life more difficult for our diplomats.
translation: 我们的大使犯下可怕的错误.不良影响已蔓延，我们的外交官们发现生活更加困难

original: The performance of our merchants has been poor lately, leading to lowered revenues.
translation: 我们的商户的表现一直不佳，最近导致收入降低.

original: Merchants are enjoying a slightly uncanny success around the world, leading to more wealth for us.
translation: 商人在世界获得成功，给我们带来更多财富

original: Hard work by our diplomats and a curious constellation of events have led to us enjoying an enhanced diplomatic reputation.
translation: 外交官的努力工作之下，我们拥有了良好的外交声誉

original: After a boom in orders for merchant ships, there is a surplus yard capacity that our navy could profit from.
translation: 在订单激增之后，多余的船坞可以让我们的海军得利

original: Our hard-working diplomats have ensured that our interests are represented in foreign courts, allowing us to spread the net of our influence even further.
translation: 我们辛勤工作的外交官已确保我们在国外宫廷的利益，这让我们传播自己的影响

original: Our men have been drilled to the pitch of military efficiency. Like a coiled spring we cannot maintain this high level for too long. Still, for a while our armies will stand where lesser men would run.
translation: 我们的人都投入刻苦的训练中.这样高强度的训练不会保持太久.但目前，我们的部队变得更加精锐了

original: Our men are proud of their regiments at the best of times but these days their pride knows no bounds. The healthy competition between regiments means that they are outdoing each other to ensure their own perfection. The really nice thing is they are buying equipment for themselves, to ensure that they have the best available, so we don't have to buy it for them ourselves.
translation: 我们的人为他们的部队感到自豪.部队之间的良性竞争意味着他们可以不断完善自我.最妙的是他们自己购买设备，以确保他们更加好用，所以我们就不必自己买了

original: Let the word go round to every village, hamlet and town, that no support should be offered to the enemy. Any attempt to take the enemy's coin will be punished when victory is won. Let no one be in doubt in our resolve to see this done.
translation: 让命令下达到每一个村庄和城镇，决不能给敌人支持.任何收取敌人钱物的人，在胜利后都会收到严惩.在看到我们这么做以后，没人会质疑我们的决心的

original: We are not often able to do this, but right now the time is right to whip up our men into new levels of fanaticism. They are ready to defend our fortresses to the very last man.
translation: 现在是时候激起我们的狂热了，我们准备死守城池，直到最后一人

original: Good foraging relies on the man being sent to forage to willingly make sacrifices to ensure that his comrades also receive their rations. He is required to walk great distances after a full day's march to bring food for his comrades. The stronger the bond between messmates, the further the forager will go and the better fed the army will be. The current war has created a strong spirit amongst the men and the foraging is going exceptionally well.
translation: 军人心甘情愿地做出牺牲，以确保他的战友们也收到他们的口粮.一整天的行军后，会有人走很远的路，带食物给他的战友们.同餐之友之间的纽带，一方面补充军队给养，另一方面培养了战友之情

original: The high level of military efficiency will not last for long, but for a while our armies will stand where lesser men would run.
translation: 高水平的军事效率不会持续太久，但是目前我们一人顶十人

original: The pride our men feel for their regiments knows no bounds, and the healthy competition among them means that they are outdoing each other to ensure their own perfection.
translation: 我们的人为他们的部队感到自豪.部队之间的良性竞争意味着他们可以不断完善自我.

original: Threatening punishment to any who help the enemy and take the enemy's coin will ensure that no village, hamlet or town will support the enemy in any way.
translation: 任何收取敌人钱物的人，在胜利后都会收到严惩之类的威胁确保敌人无法获得支持

original: The fanaticism whipped up in our men readies them to defend our fortresses to the very last man.
translation: 狂热让我们准备死守城池，直到最后一人

original: The current war has created a strong spirit amongst the men and the foraging is going exceptionally well.
translation: 同餐之友之间的纽带，一方面补充军队给养.另一方面培养了战友之情

original: A large group of shipwrights have discovered a way to make a few new ships quickly for no extra cost for $COUNTRY$. What type of ships do we need?
translation: 人们已经发现了一种方法，可以制造几艘新船，不用花$COUNTRY$一分钱.我们需要什么类型的船舶？

original: Our merchants keep expanding their fleets and keep training new sailors for their ships. This means that when we have to press them into our naval forces, we get far better sailors.
translation: 我们的商户继续扩充舰队，并培训新水手给他们的船只.这意味着，当我们要求他们加入我们的海军力量，我们可以得到更好的水手.

original: Our naval captains have managed to capture quite a few smugglers in the recent years, and the cut to the state has been rather large.
translation: 在最近几年，我们的海军船长已经成功地捕捉到不少走私分子，东西都充公

original: We never say no to a few ducats...
Having heavy ships in our fleets is always a source of pride. Our sailors are proud to serve on them, and our people feel pride watching their might in our ports.
translation: 拥有重型船只是舰队骄傲的源泉，我们的军人在服务他们的通史也获得了自豪感

original: I get so gay seeing them...

After several administrative changes and the hiring of some very competent sailors, our navy's efficiency has increased. This benefits both our navy and the merchant fleet, as an efficient ship will cost less and require less attention.
translation: 经过几个行政变化并雇用额一些非常能干的水手，我们海军的效率有所增加.这有利于我们的海军和商队，船舶成本更低，建造也更简单

original: A number of other countries have been tardy in paying their mercenaries. This has created a number of captains who need to pay their men. They are ready to accept contracts from us at a lower price, providing we will actually pay.
translation: 一些其他国家推迟了雇佣兵的款项，结果有些佣兵团长自己花钱养兵.这迫使他们同意接受我们较低的价格，只要我们按时支付

original: Which war ended? Who can say, was it several or just one big one? It matters not but a number of unemployed mercenary companies have arrived in our realm looking for work. One man's war is another man's opportunity. We have the war and they seek the opportunity.
translation: 战争结束了吗？谁知道呢，大战小战？这不重要，问题在于，一些事业的佣兵在我们国家找机会.一个人的战争是另一个人的机会.我们需要战争，他们需要机会

original: We are the land of opportunity
translation: 我们是充满机会的土地

original: The one thing we couldn't resent more are the ruinous rates of interest we are charged. However, our solid administration has convinced our creditors that perhaps the interest rate is too high and they have agreed that a small reduced is merited, at least for a while.
translation: 我们无法忍受这种高昂的利息.我们的政府已经说服了债权人，也许利率太高了，他们都同意这一点，愿意在一定时间内给予减免

original: Good advice is sometimes hard to come by but these days the number of people coming forward to advise us is increasing nicely. This gives us more choice than ever before.
translation: 很好的建议有时是很难得的，但这些天许多人前来向我们提供建议。这使我们比以往任何时候都有更多的选择。
让我们回顾一下候选人。
向人们展示我们的韧性

original: Our state is under pressure but it is time to show our resilience in the face of adversity. It is time for boys to step up and become men, for men to show the world what they are made of. Together we can go forward.
translation: 我们国家处在压力下，但时间能够证明我们在面对逆境时的应变能力.现在是男孩成长为男人的机会，对于男人来说，向世界展示坚韧的时候到了

original: Our people are weary of this war, but their spirit is strong. They are ready to give one more effort for victory. We will be victorious.
translation: 我们的人都对这场战争感到厌倦，但他们的精神是强大的.他们准备尽更多的努力以取得胜利.我们将取得胜利.

original: Our administration has failed our people. Instead of justice for all there is justice for the few. It is undermining the very support of our state.
translation: 我们的政府让人民失望了.所谓的公平是对少数人的公平.这降低了人们对政府的支持

original: It is a sad state of affairs
The state will be supported by gold instead
translation: 那以后我们的国本就是金钱了。

original: Sensing that we may need them more than they need us, various mercenary captains have banded together to demand higher pay.
translation: 感觉我们可能更需要他们，各佣兵队长已经联合起来要求加薪.

original: Mercenary captains take advantage of our apparent need and demand a higher pay.
translation: 佣兵队长已经联合起来要求加薪.

original: More people are stepping up to become our advisors.
translation: 越来越多的人成为我们的顾问.

original: Our creditors have agreed to lower our interest rates for a while.
translation: 我们的债权人已经同意降低利率一段时间.

original: A lack of war in other countries has led to a number of unemployed mercenary companies coming to our realm seeking employment.
translation: 其他国家没有战争驱使一批失业佣兵来到我国

original: Other countries' tardiness in paying their mercenaries has created a number of captains ready to accept contracts from us at a lower price, providing we will actually pay.
translation: 其他国家迟付工资给佣兵的行为让佣兵队长同意接受较低的价格，只要我们按时支付

original: The Church is a large landowner and this has brought a great deal of wealth to the Church. The non-possessors claim that the Church is being corrupted by this great wealth. Their opponents argue that the Church needs this wealth to carry out its holy mission. The key thing is the Church isn't really a big taxpayer, if it was forced to give its land away it would move it into the hands of people we can tax. The downside would be the Church would have less wealth to perform its mission.
translation: 教会是个大地主，而这给教会带来大量财富.无产者声称，这笔巨大的财富让教会腐化.反对者认为教会需要钱来履行他们的神圣使命.如果教会被迫放弃其土地，将它转移到别人手中，我们可以收税.缺点是，教会财富减少，难以履行其使命.

original: The Church has gathered in a great Synod, they are asking for your support and certain privileges in return for helping fight anti-feudal heresies that are stalking our land. Do we help the Church keep the people in their place or do we support these movements to break up the old Feudal order.
translation: 教会组织了伟大的主教会议，他们要求你的支持和特权，作为回报，他们会帮你打击异端邪说.我们要帮助教会的人，还是要支持打破旧秩序的运动
