original: The Eastern Orthodox Church is the One, Holy, Catholic and Apostolic Church established by Jesus Christ our lord and his apostles. However, our family is large and diverse. Our patriarch is proposing some reforms to our liturgy that will bring our form closer to the other churches. The idea is bold and will strengthen the Church but we know that the superstitious and backward will reject this change.
translation: 东正教是唯一，至圣，的教会.由我主耶稣和他的门徒创建.然而，我们的家族是庞大而多样.我们的族长对礼仪提出了一些改革建议，以和其他教会的仪式相类似.我们的想法是大胆并加强教会，但我们知道，迷信，落后者会拒绝这种变化.

original: Hold true to the old ways
Reduce the Independence of the Church

The Church is a powerful institution, but more important a wealthy one. If we were to rein in the Church and make more a part of the state we would also bring in more income for taxation. On the other hand we would also sap its authority in the eyes of the masses.
translation: 教会不仅是一个强大的机构，它更是一个富裕的机构。如果我们把教会纳入国家统治，我们将获得更多的税收。在另一方面，我们将削弱其在大众眼中的权威。

original: If we were to promote and strengthen the powers of lay members of the Church administration and bring in more state appointments, we would bring the Church under central control. The other side of the coin is that we will damage the Church's moral standing with the people.
translation: 如果我们要促进和加强对教会管理的权力，并带来更多的国家任命，我们要将教会纳入控制。但这会影响教会和人民的道德水平。

original: We have let all know that our navy is the Lord of the Seas, however, news has reached us that a certain country failed to promptly show the right amount of respect and skirmish has resulted. The country is clamoring for war.
translation: 我们必须让所有人知道我们的海军是海洋的霸主，但是消息到达某国之后，得到是他们对战争的叫嚣

original: Pirates have struck some of our shipping. They tortured and then brutally murdered the male passengers and as for the female passengers the tales told shock all civilized men. One of the female passengers was the daughter of an important noble and he is crying out for vengeance. There are heavy implications that these pirates are under someone's protection.
translation: 海盗捕获了我们的一条船.他们折磨，然后残忍地杀害了男乘客和女乘客的故事震惊了文明人.其中一名女乘客是一位重要的贵族的女儿，他哭着要求复仇.很明显，这些海盗受到别人的保护

original: Our merchants have been too successful in trade, and the owners of a local trade node are upholding their mercantilist ideals and are now attempting to expel our merchants from it.
translation: 我们的商户在贸易商取得了成功.结果当地业主开始坚持自己的重商主义，并正试图驱逐我们的商人

original: The merchants will keep a lower profile

Our merchants report that they are facing stiffening resistance to trying to peddle their wares. They are talking like it is the end of the world, and fear they will never earn a copper again in life.
translation: 我们的商人报告说他们贩卖货物时遭到了严厉抵制. 他们说得就像世界末日似的，觉得这辈子可能都再赚不到一分钱了.

original: One of our merchants abroad has returned home as a pauper after losing every single ducat. He has gone bankrupt, and we will not receive benefits of his trade anymore.
translation: 我们在国外的一个商人身无分文地回来了.他破产了，我们无法再从他身上获得贸易收入了

original: He just could not make it...
A merchant has been lost at sea while trading in a coastal trade node, taking all his goods with him to the bottom of the sea.
translation: 一个商人已在沿海贸易节点交易之时失踪，他与他的货物全部沉入海底.

original: Our focus on mercantilism is making life hard for our merchants who trade in foreign places.
translation: 我们致力于重商主义，这使在外国贸易的商人的生活变得困难.

original: They should have stayed at home
With the generous liberties we have granted our merchants, we have ended up with a situation where people simply don't want to do honest work anymore.
translation: 我们给予我们的商人慷慨的自由，结果人们根本不想做诚实工作了.

original: This was not quite the plan

Our mercantilist policies have engendered a breed of administrator that is good at getting our merchants to pay their dues. One such man has recently come to our attention as being particularly outstanding.
translation: 我们重商主义的政策已产生了新的人才，他们擅长于让商人们偿还债务. 最近我们注意到其中一个人尤为突出.

original: He may go on to do great things
translation: 他可以继续做伟大的事情

original: Our determination to embrace free trade has led to domestic merchants losing out to the rivals from other countries.
translation: 我们决心实施自由贸易政策，这导致国内的商人败给了来自他国的竞争对手.

original: With the relaxation of restrictions on foreign merchants, some of our own traders feel that they are not getting enough state support, and have decided to switch careers.
translation: 随着对外国商人放宽限制，我们的一些商人认为，他们没有获得足够的国家支持，所以决定转职.

original: Our free trade policies are forcing our merchants to become more innovative. One in particular looks like he could become a great man.
translation: 我们的自由贸易政策，正在迫使我们的商人变得更加创新. 特别是其中一个看起来可以成为一个伟人.

original: We may need to find a job for him
translation: 我们需要给他找份工作

original: His Holiness, the Pope, has tasked a commission of cardinals with addressing the challenges posed by the Protestant movement. While the Catholic faith itself must not be compromised, His Holiness and most cardinals are willing to admit that some Protestant complaints are valid. Therefore, the Council advises many changes to the administration of the Church, a stop to absentee Bishops and the worldly excesses of the clergy. In addition, several new monastic orders are to be founded, to aid in the efforts of the Counter-Reformation.
translation: 教宗陛下已指派了一个枢机委员会来应对新教运动带来的挑战。虽然公教信仰本身不可妥协，但教宗陛下和多数枢机都愿意承认一些新教徒的抱怨是正当的。因此，委员会建议对教会的管理进行许多改革，停止主教缺勤和神职人员的俗世过分行为。此外还将建立一些新的修道院规范，以帮助反宗教改革的努力。

original: The Kingdom of God on Earth

Having united the whole of Italy under the banner of Catholicism, the Pope has seen fit to declare it 'The Kingdom of God'. Catholics from all over Europe flock to his banner, eager to live in this model nation of Christian virtue. Foreign powers can no longer control the College of Cardinals, but neither will they pay much heed to any Papal bulls or decrees.
translation: 在圣教会里意大利得到统一。教宗阁下宣布这是显现在人间的天主之国。全欧洲的天主教徒服膺于圣教会的旗号下，热切渴望居于此模范的基督国度里。外国势力无法再插手枢机团中的事务，但也不再对宗座的诏令与训示热切关注。

original: $COUNTRY$, having brought all five Patriarchates back into the Christian - Orthodox - fold, we have restored the old Pentarchy, thus effectively ending the great East-West Schism. While some countries might continue to cling to Catholicism, the Pope has lost his vaunted primacy as the lawful successor of St Peter and Bishop of Rome.
translation: $COUNTRY$，已经将所有五个主教辖区带回基督教的正统，我们重建了古老的五大宗主教区，有效地结束了东西方的分裂.尽管有些人还会继续坚持天主教，但是教宗引以为豪的，作为圣彼得和罗马教宗的合法继承人的优势已经不在了.

original: We have a vacancy in high position in the church administration of $CAPITAL$. There is a churchman from a rich family who has made an offer. If we approve and back his election to the position, we will gain a large contribution to our coffers. Some more devout people claim that this is a sin called Simony, but what do they know?
translation: 我们在$CAPITAL$教区有一个高层职位空缺。一名出身富贵的牧师已经提出了申请。如果我们同意并支持他竞选此职，我们的金库就能收到一笔巨额捐献。一些更虔诚者宣称此为买卖圣职罪，但是他们知道些什么？

original: 'As soon as a coin in the coffer rings, a soul from purgatory springs!', as Johann Tetzel said. The Pope offers indulgences for money, so the souls of the rich can be saved while still continuing in sin. This is what eventually caused a fraction in the Church and led to the reformation.
translation: 就像约翰特策尔说的，“只要金库里铜币叮咚，地狱里就有救赎不完的灵魂”.教宗为了钱提供赎罪券，所以富人能够浸淫在罪孽之海的时候同时得到救赎. 这逐步导致了教会的分裂，最终引发了教会的改革.

original: From the highest to the very low, the people believe that the veneration of will allows the viewer to reduce their time in purgatory. A treatise opposing this practice has been found nailed to a church door with a very substantial relic collection. The opponents of this practice are hurting the unity of the one true path to salvation, the holy, universal and apostolic church, or perhaps they are right?
translation: 不论贵族还是平民都相信，尊重遗迹能够减少人们的罪孽.但是有篇文章被订到教堂的大门上反对这种行为.反对者正在损害救赎之路的统一，神圣的无处不在的使徒公会，或者他们可能是对的？

original: But I just bought a vial of the milk of the Virgin Mary
translation: 但是我只得到了圣母的一小瓶乳汁

original: Forgiveness can only come from God

The Blessed Virgin Mary, mother of our Lord Jesus Christ, is the Queen of heaven and mediator of many graces. There is no more perfect woman and her holy motherhood grants her a seat at the right hand of God. Or does it? Recently radical theologians have been arguing that there is no need for such intersessions. Are they right, or is the holy mother church in danger from their almost heretical utterings?
translation: 受到祝福的圣母玛利亚，我主耶稣基督的母亲，天堂的女王，集众多恩典于一身.再没有哪位完美的女性与她的母性能配得上站在上帝的旁边了，有吗？最近，激进的神学家认为没有必要有这样的复杂，他们是对的，或者神圣的圣母教会陷入他们最直接的继承者造成的危机中了

original: She is a special woman, but still just a woman
translation: 她是一个特别的女人，但仍只是一个女人

original: When we die, God judges immediately and decides a soul's fate until it awaits the last judgment. A monk has started a doctrinal dispute that verges on the edge of heresy, when he claimed that there was no purgatory and saying prayers for the dead would not assist their passage into heaven. These disputes are threatening the very unity of our church.
translation: 当我们死的时候，神会审判我们每个灵魂的命运，直至最后的审判。一位僧侣对理论上的争论已经近乎异端，他声称根本就没有炼狱，而为死者祈祷也不会帮助他进入天堂。这种论调正威胁着教会的统一性。

original: Sorry, there is nothing you can do for your dead loved ones

Reformers have put forward a new confession of faith that has some minor, but still serious, differences with Catholic teachings. The church claims it borders on the heretical while there are those who suggest it would bring the Church and their administrative apparatus under tighter control.
translation: 改革者提出了一项新的信仰，这些信仰中有一些小的但很严肃与天主教教义不同的地方.教会声称这近乎异端，有人认为这会使教会与他们的行政机构得到更严密的控制.
不，它会让所有人下地狱的

original: One of the so called reforming monks has recently appeared at our court under our most solemn promise of safe passage to argue the justness of his cause. Like Hus before him, his heresy is manifest but our word has been given.
translation: 一个所谓的致力于改革的修士最近在法庭上，在最庄严的许诺下，辩驳他事业的正当性.就像之前的胡斯一样，我们说他就是异端，这显而易见.
信守诺言是我们的荣耀

original: We are not bound by promises to a heretic
translation: 对异教徒的承诺对我们没有束缚

original: Our young and fragile republic is experiencing severe debates, some even turning violent, between supporters of the old regime, and the sturdy defenders of liberty and freedom. How shall we react to this?
translation: 我们的年轻，脆弱的共和国正处于激烈的辩论中，一些人甚至诉诸武力，在旧政权和坚定的自由捍卫者之间我们应该如何选择？

original: The freetraders are increasingly popular, and seem to have how a majority of the support in the parliament now. They are advocating that we must reduce our mercantilistic tendencies.
translation: 自由贸易派日益流行，现在似乎大部分的议员都支持他们。他们主张我们必须减少重商注意倾向。
我们肯定是自由贸易派。

original: Mercantilism is vital for the state
translation: 重商主义对国家至关重要。

original: The lack of respect for the republic has slowly eroded its foundations. To preserve the stability of the state, $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ has proclaimed $RULER_O_PRONOUN$self dictator for life.
translation: 缺乏对共和的尊重已经缓慢地腐蚀了它的根基，为了维护国家的稳定，$MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ 已经宣布 $RULER_O_PRONOUN$ 自己将终生独裁。

original: My most noble $MONARCHTITLE$, your eldest son is on trial for corruption and bribery. There is no doubt that the charges are true, the conviction of your eldest son would be a serious personal blow to you. On the other hand we could of course interfere in the trial and secure his innocence.
translation: 我最高贵的$MONARCHTITLE$，您的大儿子因为腐败和贿赂而受到审判。毫无疑问，如果对您儿子的指控是真实的，判他有罪对您个人将是非常严重的打击。但是换个角度说，我们当然也可以干预审判确保他是无辜的。

original: In times past the $MONARCHTITLE$ used to be on the reverse side of the coins, now the republic rejects such personality cults. If we were to issue a new high purity coin we could improve people's faith in the coinage and of course all should remember who did this.
translation: 过去，$MONARCHTITLE$的头像就印在硬币的反面，现在公众拒绝如此个人崇拜的行为。如果我们发行新的银币，可以提高人民对货币的信任。当然，所有人都会记住谁做了这一切。

original: Wild rumors are circulating about our nobility plotting with foreign powers. Hysteria grows and the mood is fearful. The people demand that we strike at the traitors, but wiser minds say that we must let the tradition of republican justice take its course.
translation: 流言甚嚣尘上，疯传我们的贵族与外国列强密谋.人民变的歇斯底里恐惧万分.人民要求我们打击叛徒，但是智者说我们必须让共和司法的传统顺其自然.
抓住他们占有他们的财富

original: The office of $MONARCHTITLE$ is challenged by enemies within and without, and thus a strong personal bodyguard is essential to ensure that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] remains in power. The turbulent politics of our time require this, but there are those who decry it, claiming that this new trend displays aristocratic tendencies and subverts the traditions of the Republic.
translation: $MONARCHTITLE$的办公室受到内外敌人的挑战，因此确保[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]的执政一个强壮的私人保镖是必不可少的，这是我们动荡的政治局势需要，但有些人对此公开谴责，认为这个举动是新的贵族化趋势和对共和传统的颠覆.

original: It would violate our Republican Ideals!
translation: 这会亵渎我们的共和精神！

original: A preacher has appeared prophesying the end of all we know and a new beginning. The preacher gained traction with our recent war but he isn't really pushing for the kind of republic we know. We could challenge him to a trail by fire, but this could create internal problems just when we need unity.
translation: 一个传道者出现了，他预言我们都了解的一个结束以及一个新的开始.这个传道者受到我们最近的战争的牵引，但他不是真的在推动我们所知的共和国.我们可以向他挑战判他火刑，但这有可能在我们正需要团结的时候引发内部矛盾.

original: Give him a Trial by Fire!
With the republic looking fragile rumors have reached us that nobles are plotting to bring in hereditary succession to our great Republic.
translation: 共和国看起来很脆弱，谣言传到我们耳朵里，说是我们的贵族正在密谋将世袭带入我们伟大的共和.

original: The republic functions because of the agreed common purpose of the rulers who in turn represent the settled will of the ruled. Our republic has been turning back on the traditions that made us strong. The lack of cohesion in our ruling council is costing us militarily.
translation: 共和国必须在所有人都有共同目标的情况下才能正常运转.我们的共和体制传统曾让我们强大.但是执政委员会缺乏凝聚力则消耗了我们大量军事支出

original: Republic's are successful when the important families are ready to put the republic's interest on a par with their own. Currently our republican traditions are under pressure and families are putting their own interests ahead of the republics. This is hurting our ability to govern, as consensus is harder to achieve.
translation: 共和国的是成功在于重要的家族预备把共和国的利益与自己与自己的利益放到同等地位上.目前我们的共和传统受到了压力，家族都把他们自己的利益看的高于共和国的利益.以至于共识更加难以实现，这降低了我们的执政能力.

original: We always encouraged health competition between our merchants, but at the same time they always put the greater interest of the republic first. We would work together to ensure that the republic's trade was strengthened against the interest of rivals. Now this tradition is waning and the merchant class is becoming increasing fratricidal. This is hurting our country...
translation: 我们总是鼓励商人间的良性竞争，但是同时我们总是将共和国的利益放到首位.我们将会共同努力促进共和国的贸易，确保对手难得利益.现在这个传统收到警报，商人们相互碾压.这伤害了我们的国家……

original: One of the core parts of a republic are the great ceremonies of state. This is a time where disagreements and disputes between the patricians are put on hold so we can display our unity of purpose and show the world our strength. At a recent ceremony disgruntled elements turned their backs on our traditions to air their disagreements with the ruling council.
translation: 共和国的重要组成部分之一是国家的伟大庆典。此时，贵族间搁置了分歧和争端，我们可以展示一致的目标，并向世界展示实力。但在最近的庆典上，不满分子背弃了我们的传统，表达对了议会领导的不满。

original: The late Middle Ages saw the emergence of several new forms of Islamic mysticism, one of the most controversial being a brand of Sufi dervishes known as the 'renunciationists'. These men sought to separate themselves entirely from normal society, shaving all body hair down to their eyebrows and publicly breaking the rules of the Sharia in order to demonstrate their unique relationship with God, all while wandering from town to town begging for alms. Our religious scholars are calling for their persecution, arguing that the uneducated populace's tendency to view them with awe will lead them away from the true faith.
translation: 中世纪后期出现了几种新型的伊斯兰神秘主义，其中最具争议性的是一些被视为「克己主义者」的苏菲教徒。这些人试图把自己完全从世俗世界中分离出来，他们剃除眉毛以下的全部体毛，公然违背伊斯兰教教规，以此证明他们和神之间的独特关系，而且他们总是在一个城镇到另一个城镇间乞求施舍。我们的宗教学者呼吁对他们进行迫害，认为没有受过教育的民众倾向于敬畏地看待他们，这会导致他们渐渐远离真正的信仰。

original: Particularly in the aftermath of the Mongol conquests of the thirteenth century, Egypt and Syria emerged as the foremost centers of scholarly learning in the Muslim world. Sunni scholars of every persuasion flocked to Damascus and Cairo to learn from the most renowned teachers of science, theology, and above all law, while Shi'ites traveled to Jabal Amil in Lebanon to meet with the scholars of orthodox Twelver Shi'ism. Many students from our lands, having completed their educational pilgrimage, are now returning home and hoping to implement legalistic Islam in our [Root.GovernmentName] just as they learned it in the heartlands of Islam.
translation: 十三世纪蒙古征服造成的后果中，尤为瞩目的是埃及和叙利亚崛起成为了穆斯林世界最重要的学术中心。逊尼派的学者们纷纷到大马士革和开罗向最著名教师学习科学，神学，以及那高于一切的法律，而什叶派人士则前往黎巴嫩的阿米尔山，与正统的特维尔什什叶派的学者见面。 许多来自我们国家的学生完成了他们的教育朝圣，现在正在回国，希望在我们的[Root.GovernmentName]中恪守伊斯兰教的法规，正如他们在伊斯兰教的核心地带学到的一样。

original: They will make a welcome addition to our country.
Contact with the divine is not about studying books.
translation: 从书本上学习如何进行与神交流是行不通的。

original: During the early modern period popular forms of Sufi worship became extremely widespread in the Muslim world. Seeing the weakened state of our armies, the sheikh of a major order has begun urging his followers to take up arms in support of us against our enemies.
translation: 在近代早期，苏菲派崇拜的流行形式在穆斯林世界非常普遍。 看到我们军队的弱势现状，一个主要宗教团体的教长已经开始鼓动他的追随者们拿起武器来支持我们，消灭我们的敌人。

original: We cannot rely on mystics for support!
translation: 我们不能依靠神秘主义者的支持！!

original: Let us welcome these warriors of faith.

Just as many members of the Ulema have developed Sufi leanings, many of our Sufi orders have likewise come to extol the virtue of a pious life lived in accordance with the Sharia. Despite disapproving voices on both extremes, we have managed to strike a balance between mysticism and legalism. Our realm is currently enjoying the fruits of moderation and tolerance of differing religious practices.
translation: 随着大量的乌理玛成员逐渐有了苏菲派倾向，我们的许多苏菲派教团也开始赞扬这种依照沙里亚法生活的虔诚美德。尽管我们既不赞成极端神秘主义也不赞成极端教法主义，但是我们却设法在两者之间取得一种平衡。我们的国家目前正在享受温和和容忍地对待不同宗教教习而带来的美好成果。

original: Debate over the Philosophy of Ibn Arabi
translation: 伊本·阿拉比的神学理论的辩论

original: Ibn Arabi was an Andalusian scholar and mystic, regarded by many Sufis as the foremost spiritual master. His pantheistic philosophy of the 'unity of being' viewed all of creation as a manifestation of God, and invited worshippers to see divine beauty in all aspects of life, not merely in the traditional rituals of Islam. Ever since, debates have raged on over the compatibility of his philosophy with scholarly interpretations of Islam, with some going so far as to label him an unbeliever. For many Sufis, on the other hand, Ibn Arabi's philosophy became the foundational principle of their religious practice. Now we too are being asked to take sides.
translation: 伊本·阿拉比是一名安达卢西亚的神秘主义者及学者，被许多苏菲派认为是最杰出的精神导师。 他的“存在单一论”的泛神哲学理论把所有的创造视为神的一种表现形式，并且邀请信徒在生活的各个方面看到神灵的美，而不仅仅在传统的伊斯兰教仪式里。 从那以后，关于他的哲学与传统学术对伊斯兰教解释的兼容性的辩论已经开始激化，有些甚至把他列为为非信徒。 另一方面，对于许多苏菲信徒来说，伊本·阿拉比的哲学已成为他们宗教实践的基本原则。 我们现在也不得不支持其中一方了。

original: Under Islamic Law, non-Muslims faced a number of restrictions on the construction of new buildings in urban centers: their houses were not to be taller than those of the Muslims, and they were not permitted to construct new centers of worship, only to maintain those which already existed. In practice, these rules often went unenforced, but as our realm shifts further toward a legalistic interpretation of Islam, key members of the Ulema are beginning to call for their stricter implementation.
translation: 根据“伊斯兰法”，非穆斯林如果在城市中心建设新建筑面临着一些限制：房屋不得比穆斯林高，不得建设新的宗教场所，只能维护那些已经存在的。 在实际中，这些规则往往没有得到落实，但随着我们的国家一步步偏向伊斯兰教教法法律方面，乌理玛的重要成员开始要求进行更严格的执行。

original: Enforce the letter of the law.
Leave them to do as they please.
translation: 爱咋地咋地，随他们去吧
齐米公然蔑视建筑限令

original: Despite being officially prohibited from constructing houses of worship and tall buildings, the dhimmis in several provinces of our realm are openly disobeying the laws, and many of our qadis are too lax to respond, either because they see no harm in it or because of the hefty bribes they can earn for turning a blind eye.
translation: 尽管已禁止修建教堂和高层建筑，但我们国家个别省份的齐米民众却公然违反法律规定，我们的许多卡迪管理过于松懈，要么是因为他们看不到其中的弊端，要么就是他们因为可以赚取巨额贿赂而对此睁一只眼闭一只眼了。
法律不一定要强制执行嘛。

original: Muslims are encouraged in the Qur'an to take an active role in their community in order to “enjoin right and forbid wrong.” While this command has been interpreted in many ways by Muslim scholars, it was sometimes used by reformist groups to justify the forceful spread of more extreme views. A group of charismatic mosque preachers in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] have begun calling for the end of unorthodox religious practices and are inciting the populace against the Sufis, leading to violence and street battles.
translation: “古兰经”鼓励穆斯林在社区中发挥积极的作用，以便“聚善攘恶”。穆斯林学者在许多方面对这项指示进行了解释，但有时候这些命令被改革派群体用来辩护他们那些有说服力的十分的极端观点。 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]中一群有魅力的清真寺传教士已经开始呼吁结束非正统的宗教活动，并煽动民众反对苏菲主义，导致暴力和街头斗殴。
关于苏菲主义活动的争议

original: Muslim scholars were not united on the question of the permissibility of Sufism. While most appreciated the heightened levels of religious devotion it inspired among the general population, some disapproved of how certain Sufis expressed their faith. Poetry and song about wine and illicit love, as well as communal dancing and veneration for the tombs of those regarded as saints, could at times provoke opposition from more hardline elements of the Ulema.
translation: 穆斯林学者在是否允许苏菲派的问题上并不统一。 虽然大多数人都赞赏它在普通民众中所激发出的高涨宗教热忱，但有些人不赞成苏菲派表达他们的信仰的某些方式。 关于违禁爱情和葡萄酒的诗歌，以及在那些被视为圣人的墓地进行崇拜和群体舞蹈，有时会激起更多的乌理玛强硬分子的反对。

original: Ensuring that the realm's laws operate in accordance with the sacred Sharia requires us to occasionally re-examine our tax-collection practices, and to strive to align them as closely as possible with the legal positions held by the great lawmakers of our [Root.GetReligiousSchool] school. This means eliminating the customary taxes which have accumulated over the years, and taking only what is permitted by the Sharia.
translation: 要确保国家的法律按照神圣的伊斯兰教法来运行，需要我们时不时的重新清理我们的税收系统，并不断调整使其更加接近我们[Root.GetReligiousSchool]学派的伟大的立法者所创建的法律。

original: The peasantry must be free from unlawful exactions.
translation: 必须取缔对农民的非法强征。

original: Many among the Ulema would question the great influence that storytellers have over the life of common men. The traditional hero stories of our people are centuries old but they risk making a cult out of seriously distorted fates of historical figures. A prominent cleric in [storytellerprovince.GetAreaName] have taken a strong stand against the storytellers of the realm, and cautions that religious scholars of the past have warned that obsessive listening to stories could lead to false worship.
translation: 乌理玛中的许多人会质疑说书人对普通人的生活有什么影响。 我国人民的传统英雄故事已有数百年的历史，但却有着严重扭曲历史人物且塑造个人崇拜的风险。 [storytellerprovince.GetAreaName]中的一位重要的神职人员开始对当地的说书人采取强硬立场，并警醒大家说过去就有宗教学者提醒过: 沉迷于听故事很有可能导致在信仰上误入歧途。

original: We must ban offensive stories from the realm.
translation: 我们必须禁绝这些极其讨厌的传说。

original: There is nothing wrong in idealizing our ancestors.
translation: 我们理当赞美我们的祖先。

original: Guilds and fraternities are a constant factor in the public life of the [Root.GovernmentName], in many ways these are small communities within the community, with their own rules, customs and even laws. It is also very common for these associations to indulge in mystic traditions, sufism and often unorthodox adaption of the Sharia. Something that sometimes makes it hard for the laws of the Ulema to penetrate the urban milieu.\nAn artisan in [fraternity_province.GetName] has reached out to the state, warning us of a local guildsman with a great influence on local affairs. Anyone wishing to take up a craft in the city is currently required to be approved by this man and then swear an oath of allegiance.
translation: 行会和兄弟会同行会一直是[Root.GovernmentName]公共生活中常有的因素，在许多方面，这些社会里的小团体都有着自己的规则，习俗甚至法律。 很多这些协会沉迷于伊斯兰教的神秘主义传统，苏菲主义且经常肆意改编伊斯兰教法。 一些有时使得乌理玛的法律难以在繁华都市间贯彻实施。\n[fraternity_province.GetName]的一个工匠已经来到我们的政府，让我们密切关注当地一个对本地事务有很大影响的行会成员。在城市里任何想要加入行会的人都需要得到这个人的批准，然后还要对其宣誓效忠。

original: Let us not interfere with the guilds.
translation: 还是不要干涉行会的内部事务了
苏菲主义的流行引发社会争议

original: The great stress that our government has placed on Legalism and the limiting of Mysticism in our society has had the effect of closely associating Sufism with resistance to central rule. In times of social distress many now look to the Mystical orders for spiritual guidance as an alternative to the highly legalistic Ulema and its [Root.GovernmentName] ally.\nAs tensions flare in [popular_sufism_province.GetName] an influential Sufi Master declared his support for [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], potentially calming the situation.
translation: 我们政府对社会中教条主义的担忧和对神秘主义的限制，已经使得苏菲主义成为中央政府统治的障碍。 在社会困难时期，许多人现在转而向和这些神秘主义教团而不是严守教条的乌理玛以及它来自[Root.GovernmentName]的支持者寻求精神指导。\n在[popular_sufism_province.GetName]地区的紧张气氛一触即发，于是一个有影响力的苏菲派大师公开宣布他对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的支持，志在平息当地严峻事态。

original: We cannot accept the support of a Mystic.
translation: 我们拒绝接受神秘主义者的所谓支持。

original: While they are quite new to our society the use of stimulants such as Coffee and Tobacco has spread quickly, with coffee houses now a common feature from [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] to [coffee_province.GetAreaName]. The popularity is especially marked among the Sufi orders. The novelty of these substances means that the religious establishment is divided on their proper use.\nMany strict legalists wants us to limit their use while others argue for caution, as both Coffee and Tobacco are very popular in our state. The local governor of [coffee_province.GetName] have now turned to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] wanting to close down the local coffee houses that he believes have become meeting places for dissidents.
translation: 尽管刚刚传入我国，咖啡和烟草已经很快作为兴奋剂在社会上广为传播，从[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]到[coffee_province.GetAreaName]咖啡屋的存在现在已经成为常态。 尤其在苏菲教团中极受民众喜爱。 由于这些物品都是前人所未见过的，所有对于如何正确地对待这些物品，宗教内的核心人士已然开始了争论。\n许多严格的教条主义者要求我们对此加以限制，而另一些人则持谨慎态度，因为咖啡和烟草已在我国广受人民喜爱。 [coffee_province.GetName]的总督现在已经来到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，并提出应关闭当地的咖啡馆，他认为这些咖啡馆已然成为异见人士的聚会场所。
我们理应对此加以限制。
随便啦，喝个咖啡没什么大不了的。

original: Sufi Orders growing in popularity in [new_province.GetName]

Some of the more prevalent Sufi orders in [Root.GetName] have quickly started to establish themselves in the newly acquired [new_province.GetName] province. While the locals seem somewhat hesitant about [Root.GetAdjective] rule they have embraced the orders and this has greatly eased the integration of the province into our [Root.GovernmentName].
translation: 在[Root.GetName]，一些比较流行的苏菲教团很快就开始在新获得的[new_province.GetName]省中建立起来。 虽然当地人似乎对[Root.GetAdjective]规则有些犹豫，他们已经接受了这个命令，这大大缓解了我们这个省的整合到我们的[Root.GovernmentName]中。

original: The learned Ulema complain over the widespread flouting of Sharia rules in our [Root.GovernmentName]. They demand that we reduce the influence of Mystic orders and heterodoxy in the country. Failing to comply could see us risking losing their support and many of these valuable legal scholars might even leave for other courts.
translation: 据悉，乌理玛抱怨在我们的[Root.GovernmentName]中存在大肆嘲讽伊斯兰教教规的行径。他们要求我们减少神秘主义教团和宗教异端在国内的影响力。 如果不遵守规定，我们可能会失去来自乌理玛的支持，许多这些有价值的法学学者甚至可能会去往其他宫廷。

original: We cannot give in to such threats.

As our realm loses its zeal for legalistic Islam, it has become harder and harder for us to find and appoint qadis willing to fully implement our official restrictions on the construction of dhimmi buildings. The law has, at this point, simply become unenforceable.
translation: 由于我国已然失去了对教条主义的热忱，我们越来越难以找寻到愿意全面贯彻实施建筑限令的卡迪斯了。 现在这条法令已然变得难以为继。
好吧好吧，我能怎么样，我也很无奈啊。

original: Our nation has sorely lacked a firm guiding hand under the rule of [Root.Heir.GetName], a timid child, ill-prepared to face the dangers of the world. Fortunately for us all, one of [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] uncles, and close advisors has decided to act. The child is now safely locked away where [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] can do no more harm. The advisor has been proclaimed our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and has sworn to provide our nation with the strong leadership it so desperately needs.
translation: 我们的国家现在在[Root.Heir.GetName]这个黄口小儿统治下，缺乏一个有力的导师，还没有准备好面对这个危机四伏的世界。然而对我们所有人来说幸运的是，[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]叔叔和亲密顾问们决定采取行动。孩子现在可以安全地隔离开来，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]已不会再损害我们的国家了。 这位顾问已经宣告了我们新的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，并且已经发誓要为我国提供其所迫切需要的强力领导。

original: May our new $MONARCHTITLE$'s rule be long and prosperous!
translation: 愿我们新的$MONARCHTITLE$体制持久兴盛!

original: The weekly congregational prayer has been a way for Islamic rulers to show their legitimacy for centuries. The long standing Sunni dominance where most friday prayers have been in the name of the Sunni Caliphs and the worldly Sultans of the Sunni world, has however lead to the status of the prayers being very uncertain.\nMost among the Shia Ulema oppose the practice of the friday prayers, but there are some who would see its role as a way to bind together society, Ulema and ruler, return to the Shia faithful of our country.
translation: 每周的集会祈祷已经成为伊斯兰统治者在几个世纪中显示其合法性的一种方式。在逊尼派统治下，大多数周五的祈祷都是以逊尼派哈里发和世俗的逊尼派世界的名义出现的，然而却导致了祈祷的地位非常不确定。\n什叶派乌理玛中的大多数人反对 星期五祈祷，但也有一些人将其看作是把社会，乌理玛和统治者绑在一起的一种方式，回到我们国家的什叶派信徒身上。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] will lead the friday prayers and our country will pray.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]将会带领国家和民众进行主麻日祷告。

original: We must respect the traditions of our people.
translation: 我们必须尊重国民传统

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Let loose Pantalone, Harlequin, and all the other stock characters of the traditional Commedia dell'Arte on your unsuspecting population, and watch as they are entertained by the antics and the shenanigans. A good piece of comedy can make anyone forget for a while that their everyday lives are wasted away laboring under the yokes of tyrannical rulers. Plus, it's fun!
translation: 大家都来看呀，很有趣的!

original: Like a mighty torch, bringing the light of reason into even the darkest corners of the old and new worlds, the Enlightenment is sweeping across the world. Supporting this movement will doubtlessly lead to advances in science and philosophy, but the movement's notions about human freedom and the unalienable rights of man may cause a bit of a rebellious fervor in our country.
translation: 就像强大的火炬，甚启蒙运动带来的理性之光横扫旧世界与新世界，即便是最黑暗的角落也被点亮了.支持这一运动将无疑促进科学和哲学上的进步，但启蒙运动关于人类自由和人类不可剥夺的权利的观念可能会引发一点叛逆问题.

original: No, it's not worth the risk

My Lord, Byzantium has fallen to the Saracens. The last bastion of the Roman Empire, the City of Constantine, is now in Turkish hands. As Christendom reels from the shock, Byzantine refugees flock to the cities and courts of Europe, bringing with them old manuscripts of classical knowledge, tracts by Aristotle, Plato and Galen, and a thorough knowledge of both Latin and Greek. Inviting these refugees to $COUNTRY$ might provide an enormous boost to our own efforts in the fields of culture and science.
translation: 我的领主，拜占庭已经陷于萨拉森人之手。罗马帝国最后的堡垒君士坦丁堡现在落入了土耳其人手中。正当基督教世界正因此惊慌失措之时，拜占庭来的难民蜂拥来到欧洲大大小小的城市和宫廷，带来关于古典时代知识的古老手稿，亚里士多德、柏拉图和盖伦的文章，还有详尽的拉丁与希腊的知识。将这些难民邀请到$COUNTRY$来，应该可以极大地促进我们文化和科学领域的工作。

original: By all means, let them come!
No, we don't need their help
translation: 不，我们不需要他们的帮助

original: Because of our relative notability, we are in a position to support the Italian artists in the Florentine School. Being perceived as patrons of international art will definitely help our propaganda efforts.
translation: 有了一定的知名度，我们有机会资助佛罗伦萨学派的意大利画家。「国际艺术品的买家」绝对会起到很好的宣传效果。

original: Of course. They shall have our support
translation: 当然。他们会得到我们的支持。

original: We can feel it in the wind. Soon our equestrian elite will be nothing more than a dream remembered, as the chivalrous tradition dies out before the onslaught of modernity. The world is changing, but for now, for one last time: Let the Knights of $COUNTRY$ ride!
translation: 世界正在进步，我们可以感觉到我们的精英骑士们会被渐渐淘汰. 现在，让 $COUNTRY$ 最后的骑士们展现一下身手吧!

original: No, we need to get with the times
Charter a Guild of St. Luke

Saint Luke, the patron saint of artists, often came to lend his name to artists guilds in Western Europe, the most famous, perhaps, in Antwerp. Chartering a guild here in $COUNTRY$ might be a tad on the expensive side, but the cultural benefit will be there for all to see. Developing the Guild's bureaucracy will also strengthen our native bureaucratic tradition.
translation: 圣卢克，艺术家的守护神，在西方欧洲经常出现以其命名的艺术家协会，其中最为著名的，或许，就在安特卫普.在$COUNTRY$成立协会的费用也许微不足道，但是文化收益却是众皆可见.发展该协会的管理机构同样将加强我们本土的官僚传统
荷兰式绘画的黄金时代

original: The Dutch Republic, recently Calvinist, recently independent, and with strong undercurrents of humanistic thought and philosophy, had in the late 16th century set the philosophical stage for a break with the established artistic traditions and ideals of the old Catholic Europe. Riding on the back of the wealth coming in from the developing trade through Amsterdam, we could help usher in a Golden Age for Dutch painting.
translation: 新近独立的荷兰共和国最近归属了加尔文宗派.国内人文主义思想与哲学思想暗潮汹涌，16 世纪后期荷兰共和国搭设了哲学舞台与既定的艺术传统和欧洲旧天主教思想剥离开来.坐在从阿姆斯特丹发展贸易的来的金山上，我们迎来荷兰画坛的黄金时代.

original: A cursive style of Arabic calligraphy, originated in the Ottoman Empire of the 15th and 16th centuries, the Diwani Script was thus named for its intended use on royal decrees issued by the Ottoman diwan, the cabinet of the Ottoman state. Strengthen our rule by proclaiming our edicts, and the word of God, in the harmonies of calligraphy.
translation: 总之就是一种阿拉伯的书法，被奥斯曼继承并融入了很多文化与宗教因素

original: While tea had been grown in Japan at least since the 9th century, the more refined aesthetics of the Chanoyu, The Way of Tea, only developed fully during the early parts of the 15th century. Part religious ceremony, and part cultural tradition, The Way of Tea could become an integral part of our cultural heritage.
translation: 茶叶在3000多年前就已经在开始中国种植，茶文化则在唐朝开始形成. 其中包含了文化与宗教传统，茶道渐渐成为我们不可分割的文化

original: You, with no limit and no bound, may choose for yourself the limits and bounds of your nature. We have placed you at the world's center so that you may survey everything else in the world.\n\n--Mirandola, Piccolo -- 'Oration on The Dignity of Man'
translation: “你，不受任何限制和约束，你可以选择自己的本性之界限。我们已将你置于世界的中心，如此你便可以观察世界上的任何其他东西。”\n\n——皮科·德拉·米兰多拉——“论人的尊严”

original: The South German organ tradition was a school of German organ composers, whose work was largely inspired by earlier Italian traditions, learned by the Germans from studies under Italian masters. Known for improvisatory preludes, chaconnes and passacaglias, the music of the South German Organists is something we could consider supporting.
translation: 南德的传统风琴在加上来自意大利的改良因素使其广为流行，也值得我们赞助它

original: Only the Almighty knows what artistic talent has gone wasted because of too little money, too little food and too little love. Help struggling composers in $COUNTRY$ with your patronage, and they will help you in return.
translation: 只有上帝知道艺术天赋会因为缺少金钱、食物和爱而消失殆尽。资助在$COUNTRY$奋斗的作曲家们，他们会回报你的。

original: Our subjects have taken to telling tales and legends about $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$. The legend says that in $COUNTRY$'s darkest hour, he will return to our nation, and deliver it from evil. Regardless of the truth in that statement, we could use this in our propaganda.
translation: 据悉，我国民间流传着关于$RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$的传说：当$COUNTRY$到了最危险的时候，他将重返故土祛除邪魔。传说里有几分真相搁在一边，我们可以宣扬这样的故事。

original: Yes, I love a good story
No, our people should focus on the here and now
translation: 不，我们的人民应当着眼身边、关注当下

original: Unite the §YHoly Roman Empire§! to one country!
All members of the §YHoly Roman Empire§! will become our direct vassals or leave the empire, giving us claim on their lands!
translation: 所有§Y神圣罗马帝国§!的成员国会成为皇帝的附庸或者脱离帝国。如果选择脱离帝国，我们将得到他们所有土地的宣称权！

original: Thanks to our shrewd commerce practices, merchants are being attracted to our realm and our trade efficiency has increased as a result.
translation: 我们精明的商业条例将商人吸引到了我们的土地上，这是我们贸易效率提高的结果

original: After putting in some effort in communicating with $RULER_ADJ$ peers, the hard work of $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ has paid off. Our diplomatic standing has increased thanks to $RULER_ADJ$ silky tongue.
translation: 花了些功夫与$RULER_ADJ$的同侪交流了一下，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$的努力工作有回报了.多亏了$RULER_ADJ$的能说会道，我们的外交地位提升了.

original: It is almost inconceivable how incompetent $MONARCH$ is when handling diplomacy. We do not know how $RULER_S_PRONOUN$ did it, but $RULER_S_PRONOUN$ managed to hurt our diplomatic standing in the world with a single letter of apology to an ambassador.
translation: $MONARCH$在外交上的无能几乎让人难以置信.我们不知道$RULER_S_PRONOUN$怎么做的，但是$RULER_S_PRONOUN$仅仅通过给一位大使去了一封道歉信就设法损害了我们在国际上的外交地位.

original: Borders are organic things, changing and mutating with the seasons, and with the fortunes of the latest conqueror passing by. Historians will, perhaps, say that the events that transpired in $PROVINCENAME$ in that year of our lord $YEAR$, were inevitable. 'As $PROVINCENAME$ continued to flourish under the benevolent rule of $COUNTRY$, the yokels on the other side of the border were bound to get jealous.' Perhaps they will be less fair to us. Either way, tensions in $PROVINCENAME$ have given a rival neighbor a Casus Belli against us.
translation: 边界是会变化的，随着季节或过去的征服者带来的财富而变化或变异.或许历史学家会说在吾主之年$YEAR$，$PROVINCENAME$中发生的事件是不可避免的.“在$COUNTRY$的德政领导下，当$PROVINCENAME$继续蓬勃发展的时候，边界另一侧的乡民注定要嫉妒的”.也许他对我们不太公平.不管怎样，$PROVINCENAME$中的紧张局势给充满敌意的邻居一个理由向我们宣战.
如果有行动，那就征兵吧

original: The overall performance of our Navy has indeed improved since we decided to favor it a bit more at the expense of the Army. An officer of great skill has emerged from the ranks.
translation: 自从我们决定牺牲陆军而促进海军，我们海军的表现切实的提升了.一名军官技术很好，脱颖而出.

original: The End of the Internal Conflicts
We are in a war with one of our enemies. Everyone in the realm feels that this is a fight we have to win, and they are doing their part.
translation: 我们和敌人之一开战了.全国上下都认为这场战争我们必须胜利，他们正在做出努力.
俄罗斯民族国家的建立

original: Through conquest and diplomacy Russia has managed to transform from a mere settlement into a dominant principality. After several eastern expeditions the Mongol hordes have finally been subdued and a centralized Russian state, ruled under the suzerainty of the Tsar, is emerging. Influences from Western Europe are helping us modernize and reform our nation and Western style of education is being adopted.
translation: 通过征服以及外交，俄罗斯已经成功从纯粹的聚集地转变为一个大公国.经过几次的东征，蒙古汗国也终于被征服，一个由沙皇统治的集权式俄罗斯国家崛起了.来自西欧的影响正帮助我们实现现代化以及改革我们的国家，同时西式的教育也会被采用.

original: It all belongs to Mother Russia

translation: 尼德兰民族国家的建立

original: The Dutch are emerging as one of Europe's most capable naval and colonial powers. Lucrative trade opportunities, locally and overseas, have resulted in a swift evolution for the country into one of the first capitalist countries in the world.
translation: 尼德兰是作为欧洲最有实力的海军和殖民国家登场的. 本地和海外商机带来的大量收益，使这个国家进化成了世界上最大的资本主义国家之一.

original: We want no part of it

translation: 西班牙民族国家的建立

original: Global expansion in newly discovered areas and the establishment of colonies is transforming Spain into one of the most powerful and wealthiest nations of our time. Spanish explorers are constantly moving into new areas and extending our borders. Immense amounts of gold and silver are being brought back to our motherland, filling the coffers of our state treasury.
translation: 在新大陆的全面扩张以及殖民地的大量建立使得西班牙成为了当时最强大也最富有的国家之一。西班牙的探险者们不懈地探索着未知的地域，扩展着我们的疆界。无数的黄金白银被运回祖国，填满了国库。

original: Let's conquer the world in the name of Spain.
translation: 以西班牙之名征服世界

original: Nothing good will come of it

translation: 英格兰民族国家的建立

original: Foreign trade has long been a foundation of English national policy. By extending our influence across borders and controlling its political development domestically, we have managed to become one of the foremost European powers. Our colonial expansion is becoming a major factor in promoting our nation's economic growth, reinforcing our position in world affairs.
translation: 国际贸易长期以来一直是英国的基本国策，通过在海外扩大本国影响以及控制他国政治走向，我们设法成为欧洲列强之一. 同时我们在海外的殖民地扩张正在成为国家经济增长，推进全球影响力的新动力.

original: The day of glory has arrived for the English
translation: 英格兰的荣光终于到来

original: We want no part of it

translation: 法兰西民族国家的建立

original: This year will mark the beginning of an evolutionary period for our nation. The old feudal ways will begin to make way for a more modern centralized nation. Although struggling financially due to miscalculated projects and military campaigns, we have managed to transform ourselves into one of the most dominant powers of Europe.
translation: 今年将会是标志着我国进入进化时期的一年.传统的封建方式将会在一个更现代化的集权式国家中消失.尽管由于项目预算失误以及军备竞争加剧，我们的财政面临窘境，但我们还是设法将我们转变成了欧洲最具统治力的强国之一.

original: The day of glory has arrived for the French
translation: 法兰西的荣光终于到来

original: We want no part of it

translation: 意大利民族国家的建立

original: As the heart of the Renaissance, our nation is blossoming culturally. We have just entered the beginning of what looks like a prolonged artistic rebellion, especially in the field of architecture and literature. The cultural evolution is not aiding our country in maintaining peace within our borders however. Our country is continuously stricken by foreign states seeking power and land.
translation: 作为文艺复兴的中心，我们国家的文化蓬勃发展. 我们已经进入了一个持久的艺术革命的时代，特别是在建筑和文学方面. 但是文化革命却没能帮助我们的国家保持内部的和平. 我们一直被外来的追求力量和侵吞领土的国家侵扰着.

original: We want no part of it

Regardless of the absence of a strong, central authority, our nation is prospering. The Hanseatic League, formed by hundreds of towns in northern Germany, has contributed to the prosperity of our nation. Intellectual growth, combined with sea and overland trading, has also helped spur the development and transform our country into a wealthy manufacturing center.
translation: 尽管我们缺少一个强大集权的中央机关，我们的国家仍然在蓬勃发展着.由德国北部数百个城镇组成的汉萨同盟对我国的发展起了至关重要的作用.通过结合海路与陆路贸易所增长的智慧也有助于刺激我们的发展进步，并将我们的国家转变欧洲一个富裕的生产制造中心.

original: We want no part of it

At the mere age of 15, $MONARCH$ has taken his father's position as head of the Shiite Turkmen tribe. He has quickly established a base of power in the northwest and proclaimed himself Shah of Iran. Several of the neighboring regions have been conquered and the possibility of a resurrected Iranian nation doesn't seem so absent anymore.
translation: 年仅16岁的$MONARCH$取代了他的父亲成为了什叶派土库曼部落的首领.很快他就在西北部建立了一个权力基地并宣称自己为伊朗王.周边的几个地区已经被征服了，伊朗民族国家的再度崛起看来并不是没有可能的.

original: We are not prepared to take that step
translation: 我们不准备走上这条路

original: $MONARCH$ has begun to lay the foundation of his new empire. Although inferior in numbers, his well-disciplined troops have managed to achieve several decisive victories against the Sultans of India. The battle of $CAPITAL$ became the first great victory in a series of expansions and, with time, the empire of the Mughals could stretch over the larger part of the Indian plateau.
translation: $MONARCH$已经为他的新帝国奠定了坚实的基础。虽然人数不多，但他纪律严明的军队在对抗印度苏丹的战役中打了不少的胜仗。特别是$CAPITAL$之战成为了这一系列扩展疆土的战役中的第一个胜仗。在不久的将来，莫卧儿帝国将横扫整个印度半岛。

original: This area is of no interest to us
translation: 我们对这些地区一点兴趣也没有
爱尔兰民族国家的建立

original: For decades England has attempted to subjugate the Irish population and take control of the island. To unite the Irish lands under a sole flag may be our only chance to repel them.
translation: 数十年来英格兰一直都想征服爱尔兰人并占领爱尔兰岛. 将整个岛屿联合在一个旗帜之下或许能帮助我们驱除这些侵略者.

original: Foreign trade has long been a foundation of British national policy and by extending its influence across borders and uniting its political development domestically we have managed to become one of the foremost European powers. Our colonial expansion is becoming a major factor in promoting our nation's economic growth and is also reinforcing our position in world affairs.
translation: 国际贸易长期以来一直是不列颠的基本国策，通过在海外扩大本国影响以及控制他国政治走向，我们设法成为欧洲列强之一. 同时我们在海外的殖民地扩张正在成为国家经济增长，推进全球影响力的新动力.

original: The day of glory has arrived for the British
translation: 不列颠的荣光终于到来

original: We want no part of it

After a prolonged period of colonial mismanagement, we have reached a state of divergence. Cultural, social and political dissimilarities and the ongoing exploitation have made the settlers lose faith in our government. The differences between us and the settlers are becoming more prominent as time is progressing and a large-scale rebellion is beginning to take form.
translation: 经历了对殖民地长期的错误管理之后，我们的国家已面临分裂. 文化，社会和政治差异和正在进行的剥削使得殖民地居民对政府丧失信心. 我们和移民者的分歧随时间推移越来越大，大范围的反叛已经暗潮涌动.

original: Our attempt to assert rigid economic control over our colonies has met fierce resistance. Some colonists have brought forward a suggestion to restrict the amount of goods being imported from $COUNTRY$ and impose a ban on imported goods.
translation: 我们对殖民地所采取严格的经济控制遭到了猛烈的抵制. 一些殖民地提出限制进口来自 $COUNTRY$ 的商品，并且征收关税.

original: Many honored and influential representatives from several of our colonies afflicted by $MONARCH$'s new policies have assembled in $PROVINCENAME$. We should take appropriate measures to stop them before they find common cause and manage to turn all our colonies against us.
translation: 很多来自我们殖民地的受人尊敬的有影响力的代表们上受到$MONARCH$的新政策的折磨，他们在$PROVINCENAME$集结.我们应采取适当措施，在他们找到共同的借口并且设法使所有的殖民地反抗我们之前，阻止他们.

original: Attempt to find a diplomatic solution
The days of diplomacy are over

Social and political dissimilarities in combination with the poor administration of our colonies have caused frictions between the colonial governors and the settlers. The aspiration and longing for autonomy has triggered a chain of rebellions.
translation: 社会和政治差异再加上糟糕的管理政策，导致了王国总督和移民间的剧烈摩擦. 人们渴望自治的热切心情导致了一系列的反叛行为.

original: As our colonies are expanding a growing desire for independence has begun to spread among the settlers. High taxes and colonial mismanagement have also helped to spur the formation of rebellious movements and at the moment protests and revolts are erupting all over our colonial lands.
translation: 随着我们殖民地的日渐扩张，独立自治的想法也开始在移民中传播. 高额赋税和管理不善大大刺激了反叛运动的高涨，抗议和起义席卷了整个殖民地.

original: Social and political dissimilarities have for some time created divisions between the settlers and us. A growing desire for self-government and liberation has initiated a series of uprisings and protests across our colonies.
translation: 社会和政治差异导致了我们和移民们的巨大差异，移民们日益增长的独立和解放思想在整个殖民地导致了一系列的起义和暴乱.

original: Several decades of poor colonial rule and mismanagement have evoked discontent among large groups of settlers. Their desire for independence is growing stronger by the day and major uprisings are erupting in several of our colonies.
translation: 数十年来的糟糕殖民政策以及管理失当导致了殖民地居民的不满. 他们日益渴望独立，大量的起义在殖民地四处爆发.

original: We can't afford to ignore this

Centuries of colonial rule have instigated a sense of nationalism amongst our colonists. The relationship between the new generation of settlers and the motherland is becoming more and more strained. Resistance movements are beginning to form in several colonies, bringing considerable instability to the area.
translation: 数个世纪的殖民统治唤起了殖民地居民的民族主义思想. 新一代殖民地居民与母国之间的关系也越来越紧张，在几个殖民地率先爆发的反抗运动给整个地区的稳定带来了极大影响.

original: We can't afford to ignore this

Centuries of colonial rule have instigated a sense of nationalism amongst our colonists. The relationship between the new generation of settlers and the motherland is becoming more and more strained. Resistance movements are beginning to form in several colonies, bringing considerable instability to the area.
translation: 数个世纪的殖民统治唤起了殖民地居民的民族主义思想. 新一代殖民地居民与母国之间的关系也越来越紧张，在几个殖民地率先爆发的反抗运动给整个地区的稳定带来了极大影响.

original: We can't allow this to continue
translation: 不能允许这一切继续了

original: Several decades of poor colonial rule and mismanagement have evoked discontent among a large group of our settlers. Their desire for independence is growing stronger by the day and has resulted in major uprisings in several of our colonies.
translation: 数十年来的糟糕殖民政策以及管理失当导致了殖民地居民的不满. 他们日益渴望独立，大量的起义在殖民地四处爆发.

original: Centuries of colonial rule have instigated a sense of nationalism amongst our colonists. The relationship between the new generation of settlers and the motherland is becoming more and more strained. Resistance movements are beginning to form in several of our colonies, bringing considerable instability to the area.
translation: 数个世纪的殖民统治唤起了殖民地居民的民族主义思想. 新一代殖民地居民与母国之间的关系也越来越紧张，在几个殖民地率先爆发的反抗运动给整个地区的稳定带来了极大影响.

original: We can't allow this to continue
translation: 不能允许这一切继续了

original: Several decades of poor colonial rule and mismanagement have evoked discontent among large groups of our settlers. Their desire for independence is growing stronger by the day resulting in major uprisings in several of our colonies.
translation: 数十年来的糟糕殖民政策以及管理失当导致了殖民地居民的不满. 他们日益渴望独立，大量的起义在殖民地四处爆发.

original: We can't allow this to continue
translation: 不能允许这一切继续了

original: The federation of kingdoms and principalities that formed the Holy Roman Empire at times made up the larger part of central Europe. The size of the Empire varied at different times and was loosely organized during most of its existence, but the German and Austrian lands always constituted an integral part of the Empire.
translation: 彼时构成神圣罗马帝国的王国与公国的联盟构成了中欧的大部分.不同时期帝国的规模也各不相同，在他存在的大部分时间都组织松散，但是德国和奥地利的土地始终是帝国的内部组成部分.

original: The incessant strife, both religious and political, within the Holy Roman Empire is draining the morale of $PROVINCENAME$'s population. The relation with the Emperor has reached an all time low and many consider it to be in $PROVINCENAME$'s best interest to leave the confederation.
translation: 在神圣罗马帝国内部，宗教和政治上无休止的纷争耗尽了$PROVINCENAME$人们的士气.与皇帝的关系达到了历史新低，许多人认为离开联邦满足$PROVINCENAME$的最大利益.

original: The incessant strife, both religious and political, within the Holy Roman Empire is draining the morale of $PROVINCENAME$'s population. The relation with the Emperor has reached an all time low and $MONARCH$'s dishonorable reputation hasn't improved our situation. Many considered it to be in $PROVINCENAME$'s best interest to leave the confederation.
translation: 在神圣罗马帝国内部，宗教和政治上无休止的纷争耗尽了$PROVINCENAME$人们的士气.与皇帝的关系达到了历史新低，$MONARCH$可耻的名声并不能改善我们的境况.许多人认为离开联邦满足$PROVINCENAME$的最大利益.

original: The questionable rule of $MONARCH$, the populations' strive for liberty and the desire for enactment of enlightened ideals has spurred a revolution that seems all but unavoidable. The common people has united and taken to arms in an attempt to topple the government and thereby initiating one of the bloodiest revolutions of our time.
translation: 民众对 $MONARCH$ 糟糕的统治已失去了信心，他们为争取自由不惜采取武力手段推翻现政府，一场血腥的革命已经爆发.

original: Dire times are ahead of us

The government's inept inability to cope with the national crisis has allowed new insurrections to spring up. The population is demanding the immediate dissolution of the current administration and is determined to achieve that goal at any cost.
translation: 目前的政府没有能力处理国家的局势，已经激起了新的动荡. 民众要求立即解散政府，为此他们不惜采取极端方式.

original: It is nothing to be concerned about

$COUNTRY$'s prospect of financial success has looked quite bleak the last couple of years. $MONARCH$'s continuous investments in wars on foreign soil, the governments financial neglect and the political instability have almost decimated the nation's funds bringing $COUNTRY$ close to bankruptcy.
translation: $COUNTRY$最后几年在财务上的前景已经相当黯淡.$MONARCH$持续对国外战争的投资，政府对财政漠视以及政治的不稳定让国家元气大伤，这使$COUNTRY$濒临破产.

original: The treasury isn't even close to empty
After some gruesome years, order has finally settled amongst our people.
translation: 经过数年的动荡纷争，国家的局势终于稳定下来了.

original: With the discovery of previously unknown continents and the establishment of new trade routes, a new maritime era has been born. Explorers of other nations are returning home with highly sought after cargo of spices, luxuries and commodities. Our country's importance as a trading nation has suddenly diminished and we are faced with a sudden economic decline forcing our government to regulate our expenditures.
translation: 随着新大陆的发现和新贸易线路的建立，新的航海时代已经诞生. 其他国家的探险者带着抢手的香料、奢侈品和大宗商品正在回国.贸易国的突然减少对我们的国家来说十分重要，我们面临着突如其来的经济衰退，这迫使我们的政府管控支出.

original: As with most dynasties, our nation is under constant attack by foreign rivals claiming their rights to our crown. Blighted by the lack of financial resources $MONARCH$ has been advised to seek diplomatic negotiations or otherwise face the possible end of our empire.
translation: 和其他许多王朝一样，我国王位也受外国那些宣称自己有继承权野心家的觊觎.与此同时还面临着财政方面的窘境，$MONARCH$寻求以谈判方式解决争端.

original: Although comprising a vast area, $COUNTRY$ is politically a rather shattered nation. $MONARCH$'s power over the empire has been severely limited by various local rulers and he is faced with increasing difficulty administering the large empire. The disparate mix of culture groups, with different values and beliefs has resulted in conflicts erupting over the most insignificant matters.
translation: 尽管$COUNTRY$领土面积辽阔，但其政治上并不统一.$MONARCH$对帝国的统治力量被形形色色的本土领袖限制了，对较大帝国的统治越发困难了.不同文化团体的杂糅在一起，各自不同的价值观与信仰使他们在最不重要的小事上爆发冲突.

original: Administering such a large empire as $COUNTRY$ requires extensive economic planning and the lack of a good financial advisor had so far proven quite disastrous. The appointment of $TREASURER$ helped turn the tide however. They introduced a number of financial reforms, including a more equitable tax system and a plan for the funding of the national debt.
translation: 管理像$COUNTRY$一样的大帝国需要有详尽的经济规划，缺少财政顾问的后果被证明是灾难性的。任命$TREASURER$让我们避免这一情况的发生。他们引入了一系列的金融改革，包括更公平的税制系统和给国家债务注资的一项大计划。

original: $MONARCH$ has become renowned for our country's artistic achievements and blossoming economy. Artists, philosophers and poets are flocking to $CAPITAL$ and the thriving economy has allowed extensive artistic funding. Several fine-architectural buildings are being erected and beautiful gardens are built to demonstrate our country's wealth and many members of our new intellectual elite have ideas on how to improve various parts of our country.
translation: $MONARCH$因我国的艺术成就和繁荣的经济享誉世界。艺术家、哲学家和诗人纷纷涌入$CAPITAL$，繁荣的经济使得许多人愿意资助艺术发展。众多符合建筑美学的建筑拔地而起，建成的美丽园林夸饰着我国的富裕，新晋的精英知识分子争相提出改善我国各方各面的想法。
投资建设更好的城市基础设施。
投资建设更好的乡村基础设施。
投资推广更好的生产方法。

original: With the discovery of the New World, we have entered what looks like our greatest period of prosperity. Despite the immense wealth returning to us allowing $MONARCH$ to finance one of the most outstanding armies in the world, we have not been successful in creating a strong naval force and his attempt to conquer the neighboring states has so far failed miserably.
translation: 伴随新大陆的发现，我们似乎进入了最繁荣时期。尽管回馈给我们的巨大财富使$MONARCH$有能力资助世界上最杰出的军队，我们还没有成功的打造强大的海军，我们海军征服邻国的尝试目前为止都惨遭失败。

original: Abandon the idea of naval supremacy

The deep devotion of the Roman Catholics in Rome has awakened a desire for an independent state ruled by Popes of the Church. A large part of the population has expressed support for the idea of such an establishment and has now turned to $MONARCH$ for approval.
translation: 罗马天主教徒的极度忠诚使他们想要拥有由教宗统治的独立国家.大多数人已经表示支持这个想法，现在正寻求$MONARCH$的同意.

original: We will never support such a state

Thoughts of disapproval against the Roman Catholic Church are spreading across Europe as a result of the increasing corruption of monks and clerics. Voices are raised questioning the current principles and greed of the Church. A monk in $CAPITAL$ has for some time expressed deep concerns and is now openly declaring his discontent with the Church, paving the way towards a reformation of the faith.
translation: 反对罗马天主教会的思潮在整个欧洲蔓延，这是僧侣和神职人员越来越腐败的结果.人们对教会现行教义和贪婪提出质疑.在$CAPITAL$的一位僧侣很长时间以来对此深切关注，现在公开表达了他对教会的不满，为宗教改革铺平了道路.

original: Only time will tell what this might bring

The increased secularization of the Papacy and their accentuation on rituals has gradually evoked concern across Europe. The preaching of new ideas is becoming more common and appealing to several segments of society, dignity and respect for the peasants and salvation without loss of fortune for the wealthy. A majority of the citizens of $PROVINCENAME$ have begun to question the authority and actions of their religious leaders.
translation: 教宗的权利越发世俗化，他们对宗教仪式的强调逐渐引起了整个欧洲的担心.传播新思想的情况越来越普遍，在社会的某些层面很受欢迎，尊严以及对农民的尊重，不剥夺财产的救助.大部分的$PROVINCENAME$市民开始质疑宗教领袖的权威和行为了.

original: Only time will tell what this might bring

After the publication of 'The Institutes of the Christian Church', introducing the central principles and ideas of the theological reformation, the social, political and philosophical attitude of Europe has begun to alter. The doctrines of the elect and predestination has had a strong influence on the population of $PROVINCENAME$, making them give up their old beliefs in favor of those preached by the reformed scholars.
translation: 《基督教会研究》一书的出版开始了对中心方针和理念的改革，欧洲对社会，政治和哲学的态度发生了改变.也对$PROVINCENAME$的人民对选民和宿命的教义产生了强烈的影响，这使他们放弃自己的旧有观念，这有利于学者所宣扬的那些改革

original: Despite $MONARCH$'s effort to mediate between the different religious groups in our nation, conflicts have been erupting on a regular basis. The situation has worsened and without drastic measures, we will soon be engulfed in a religious civil war.
translation: 虽然$MONARCH$努力调和国内各教派之间的争端，激烈的宗教冲突仍然在不断发生。局势已经极度恶化，如果不采取有效的措施，一场内战随时可能爆发。

original: Eradicate the heretics to bring peace
We should strive for a tolerant society
In spite of rigorous attempts to eradicate heresy, the population of some of our provinces are strongly attached to their faith and are still resisting conversion.
translation: 尽管国家已经在全力地根除异端，但是我们一些省的居民仍旧顽固地忠于他们的信仰，抵制我们的国教.

original: Increase funding to convert the heretics

Our country's harsh subjugation of heretics hasn't brought the expected results. Instead of restoring order and bringing our nation under one religious faith, our actions have further agitated the population leading to increased violence and acts of cruelty.
translation: 我国严厉镇压异教徒的努力并没有获得预期的效果，国家没有出现秩序井然和信仰归一的状况，相反我们的行动反而加剧了暴力和凄惨事件的发生.

original: Increase funding to suppress the heretics
translation: 加大资金投入以镇压异端

original: Even though attempts have been made to transform our society into a more tolerant one, violent outbursts and riots are becoming more common. The violence has escalated and atrocities are being committed on both sides, widening the religious chasm and threatening to tear our country apart from within.
translation: 虽然国家下了大力气来使社会能够容忍不同的宗教，但是暴力和骚乱事件仍旧越来越频繁. 冲突逐渐升级，不同宗教各方都表现出残暴的一面. 他们之间的沟堑正在扩大，威胁着国家的统一.

original: We have to convert them to the one true faith

The edict of tolerance, proclaimed by $MONARCH$ a short while back has proven to be nothing more than mere words. There have been several violent incidents and atrocities against religious minority groups since the declaration where $MONARCH$ has taken the stance of complete ignorance.
translation: 前阵子 $MONARCH$ 颁布的宽容法案被事实证明只是一张废纸. 在几处 $MONARCH$ 已经颁布宽容法案的省份，几起针对少数宗教团体的暴力事件仍旧发生了.

original: Our time is better spent elsewhere

Beginning in $YEAR$, $COUNTRY$ faced almost a decade of utter chaos slowly consuming the country from within and bringing it to the verge of collapse. Our nation is struggling both socially and economically as famine and war plague our people and the growing opposition against the aristocracy and church has resulted in a series of rebellions and assassination attempts against the monarch.
translation: 自$YEAR$年起，$COUNTRY$开始面临了近十年的混乱，这慢慢消耗了国家实力，使国家濒临崩溃的边缘.我们的国家正在饥荒和战争的泥沼中挣扎，贵族和教会的日益增长实力导致了一系列反对君主的起义和暗杀

original: Dire times are ahead of us

The government of $COUNTRY$ is constantly faced with the problem of outside forces trying to influence the local population to convert their religious beliefs. The outbursts that have followed have been particularly violent in $PROVINCENAME$ and the possibility of the riots spreading outside of the province's borders is becoming a serious threat to the surrounding areas.
translation: $COUNTRY$政府正面临着异端势力的宗教入侵，这已经在$PROVINCENAME$引发了持续的动，骚乱可能扩大并影响其他地区。

original: The mental strain of war, declining population numbers and the conniving of nobles, attempting to preserve and strengthen their authority, has hardly improved our nation's critical condition. Peasant uprisings are becoming increasingly common and without drastic measures, we are facing a long recovery.
translation: 战争导致人口数量下降，引发了贵族的紧张，他们试图维护和加强自己的权威，完全不理会国家的命运.农民起义正变得越来越普遍，没有严厉的措施，我们需要漫长的恢复过程.

original: The war is our main concern
Our domestic problems are our main concern

Starvation, plague and our increased effort to control the legal and economic status of the peasants are draining the strength of the common people. Unrest is brewing among the lower classes of society and is threatening to worsen the disorder of our already tormented nation.
translation: 饥饿，瘟疫和我们的试图强化对农民控制的法律耗光了人民的力量.动荡正在社会下层中酝酿，并威胁到我们这饱受磨难的国家

original: With plague, starvation and war ravaging our country, our people find themselves in a state of extreme mental and physical fatigue. Our population is begging our government to ease their misery and put an end to their sacrifice and suffering.
translation: 瘟疫，饥饿以及战争的蹂躏以及使得我们的人民无法忍受. 人民乞求政府减轻他们的痛苦，结束他们的牺牲与苦难.

original: There is no immediate solution at hand

Due to poor administration, $MONARCH$ has become the victim of several conspiracies by ambitious opponents. The opposition is growing stronger by the day and it is becoming apparent that $MONARCH$ most certainly isn't the right person to lead our nation in such troubled times.
translation: 由于贫乏的统治才能，$MONARCH$ 成为了野心家阴谋的受害者. 反对派一天天强大. 显然在这么一个麻烦的时期，$MONARCH$ 根本不是一个能领导国家的强势人物.

original: Leave the nation's fate in his hands
Widespread crop failure has left our people with very little, or nothing to eat. The people are crying out for the government to relieve their suffering, but to help so many will be very costly.
translation: 大面积的农业歉收使粮食极度缺乏. 人民向政府请求援助，但是帮助这么多的人将需要极大的支出.

original: We are helpless in the face of such a disaster...
The instability of the past years now finally seems to be over!
translation: 持续多年的动荡终于结束了!

original: Decades of feudal oppression, religious intolerance and unjust taxation have all contributed to the revolutionary movements beginning to surface across our lands. $MONARCH$ has desperately been seeking resolutions to the ever increasing problems as our country finds itself on the verge of financial ruin. The populations' incessant strive for liberty will probably prove too much of a challenge if not handled properly.
translation: 几十年的封建压迫，宗教不容忍和不公正的税收导致了我们国家的革命运动.$MONARCH$拼命寻求帮助以应对不断增加的问题，而国家正处在财政破产的边缘.人民不断争取自由是一个挑战，如果处理不当，那麻烦就大了.

original: Dire times are ahead of us

As the Reformation is beginning to take a hold of Europe, drastic measures have been taken to try to stem the tide of its spread. The religious policies of the non-Roman Catholics are despised by the state and the oppression towards the Protestants/Reformed will probably lead to religious revolution within a short period of time if not handled properly.
translation: 随着改革浪潮统治欧洲，各国已采取了严厉的措施，设法阻止传播的大潮.对非罗马天主教徒的宗教政策尤其让新教徒不满，如果不妥善处理，宗教革命即将爆发

original: Unrest is brewing among the lower class of our society due to the heavy burden placed on their shoulders. Their dissent of manorialism, high taxes and the food shortage has resulted in several revolts erupting all over the nation.
translation: 由于肩头的重压，不满情绪正在社会底层散播. 采邑制度，高额赋税以及食物的短缺已经导致了几处叛乱.

original: Vivid discussions among our philosophers, about social reforms and the virtues of reason have had a great impact on a large part of our population. $MONARCH$ is beginning to fear that some of them will be too easily influenced and that their rebellious actions will further increase our country's instability.
translation: 哲学家们进行了许多大胆的辩论，这些涉及到社会革新和道德准则的新思想给人们留下了深刻的印象.  $MONARCH$ 开始害怕他们可能会传播更激进的思想，进一步增加国家的不稳定因素.

original: The centralized government of our nation has become very corrupt and bloated. Many of the revolutionaries are hoping that they will be able to decentralize the authority and weaken the bureaucracy.
translation: 本国的中央集权政府已经极度臃肿和腐败.许多革命者的希望，能够下放权力，并削弱官僚

original: $MONARCH$'s indecisiveness and poor administration has made many of our people turn against their ruler. The opposition is growing stronger by the day and it is becoming apparent that $MONARCH$ probably isn't the best suited to lead our nation in such revolutionary times.
translation: $MONARCH$的优柔寡断和糟糕的行政管理使得人们对他的统治感到不满。反对派一天比一天强大。显然，在这个大革命时代，$MONARCH$根本不是一个合适的领导者。

original: The war, extensive crop-failures and our mismanaged economy overall has slowly paved the way for an economic crisis. The prospect of a bankruptcy is looming over our nation as money is rapidly losing its value and the monetary purchasing power is becoming more limited by the day.
translation: 战争，大面积的粮食歉收再加上失败的经济政策，所有一切正慢慢地使国家走上经济动荡的道路. 当货币快速贬值，实际购买力一天天降低时，破产的前景开始隐约迫近我们的国家.

original: Our mismanaged economy has emptied our financial reserves. If we are to recover from this, we must improve our financial planning immediately.
translation: 经济政策的适当耗尽了国库中最后一分钱. 如果想从中恢复，我们必须立即制定更好的经济政策.

original: The instability of the past years now finally seems to be over!
translation: 持续多年的动荡终于结束了!

original: The peasantry has for some time demanded economic, religious and political amendments. Their dissatisfaction has grown to such an extent that violent revolts are becoming a common day practice. Even though there is no central leadership and they lack proper armament, the peasants have still managed to pose a challenge to the authority. Several important buildings, both religious and other, have been burnt and plundered as a protest.
translation: 农民几次要求经济，宗教和政治的改革.他们的不满情绪已经酝酿了很长时间了，暴力反抗成为一种常见的日常行为.即使没有领导核心也没有合适的装备，农民仍然对权力构成了挑战.作为抗议，一些重要建筑被烧毁和掠夺.

original: Dire times are ahead of us

Regional revolts and protests are erupting all over our nation. Furious peasants are demanding immediate reforms of the social and political order. The weight of the heavy taxes and the cruelty of their landlords have finally driven them over the edge.
translation: 地区性的反抗和抗议在我国四处爆发. 愤怒的农民要求立即进行社会和政治改革. 繁重的赋税和领主的暴政迫使这些农民走向风口浪尖.

original: The ideas of the reformation have appealed to a large number of the oppressed peasantry. The appeal is in many cases based on social motives, many believe that they will receive support and that their hardship will lessen. This isn't necessarily the case, as the revolt has gained momentum and atrocities at the hands of the peasants have become more widespread, the reformists have begun to oppose the 'murderous peasants'.
translation: 改革宗派的教义迎合了大量受压迫农民们的需要. 这种吸引力更多的是来自于自身苦难的生存现状. 许多农民相信他们将会得到支持并且他们的苦难将会减轻. 毫无疑问，由明确动机和残酷思想武装起来的农民起义将波及全国，一些改良主义者也开始反对这些"农民杀人犯"

original: Let them choose their own faith
translation: 让他们选择自己的信仰

original: Military research and the introduction of gunpowder has more or less made our former armed forces obsolete. Their high status being something of the past, they now find themselves struck by poverty and frustration. Their misery has gone beyond reason and they are pressuring the authority for financial aid.
translation: 随着军事科技的日渐发展以及火炮的引入使我们的军队多多少少变得有点落后. 曾经的荣耀已经成为历史，其而代之的是困顿和挫败. 因此军队要求政府加大军费支出以重现昨日荣光.

original: They have no place in our society
They may still be of some use

During the first stages of the Peasants' War, the rebels have gained ground simply by overwhelming the lords and knights. Due to our already politically decentralized nation, what started out as several smaller, local uprisings has spread over the provincial borders and engulfed a larger part of our nation.
translation: 在德国农民战争的初期，叛军人数多于地主和骑士而占了上风.由于我们已经从政治上分化了国家，最初小范围的地方性的动乱最终越过了省界，将国家大部分地区卷入其中.

original: We have to negotiate a solution
The End of the Peasants' War
The instability of the past years now finally seems to be over! We no longer have to worry about peasants fighting for reforms. Their will to fight have been drained.
translation: 过去几年的动乱现在似乎结束了！我们没有必要再担心农民们会为改革而斗争了.他们已经没有战斗的愿望了.

original: The ongoing oppression and exploitation of the minority population in one of our provinces has finally reached its boiling point. The citizens of the province are up in arms against our rule.
translation: 在我国某一省份，对少数民族持续的压迫和剥削已经达到了顶峰。该省人民奋起武装反抗我们的统治。

original: The settlers of our colony have spotted minor groups of natives attentively observing the colony. We don't know what their intentions are, how do you want to proceed?
translation: 我们发现一些原住民正在监视殖民地居民。我们不知道他们有何目的，你打算怎么做？

original: Allow them to live in peace

The settlement of a growing number of white people in our colonies has brought discontent and hatred both among the natives and the settlers. The $PROVINCECULTURE$ colonists have ignored the natives as long as they have been able to grab their land and suppress, on false pretexts, all attempts at reaction and redress of wrongs.
translation: 我们殖民地移民数量的不断增加已经导致了当地原住民的敌对情绪。$PROVINCECULTURE$的殖民地居民与原住民日益对立，任何不当的处置都可能导致严重后果。

original: The maltreatment of the indigenous people, in combination with previously unfamiliar diseases brought by the settlers, has decimated the native population of $PROVINCENAME$.
translation: 对本地原住民的虐待以及移民带来的奇怪疾病，使得$PROVINCENAME$的原住民数量正在大幅减少。

original: Political and economic pressure at home has made way for a sudden increase in the number of people looking for a better life in rich uncharted lands
translation: 国内政治和经济形势的恶化迫使大量人口远涉重洋前往新开发的丰饶殖民地寻找新生活。

original: Our trade with the natives of $PROVINCENAME$ has proven very profitable and the economy of the colony has spurred to new heights.
translation: 我们与$PROVINCENAME$的原住民的贸易带来了巨额利润，殖民地经济取得了长足发展。

original: New diseases brought from overseas have quickly spread among the tribes and almost annihilated the entire native population in some areas.
translation: 远方国度传来的怪异疾病正在原住民部族中迅速传播，某些地区的原住民几乎完全消失了。

original: The $PROVINCECULTURE$ missionaries that were sent overseas to preach to the indigenous population have met fierce resistance. In some cases though, they have managed to influence the natives enough to convert them. A smaller group of natives living within and surrounding $PROVINCENAME$ have readily accepted the Christian beliefs.
translation: $PROVINCECULTURE$的传教士在当地的传教活动遇到了巨大的阻力，但有时他们还是能使原住民接受新信仰。在$PROVINCENAME$的部分原住民已经开始信奉基督教。

original: Try to convert all of them

For many years we have undercut our tax base. We have absolutely no control of the price-fluctuations from the inflow of silver and gold. The minister of finance is struggling to forecast any repayments as all costs are fluctuating wildly. The spending is based on the planned budget, but the inflow is irregular at best, making us spend more than we actually have.
translation: 多年以来我国本土的税源逐渐枯竭. 而海外大量流入的黄金和白银则导致无法控制的剧烈物价波动. 财政总管竭力维持金融秩序，制定严格的预算制度. 但金融领域的不确定因素实在是太多了，最终总是出现严重的赤字.

original: We are on the verge of bankruptcy
translation: 我们正处于破产的边缘

original: There is now even support in our capital for the pretender. There is an army just outside the gates of $CAPITAL_CITY$, and the city is about to fall!
translation: 我们的首都没有丝毫防守力量.而敌人已经就在$CAPITAL_CITY$城外了，城市即将陷落！

original: $MONARCH$'s continuous scheming and plotting has infuriated the nobles and made $MONARCH$ some powerful enemies among the aristocracy. It won't take long before the whispers and rumors of plots to end the misrule will turn into reality and our nation will be plunged into a drawn-out power struggle.
translation: $MONARCH$不断的密谋惹怒了贵族，其中的一些人对$MONARCH$恨之入骨.用不了多久，阴谋的谣言就会变成真实的政变.我们国家即将陷入漫长的权力斗争中

original: The opposition against $MONARCH$ has been attracting more supporters by the day and the possibility of a deposition is becoming very plausible. In a desperate attempt to save the throne and restore order, $MONARCH$ has turned to $COUNTRY$'s foreign allies asking for help.
translation: 反对 $MONARCH$ 的力量不断赢得新的支持者，他们很有可能会推翻现政权. 为了维持自己的地位，$MONARCH$ 开始转向 $COUNTRY$  的盟友请求援助.

original: A Royal Marriage can sometimes be a blessing but in our weakened state, due to the clash between the monarch and the aristocracy, it is nothing less than a curse. Opportunistic in-laws are regarding this as the perfect timing to expand their influence and obtain more power.
translation: 王室联姻本是喜事，但有鉴于我国君主和贵族之间的激烈冲突，这不啻是一个诅咒. 一些外戚乘机扩大其在我国的影响力掠去更大的权利.

original: $PROVINCENAME$ has fallen into the hands of the rebel forces. They have managed to overthrow the local government and have proclaimed $PROVINCENAME$ as theirs. News have reached us that they are preparing for a new attack as we speak.
translation: $PROVINCENAME$ 已经陷入叛军之手，他们推翻了地方政府，并公开宣称$PROVINCENAME$ 已为自由所有. 有消息说他们正准备向我们发动新的进攻.

original: We must regroup before they attack again
We'll have to accept defeat, for now
translation: 我们必须要接受失败，暂时接受。

original: The morale of our troops is sinking and groups of deserters have been spotted joining the rebel ranks. If this continues there is no way we can stop them from taking control over $PROVINCENAME$.
translation: 我们的部队士气低落，士兵大批地开小差，甚至加入叛乱队伍. 如果这种现象长期持续下去，叛军将会完全控制 $PROVINCENAME$ .

original: We have no resources for that

Our troops are gaining ground. It seems that many of the rebels have lost their incentive to fight and as a result large groups are retreating. This is our chance to end this madness and restore order.
translation: 我们的军队进展顺利，许多叛乱者已经失去了斗志，被迫向后撤退. 现在是结束乱局恢复秩序的好机会.

original: $MONARCH$ has begun a thorough revision of our country's military structure. While officers are still drawn from the nobility, the peasants and townspeople are conscripted into the other ranks. Regular drilling has been introduced and a powerful fleet established together with hundreds of battleships, galleys and other crafts.
translation: $MONARCH$开始重新整顿本国的军事结构。尽管军官依然有不少贵族，但农民和市民也可以获得军衔。常规训练已经引进，上百艘战船与桨帆船等组成了庞大的舰队。

original: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

One of our advisors, $NATURAL_SCIENTIST$, has received great support for their efforts in developing astronomical instruments and measuring and fixing the positions of stars. [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] observations include a comprehensive study of the solar system and accurate positions of more than 777 fixed stars.
translation: 我们的顾问之一，$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$，在努力开发天文仪器，测量及定位星体的位置等方面得到了极大的支持。[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap]观测包括了太阳系的全面研究和超过 777 颗恒星的准确位置。

original: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

One of our advisors, $ARMY_REFORMER$ has revolutionized the art of siege craft and defensive fortifications. $NAVAL_REFORMER_CAP_ADJ$ has fought in all the wars of $MONARCH$, and has attended frequent tours around the frontiers, redesigning and improving numerous fortifications.
translation: 我们的顾问，$ARMY_REFORMER$，改良了围城战术和防御工事。$NAVAL_REFORMER_CAP_ADJ$参与了$MONARCH$的所有战役，频繁地巡查前线，重新设计并改善了一系列的防御工事。

original: [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

$NAVAL_REFORMER$, our military advisor, has stressed the importance of a more organized fleet and the necessity of a reform. [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetSheHeCap] has managed to convince $MONARCH$ to commence an extensive restructuring. Battleships, galleys and other crafts will be built to strengthen the fleet.
translation: $NAVAL_REFORMER$，我们的军事顾问，不断强调更有纪律的舰队和海军改革的必要性。[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetSheHeCap]他们说服了$MONARCH$进行一项大的舰队改造工程，建造战舰、桨帆船等战船以增强我们海军的实力。

original: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders
$ARTIST$ is considered by many as one of the greatest living artists of our time. A number of $ARTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$ works rank among the most famous in existence.
translation: $ARTIST$被尊为我们时代仍在世的最伟大的艺术家之一。数件$ARTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$作品位于存世珍品之列。

original: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

The Wealth of Nations' was the first great work in political economy and the corner stone of what later became known as laissez-faire. $TREASURER$ has introduced the concept of the 'invisible hand' - the intrinsic ability of a system of perfect liberty to control itself and still give rise to an orderly society through the mechanism of competition.
translation: 《国富论》是一部伟大的政治经济学著作，并成为后世经济自由主义理论的基石。$TREASURER$引入了「看不见的手」的概念——一个完全自由的系统在市场的作用下，通过竞争逐利机制往往能更有效的促进社会的利益。

original: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

One of our advisors, $THEOLOGIAN$, must certainly be one of the greatest scholars of our time. $THEOLOGIAN_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ field of expertise in patristics and classical literature has had a great influence on theological debate in our nation. As a person of the middle ground their views have made $THEOLOGIAN_S_PRONOUN$ a beacon for those who value liberty more than Orthodoxy.
translation: 我们的顾问，$THEOLOGIAN$，一定是当代最伟大的学者之一。$THEOLOGIAN_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$在教父学和古典文学的领域的专业知识在我国的神学辩论具有极大的影响力。作为一个中立的人，人们认为$THEOLOGIAN_S_PRONOUN$是那些珍视自由超过正教的人们的灯塔。

original: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

One of our advisors, $STATESMAN$, has published the crowning achievement of $STATESMAN_POSS_PRONOUN$ literary career - 'The Spirit of Laws'. This monumental work has been celebrated for three of its numerous theories: the classification of governments, the influences on politics and the most important one - the theory of the separation of powers.
translation: 我们的顾问，$STATESMAN$，出版了$STATESMAN_POSS_PRONOUN$职业生涯最重要的一本著作——《论法的精神》。这一不朽的著作以三个重要的理论知名：政府的分类，政策的影响，以及最重要的部分——权力的隔离。

original: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders
One of our advisors, $COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$, has greatly helped intensify colonization and increase stability in our colonies.
translation: 我们的一个顾问，$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$，大大增强了殖民统治和殖民地的稳定性

original: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

$SPYMASTER$'s perfect organization of a secret service and spying network has proven extremely efficient in aborting all conspiracies against $MONARCH$'s life and all other political and diplomatic plots.
translation: $SPYMASTER$组织精密的秘密间谍网成功而有效的阻止了所有一切威胁$MONARCH$ 生命安全的图谋，以及其他政治和外交的阴谋.

original: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders
$DIPLOMAT$ is a greatly accomplished diplomat well known for $DIPLOMAT_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts in establishing our nation as a major diplomatic force.
translation: $DIPLOMAT$是及其娴熟的外交家，$DIPLOMAT_POSS_PRONOUN$的努力，使我国成为主要外交势力，并以此而知名。

original: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders
$TRADER$ is a very proficient merchant, renowned for $TRADER_POSS_PRONOUN$ attempts to improve trade customs and to stabilize the economy of our nation.
translation: $TRADER$是极其内行的商人，以其对改善贸易惯例及稳定我国经济而知名。

original: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] efforts will be admired throughout the nation
[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHisCap] reputation will reach further than our borders

Our nation is undergoing sweeping reforms in terms of the economy and the administration of our country. However, such reforms do not come cheap and may cause a fair bit of resentment among the populace.
translation: 我国正在彻底改革经济及行政管理。但这类改革代价昂贵，可能会在民众中引发一些愤怒。

original: No, such restructuring would be too harsh.
translation: 不，这样的改革可能太残酷了

original: Our country is going through an extensive social reorganization. Aristocratic lands are hugely being reduced and promises have been made to lessen the peasants' burden. A consequence of the liberation of the serfs, who compose a large part of our population, is the hostile reaction of the nobles in our realm.
translation: 我国正在经历一场广泛的社会重组。贵族拥有的土地大幅缩水，并被迫保证减轻农民负担。解放占我国人口一大部的农奴的后果，就是使得贵族反对我们的统治。

original: We are in no need of such a reform.
translation: 我们不需要这样的改革

original: $MONARCH$ has undertaken a set of measures to reform the military system of our country The tactical innovations include shallower and broader formations to maximize firepower, cross training between the army branches and light, highly mobile field artillery. The new tactical doctrine is based on firepower and mobility, eschewing heavy artillery and slow-moving tercios.
translation: $MONARCH$已着手对我国军事系统进行一系列改革。战术革新包括：更浅更宽的战线，以使火力最大化；在步兵和轻、高机动炮兵的交叉训练等。新的战术原则基于火力和机动，避免重炮兵和移动缓慢的部队。
