A spy sent into the garden on a full moon night returns with disturbing news: The Grand Secretary spends his nights standing in his garden, howling at the moon.
translation: 近日，深夜时从某位大学士的别墅中传出了奇怪的声音，且每过一个月都变得愈发强烈。起初，你以为这是大学士在跟他的小妾们玩一些盘根错节的游戏，但近来你开始意识到这种声音与月相之间存在着明显的联系。一名在月圆之夜被派去别墅花园暗查的密探回报了一则令人愕然的消息：大学士站在花园里，对着月亮嚎叫了一整夜。

original: He has taken the law and thrown it away!

Terrible news reach us from the Pearl River, where a number tax barges, carrying a substantial amount of the taxes for $YEAR$, has sunk during a particularly nasty bout of bad weather. The Grand Secretary of the Treasury interprets these events as a sign that our dynasty no longer enjoys the Mandate of Heaven, and argues that we must accept and respect this turn of providence. How shall we respond to these ill tidings?
translation: 从珠江那里传来了噩耗，一批载有大量$YEAR$年税银的漕运驳船因恶劣天气而沉没了。户部尚书将此视为本朝不再享有天命的凶兆，并声称我们只能听天由命。我们该如何应对这个烂摊子？

original: Sigh. Not much to do, is there?
translation: 呜呼！无计可施，为之奈何？
多铸些铜钱，把亏空补上。

original: Provinces have reported to the capital that they are now in full compliance with several sets of new imperial edicts, the only problem is that you've never issued any such edicts. An investigation into the matter reveals that forged bronze plaques with written edicts, bearing your seal, have somehow found their way to the province governors. It is a dark time when people dare challenge the Emperor openly, and many claim that this is because our dynasty no longer enjoys the Mandate of Heaven. What shall we do about these false edicts?
translation: 各省督抚来报，他们已谨遵新的几道圣旨行事——但问题是你并未发出这样的诏书。调查显示，有假的令牌和加盖了你大印的手写诏书不知通过何种途径传至了各省督抚之处。居然有人敢公开跟天子叫板，真可谓是天昏地暗，还有人声称此乃因我朝已不再是天命所归。我们该如何处理这些伪诏？

original: The Waning influence of the Imperial Palace in the border areas have resulted in local officials proclaiming that we no longer possess the Mandate of Heaven. They have turned to the neighboring [From.GovernmentName] of [From.GetName], inviting them to invade our lands.
translation: 宫中对边疆地区的影响力在日益衰落，某些地方官甚至公然宣称我们不再享有天命。他们投向了紧邻的[From.GetName][From.GovernmentName]，引导他们侵略我们的国土。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Empire is rapidly declining, as is their ability to project any kind of power beyond their borders. Our representatives in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] report that their attempts to get an audience with the [From.Monarch.GetTitle] has been met with nothing but feeble and insulting excuses.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]帝国正在迅速衰败，已难以维持任何境外势力对自己的臣服。我们派往[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的使节回报称他们觐见[From.Monarch.GetTitle]的请求遭到了拒绝，得到的回应只有无力又无礼的搪塞。

original: They are our overlord in name only.
translation: 他们只是我们名义上的宗主。

original: Your majesty has been presented with a formidable gift in the form of a Jade seal of some level of craftsmanship. The gift has been presented by an up and coming administrator associated with the Bureaucrat faction. As nothing is free in The Middle Kingdom, he probably expects us to return the favor.
translation: 陛下收到了一个鬼斧神工的玉章作为礼物.礼物来自一个积极进取的官僚派系行政官 .天下没有免费的午餐，他可能期待着我们报以青睐.

original: The writings of Master Confucius are being forgotten in $PROVINCENAME$, as the inhabitants there have more and more taken to practicing the Buddhist rite. The news comes as a major setback for the Temple faction, which has prided itself on the successes of state-sanctioned Confucianism. We could dispatch officials to immediately restore order to the province, but forcing the locals into a different faith will most likely hurt the economic viability of the province.
translation: 孔夫子的著作已经在$PROVINCENAME$被人遗忘，因为居民越来越多的参加佛教仪式.这条消息被视作儒教派系的失败，因为儒教派系致力于使儒教成为国教.我们可以派遣官员在该省重建秩序，不过强迫当地居民改变信仰会影响经济发展.

original: They may believe what they wish.
translation: 他们可以自由选择信仰

original: Keeping the feet of young girls bound and tied until every bone in them has grown broken and deformed creates wonders of female and human beauty. The fashion of bound feet waxes and wanes every hundred years or so, and this time the wax seems to be due to the fact that the Temple faction is actively promoting this sound ideal of beauty all over the country.
translation: 保证每个年轻女孩缠足直到脚骨变形可以增加女子的美丽.缠足的习惯每隔几百年就会兴盛或衰落一次，这次的兴盛似乎是由于儒教派系在全国大力弘扬这种审美观念.

original: This sounds a bit over the top.
The Temple has the right idea!

A traveler from Tibet has arrived in $CAPITAL$. He says that he has traveled from far-away Lhasa, and that he comes to spread the word of the Buddha. The Temple faction opposes this request, preferring instead the traditional teachings of Confucius as the sole font of spiritual guidance for our people. While there is a case to be made for the Temple Faction's position, overly heavy-handed treatment of Buddhism will destabilize our country.
translation: 一个来自西藏的云游僧到达了$CAPITAL$。他自称来自遥远的拉萨，到此传播佛陀的佛语。儒教派系反对这一请求，指出传统的儒学教育才是人民思想的唯一先导。虽然儒教派系言之有理，但过分弹压佛教会动摇我们的国家。

original: Of course he is free to preach
We should weed out this pest!
translation: 我们应该除掉这个害虫!

original: The Temple faction has had enough of the discord and strife that plagues $COUNTRY$. Pointing to the myriad of schools of thought that flourish within the realm it is no wonder, they argue, that we live in troubled times. The Temple faction holds that only a return to true Confucian values can restore order, and what better way than to burn a few books of heterodox teachings?
translation: 儒教派系的争吵和不和席卷了整个$COUNTRY$. 他们直指国内的百家争鸣是乱世的内因. 儒教派系主张只有罢黜百家,独尊儒术,秩序才能重建. 对此, 还有比焚烧掉异端学说的书籍更好的方法吗？

original: That does sound like an idea!

The Temple faction, tired of the pluralistic thought climate that has taken hold in China in the past few years, has taken matter into its own hands. In several provinces all over the country several prominent scholars of other schools than the official Confucian doctrine have been buried alive. That this will be a blow to innovation is already clear, but how shall we punish the Temple?
translation: 儒教派系厌倦了近几年席卷中国的百家争鸣局面，决心采取行动进而一手遮天. 国内几个省份中，除了正统儒学外，很多知名学派的思想家都被活埋了.这显然将打压开拓创新的精神，不过我们值得为此惩罚儒教吗？

original: A Scholar at the Examination Center

Wrapped in the reddish gold of a dying sun, and reflecting the blue of the heavens suspended above it, the old Gilded Pagoda has stood since the times of the Tang dynasty, or perhaps even longer still. The silence and darkness within the Pagoda is a stark contrast to the light and reflection outside of. Since Buddhism has become rare, the Pagoda has gone unused, and your courtiers have various suggestions as to what could be done with it.
translation: 外裹血色残阳般的黄金，反射出悬浮其上的蓝色天堂，这座镀金宝塔从唐朝起耸立至今，甚至或许比唐朝更早.宝塔内部的寂静与黑暗同外界的光明与喧嚣形成鲜明的对比.由于佛教不再盛行，宝塔也被废弃，你的大臣们对它能用来做什么产生了分歧.

original: Eunuchs: Melt it down and mint the gold!
Bureaucrats: Turn it into an examination center!

A high ranking member of the Bureaucrat faction has been caught siphoning funds out of the Imperial Treasury and into his own pocket. The only punishment that can at all be considered is of course death, but the question of who should replace him is less obvious. There are powerful candidates within both the Eunuch and Temple factions, but the candidates from the Bureaucrat faction are doubtlessly the ones best equipped to handle the job. Who should get the job?
translation: 一个文官派系的高级官员被发现用国库资金中饱私囊.唯一值得考虑的惩罚就是将他处以极刑，但问题在于谁将取代他的位置.宦官和儒教派系都有强有力的候选者，不过文官派系的候选人无疑是最适合担任这一职务的.谁将得到这一职务？

original: Since losing the Mandate of Heaven, people have begun avoiding you. It did not happen overnight, but progressively, as the months have passed, you have noticed that fewer and fewer people seem to take the time to pay their Emperor the proper respects and courtesies. After some cautious inquiries among trusted retainers you discover the reason: People have begun to fear you. For whatever reason, you have developed a reputation for cruelty. What to do about it?
translation: 由于不再受命于天，人民开始逃离你.这不是一夜间发生的，而是在持续数月后，你注意到越来越少的人民仍然对皇帝保持尊重和敬意.在对亲信侍从的几次谨慎的试探后你发现了原因:人民畏惧你.不知道什么原因，你建立起了残忍的名声.怎么办？

original: A scream echoes through the palace, but soon dissolves again into the silence and black of the night. A courtier has been murdered, found in his bedchamber with a blade buried deep in his back, and several stab wounds to the rest of his body. Fratricide and internal strife are becoming ever more common in $COUNTRY$, and many believe that we no longer enjoy the Mandate of Heaven. There are three suspects in the murder case, who did it?
translation: 一声惨叫在宫中回荡，不多时又归于寂静.一个官员被谋杀了，尸体在他自己的卧室里被发现，背上插着一柄利刃，身体的其他部分也有几处伤口.$COUNTRY$国内的谋杀和内部冲突已经变得司空见惯，许多人相信这是我们失去天命的表现.现在抓到了三个谋杀嫌疑犯，是谁干的呢？

original: The Palace Chef, in the Bedchamber, with a knife.
The Grand Secretary, in the Bedchamber, with a knife.
translation: 内阁大学士，于寝室以刀行刺。

original: The Grand Marshal, in the Bedchamber, with a knife.
translation: 兵部尚书，于寝室以刀行刺。

original: They present your heir on a stretcher, lying dead before you. He had been out riding with some of his companions, and apparently fell off the horse. You can feel only a quiet rage welling up within you when you think of the futility of his death. The son of the Emperor, dead, not in war or battle, but from a pointless accident. The event is a clear sign that the Mandate of Heaven has passed from our dynasty, and that we need to regain it. His companions are from various factions, who should be punished for the incident?
translation: 你的继承人被放在一副担架上，奄奄一息地抬到你面前.他和几个同伴骑马时不小心摔下马背.当你面对他毫无意义的死亡时不由得怒火中烧.皇帝的继承人死了，不是光荣的战死沙场，而是无意义的死于意外.这一事件清楚地表明我们的王朝已经失去了天命，我们必须努力重新获得天命.他的同伴来自不同的派系，谁应对这场意外负责？

original: One of the highest organs of our government, the old Privy Council, still seems to have ties to the old Dynasty. To assure loyalty and a more effective government we should dismiss it and appoint a new State Council.
translation: 我们政府的最高机关，旧佥议府，看起来仍旧依恋着旧王朝.为了确保一个更加忠诚和有效率的政府我们必须解散它代之以新的议政府.

original: Let things be as they were.

It has long been the custom of court ministers and advisers to make important national decisions amongst themselves, reducing the King to a mere onlooker.\n\nThis might be interpreted as a sign of weakness by our neighbors. To counter this possible threat and strengthen the King's hold over the country, perhaps a change of system is needed?
translation: 作为宫廷里长久以来的习惯，大臣与顾问直接做出各种重大的国家决定，国王被削弱为一个旁观者.\n\n这会被我们的邻国理解为衰弱的信号.为了反击这种可能的威胁以及加强国王对全国的控制，也许需要一些体制改革？

original: All decisions should be approved by the King.
translation: 所有决定都应该由国王批准

original: The current system works well enough.
translation: 当前的体制已经运行得足够好了

original: Subjects who feel they have been exploited or treated unfairly by the government or their overlords have little or no chance to voice their concerns. It has been suggested that we form a special branch of the government to review these cases.
translation: 认为自己被政府或君主剥削及不公平对待的国民们只有很少或几乎为零的机会来表达他们的意见.有人建议我们成立一个特别的政府分支机构来处理这些事务.

original: Our attempts to westernize have been met by refusals from local nobles. They are now up in arms over our latest demands which they feel are interfering with their privileges
translation: 我们试图西化的决定可能会遭到当地贵族的抵制.现在他们拿起武器对抗我们试图剥夺他们特权的行动

original: Our attempt to westernize is not popular everywhere in $COUNTRY$. Some of the provinces are asking for greater autonomy as a price to accept the changes.
translation: 我们试图西化的决定在$COUNTRY$收到广泛的抵制.现在有些省份要求自治

original: The ignorant serfs are getting uppity again, and are creating havoc over our reasonable demands to modernize and become civilized. This is outrageous, but the price to accept their demands may be too high.
translation: 来自欧洲的探险者以及移民不断涌入我们的国家.我们的许多人民染上了奇怪的疾病和受到了残酷的压榨.我们的传统文化和价值观开始显得过时，也许将被西方的新思想和新理念所代替

original: Our attempts to westernize have met resistance from every strata of society and protesters from all corners of $COUNTRY$ demand we put a stop to this. Failing to do so may jeopardize the standing of the royal family.
translation: 我们西化的尝试遭到了每个社会阶层的抗议，从$COUNTRY$各个角落站出来的反对者要求我们停止西化.不这样做的话可能会危及皇室地位.

original: Our attempts to westernize have been met by refusals from reactionaries. They are now up in arms over our latest demands which they feel are interfering with their old privileges and traditions.
translation: 我们的西方化尝试遭到了反动分子的抗议.由于认为我们最近的措施妨碍了他们旧有的特权和传统，他们已经拿起了武器.

original: Our attempts to westernize have been met by refusals from our traders. Feeling hindered by new trade restrictions they threaten to move elsewhere, taking their trade with them.
translation: 我们的西化尝试遭到了商人的抗议.由于从新的贸易限制中感到了阻碍，他们威胁将把生意转移到别处去.

original: Influential artists throughout the country have voiced concerns that our attempts at westernization are eroding our cultural identity and demand an immediate stop to this.
translation: 全国上下有影响力的艺术家声称我们的西方化尝试正在腐蚀我们的文化认同并要求立刻停止.

original: Several government officials have been voicing concerns that our attempts at westernization are going too fast and may drive the country to the brink of ruin. They advise an immediate stop to this or some of them might resign in protest.
translation: 大量政府官员声称我们的西化尝试走得太快从而导致国家走向崩溃的边沿.他们建议立刻停止西化，否则他们中的一些人会辞职.
高级指挥官反对西方化

original: Our attempts to westernize have been met with refusal from the High Command of our armed forces. They demand we put a halt to this or some of them might resign in protest.
translation: 我们的西方化尝试遭到了部队高级指挥官的抗议.他们建议暂停西方化，否则他们中的一些人会辞职.

original: Our attempts to westernize have been met with refusal from our most trusted advisers. They demand we put a halt to this or some of them might resign in protest.
translation: 我们的西方化尝试遭到了我们最信任的顾问们的抗议.他们建议暂停西方化，否则他们中的一些人会辞职.

original: The growth that our country has seen lately seems to have diverted much of both our resources and attention. The educational reforms and artistic development we were once known for have suffered accordingly, and we can no longer claim to be a leading nation when it comes to embracing the renaissance philosophy.
translation: 近来我国的资源和注意力越来越多地转移到了领土扩张方面.我们曾经闻名的教育改革和艺术发展也相应地遭到损失.谈到文艺复兴理念时无比感慨的我们再也不能声称自己是一个领先的国家.

original: Our recent strategy to carve new provinces out of whoever happens to be in the way surprisingly seems to have had a somewhat negative effect on our standing among our fellow nations.
translation: 我们最近用来瓜分新省份的策略令人惊讶地看起来对我们在国民中的地位造成了一些负面影响.

original: The state of constant war has eroded our economy and now inflation is spiraling out of control!
translation: 持续战争的态势已经侵蚀了我们的经济，现在通货膨胀已经超出了控制！

original: Disillusioned by the repeated and seemingly aimless wars of $MONARCH$, many officers in the army have deserted to seek better assignments elsewhere.
translation: 随着 $MONARCH$ 重复并且看起来毫无希望的战争的破灭，军队里大量军官已经逃亡去别处寻找更好的工作.

original: Bah, I'll lead the army myself!
translation: 哼，我可以自己统帅军队！
那我把它们也都征服了！

original: The bloodthirst shown by $MONARCH$ has ruined the reputation of $COUNTRY$ in the eyes of the world, and now our own subjects are starting to question the legitimacy of such a ruthless ruler.
translation: $MONARCH$表现出的残忍嗜杀已经摧毁了$COUNTRY$在世界上的名声，现在摆在我们面前的问题是开始思考一个如此残忍的统治者其正统性何在.

original: Tell my heir to start worrying...
Magistrates are the very sinews of a country, and unfortunately all ours are resigning!\n\n They claim this to be a protest to the burden of never-ending wars that has been laid upon them.
translation: 事务官是国家的栋梁，但不幸的是他们全辞职了！\n\n他们声称这是抗议持续不断地战争加诸他们的重重压力.

original: I can do whatever they did myself!
translation: 我可以自己来做他们的工作！

original: Horrified by our conquest-bent foreign policy, a leading court adviser has resigned and left the country!
translation: 因为惧于我们的征服性外交政策，一位首席顾问已经辞职并离开本国！
典型的反对分子……这是件好事！

original: The loyal subjects of $COUNTRY$ have long carried the enormous burden of the $MONARCHTITLE$'s constant wars without complaint. Those days are now over...\n\nSince $MONARCH$ doesn't seem to listen to reason, the people of $PROVINCENAME$ have decided to try saber rattling!
translation: 忠诚的$COUNTRY$国民长期以来负担着$MONARCHTITLE$持续进行战争的重压而毫无怨言.这种日子一去不复返了……因为$MONARCH$看起来并不想听听理由，$PROVINCENAME$的民众决定拿起武器！

original: Good news, my $MONARCHTITLE$! The Emperor has bestowed the great honor of hosting this year's assembly of the Reichstag upon us.\n\nThis will greatly increase our prestige in the empire. May all delegates gasp in awe as they enter our glorious capital $PROVINCECAPITAL$!
translation: 好消息，我的$MONARCHTITLE$!皇帝陛下交给我们一个光荣的任务：举办本年度的帝国议会。\n\n这将极大地增加我们在帝国内的威望。让所有代表进入我们辉煌的首都$PROVINCECAPITAL$时都感到惊叹不已吧！

original: Heads will roll! Hopefully not mine...

Since the nine hundreds the Archbishopric of Mainz have held the prestigious title of §YPrimas Germaniae§! - the most important Catholic Archbishop throughout the Holy Roman Empire.\n\nNaturally, such a title will inspire jealousy among the other princes of the Empire... We must take heed and not let our prestige drop to low, or we might find the title slip from our fingers!
translation: 从九世纪开始，美因茨的大主教就把持着一个负有盛名的头衔，§Y日耳曼首席主教§!——全神圣罗马帝国之内最重要的天主教大主教。\n\n自然，这样一个头衔会引起帝国内其他诸侯们的嫉妒......我们必须万分小心，决不能使我们的威望扫地，不然这个头衔很可能就不再为我们所把持！
日耳曼尼亚大主教头衔遭到质疑

original: My $MONARCHTITLE$, much of the Catholic community seem to have lost their faith in us! There are even rumors that another Archbishopric plans to claim our title as Primas Germaniae!
translation: 我的$MONARCHTITLE$，许多天主教社团似乎已经失去了对我们的信任！甚至有谣言称其他的大主教计划从我们这里夺走日耳曼尼亚大主教的头衔！

original: The title of §WPrimas Germaniae§! - the most important Catholic Archbishop throughout the Holy Roman Empire - was created in the nine hundreds when the Archbishopric of Mainz became the first Archbishopric to receive it.\n\nFor the second-rate power of $FROM$ to hold such a prestigious title seems an affront to the Catholic Church. Perhaps a more worthy candidate can be found?
translation: §W日耳曼尼亚大主教§b的头衔——天主教在神圣罗马帝国最为重要的大主教——是美因茨大主教于九世纪创立并继承的.像$FROM$这样一个二流国家持有如此一个权威头衔似乎是对天主教会的一种轻蔑.也许应该找到一个更加有价值的候选人？

original: A better one could not be found.
translation: 不可能找到一个更好的.
失去日耳曼尼亚大主教的头衔

original: My $MONARCHTITLE$, we have lost the prestigious title of §WPrima Germaniae§! Due to our low standing in the empire of lately, another Archbishop has gone ahead and claimed the title!
translation: 我的$MONARCHTITLE$，我们已经失去了§W日耳曼尼亚大主教§b的权威头衔！全是因为我们最近在帝国内的地位太低，其他大主教超越了我们并获得了这个头衔！

original: We have long been honored with being the Pope's representative - §WLegatus Natus§! - north of the Alps.\n\nSuch a prestigious title demands a certain level of dignity and we cannot let our prestige or our relations with the Pope drop too low.
translation: 我们长久以来荣耀地作为教宗在阿尔卑斯山以北的代表—— §W当地使节§! 。\n\n如此一个权威头衔需要与之匹配的尊贵地位，必须保证我们的威望和与教宗的关系不会下降得太低。

original: Our standings in the Empire and with the Pope have declined lately. The Pope no longer seems to have confidence in us upholding our role as his delegate in the empire and has most unfortunately decided to relieve us of the title.
translation: 近来我们在帝国内的地位和与教宗的关系下降了.教宗对支持我们担当他在帝国的代表这一角色不再抱有信心，并且不幸地决定取消我们的头衔.

original: I guess it was in my hands after all...
translation: 我想一切还控制在我手中吧……

original: Good news! We have been selected by the Pope to hold the prestigious title of §WLegatus Natus§! - his representative north of the Alps - after the former holder fell from grace.
translation: 好消息！我们被教宗选中，获得了 §W当地使节§b 这一权威头衔——他在阿尔卑斯山以北的代表——在上一位持有者失宠之后.

original: Is that a crepuscular ray shining in?
translation: 佛晓的光辉照耀进来了吗？

original: Our policy of supporting and expanding the bureaucracy of our nation is really paying off. Every day new officials are trained and set off to glorious new careers in our administration!
translation: 我们支持扩充国内官僚体系的政策获得了真正的回报.每天都有新的官员完成培训并前往我们光荣的行政部门担任职务！

original: An empire of this size needs a lot of bureaucrats, perhaps offering a sign up bonus will encourage their numbers to grow?
translation: 一个如此规模的帝国需要大量的官僚，也许提供就业奖金可以刺激他们的人数上升？

original: Reports have reached us that the Emperor is planning to march against all Protestant states in the Empire. He is determined to cleanse the Holy Roman lands of all heretics before the end of the year. If we are to stay true to our faith, we'll have to make preparations.
translation: 有消息称皇帝将对国家内的所有的新教徒省份动武. 在年底前，他将清剿神圣罗马帝国土地上的所有异教徒. 如果我们要坚持我们的信仰，就必须早作准备.

original: Our allegiance lies with the Emperor.
Popular Support for our Grand navy

Across the land people are supporting our Grand Navy, making contributions towards the defense of our nation. In the shipyards our shipwrights are working ever harder, and people are even volunteering to become sailors! People take pride in our great Navy.
translation: 全国人民支持我们的海军建设，为国防事业做出贡献.船坞中的工人以前所未有的热情工作着.大量平民甚至志愿加入海军! 人们为我们的强大海军而骄傲.

original: Popular Enthusiasm for our Navy diminishes

To be honest our people do not feel that our Navy is so Grand anymore, in fact they just plain don't like it. Press gangs are finding it even harder than usual and even acquiring basic materials is a struggle.
translation: 诚实的说，我国人民并不觉得海军有多重要，实际上他们只是不喜欢. 强行征募税收变得更常发生也更难了，甚至连基础军需物资供应也成了个麻烦.

original: This is only a short term problem.
This is nothing a little money can't solve.
translation: 没有用钱解决不了的问题

original: One of our Seahawks has turned out to be much better than we first expected.
translation: 一个海军军官表现出了超出我们预料的才能.

original: I knew this was a good idea.

Our policy of appointing promising commanders regardless of birth is upsetting our aristocrats who find it hard to dine with men who lack breeding. According to our aristocrats it is also upsetting the men under their command, who expect to be led by their betters rather than by someone who is plainly not a gentleman.
translation: 我们不计身份提拔将领的政策使我们的贵族感到不满.贵族们还对他们手下的军队感到不满，因为他们总想接受平民出身的优秀军官的领导.

original: Well, we can make a few concessions.
Our use of Superior Seamanship is leading to huge developments in Naval thought. This is just too good to be true.
translation: 优秀的航海技术导致了海军的飞速发展. 这真是非常好的一件事.

original: Our seamanship is so superior that to be honest complacency is setting in. People are content to rest on their laurels and I am not sure this is what we need right now.
translation: 我们的航海技术是如此优秀，以至于海军开始自满起来. 人们满足于他们的赫赫威名，这是我们乐于看到的事吗？

original: We must shake them up a little.
translation: 我们要稍微动摇他们的自信

original: Our use of Naval fighting instruction has allowed us to develop much improved blockade tactics. Although our enemies will eventually counter them, for the moment we will really be able to turn the screw.
translation: 海军战斗理论的应用使我们可以大大提高封锁效率. 尽管我们的敌人最终会找到反制手段，但现在我们可以转变战争形势了.

original: We might even make some money out of this.
Our use of naval fighting instruction has allowed us to put up fearsome blockades of enemy coasts, but at the moment our sailors are just getting a bit lazy.
translation: 海军战斗理论的应用使我们可以对敌人的海岸进行有力的封锁，但现在我们的水手开始变得有点懒惰.

original: Well we can't expect them to operate at peak efficiency all the time.
translation: 我们不能期望他们随时随地保持高效

original: I expect every man to do his duty no matter what.
translation: 我希望每个人完成自己的职责

original: Our shipwrights are already excellent, but they are currently undergoing a burst of creativity that is leading to newer technical developments.
translation: 我们的船坞已经非常优秀了，但他们还是以非凡的创造力带来了更新的科技进步.

original: Who am I to stop them?

For reasons we cannot fathom our shipwrights feel that they are not getting the backing and support for the Naval establishment. However ruling a nation is a lot of work, do we really care about such a minor matter?
translation: 由于种种原因，我们无法理解造船工们认为未得到海军署支持的不满.然而，治国必须兼权熟计，我们有必要为这些薄物细故而多花心神吗？

original: Why should I care about people who are so poor they have to work?
translation: 为什么我要关心这些穷人？

original: Time to upset the Naval Establishment.
translation: 是时候重组海军建设了

original: Our Glorious Navy is the pride of our Nation and the envy of the world.
translation: 光荣的海军是我国的骄傲，也是全世界羡慕的对象.

original: No one can quite understand it. One minute we had a glorious navy that the whole nation took pride in. Now the world laughs at our fleet.
translation: 没有人知道到底发生了什么. 以前我们的海军是整个国家的骄傲，现在却受到全世界的嘲笑.

original: A little money might sort things out.
Our system of national conscripts is proving very successful, the poor, the desperate, even the patriotic are flocking to the colors. The Generals are pleased.
translation: 我们的国家征募系统被证明非常成功，穷人、亡命徒甚至爱国者都被征入了军队.将军们很满意.

original: Let's get them into the army now.
No, we must think long term here.
People don't want to be conscripted

Usually our system of national conscripts functions like a well oiled machine, but at the moment we are encountering some resistance to recruitment. You know, riots, recruiting parties being attacked, minor things like that.
translation: 通常我国的征募系统能像润滑过的机器一样运转，但现在我们遇到了麻烦.暴动和武装袭击这样的小问题时常发生.

original: Well I am sure we can slow down recruitment in the short term
translation: 最近应该暂缓征兵工作

original: Bah! I need soldiers, not whiners.
translation: 我需要的是兵员，不是诉苦

original: Our Grand Army is so grand that it is marching from one victory to another. Experience from those victories positively impacts recruitment and training of new soldiers.
translation: 我们强大的陆军看起来正在向胜利前进，鼓舞人心的结果正在影响我们的训练和征募工作中

original: Our Army is not so grand
translation: 我们的军队并不是那么强大

original: One minute our army is the envy of the world, next no one has anything good to say about it. We have no idea how our grand army slipped so, but it could end up affecting recruitment.
translation: 一分钟前我们的军队还是全世界嫉妒的对象，但现在没人对它有什么好的评价. 我们不知道为什么我们强大的军队沦落到如此地步，但是这会影响我们有效的征兵行动.

original: Looks like recruitment will be a little harder.
translation: 看起来征募新兵将会变得有些困难。

original: Time to shake up the military establishment!
translation: 是时候重组我们的军事组织了

original: Our Officers are experimenting with new ways to drill our, already superbly drilled, army. This seems to be raising the overall level of military thought in our nation.
translation: 我们的官员正在试验的新方法让我们的演练，已经出色的操练，陆军. 这似乎是提高我们国家整体水平的军事思想.

original: Our superbly drilled army is in the opinion of our most influential generals invincible. Any recent defeats are down to the weather or the enemy using such unmanly things as tactics. As far as our generals are concerned there is no way to improve on perfection.
translation: 我们的最有影响力的将军认为我们训练有素的军队是无往而不胜的. 任何最近的失败都是因为天气的原因或者敌人使用没有男子气概的战术. 我们的将军们认为总是没有什么方法能使事情变得尽善尽美

original: Invincible, I like the sound of it...
translation: 无往而不胜，我喜欢听到它

original: I think the truth may upset some people.
translation: 我想事实会使一些人烦躁不安

original: Our Engineering Corps is currently short of things to do, however, they have found a province without any fortifications and have taken upon themselves to sort this out.
translation: 我们的工程部队最近总是没什么事情做，然而最近他们发现一个省份没有任何防御设施并且他们已经开始致力于解决这个问题.

original: That is very nice of them.
Our Engineering Corps has found a minor fortification that could do with some improvements.
translation: 我们的工程部队找到了一个次要的防御工事，可以做出一些改进.

original: We must always seek improvements wherever possible.
translation: 我们必须始终寻求任何可能的改进

original: Our Engineer Corps is always finding ways to keep themselves occupied. Today they upgraded a fortification in one of our provinces.
translation: 我们的工程部队始终保持他们是在忙碌着的. 今天他们在我们的一个省份升级了防御工事

original: Our Engineers have enhanced a fortification making it a substantial barrier to enemy forces.
translation: 我们的工程师增强了防御工事来确保它能坚固地抵挡敌人的进攻.

original: Let's hope someone tries to siege it
translation: 让我们期盼什么愚蠢的人去围攻它吧
史诗般的防御工事兴建

original: An already substantial fortification has been enhanced by our engineers, although some of our generals feel that our troops are wasted cowering behind forts.
translation: 一个已经十分坚固的防御工事目前正在被我们的工程师进一步加强，虽然一些将领认为我们的军队将会因此躲在堡垒后面畏缩不前.

original: Just when it seemed that our fortifications couldn't get any better. One of our engineers came up with this great idea of triangular bastions. Not only do they look great, they also seem to slow down the enemy.
translation: 正当我们的防御工事似乎可能得不到任何改善的时候，我们的一位工程师想出了三角堡垒这个伟大的构想. 他们不仅看起来伟大，而且拖住了敌人

original: A minor fortification has been neglected by our engineers and has fallen into disrepair. To be honest, at the moment it probably wouldn't even delay a party of school children, never mind an invading army.
translation: 一个不起眼的防御工事被我们的工兵们忽视，现在它已经陷入失修. 老实的说它现在可能阻碍不了一群中学生，更别提一支正在入侵的军队了.

original: Real men don't hide behind forts!
translation: 真正的男人不躲在堡垒里面

original: Perhaps some repairs are in order...
translation: 也许应该进行一些适当的修理

original: Our Engineers have sadly neglected the condition of this fortification, unless an action is taken the fort will only offer minimal protection.
translation: 我们的工程师正难过的发现他们忽视了一些堡垒的状况.除非采取行动不然这些堡垒只能提供最小的防护.

original: A recent audit has revealed that the walls of one of our fortifications are crumbling, while our engineering corps claims that there isn't enough money for repairs. If nothing is done its defensive ability will be reduced, however, on the long term basis it might become a major tourist attraction in a few hundred years time, boosting the local economy.
translation: 近期的一项质量审计显示我们一个要塞的围墙正在坍塌，与此同时我们的工程部队表示没有足够的资金可投入修理.如果放任不管那么他的防御能力将大打折扣.但是从长远出发，它可能在将来的几百年内成为一个主要的旅游景点.

original: Let's go for long term gain.
I think a more short term approach is in order.
translation: 我认为我们应该采取短期的措施

original: Poor maintenance work by Engineer Corps has left one of our more substantial fortifications with serious structural damage. For this fort to remain up to spec major structural work will be required.
translation: 因为工程师的疏于维修我们的一个坚固的要塞正在遭受严重的结构损害. 因此这个堡垒需要一些主要的结构改造来维持他的防御能力.

original: Just punish a few of the people responsible.
translation: 只要惩罚那些该负责的人

original: It has been discovered that one of our largest fortifications is no longer up to the job after a bout of complacency in our engineer corps.
translation: 我们发现一个我们最大的堡垒不再很好地发挥作用因为工程师们显的自信满满.

original: If the experts are getting complacent I am sure things must be fine.
translation: 如果专家们正变得自信满满那我想防御工事一定十分完美

original: Neglect by our Engineer Corps has left one of our most powerful and modern fortification with a weakened wall. A besieging army may be able to exploit this.
translation: 由于工程师的忽视我们的一个最强大和先进的防御工事的城墙出现了裂缝 . 一支包围部队可能会利用这个弱点.
说句实话，我看不到任何军队抵达要塞

original: No! We will do something immediately.
translation: 不我们应该马上做一些事

original: Our policy of battlefield commissions has been very successful, a new general has emerged.
translation: 我们的战地晋升政策一直非常成功，一个新的将领出现了。

original: Nobility concerned with the loss of privileges

Our policy of battlefield commissions is seriously concerning our nobles. They believe that just because a man shows some ability on the battlefield doesn't mean that he will be a good general. In fact it seems that life in the mess is becoming quite unbearable, as these new officers have no idea how a gentleman behaves. There are also rumors that the rank and file believe that a good leader ought to be better bred.
translation: 我们的贵族正强烈关注着我们战场委托的政策.他们认为一个在战场上展示一些能力的人并不一定就是一个优秀的将军.事实上那些在战场上厮杀的人总是令人难以忍受，那些新军员也不知道一个绅士该如何表现.也有谣言说普通士兵们认为更好的领袖应该有更好的待遇.

original: Well, I think making things a bit more difficult in the short term might be better.
translation: 嗯，我觉得事情在短期内变得更好有点困难

original: Our Glorious Army is enhancing the prestige of our nation.
translation: 我们光荣的军队提高了我们国家的威望。

original: Our Army has seen better days
translation: 我们的军队这些日子看起来好些了

original: The tarnish seems to have come off the glory of our arms. People just aren't taking our army as seriously as before.
translation: 我们的军队似乎重现光泽.人们不像以前那样苛刻的评价我们的军队了.

original: Time to shake things up then!
I don't think there is much that can be done...
translation: 我不认为我们能改变什么

original: Current trading conditions are strongly favoring our merchants. Our merchants are ready to take advantage of these.
translation: 目前贸易的条件正强烈地诱惑着我们的商人.我们的商人正准备好利用这一优势.
我们的商人现在做的很差

original: Although previously our adventuring merchants were doing good business, things have recently taken a turn for the worse.
translation: 虽然先前我们先进的商人们一直都经营着成功的产业，但最近事情似乎朝着变坏的方向发展.

original: I guess we'll just have to tighten our belts!
translation: 我猜我们不得不节俭度日了

original: A few unpopular reforms are the answer.
translation: 一些不受欢迎的改革将提供答案

original: Rumors of our Quest for the New World have led to more people readying themselves for a new life as a colonial settler.
translation: 我国将会在新世界进行开拓的谣言导致越来越多的人加入成为一个殖民者的新生活.

original: Our Quest for the New World has opened up opportunities for people in our colonies. The continuing war has convinced many of the best and brightest that the time to take these opportunities is now.
translation: 我们在新世界的探索向我们殖民地的人们提供了新的机遇.聪明的人们确信战争将会持续很久而现在就是抓住这些机遇的最好时刻.

original: A Colonial Company has decided to expand a colony into an adjacent province.
translation: 一个殖民公司决定对邻近的一个省份扩展殖民贸易.

original: One of colonial ventures has run into serious financial trouble, if no action is taken the colonists could suffer.
translation: 一个殖民投机公司陷入了严重的财务危机，如果无法采取有效的措施那只能让殖民者自己承受.

original: They knew the risks, it's not my problem.
translation: 他们知道冒险的代价，这不是我的错

original: Time for us to step in.
Although as a nation we are famous for our shrewd commerce practices, at the moment our merchants are becoming a tad complacent.
translation: 虽然我们的国家一直以精明的商业实践而闻名，可目前我们的商人正在变得有一点自鸣得意.

original: I can see our merchants not competing as well.
translation: 我想我们的商人也无法更好的竞争

original: I think prices could be rising.
Every so often a country is blessed with honest men working hard for the state. A number of good viceroys across our overseas holdings are giving us a real boost.
translation: 一个国家常常被保佑有忠实的人为其努力工作.一群在我们海外领地的总督们在给予我们确实的支持.

original: We are pleased to hear this.
Overseas provinces are notoriously too hard to police and good viceroys are essential. Sometimes though things don't work according to the plan, and corrupt and venal men end up in charge.
translation: 海外的领土因为无法有效执行中央的政策声名狼藉，而优秀的总督是解决问题的本质.但有时候事情总是无法按照计划的进行并且腐败的人最后获得了任命.

original: Our embracing of Smithian Economics has led to people spending time thinking about how things are produced. For the moment it seems to have paid off.
translation: 我们对市场经济理论的倡导使人们花时间思考如何更好地生产.目前这些思考似乎带来了回报.

original: Our producers become complacent as our use of Smithian Economics led to our production techniques being so advanced.
translation: 我们的手工业者因为市场经济理论带来的生产技术的提高而感到自鸣得意.

original: I think this will hurt production.
translation: 我想这会损害我们的手工业

original: Actually it seems to have translated into higher prices.
translation: 事实上这应该采取提高价格的措施

original: On an annual basis bureaucracy gives the country a nice little tax boost, but sometimes the right men in the right place can give the country that little bit extra. It is a shame that a few years down the line you have to promote them beyond their ability.
translation: 虽然往往总是我们优秀的官僚机构带给国家税收的增长，但正确的人处在正确的位置上也能给国家带来额外的收入. 只不过有点羞愧的是有那么几年你不得不给他们那些超出他们能力之外的晋升.

original: Make hay while the sun shines.

Bureaucracy sometimes just doesn't work. The wrong men in the wrong places can lead to corrupt practices which hurt the country's income. Even worse, it will take a few years to get the proper paperwork to change it.
translation: 官僚机构有的时候不做事情.错误的人在错误的位置上会导致腐败的风气从而影响国家的收入.更糟糕的是这将需要好几年的时间通过合理的努力来改变它.

original: You just can't fight the system.
translation: 你只是不能和规律做搏斗

original: Several shrewd loans have led to very good profits at our National Bank. The bank is hiking its dividend and buying back some of its shares.
translation: 几次精明的贷款给我们的银行带来了很好的利润.所以现在银行要支付红利.

original: Our National Bank is doing very poorly. It is finding it hard to lend to reliable people and is running into difficulties.
translation: 我们的国家银行表现得一塌糊涂。它无法找到值得信赖的贷款人，陷入了困境。

original: We'll give it some money to support it!
Tell the bank to lend to slightly less reliable people.
translation: 让银行借钱给信用差那么点儿的人。

original: Our National Trade Policy is proving unusually successful at the moment. This is giving our merchants a real boost.
translation: 我们的国家贸易政策现在超乎寻常地成功。这将给予我们商人真正的推动力。

original: I am sure this is good news.
translation: 我确信这是一个好消息。

original: Our National Trade Policy isn't really delivering at the moment. Our merchant just aren't doing as well.
translation: 我们的国家贸易政策现在没有很好地实施到位。我们的商人也没什么作为。

original: Looks like the merchants are struggling.
translation: 似乎商人们正备受煎熬。

original: We should grease the wheels a little more...
translation: 我们应当为车轮多上一点润滑油...

original: Our Espionage system is performing and our agents have found new ways to spy on people. Sooner or later our 'friends' and enemies will find out, but for the moment we have an edge.
translation: 我们的谍报系统运行过程中，探员们发现了从人们身上打探情报的新方法。虽然迟早会被我们的「朋友」或者敌人发现，但至少现在我们拥有了一条优势。

original: Some of the spies in our espionage system are defecting to other countries. This could hurt us in the short term.
translation: 我们间谍系统的一些间谍叛逃到其它国家去了. 这将在一段时间内损害我们.

original: A small cash sum might change a few minds.
translation: 一袋金币可能会改变他们的想法

original: A combination of just the correct people in our cabinet can create conditions for a nice little boost in tax income. You will be pleased to hear that this has just happened.
translation: 一个由正确的人组成的内阁能为我们增加收入创造良好的条件. 你将会很高兴看到这已经发生了.

original: When the wrong men get into your cabinet it can mean bad news for the country, also it is difficult to remove them.
translation: 当错误的人进入你的内阁那对国家意味着是个坏消息，并且将很难移除他们.

original: It looks like our taxes are dropping.
translation: 看起来我们的税收会减少

original: With their legal status guaranteed by our Bill of Rights, a minority is prospering under our rule.
translation: 因为我们的权利法案保障了少数民族的合法地位，他们正在我们的统治下新旺地发展.

original: Since we introduced the Bill of Rights many of our original ruling classes have been feeling marginalized, however, rather than discuss it they seem to be staging a revolt.
translation: 自从我们引进了权力法案我们的许多既得利益阶级感到被边缘化了，然后比起讨论解决问题他们似乎更倾向于展开一场革命.

original: Why don't they just discuss this like gentlemen?
translation: 为什么他们不能像绅士那样讨论？

original: For many years our policies have motivated a large majority of our population to dutifully attend the expected religious ceremonies. The clergy has shown its thanks for our supportive policy by in turn making supportive comments about our government.
translation: 多年来我们的政策始终鼓励我们大多数的人民义务参与宗教仪式。教会通过发表支持我们的言论来表示他们对我们的支持的感谢。

original: May our people always find unity through faith.

We are in many ways seen as one of the foremost defenders of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. Our religious institutions are strong and priests both here and abroad flock to our seminars.\nIt is therefore somewhat embarrassing that the rural population in our country isn't quite as in tune with the theology as we are. Reports of deviations such as a dog being proclaimed a saint or old heathen festivals being integrated with the holy ceremonies of our faith is undermining our state.
translation: 不管怎么看，我们都是首屈一指的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰捍卫者。我们的宗教机构强大，国内外的神职人员们都涌入我们的神学院。\n因此我国的乡村居民和我们的宗教体系不太同调这一点着实有些尴尬。离经叛道的报告，比如宣布一条狗为圣人，或是将古老的异教节日与我教神圣的祭典相结合等等，实在有辱我国圣教。

original: Attempt to make them abandon their ways.
translation: 尝试使他们放弃这些做法。

original: By turning a blind eye on religious deviants around our country we have undermined the authority of our missionaries throughout our country..
translation: 我们尝试在该省根除一切偏离正教的事物时，导致当地关系紧张，公开叛乱看来为时不远。

original: Inspired by our fervent beliefs and religious policies, our missionaries are proving to be more convincing in their quiet chats with the unbelievers.
translation: 由于我们信仰至上政策的鼓舞，我们的传教士在和异教徒们聊天的时候让我们的信仰显得更令人信服.

original: Time to spread the good news.
Our religious establishment doesn't feel that the nation is properly sticking to the principles of Divine Supremacy. We have heard them condemning the government.
translation: 我们的宗教组织感到国家并没有遵信仰至上的原则，听说他们正在谴责政府.

original: It's just idle talk from restless souls.
These dissidents must be dealt with!
Our Policy of tolerance to all faiths has led to some of our Catholic population deciding to embrace orthodoxy.
translation: 我们对所有信仰都宽容的政策导致了一部分天主教信徒转而信奉东正教.

original: I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
Taking advantage of our tolerant society, people have decided to embrace the Reformed Faith. The Papal nuncio has already expressed to us the concern of the Church.
translation: 借着我们的社会十分宽容这一有利条件，人民决定转而信奉改革宗信仰.教宗的大使已经向我们明确表示了对此事的关注.

original: As we are an enlightened and tolerant society, some of our citizens have decided that the Catholic faith does not fit in with their current lifestyle choice and have decided instead to embrace Protestantism.
translation: 我们是一个文明和宽容的社会，由于天主教信仰已经不再适合他们当前的生活方式，因此部分公民已经决定转而信仰新教.

original: Well I am sure the Pope can live with this.

translation: 东正教的信仰被动摇了

original: The Patriarch arrived today to express his anger that our policy of tolerance has allowed the schismatics who sacked holy Constantinople and abandoned the Roman Empire to spread their faith in our realm.
translation: 今天刚抵达的主教明确的表示了他的愤怒，因为我们的政策居然宽容洗劫了君士坦丁堡的罪犯. 而且还放任罗马教廷的人在我们的领地里传教.

original: The Patriarch is concerned that we are showing too much tolerance when the news came the followers of Luther expanded their heretic beliefs in our realm.
translation: 牧首对我们相当担忧，因为当我们听说路德的追随者在我们的领地里的扩张时，我们表现得很宽容。

original: The news has reached us today that Calvinism has spread in our realm. It seems that people are taking advantage of our tolerance to try out strange new faiths.
translation: 今天传来消息说加尔文宗派已经在我们的领地里传播开来了。看起来人们正利用我们的宗教宽容来尝试新的信仰。

original: Well such is the price you pay for tolerance.
Bishops feel we are losing ground
translation: 主教感到我们正在衰落

original: The Archbishop today arrived to express his dismay that our tolerance has led to people turning their back on the true faith and returning to Catholicism.
translation: 今天刚抵达的大主教明显很沮丧，因为我们的宽容导致了人民重归旧路，再次信仰天主教了。

original: We are a modern state, these things happen.
translation: 我们是一个现代国家，这些事就随它去吧。

original: A delegation of senior bishops arrived today to discuss the effects of our continuing policy of tolerance for other faiths. They are especially concerned that the Orthodox faith is gaining ground in our country.
translation: 昨天抵达的高级主教代表团讨论了我们长期以来的宗教宽容政策的效果。他们特别关注的是东正教在我们领地上的发展。

original: They should not be so backward.
Our policy of tolerance has led to concerns amongst senior churchmen, since the news has reached us that the followers of Calvin are spreading their faith in our realm.
translation: 当加尔文宗派的我们的领地中扩散的消息传来时，主教对我们的宽容的政策表示了担忧。

original: Church Elders think the apocalypse is coming
translation: 教会长者认为天启正在降临。

original: Church elders believe that, as God has ordained, that our tolerant policies should be punished with our people converting to Catholicism, the apocalypse is surely just round the corner.
translation: 教会长者相信，由于我们的宽容政策导致了人民转而信仰天主教，上帝将惩罚我们，天谴临近了。

original: I think we should wait for a few more signs.
translation: 我想我们应该等待更多的征兆。

original: Church Elders are of the opinion that our Merciful Lord is punishing us for the sinful policy of humanist tolerance. Certainly the Orthodox faith is advancing in our realm.
translation: 教会长者认为仁慈的主正在惩罚我们罪孽的人道主义宽容政策。当然，东正教的信仰在我们的领地里扩展。

original: Senior Elders in our church have expressed the opinion that the recent mass conversion to Protestantism was yet another sign of our Lord's divine wrath. Slightly more skeptical government officials think that our policy of tolerance may be a more likely cause.
translation: 我们的教会长老表示，最近大量的人民转而信仰新教，这是上帝再一次给予我们的指示。政府官员里那些持有些微怀疑的官员认为我们的宽容政策有可能是问题的根源。

original: I guess you reap what you sow.

The Ulema are increasingly concerned that we are being too tolerant to the schismatic followers of Ali. They feel that Allah the compassionate, the merciful, will be angered by this. Regardless, their faith is advancing in our country.
translation: 乌理玛的担心日益增加，因为我们对阿里的追随者过分宽容。他们感觉到富于同情心和仁慈的真主将会对这些感到愤怒。无论如何，他们的信仰正在我们的领地里扩展。

original: I am sure there will be no problems.

A delegation of senior Ayatollahs advised us today that our policy of tolerance has allowed the advancement of Sunni Islam in our realm. They are concerned that this may delay the return of the Mahdi.
translation: 一个阿亚图拉组成的代表团今天向我们做出了警告，我们的宽容政策使得逊尼派异端在我们的领地里得以扩展。他们担心这将耽搁马赫迪的归来。

original: I'm sure he will return on time.
translation: 我相信时候一到他就会回来的

original: A delegation of senior Monks, after several days of meditation, have come to suggest that our tolerant policy is affecting the enlightenment of our realm. It seems that some of our people have decided to embrace the Hindu faith.
translation: 在数日的冥思之后，一个僧侣的代表团向我们提出，我们的宽容政策影响了对领地人民的教化. 我们的部分臣民看起来转而信仰了印度教。

original: This could harm some of our people's Karma.
translation: 这将损害部分人的因果报应
人民转而信仰儒教学说！

original: In a move that could rock the Karma of the whole nation, some of our people have decided to turn their back on the teachings of the Lord Buddha and instead embrace the teachings of a Chinese philosopher. Senior Monks believe that our policy of tolerance is the cause of this.
translation: 作为一个可能动摇整个国家因果报应的步骤，我们的部分臣民放弃了佛祖的教导，转而信仰儒教学说。高僧们认为我们的宽容政策是导致这一切的原因。

original: If only the Lord Buddha allowed us to be a bit more intolerant.
translation: 只要佛祖允许我们多一点点不宽容。

original: The People turn to spirit worship
translation: 人民转而信仰神灵崇拜

original: Our People have taken advantage of our policy of tolerance to embrace the spirit worship of Shintoism. Many monks are concerned.
translation: 我们的臣民正利用我们宽容政策所带来的便利，转而信仰神道教的神灵崇拜。很多僧侣对此表示了担忧。

original: Such is the price for being such a forward looking country.
translation: 这就是成为一个如此有前瞻性的国家所要付出的代价。

original: People turn their back on Brahman
Our People have started to turn their back on traditional forms of worship, to follow the teaching of that new thinker Buddha. Priests blame our policy of tolerance.
translation: 我们的臣民正在回归他们传统的精神信仰，去追寻一位新的佛教思想家的教义。祭司责备是我们的宽容政策导致了这一切。
人民转而信仰儒教学说

original: Shockingly to the religious establishment, due to our tolerant policies people are turning to the Chinese philosophy of Confucianism. The Thuggees have already announced there will be unspecified action taken.
translation: 由于你那该死的宽容政策，人民开始转而信仰儒教学说，这将会动摇国家的信仰基矗已经传出的消息说将会有未指明的暗杀行为发生。

original: It is not that surprising really...
A number of important Gurus are expressing their concern at our policy of Tolerance. It seems a new form of spirit worship has been spreading in our country.
translation: 一些德高望重的上师表达了对我们的宽容政策的担忧。一种新的信仰似乎正在我们的领地上传播。

original: Some of our people have decided that as we are so tolerant that there would be no problems in becoming Buddhists. Confucius says 'Do not be concerned about others appreciating you. Be concerned about your not appreciating others.'
translation: 我们的部分臣民认为，我们的政策如此宽容，因此他们转而信仰佛教没什么问题。孔子曰：「己所不欲，勿施于人。」
我们生活在一个有趣的时代。

original: With our tolerance of other faiths people have decided to embrace Hinduism. Confucius says 'Lead through policies, discipline through punishments, and the people may be restrained but without a sense of shame. Lead through virtue, discipline through the rites, and there will be a sense of shame and conscientious improvements.'
translation: 由于我们的宽容政策，部分臣民转而信仰印度教。孔子曰：「导之以政，齐之以刑，民免而无耻。 导之以德，齐之以礼，有耻且格。」

original: Our Humanist Tolerance has led some of our people to become Shintoists. Confucius says 'If a man is without benevolences, then of what use are the rights? If a man is without benevolences, then of what use is music?'.
translation: 我们的人文主义宽容导致了一部分人民成为神道教教徒。孔子曰：「人而不仁，如礼何？人而不仁，如乐何？」
我们的牧师表现出不满

original: Our Shinto priests are concerned that our tolerance is causing our people to turn their back on the religion of our ancestors and start worshiping Buddhism.
translation: 我们的神道教牧师关注着系列情况，我们的宽容政策导致了我们的人民转而信仰佛教。

original: Our Priests wish to politely mention that our tolerance of other faiths is leading our people to start worshiping in the Hindu manner.
translation: 我们的牧师礼貌地提及，我们对其他信仰的宽容导致了我们的人民开始信仰印度教。

original: Our Priest are mildly outraged to discover that due to our humanist tolerance, some of our people are now following the teachings of Confucius.
translation: 我们的牧师有些愤怒的发现，由于我们的人文主义宽容，导致了部分人民开始追随孔子的教导。

original: There is nothing that can be done here.
The Spirits of Nature are concerned
The Spirits of the nature are telling our people that our policy of tolerance is allowing shamanism to spread in our realm.
translation: 自然神灵告诉我们的人民，我们的宽容政策导致了萨满教在我们的领地里的扩展。

original: Well, that is tolerance for you.
Unhappy news from the hunting ground
Our Shamans are reporting that some of our people have decided that since we are so tolerant they will turn to Animism.
translation: 我们的萨满们向我们报告说，由于我们如此宽容的宗教政策，一部分臣民转而信仰万物有灵论.

original: Still at least we are tolerant.
The Spirits of Nature are concerned
The Spirits of the nature are telling our people that our policy of tolerance is allowing Totemism to spread in our realm.
translation: 自然之灵告诉我们的人民因为我们的宽容国策，图腾崇拜正在我们的省份传播.

original: Well, that is tolerance for you.
Unhappy news from the hunting ground
translation: 不愉快的消息来自猎场

original: Our Shamans are reporting that some of our people have decided that since we are so tolerant they will turn to Totemism.
translation: 我们的萨满在报告自从我们变得那么宽容，我们的一些子民决定转变为图腾崇拜。

original: Still at least we are tolerant.
Our kinship with animals and plants are in danger as we have let Animism spread through our nation.
translation: 我们的动植物的亲属正处于危机，当泛灵教在我们的国家传播.

original: Our kinship with animals and plants are in danger as we have let Shamanism spread through our nation.
translation: 我们的动植物的亲属正处于危机，当萨满教在我们的国家传播.

original: Our Scientific Revolution continues to provide benefits. Our scientists are making further developments.
translation: 科学革命的持续进行带来了收益.我们的科学家正在进一步发展它.

original: Actually I think trade should benefit!
At the moment our scientists seem to be running out of things to discover. Well, probably not, but the revolution has slowed down for the moment.
translation: 看起来我们的科学家此刻已经发现了所有的东西.尽管未必如此，但是科学革命现在已经慢了下来.

original: Our continuing patronage of the arts has led to one the greatest works the world has seen being produced. This brings much glory to our nation.
translation: 我们对艺术的持续资助使得一件世界上最伟大的艺术品诞生了.这将为我们的国家带来极大的荣耀.
为了这一荣耀而狂欢吧
没有出现真正的艺术品

original: Although we are known for being a patron of the Arts, at the moment the artists we patronize are not producing good art. Our Ruler looks a tad foolish.
translation: 尽管我们是各类艺术的赞助者，但在此时此刻，我们所赞助的艺术家并没有创作出什么真正的艺术品.这让我们的统治者看起来有些傻.

original: I am sure things will change.
translation: 我保证这一切将会改变

original: As we have declared that we will wage war on our religious enemies, the people have swung behind the war effort.
translation: 当我们公开宣告将对宗教对手宣战时，人民会因为战争的成就而欢呼.
人民因为我们发动了一场失败的战争而愤怒

original: We have often made it clear that the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is the one true faith, ensuring our people that a war against [infidel_neighbor.GetName] is imminent, considering our religious differences. However, many of our subjects are currently disappointed in us as we have failed to pursue any kind of war against our neighbors of [infidel_neighbor.GetName]. Some take to the streets to show their discontent.
translation: 我们反对异教徒的战争失败了，我们的人民开始反对我们.

original: We are just not quite ready yet.
If it's a fight they want, they shall have it!
translation: 这些事用不着他们来决定？

original: Our Policy of Serfdom has yielded results, as our Land Owners have recently made extra special efforts to exploit their serfs.
translation: 我们的农奴政策产生了成效，我们的农场主们在使用农奴最近取得了额外的成就.

original: That is why we keep them in their place.
translation: 这就是为什么我们保持他们的这种地位

original: Word has reached us that our happy population of serfs are not quite as happy as we first thought. We even hear rumors of a planned revolt.
translation: 刚刚收到的消息表明农奴们并不像我们起初想象的那样快乐.有谣传说将发生一次有计划的起义.
我们的军队正好需要实战演练

original: A few concession might be best.
translation: 少量的让步也许是最好的

original: Our policy of allowing the common people freedom is paying off. It seems they are more content than usual.
translation: 我们允许平民自由的政策已经实行了.看起来他们比平常显得更满足.

original: Our Nobility are concerned that our policy of allowing free subjects is interfering with their ability to flog their servants. It seems several dinner parties were ruined.
translation: 我们的贵族对对此事表现出了关注，我们的允许国民自由的政策妨碍了他们鞭打仆人的权利. 看起来有几个宴会被迫取消了.

original: Our policy of favoring quantity over quality is paying off, as of today yet more men came available for the army.
translation: 我们注重数量的政策已经生效了，现在我们有如此多的兵员可以利用。

original: You can never have too many men.
translation: 你从未有过如此多的兵员
关注质量导致兵源下降

original: Our decision to focus on quantity is leading to a decline in the number of recruits for our army.
translation: 我们关注质量的做法导致了新兵数量的下降.

original: The Quality of our troops is Impressive
translation: 我国军队的素质令人印象深刻

original: Our decision to invest in quality has made our army seem more impressive in the eyes of our neighbors.
translation: 我们投资于军队质量的决定使得我们的军队在邻居们的眼里表现的令人印象深刻.

original: Our focus on Quality has left our generals concerned about the level of manpower available for the army.
translation: 我们专注于质量的做法使得将军们抱怨军队可用的人力水平太低了.

original: Army is the way to Glory
translation: 军队是他们通往荣耀之路

original: Our focus on land has left many feeling that we have an excellent army. Some of our brightest and best wish to become officers in it.
translation: 我们专著于大陆的政策使得人们认为我们有一只很强大的军队. 这使得我们治下的优秀人才们都愿意成为军官.

original: Our Admirals are expressing concern that our focus on land is coming too much at the expense of the fleet.
translation: 我们的海军将领非常担心我们对陆军的关注正在损害海军

original: Our Fleet is the pride of the Nation
Our decision to focus on Naval policies is causing a surge in the support for the Navy at home. Young fools are signing up to be officers.
translation: 我们对海军的关注引发了我国支持海军建设的热潮.年轻的傻瓜们纷纷报名参军.

original: Our Generals are concerned that our focus on the navy is hurting our Army.
translation: 我们的陆军将领担心我们对海军的关注损害了陆军的利益.

original: The Fleet it is, Damn them.
Time to devote more attention to the army.
translation: 是该给陆军多一些关注了

original: Our Army's Elan strikes fear into the enemy
translation: 我们的陆军使敌人感到恐惧

original: Our Policy of choosing the offensive over the defensive has led to tales about the elan of armies.
translation: 我们的进攻政策使敌人对我们的陆军感到恐惧.

original: Our Policy of favoring the offensive attitude is leading to our fortifications being neglected.
translation: 我们的进攻政策导致要塞防御问题被忽视.

original: As we remain wedded to the doctrine of offensive action, some of our fortifications are suffering.
translation: 由于我们继续采取进攻政策，一些要塞已经年久失修了.

original: We must remain on the offensive.
Perhaps defense is also a good form of defense.
translation: 也许防御也是个不错的主意

original: The offensive nature of our armed forces means that local commanders are not concerned with the status of local fortifications.
translation: 我们采取的进攻政策意味着我们的地方指挥官不怎么关注防御问题.

original: Maybe we should think about this.
Following our focus on the offensive attitude, our generals are letting some of our larger forts to fall into disrepair.
translation: 由于我们的进攻政策，我们的将军一点也不关心要塞.他们正在让我们的一些大要塞年久失修.

original: Our Generals are refusing to maintain our forts
translation: 我们的将领拒绝维持要塞

original: Local Generals are so enamored with the offense that they refuse to man one of our larger fortifications properly.
translation: 本地将领过于热爱进攻以至于拒绝向要塞派遣适当的守军.
将军们不赞成懦弱的防御

original: Our Generals love our policy of offense so much that they are refusing to use one of our mighty fortifications properly.
translation: 我们的将军太喜欢进攻了以至于他们拒绝使用我们的强大的要塞.

original: Our decision to focus on the defensive has led to local commanders building fortifications to hide behind.
translation: 我们对防御的关注导致本地指挥官大量修建要塞.

original: Due to us favoring defensive tactics, a local commander has decided to upgrade his fortification.
translation: 因为我们采取的防御政策，一个本地指挥官升级了要塞防御.

original: Our focus on the defense has left local commanders thinking that improving fortification is the proper use of their time.
translation: 我们对防御的关注使本地指挥官认为应该把时间投入到增强防御上去.

original: A local commander, taking his cue from our focus on the defense, has decided to improve a local fortification.
translation: 一个指挥官决定改善本地要塞防御工作.

original: I like to see commanders take the initiative.
translation: 我喜欢有主动精神的指挥官

original: As we committed to the defense, local commanders feel that it would be all round safer if they put more troops in forts, rather than waste them on the battlefield.
translation: 因为我们对防御的热心，本地指挥官感到将部队部署在要塞里会比浪费在野战战场上更安全.

original: With our focus on the defensive, a local commander has taken it on himself to maximize the fortification level of our province.
translation: 因为我们对防御的热心，一个本地指挥官建立了防御最完善的要塞.

original: This is what we like to see.
Generals Concerned by our unmanly tactics
translation: 将军们担心我们的懦弱的战术

original: Our focus on the defensive is robbing our units of the élan they need to be truly successful on the battlefield. Our generals are deeply concerned about this, and there are rumors that other countries snigger about us behind our back.
translation: 我们对防御的热心削弱了部队在野战上的信心.将军们对此感到忧虑，而且还有流言声称我们的邻国正在嘲笑我们.

original: We can give a little ground here.

translation: 我们的重商主义政策促进了贸易

original: Our Embracing of Mercantilist policies is making it harder for other nations to compete with our merchants, meaning more profits for us.
translation: 我们采取的重商主义政策使别国越来越难与我国商人竞争，这意味着更多的收入.

original: Our use of mercantilist policies is proving frustrating for some of our merchants, causing some to defect to other countries.
translation: 我们的重商主义政策使商人不满，一些商人叛逃了到别的国家。

original: A slight loosening of the policy might be the answer.
translation: 或许政策松动才是答案。

original: Our policy of free trade is allowing our merchants to expand our trade.
translation: 我们的自由贸易政策使我们的商人能扩大贸易.

original: Merchants worried about lack of protection
translation: 商人对缺少贸易保护感到担忧

original: With our focus on free trade our merchants are concerned that they are not getting the support that they would get under a more mercantilist policy.
translation: 我们的自由贸易政策使我们的商人担心得不到贸易保护.

original: That is why it is called free trade.
Well maybe there is something we can do.
Our long-term policy of encouraging innovation has reaped major benefits. We are seeing intellectual growth in our nation.
translation: 我们鼓励创新的长期政策收到了成效. 我国的知识分子开始增加.

original: Our policy of encouraging innovation and free thinking has led to our people taking a more relaxed attitude to the state religion.
translation: 我们鼓励创新和解放思想的政策导致人民对国教漠不关心。

original: Since the government of our [Root.GovernmentName] officially began encouraging worship and focusing life on the true [Root.Religion.GetName] faith our people feel more secure in their daily lives and with each other.
translation: 我们采取的因循守旧政策使人民觉得离危险的新事物越远越安全.

original: Where there is faith there is trust.
The more liberal and free thinking sections of our society are upset about the lack of innovation in government attitudes.
translation: 越来越思想解放的社会对政府缺乏创新感到不满.

original: Innovation is nothing compared to tradition.
Thanks to our centralizing policies we are better able to control the administration of our state, yielding benefits for all.
translation: 由于中央集权政策，我们能更好的管理我们的国家.

original: Provinces Frustrated by Lack of Autonomy
translation: 省份因缺乏自主权而沮丧

original: Our Centralizing policies have led many in the provinces to feel that they have lost a lot of autonomy. There is talk of revolt in the air.
translation: 我们的中央集权政策使省份失去了很多自主权.空气中飘荡着叛乱的风声.

original: A delegation of Aristocrats came to us today to thank us for favoring them in government. In fact they are so grateful that a small voluntary contribution was made to the treasury.
translation: 一些贵族感谢我们在政策上对他们的支持.实际上他们是如此感激，以至于自愿对充实我们的国库做出了贡献.

original: We thank them for their gift.
Merchants of the better sort are complaining how the government's insistence on favoring the aristocracy is hurting their interests.
translation: 商人抱怨政府对贵族的支持损害了他们的利益.

original: Our merchants are prospering under our plutocratic policies, and they have therefore decided to send the state a small gift to remind us why this is good.
translation: 在金权政治下我们的商人业务兴隆，他们决定赠送一点薄利.

original: We thank them for the gift.
Our aristocracy are concerned that our plutocratic policies are not giving them their proper due.
translation: 贵族担心金权政治下他们的利益会受损.

original: Maybe we can give a little.
translation: 也许我们能给他们点甜头

original: Some of our citizens have decided to strike out and found a new colony.
translation: 一些公民决定出国并建立了他们的新殖民地。

original: Well, who I am to stop them?
Some of our colonists have decided that the current colony isn't very good and have decided to move elsewhere.
translation: 一些殖民者觉得现有的殖民地不够好，因此决定迁走.

original: It's hard to keep track of people these days.
translation: 这些日子很难聚集这么多人

original: Ever since we fell under western influences, there have been those that suggest that we should embrace the Protestant religion of the west as well.
translation: 在我们拉丁化之后，有人建议我们也采用西方的新教作为国教.

original: This Protestant religion sounds quite good.
translation: 新教这玩意听上去不错

original: No, we won't abandon the faith of our fathers.
translation: 我们不能放弃祖辈的信仰

original: Now that we are under western influences, many of our people are suggesting that we should also embrace the western religion of Reformed.
translation: 在我们拉丁化之后，有人建议我们也采用西方的改革宗作为国教.

original: No, we will not betray our traditions.
Some of our people feel that as we are already under western influences we should also become Catholics.
translation: 在我们拉丁化之后，有人建议我们也采用西方的天主教作为国教.

original: I must confess that this sounds good.
translation: 我必须承认这听上去不错

original: Good news, some of our more progressive peoples have decided to see the light and embrace our culture fully.
translation: 一些进步的人民决定完全采取我们的文化.

original: Some of our grain farms are having an excellent year, allowing us to feed more troops and so increasing our manpower.
translation: 一些谷物农场丰收了，这使得我们可以供养更多军队，增加后备兵员.

original: You can never have too much manpower.
Our wine experts believe that a recent vintage from one of our wine producing areas is of superior quality. Our people are happily drinking it.
translation: 我们的酿酒专家相信葡萄的丰收会提高酒的质量，我们的人民可以开怀畅饮了.

original: As long as there is some left for me.
One of our more prestigious vineyards has shockingly produced a wine of vastly inferior quality. Needless to say, people think less of our country for it.
translation: 我们的一个声誉卓著的酿酒厂令人惊讶的生产出了劣质葡萄酒.不用说，人民感到失望.

original: I hope I never drank any.
Recent shipments of wool have been of unsurpassed quality, earning our nation extra money.
translation: 最近出产的羊毛有着无比卓越的质量，为我国带来了额外收入.

original: You can never have too much money.
One of our cloth suppliers has been found to be supplying substandard cloth for our army uniforms. We understand that the troops are not impressed.
translation: 一个服装生产商被发现提供了劣质军队制服. 我们知道军队很不高兴.

original: Our traditional fisheries are proving excellent grounds for the recruiting of sailors for our fleet. This has filtered through into better leadership in our navy.
translation: 我们传统的渔民是海军水手的最佳征募对象，这使我国海军的素质得到了提高.

original: Local native 'helpers' are temporarily not assisting our fur trappers, this is leading to reduced production.
translation: 本地原住民不想帮助我们的毛皮猎人，这导致了产量下降。
他们会再次帮助我们的。

original: Rumors are sweeping the country that there has been a shortage in salt production. Although we have tried to quash these rumors, people are certain there will be a salt crisis soon.
translation: 食盐短缺的谣言正在席卷整个国家。尽管我们正在努力辟谣，人民还是相信食盐危机即将到来。

original: We will have to live with this.
Our naval supply production has been unusually good. Giving us a boost in ship production.
translation: 我们的海军装备生产情况良好，舰船建造速度加快。

original: Some of our copper mines have hit some below standard ores, this has pushed up the cost of artillery units in our nation.
translation: 一些铜矿开采出了劣质矿石，这使军队招募的花费提高了.

original: Our miners have hit a massive deposit of gold. Massive amounts of money are flowing into the treasury.
translation: 我们的矿工开采出了大量高品质黄金.我们得到了巨额收入.

original: One of our iron ore mines has hit some lower quality iron ore. This has made the raising of units more expensive.
translation: 一个铁矿开采出了劣质矿石. 这使组建部队的花费提高了.

original: I'm sure we have enough men anyway.
An outbreak of disease has swept through the local population weakening the local populace. This has led to a reduction in the number of healthy people we can export as slaves.
translation: 本地的许多居民被突然爆发的传染病所感染. 这导致了我们可以当作奴隶出口的健康劳动力大大减少.

original: Our Ivory production has of late been of much higher quality than usual. People are admiring the quality of the workmanship.
translation: 最近我们的象牙生产质量大大提高了. 人民对精细的象牙制作工艺交口称赞.

original: Local residents, upset at seeing their high quality tea shipped abroad have attacked a tea ship and thrown the cargo into the harbor. Although the over all quantity was negligible, the province does have a little discontent.
translation: 本地居民沮丧地看到他们的一箱用来出口的高质量茶叶被货船扔到了海里.尽管数量微不足道，但他们还是有点不满.

original: Heavy Storms have hit some of our porcelain factories. It will take years until they have recovered to full productivity.
translation: 暴风雨侵袭了我们一些瓷厂。 完全恢复生产可能要花上几年时间。

original: At least a bull didn't run through...
translation: 起码来说，一只公牛无法通过。.

original: The spice harvest in one of our spice producing regions has failed, although not badly. However, production will be reduced due to this.
translation: 一个省份的香料歉收了，尽管不是颗粒无收，但因此产量还是会下降.

original: Slaves at one of our plantations have staged an uprising, which was suppressed. Although the brutality of the suppression has led to rising discontentment amongst the happy servile population.
translation: 我们已经镇压了发生在一个种植园里的奴隶起义.残忍的镇压行动导致了大量奴隶的不满情绪.
他们应该掂量自己的分量

original: Our nobility have come to us with an interesting proposal. If we were to grant them the Liberum Veto they would in return give us substantial support during the current war. Although their offer is very generous indeed, some of our advisors are suggesting that this could just be the thin edge of the wedge. In fact although they will get angry if we refuse them, they will most definitely prey on any future weakness we show to demand further concessions.
translation: 我们的贵族有一个有趣的提议. 如果我们实行自由选举制，他们就会在战争中支持我们. 尽管他们的提议确实很慷慨，但是我们的一些顾问认为贵族们还会得寸进尺. 实际上，如果我们拒绝，尽管他们会感到愤怒，他们还是会等待将来我们变得弱小的时候强迫我们做出让步.

original: As we have graciously granted the Liberum Veto, our nobility are demanding further concessions or they will use their right of confederation against us.
translation: 由于我们允许了自由选举制，我们的贵族正在要求进一步妥协，否则他们将联合起来对付我们.

original: Our nobles fear that should their lands be lost to the enemy they will no longer enjoy the Liberum Veto. Thus they are making contributions towards the war effort.
translation: 贵族不再支持自由选举制，因为他们害怕失去他们的土地. 因此他们努力为战争做贡献.

original: For a long time the power of the government has been seriously restricted by the granting of the Liberum Veto. Now the government finally feels strong enough to consider reform. However, our neighbors may not look too kindly on our attempts to strengthen the state.
translation: 很长时间内我们的政府被自由选举制所束缚.现在政府终于感到自身足够强大来推行改革.但是我们的邻居可能不喜欢我们增强国力的尝试.

original: No, it's not the right time.
One of neighbors had very kindly kept itself weak and divided by having the policy of the Liberum Veto. Now, however, they have started to reform and so will greatly strengthen.
translation: 我们的一个邻国因采取自由选举制而弱小并四分五裂.现在他们开始改革并增强国力.

original: The growing revolutionary activity in our country has caused the collapse of the regime. The revolutionary masses stormed a major prison in our capital and this sent shockwaves throughout the government. The offer to form a new, slightly more constitutional, monarchy was initially accepted, but then our old corrupt monarch just couldn't quite resist the urge to try and bring the good old days back. We were left with no choice but to limit the old King's ability to influence the government by removing his head. Although diehard monarchists were convinced that the King would soon grow another one, this was not the case. Now a purely temporary committee of public safety has been appointed, which includes the leaders of the initial revolution and an over-ambitious general. Our regime's future of liberty and equality at home would be bright but we seem to have annoyed every crowned head of Europe. Even now we hear reports that they are preparing for war against us, so we must now prepare to defend the republic. On the bright side, liberal forces are looking to us to export the benefits of the revolution to them, so we will be able to gain support in such a way.
translation: 国内日益增加的革命活动导致了政府的崩溃。革命武装袭击了首都的一个重要监狱，这使整个政府大为震惊。建立一个开明君主政体的提议最初被采纳，但是老君主派无法拒绝回到以前好日子的诱惑。我们别无选择，只能砍掉老国王的头来削弱政府中君主派的权力。尽管一些老顽固相信新国王很快就会出现，但这不是事实。\n现在一个忠诚的共和安全临时委员会已成立，它包括最初的革命领袖和野心勃勃的将军。我们自由平等的政体前途无限光明，但我们正在被其他欧洲列强所困扰。我们甚至听说他们准备进行战争，所以我们必须准备好保护共和制。从好的角度来说，自由人民正在期盼我们带给他们革命的权利，我们将得到广大人民的支持。

original: The forces of reaction not only refuse to accept that our revolutionary government should be considered one of the family of Europe, but also deny our manifest right to spread our revolution to other needy countries. Our people are rallying to support the revolution.
translation: 反革命势力不仅拒绝接受我们的革命政府成为欧洲的一员，还拒绝我们传播革命理念. 我们的人民正在集结起来支持革命.

original: The evil revolutionary government is not only doing vile things like removing feudal obligation, taxing the clergy and beheading nobles, but they are also exporting their revolutionary dogma to other countries, whether they want it or not. Right thinking people in our realm are rallying to the support of our divinely appointed monarch in his struggle against the great enemy.
translation: 邪恶的革命政府不仅在摧毁封建制度并对高贵的贵族收税，还在向其他国家散播革命理念，无论他们是否想要. 有着正确思想的人民正在集结起来支持我们神圣的君主政府来对抗强大的敌人.

original: Reactionary forces have deposed the government of the people, replacing our godless revolutionary government with a divinely ordained King. People are dusting off all the old monarchist symbols.
translation: 反革命势力消灭了人民政府，用神授的王权取代了我们无神论的革命政府. 人民正在重新抹去国王旗帜上的灰尘.
所有的好事物都会消失...

original: Our victorious armies have managed to depose the foul revolutionary government and a proper God-anointed monarch has been put in power. All we need do now is agree to a just peace.
translation: 我们胜利的军队已经摧毁了革命政府，一个上帝庇佑的国王已经上台了.我们所有要做的只是同意和平.

original: We have been unable to prevent the third estate rising in revolt. The mob has stormed the Bastille and overthrown the ancien regime. A new revolutionary republic has been installed with such strange notions as inalienable rights for everyone (not just monarchs). Already Europe's monarchies are hostile and it looks like war is coming.
translation: 我们无力阻止第三阶级的起义.暴徒袭击了巴士底狱并推翻了旧政府.一个新的革命共和国成立了并给予所有人权利.所有欧洲君主国都表示反对，看来战争要开始了.

original: The forces of order have finally emerged triumphant, the ancien regime has been restored and France is back to normal.
translation: 秩序的维护军队已经取得了最终胜利，旧政府复辟，法国重回正轨.
让大部分法国人一起庆祝吧

original: Due to the monarchy's failure to adapt to the new more progressive climate, a revolutionary court has decided that our monarch will assist with science instead. The King of the ancient regime will be the first to try out our new invention by Dr. Guillotin
translation: 因为君主制不能适应新的政治气候，一个革命政府将取而代之.老国王将会是我们的新发明——断头台的第一个实验者.

original: So are the ways of progress.
With the fall of the revolutionary government the leaders of the revolution have gone into exile, giving France back its proper king.
translation: 随着革命政府崩溃，革命领导者被流放出国，法兰西将被交还于它的合法国王.

original: With the end of Royal Absolutism, a new government based on liberal principals emerged. However, continuing instability and attempts by the monarchy to reassert absolutism have radicalized the situation. The government has now switched to being outright revolutionary and the Bourbon monarch has been beheaded. The rest of Europe is shocked.
translation: 随着绝对王权的终结，建立在自由主义基础上的新政府成立了。但是持续的不稳定局势和君主派要求回到君主制的尝试使局势越发恶化。因此政府实行了彻底的革命并砍掉了波旁王室的头。全欧洲都被震撼了。

original: The worst drawbacks of the revolutionary period are now just a memory.
translation: 革命时期最糟糕的缺点，现在只是一个记忆.

original: Rumors have reached us that a small group of rebels has been spreading ideas in our colonies about an independent and unified Central American state. We cannot let this proceed! They will take control of all our colonies if we don't take this seriously.
translation: 有谣言说一小股叛军在我们的殖民地散播了建立独立中美国家的宣传.我们不能让这实现! 如果我们不慎重对待，他们会控制我们的整个殖民地.

original: Small guerrilla groups have begun to terrorize the countryside in some of our northern colonies in South America. A few attempts have even been made to overthrow our colonial governor and declare the land an independent state. If these colonies are truly precious to us, we have to capture those rebels before they bring the whole area against us.
translation: 一支游击队开始在南美殖民地北部的乡村开展恐怖活动.他们试图推翻我们的殖民地政府并建立独立国家.如果这些殖民地对我们的确弥足宝贵，我们就必须在所有人都反对我们之前逮捕叛乱者.

original: We must choose our strategy wisely!
translation: 我们必须选择明智的策略

original: Independence movements have begun to surface in several areas of our South American provinces. It won't be long before they overthrow our local government if we don't take action. How do you want to proceed?
translation: 南美一些地区的独立活动已经开始. 如果我们不采取行动，殖民地政府很快就会倒台. 你要怎么做？
我们要保卫我们的土地

original: A small group of rebels have begun to disturb the order in our Caribbean colonies. Some of them are even spreading ideas about an independent Haitian state. This could prove quite a challenge if not handled properly.
translation: 一支叛军正在破坏加勒比殖民地的秩序.一些人正在散播建立独立海地国家的宣传.我们必须慎重的处理这件事.

original: Initially it was a small duchy established in the 12th century east of the Rhine River but over time the area grew in importance especially during the Middle Ages as several cities in the Westphalian region such as Münster and Osnabrück prospered as members of the Hanseatic League.
translation: 威斯特伐利亚一开始只是12世纪时一小群德意志人莱茵河东岸建立的聚落. 但在中世纪，这一地区越来越重要，比如明斯特和奥斯纳布鲁克及其他一些城市成为了汉萨同盟的成员.

original: Support the idea of a Westphalian Nation.
translation: 支持建立独立的威斯特伐利亚

original: It truly saddens us to see that the dominions of the Pope have all but disappeared. Our strong devotion makes us the ideal candidate responsible for establishing a new Papal State. Perhaps we should cede a province of ours?
translation: 我们很悲痛的看到教宗的领地全部消失，但另一方面我们虔诚的信仰使我们成为建立新教宗国的理想人选.

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$ has made the decision to hand over the unlawfully-held province of $FROM$. They chose ... wisely.\n\nTo avoid similar accusations of holding unlawful imperial provinces, it would be wise to restore the province to its rightful owner as soon as possible.
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$决定交还非法占有的省份$FROM$. 他们的选择很...明智.\n\n但为了避免非法占有帝国成员省份带来的后果，将其尽快转交给合法所有者是一个明智的选择.

original: Release it to the previous owner.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ turned down our request to hand back the unlawfully held province of $FROM$.
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$拒绝我们关于交还非法占有省份$FROM$的要求.

original: $MONARCHTITLE$! Word has just reached us from the Far East. An explorer from our nation has visited the capital of Japan. We must hurry to take advantage of this before other European nations do.
translation: 尊敬的$MONARCHTITLE$！远东传来消息。我国一位探险家到达了日本的首都。我们要赶在其他欧洲国家之前利用这一优势。

original: The province of $PROVINCENAME$ is now considered to be a fully integrated part of our realm. The local resistance have died out and it seems like the population finally submits to our overlordship.
translation: 省份$PROVINCENAME$现在被认为是我国领土不可分割的一部分。反抗者已经死绝，人民接受了我们的统治。
失去日耳曼尼亚大主教的头衔

original: The prestigious title §WPrimas Germaniae§b can only be held by a Catholic spiritual elector. As we no longer meet these requirements, the Pope has revoked the privilege.
translation: §W日耳曼尼亚大主教§b的荣誉称号只能授予天主教神权选帝侯。由于我们不再符合要求，教宗取消了我们的特权。

original: The prestigious position as §WLegatus Natus§b can only be held by a Catholic bishop in the Holy Roman Empire. As we no longer meet this requirement, the Pope has revoked the title.
translation: §W当地使节§b的荣誉地位只能授予神圣罗马帝国内的天主教主教。由于我们不再符合要求，教宗收回了我们的称号。

original: Scholars have discovered ancient documents tracing the heritage of our noble dynasty back to Julius Caesar himself. This must be used to our advantage.
translation: 考古学家发现了一批旧文件，证实我们高贵的王室祖先可以追溯到尤里乌斯凯撒本人.这可以用来为我们服务.

original: Use it to strengthen the throne
There seems to have been a misunderstanding regarding the heritage of the great grandmother of $MONARCH$. It seems that she was the daughter of a lowly farmer from outside $CAPITAL_CITY$.
translation: $MONARCH$的曾祖母的出身似乎一直都有一个误会。如今人们发现她很可能是$CAPITAL_CITY$城外一个卑贱农夫的女儿。

original: Our most serene republic has been governed extremely efficiently the last year. There is now a possibility for us to benefit from this...
translation: 去年我们可敬的共和国得到了极为有效的治理.现在我们可以从中获益了...

original: With the great administrative leadership of $MONARCH$, we've been able to reduce the accumulated inflation of our country quite dramatically this last year.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的英明领导下，我们可以大大减少我国的通货膨胀程度。

original: With peace in our country, the great musicians, artists and poets are rejoicing in the capabilities of entertaining their betters. This era of cultural enlightenment is definitely improving the mood of $COUNTRY$.
translation: 由于长久的和平，伟大的音乐家，艺术家和诗人更好地发挥了他们的才能. 这一段艺术的黄金时期肯定会提升$COUNTRY$人民的心情.

original: With the war taking the focus of every capable and productive person in the nation, there is a lot less time for frivolous activities of musicians and poets. And even the best of poets is no better a soldier than a common farmer.
translation: 由于战争成为了每一个人关注的中心，参加音乐家和诗人的无聊活动的时间越来越少.而且即使是最好的诗人作为士兵也不会比普通农民更好.

original: The sword is stronger than the book.
Our peasants are tired of our war and our soldiers are exhausted. This may have some repercussions on our ability to finish this war in a positive way.
translation: 农民和士兵都厌倦战争了.这会影响我们打赢战争的能力.

original: The peasants are to be ignored
Soldiers are just peasants in uniform
translation: 士兵不过是穿军装的农夫

original: While $COUNTRY$ is tired of war, there is still hope and a positive spirit in the chest of everyone from the lowliest peasant to $MONARCH$. We will get through this war, and we will win it.
translation: 尽管$COUNTRY$厌战情绪浓厚，我们仍有希望，从最卑贱的农民到$MONARCH$的心中都怀有乐观的情绪.我们会渡过难关，赢得战争.

original: A few slightly shady looking characters have appeared at our court, offering their service to our $MONARCHTITLE$. They claim to be willing and able to do things that any proper ruler would never deign to do - publicly.
translation: 一些有些可疑的人出现在宫廷里，向$MONARCHTITLE$毛遂自荐.他们声称可以替体面的君主做他不愿屈尊去做的事情.

original: Words about the prospects of the New World in the west are attracting quite a lot of people who wish to enhance their future there. The question is who to send on the next ship?
translation: 西边的新世界充满机会的传言吸引了一大批希望拥有美好未来的人.问题是下一班船要带上谁？

original: We can always use some peasants.
We have merchants dealing in trade all over the world. It seems as if we struggled to support them properly, so a few rich exploiting capitalists just have to be downsized.
translation: 我们在全世界的贸易中心都派驻了商人.看起来我们要想对他们提供支持，一小部分有钱的资本家必须被裁减.

original: We have found common grounds with one of our neighbors in the fact that we share the same faith. Our relations have improved, and this can only be good for the future.
translation: 我们与一个邻国有着相同的信仰.我们的关系得到了改善，未来也更加光明.

original: A young devout preacher has spoken out recently about how great our adherence to the teachings of the Holy Father in Rome is. This can only be good for our future.
translation: 一个年轻的传教士最近在宣扬我们遵循罗马教宗教导的事情.这对我们的未来有好处.

original: Our generals are discussing the impact of some new weapons a local gunsmith has been making. They believe they can be used effectively in our armies, if we get a few more people to work on it.
translation: 将军们正在讨论一个本地铁匠制造出来的新武器的影响.他们相信新武器会在军队中发挥巨大作用，如果我们投入更多人研究它.

original: There are claims that local fishermen have improved ship design. If we do a careful study of their ships, and try building a copy, our best admirals believe that our naval technology will benefit a lot for the future.
translation: 有人声称本地渔民改进了船只设计.如果我们仔细研究这些船并依此建造新船，海军将领们相信我们将从中受益匪浅.

original: Our merchants have picked up a few new concepts when it comes to handling trade, when they encountered some foreign merchants. They think that with some investment to try it out, it will be very beneficial for $COUNTRY$ in the long run.
translation: 当我国商人遇到外国商人时，他们提出了一些开展贸易的新想法.他们认为如果得到投资支持，长期来看$COUNTRY$将获益匪浅.

original: A few local workers in the administration have discovered what they claim is a more efficient way to handle documents. Obviously they do not know what they are talking about, but can it hurt to let them try their new ideas?
translation: 几个公务员发现了更有效率处理文件的方法. 很明显他们不知道自己在谈论什么，不过让他们试一试新想法也无伤大雅不是吗？

original: There are reports of farmers and miners being more productive than local bailiffs expect them to be. We should investigate if there is something that the entire nation of $COUNTRY$ can benefit from.
translation: 有报告指出农民和矿工的产能超出了地方官的预料,我们应该去探讨这些事情能否让整个 $COUNTRY$ 收益,

original: My lord, one of your advisors has suggested selling off titles of nobility to anyone who can afford to pay. It could bring in lots of money and open a way for social advancement for the rich if we do, but it would devalue the idea of nobility and perhaps upset the existing aristocratic families. Should we do this?
