translation: 大人，我们资金短缺，一位顾问建议向有钱人出售贵族头衔.这样做会带来巨额财富，但会降低贵族头衔的价值并使贵族们感到沮丧. 我们应该这样做吗？

original: Gold is the sign of nobility!
A renowned minstrel recently crossed our nation's borders. His intention is to roam our country bringing joy to all who hear him, but some say only your ears are fit to hear such wonderful music.
translation: 一位著名的吟游诗人近日越过了我国边境. 他打算漫游整个国家并给所有听众带去欢乐，不过有些人说只有您高贵的双耳才适宜听这美好的音乐.

original: Allow him to go where his heart wishes

This year's harvests have been exceptional! Rarely in our nation's history has the earth brought forth so much of its bounty. The populace are already interpreting this as a sign that we are enjoying divine favor.
translation: 今年的丰收出乎预期！有史以来我国的土地很少出产过如此丰饶的作物.人民将这解释为我们得到了神明青睐.

original: In feudal kingdoms two castes within society held great power. The nobility and the clergy. Now it turns out a baron and the local monastery of his fief are bickering about who owns a rather large piece of land. These days the royal court is swamped with people yammering about divine right. The nobles claiming their divine right to rule the land and the clergy asserting their position as the representatives of God on Earth. The whole situation is growing rather unstable, the baron in question is inciting the other nobles against the clergy and questioning their right to hold any sort of temporal property. The prior of the monastery has brought in the archbishop on his side, who in turn threatens to go straight to Rome should you decide to side with the nobles. Now, what shall we do, my liege?
translation: 在封建王国有两个实力强大的阶层.贵族和教士.现在一位男爵和一座修道院正在为一大片土地的所有权而争吵.这些日子里皇家宫廷充斥着抱怨神权的人群.贵族坚称他们有治理领地的神圣权利而教士断言他们是神在人间的代表.形势极端不稳定，卷入问题的男爵正在煽动其他贵族对抗教士并质疑其拥有世俗财产的权利，修道院院长则获得了大主教的支持，大主教威胁称如果你支持贵族就会把事情上报罗马教廷.现在我们怎么办？

original: Jesus lived among beggars and fishermen, why don't you?
translation: 耶稣基督生活在乞丐与渔人之中，为什么你们不这样做？

original: Surely we do not wish to anger his holiness.
translation: 当然，我们不想激怒圣者

original: My lord, a peasant girl from the region of $CAPITAL$ has arrived at your court. She claims to have received a divine vision, where God commanded her to take command of your armies and drive the hated invaders from our lands! Some of your ministers are laughing at her
translation: 大人，一个来自$CAPITAL$区域的乡村少女已经到达了宫廷. 她声称获得神谕，神命令她统御军队将入侵者赶出我们的土地! 你的一些大臣在嘲笑她

original: She is a messenger from God!

A talented inventor of our country made something many considered impossible. He managed to devise a method that allows him to build a press to print huge amounts of copies of the Holy Bible, allowing every Christian to have one and rendering many monks across the world jobless. He started with the Bible but soon other books will be printed to spread enlightenment across the continent. As classics are rediscovered in Europe, the whole continent is going to change forever.
translation: 一个有才华的发明家制作了许多人认为不可能的东西.他设法设计一种工具，可以复印大量的圣经副本，让每一个基督徒人手一本，让许多世界各地的僧侣失业.他开始印制《圣经》，但很快，其他书籍也在整个非洲大陆得到普及.由于在欧洲经典被重新发现，整个大陆将永远改变.

original: A virulent disease that kills peasants, clergy, merchants and nobles within hours of infection spreads quickly throughout your capital, creating widespread panic and death.
translation: 一种疾病正在首都快速蔓延，它能在几个小时内杀死被传染上的农民、教士、商人、贵族，散播着恐慌和死亡。

original: Spend every effort to limit its effects
Salvation and piety are the only answers
translation: 拯救和虔诚是唯一答案

original: One of our advisors, while having been a faithful servant so far, but now they seem to have grown too insolent. The advisor dares to denounce our great $MONARCHTITLE$'s policies and recently did so in public in front of foreign ambassadors. Even if there might be some grounds for these criticisms, we shouldn't let open criticism of the $MONARCHTITLE$ become a habit of anyone.
translation: 我们的顾问之一，虽到目前为止是忠诚的仆人，不过现在似乎他们已经变得非常无礼。顾问们居然胆敢公然抨击我们伟大的 $MONARCHTITLE$的政策，他们最近甚至在公众和外国大使面前这么做。即使他们这些批评可能有理有据，我们也不能使公开批评$MONARCHTITLE$成为每个人的习惯。

original: But it was a good point...
Our decision to support privateer fleet is paying off. One of our captains has managed to capture a ship full of valuable gold.
translation: 我们支持私掠船队的决定正在带来收益. 一位船长捕获了一艘装满贵金属的货船.

original: That should fill our coffers nicely.

One of our captains has shown excessive skill in naval combat by capturing a privateer that has been trying to plunder our ships. It is not the first time he has managed to outwit the enemy captains and he has already gained quite a lot of fame among our fleet.
translation: 我们的一位船长在捕获试图劫掠我国船只的私掠者时展示了出色的技巧. 这不是他第一次以智取胜，并且他在海军中声名卓著.

original: We shall reward him with a promotion.
A man of such skill would be welcomed at our court.
Some of the local natives have been assimilated into the colony's population. With the additional population, we have a lot bigger faith in the feasibility of $PROVINCENAME$.
translation: 一些当地原住民已经同化为殖民地人口。随着人口增加，我们在$PROVINCENAME$殖民的信心更足了。

original: The local native population seems to be more accepting of our presence. This will have great benefits in the long run.
translation: 原住民居民对我们的存在已习以为常. 这在长期来看大有好处.

original: After recent suggestions of a trade route to India a merchant has gathered a fleet and hired an explorer to explore the uncharted waters of the west.
translation: 在提出通向印度的贸易路线的建议后，一位商人组织了一只船队并雇佣了一位探险家来探索西方未知的水域.

original: While he's gone, seize his assets!
translation: 他走之后，没收他的财产!

original: The East-India Trading Company is lobbying among our politicians for a military intervention in India. They claim that in order to protect our interests in Asia we need to assume control over more lands.
translation: 东印度公司正在游说政客发动一场对印度的武装干涉. 他们声称为了保护在亚洲的利益我们必须控制更多领地.

original: There is no need for hostilities
We need to ensure the profitability of our trade.

The various and innovative ideas of the Renaissance are spreading through Italy. Already a number of wealthy families have decided to provide financial support for the promising artists. Are we to let history pass by without leaving our mark on it?
translation: 充满多样性与创新性的文艺复兴思潮正在意大利传播. 已经有一大批富裕家族决定给予有前途的艺术家经济支持. 难道我们不想青史留名吗？

original: We too shall support the blooming renaissance art.
translation: 我们也要支持勃兴的文艺复兴.

original: I've got better things to spend money on.
translation: 我有更重要的事需要花钱

original: Through intrigue at court, skillful alliances and exploitation of his local realm, one of our kingdom's nobles has grown incredibly wealthy and powerful. If we don't deal with him now, he may became a pretender to the throne, though reducing his power will prove difficult given his influence and private retainers that he maintains as part of his own small army.
translation: 通过在宫廷上的勾心斗角，合纵连横并大肆搜刮，我们王国的贵族已经变得令人难以置信的富裕和强大.如果我们不对付他们，他们就可能篡夺王位，但减少他的权力是很困难的，因为他的私军都只承认他们自己的领主

original: Our colonists have stumbled upon an amazing discovery, and it is a real delicacy back in Europe. The major trading houses are importing this curiosity by the barrel load. They have discovered enough to supply your Kingdom, Sire, until the end of time.
translation: 我们的殖民者偶然发现了新的货物，只要能带到欧洲就能大赚一笔.大型贸易公司都大肆进口这种货物.他们发现的货源足够供应整个王国，直到世界末日

original: The merchants can learn from it
translation: 商人可以从中学习到东西

original: There are no resources to be found in $PROVINCENAME$ yet, but we hope that will change soon.
translation: $PROVINCENAME$目前没有发现资源，但我们希望很快就有改变

original: Long Live the Emperor! The Imperial Crown remains in $COUNTRY$.
translation: 皇帝万岁! 帝国的皇冠仍然在$COUNTRY$手中.

original: Long Live the Emperor! The electors have decided to maintain their faith in us, and the Imperial Crown remains in $COUNTRY$. As our country strengthens its grip on the Imperial Crown and the Princes begin to see us as the natural holders, Imperial Authority increases.
translation: 皇帝万岁！选帝侯们已经决定保持对我们的信任，皇冠依然被留在$COUNTRY$。由于皇冠紧紧的被掌握在我们手中，各国君主开始把我们看作天然的皇位持有者，帝国权威也因此增加了。

original: Like a phoenix, $FROMCOUNTRY$, a Holy Roman Empire member state has risen from the ashes!
translation: 像不死鸟一样，$FROMCOUNTRY$，一个神圣罗马帝国的成员国从灰烬中重生!

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$, a Holy Roman Empire member state, has converted to a heretical faith!
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$，一个神圣罗马帝国的成员国，转信了异端信仰！
一个迷途的羔羊归来了

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$, a Holy Roman Empire member state, has converted to the True Faith!
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$，一个神圣罗马帝国的成员国，回归了正统信仰！

original: The Empire has triumphed against the vicious aggressors of $FROMCOUNTRY$!
translation: 帝国已经战胜了邪恶的侵略者$FROMCOUNTRY$!

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$, a Holy Roman Empire member state, has been annexed by a foreign power!
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$，一个神圣罗马帝国的成员国，被外国势力吞并！

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$, a Holy Roman Empire member state, has been released from foreign vassalage!
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$，一个神圣罗马帝国的成员国，被从外国统治中解放了出来！

original: The Emperor has rushed to the defense of $FROMCOUNTRY$ against foreign aggression!
translation: 皇帝已经赶往保护$FROMCOUNTRY$抵抗外国侵略!

original: The Emperor has failed to defend $FROMCOUNTRY$ against foreign aggression.
translation: 皇帝未能保卫$FROMCOUNTRY$抵抗外国侵略.
不光彩？我会说，这是审慎的表现！

original: Our infamy is causing widespread resent of our war effort. A lot of men are basically running to the forest instead of reporting for duty.
translation: 我们臭名昭著的战争是造成了普遍的不满。许多人没有履行职责，而是逃进森林。

original: They would have been cowards anyway.
Our nation is extremely infamous, and there are a lot of people in $COUNTRY$ that have taken exception to this.
translation: 我国声名狼藉，$COUNTRY$国内有很多人对此不满。
我们需要更好的鞭策者……

original: $PROVINCENAME$ has been liberated from the clutches of $FROMCOUNTRY$ and restored to the Holy Roman Empire. Our service to the Empire has been recognized.
translation: $PROVINCENAME$已经脱离了$FROMCOUNTRY$的魔掌并回到了神圣罗马帝国。我们对帝国的奉献得到了认可。

original: Discussions regarding ways to expand our trade have been ongoing in the Parliament for some time now. We already have exclusive control over a local trade node but there are many who are enticed by the possibilities of overseas trading. Others are convinced that the risks are too great and that more money could be made at home.
translation: 关于如何扩展我们的贸易的议题已经在国会中讨论了一段时间.我们已经独占了本地的贸易节点，但是仍然有很多商人被海外贸易的暴利所引诱.其他的人相信这样做风险太大，在国内就可以安安稳稳地赚更多的钱

original: Our Parliament is divided regarding the proposal to establish a new trade node. Most of them can't see any logical reason to why such a prominent trading nation as our own shouldn't have its own trade node, but as we all know, these things don't come cheap and therefore require careful consideration.
translation: 围绕建立新的贸易节点的议题，我们的国会分成了两派.绝大多数人都认为像我们一样著名的贸易国家居然没有自己的贸易节点，这是没有道理的，但是我们都知道，这需要花费一大笔金钱，因此更需要慎重考虑.

original: Apparently citing disgust with $COUNTRY$'s endless wars of conquest some Trade Nodes have decided to expel our merchants.
translation: 有些贸易节点显然对$COUNTRY$ 无休止的征服战争感到厌恶， 他们决定驱逐我们的商人。

original: Some countries are apparently so appalled by our foreign policy that they've decided to retaliate by assassinating our merchants in an attempt to strike at our finances!\n\nWhat makes it even more shocking is that it happens even in our own Trade Nodes...
translation: 有些国家被我们的外交政策吓坏了，他们决定采用暗杀我们商人的方式来打击我们的经济！\n\n更加让人震惊的是这种事情甚至会在我们自己的贸易节点内发生...

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area has proved to be the perfect trade node for ivory. Our government couldn't be happier.
translation: 从我们的殖民定居者那里接到了报告，$PROVINCENAME$ 这一地区被证明是理想的象牙贸易节点.我们的政府对此十分满意.

original: Thoughts of disapproval against the Roman Catholic Church are spreading across Europe as a result of the increasing corruption of monks and clerics. Voices are raised questioning the current principles and greed of the Church. $COUNTRY$, which was recently swayed by these so called heresies, has now openly broken with Rome and declared itself Protestant.
translation: 僧侣和教士的腐化与日俱增，因此对罗马天主教廷的不满在欧洲扩散开来.已经开始有人质疑教廷目前的行事原则以及贪婪成性.最近，$COUNTRY$被这些异端邪说所动摇，已经公开地与罗马断绝了关系并转信新教.

original: The Protestant Reformation is spreading like wildfire across Europe. Several different movements have already formed, proposing alternative ways of reforming the Christian faith. The so called Reformed school of thought has come to dominate $COUNTRY$. Now, $MONARCH$ has decided to renounce Catholicism entirely and adopt a Reformed form of Christianity.
translation: 新教的改革像草原上的野火一样在欧洲疯传. 一些不同的让步已经形成了，给予了选择不同基督教信仰的机会. 被称做改革学派的思想成功主宰了 $COUNTRY$ . 现在，$MONARCH$ 决定完全放弃天主教，全面接受基督教的改革学派.

original: The unfortunate passing of $MONARCH$ forces us to hold a premature election. Three primary candidates have been nominated...
translation: $MONARCH$的不幸逝世迫使我们举行一次临时的选举，提名了三个主要候选人……

original: We need a Medici to rule us!
translation: 我们需要一名美第奇家族的人来统领我们！

original: The Protestant Reformation is spreading like wildfire across Europe. Several different movements have already formed, proposing alternative ways of reforming the Christian faith. A devout preacher in $CAPITAL$ has become the principal figure for the so called Reformed school of thought, stressing the complete ruin of humanity's ethical nature. Only with the divine intervention of God can humanity find salvation, turning from rebellion to willing obedience.
translation: 新教改革像野火一样烧遍欧洲.已经形成了几种不同的运动，提出了各自改革基督教信仰的方式.$CAPITAL$的一个虔诚的牧师成为了所谓改革学派的首要人物，强调人类伦理本性中包含的彻底的破坏性.只有主的干预才能救赎人类，从背叛者变成自愿顺从的人.

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the land is very fertile and would be highly suitable for agricultural production of anything from cereals and vegetable foodstuff to more exotic crops.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里的土地十分肥沃，非常适合谷物和蔬菜这类食物的农业生产。

original: You can never have too much grain
translation: 你从来都不会觉得粮食太多

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the surrounding waters have a very rich supply of fish. Fish may be one of the most basic foods available but it's nonetheless an important resource.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里的水域内发现了大量的鱼群。鱼类可能成为当地的主要食物，同时也是重要的资源。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the land is very fertile and would be highly suitable for agricultural production of various types of staples but wine in particular.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里的土地十分肥沃，非常适合各种酒类原料作物的农业生产。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area has perfect conditions for wool production. This is a rather valuable find considering that wool is the major raw material used for clothing.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里的状况非常适合羊毛生产。这是个非常有价值的发现，因为羊毛是重要的制衣材料。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area has perfect conditions for cloth production.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里状况非常适合布料的生产。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area has a very rich supply of wildlife and perfect conditions for fur trade.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里有大量的野生动物，非常适合毛皮的生产。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area has a rich abundance of salt. This is a truly valuable find considering that salt is not only essential for human life but also one of the most common means to preserve food.
translation: 我们收到来自 $PROVINCENAME$ 的殖民定居者的消息说，那里有丰富的盐. 这是个非常有价值的发现，因为盐不仅是人们生活的必需品，同时也是贮藏食物的最常用途径.

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area would be very well suited for production of naval supplies, everything from basic wood to tar, ropes, linen and sails.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里非常适合海军补给品的生产。从基本的木材到柏油、绳索、亚麻布和船帆。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area is very rich in various metals but copper in particular. This is truly a valuable find considering copper's importance in cannon production.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里发现了大量的金属矿，其中铜矿是最多的。这是个非常有价值的发现，因为铜在我们的大炮生产中非常重要。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area is very rich in various metals but gold in particular. Gold and silver being the basis of all formal currencies this is truly a valuable find.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息，那里发现里大量的金属矿，其中最多的是金矿。金和银是各种正式货币的基本材料，所以这是一个非常有价值的发现。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area is very rich in various metals but iron in particular. Iron forming the basis of the metallurgical industry this is truly a valuable find.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里发现了大量的金属矿，其中铁矿是最多的。铁是整个金属工业的基础。

original: Slaves have been a trading commodity since Antiquity but lately the demand has increased rather drastically in part due to the large amount of plantations established in colonies like $PROVINCENAME$ and similar provinces.
translation: 奴隶自古以来就是一种贸易品，最近由于殖民地的大量种植园的建立，对 $PROVINCENAME$ 和其他类似地区的奴隶的需求激增.

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the climate in combination with the fertile land makes the province a highly suitable area for tea production.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里土地肥沃，气候适宜，非常适合茶叶的生产。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the area has perfect conditions for production of high value luxuries like chinaware.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里非常适合瓷器这类高品质奢侈品的生产。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the land is immensely fertile and would serve extremely well for most kinds of spices like pepper, ginger, nutmeg, chilli or cinnamon.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，那里有非常肥沃的土地，特别适合各种香料，像胡椒、姜、肉豆寇、辣椒和肉桂的生产。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the climate in combination with the province's fertile land makes it a highly suitable area for coffee production.
translation: 从我们的殖民定居者那里接到报告称，$PROVINCENAME$的气候和该省肥沃的土壤使得这片土地十分适合咖啡生产.

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the climate in combination with the province's fertile land makes it a highly suitable area for cotton production.
translation: 从我们的殖民定居者那里接到报告称，$PROVINCENAME$的气候和该省肥沃的土壤使得这片土地十分适合棉花生产.

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the land is very fertile and would serve extremely well for sugar plantations.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，土地肥沃，气候适宜，非常适合建立糖类作物种植园。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the climate in combination with the province's fertile land makes it a highly suitable area for tobacco production.
translation: 从我们的殖民定居者那里接到报告称，$PROVINCENAME$的气候和该省肥沃的土壤使得这片土地十分适合烟草生产.

original: The Counter-Reformation no longer has the necessary support in $COUNTRY$, and thus has come to an end. The Pope is very disappointed.
translation: 在$COUNTRY$的反宗教改革运动不再得到必要的支持，已经告一段落了。教宗对此非常失望。

original: The Counter-Reformation served its purpose, but the era of religious strife in Europe is coming to an end.
translation: 反对宗教改革达到了它的目的，但是欧洲的宗教争议时代也该结束了.

original: With our new ideas of every men being equal without regard for their religion, the Counter-Reformation has come to an end in our country.
translation: 在我们宗教平等的政策指导下，反宗教改革运动在我国已告一段落。

original: With our new ideas of religious tolerance towards heretics, the Counter-Reformation has come to an end in our country.
translation: 在我们包容异端的宗教政策指导下，反宗教改革运动在我国已告一段落

original: A proposition has been made to restrict the Church's authority and right to formulate laws regarding church affairs without the king or queen's consent. Although centralizing the monarch's power may have its benefits this will also separate us further from the Roman church.
translation: 有建议提出限制教廷不经过国王或女王的同意自己制订关于教会事务法律的权力.虽然集中统治者的权力或许会带来一些好处，但是这也会让我们与罗马教廷的关系变得疏远.

original: Let the Clergy keep its authority

As slavery has been abolished in $COUNTRY$, all subjects, even in remote regions need to find another way to earn their living. Hopefully our traders can figure out another thing that is as profitable.
translation: 随着奴隶制在$COUNTRY$的废除，我们所有的属国，即使是远在地球另一端的，都不得不自谋生路了。希望我们的商人们能找到更加赚钱的方法。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the province's fertile land in combination with the province's hot, rainy tropical climate makes it a highly suitable area for cocoa production.
translation: 我们收到来自$PROVINCENAME$的殖民定居者的消息说，土地肥沃，加上炎热、多雨的热带气候，非常适合可可的生产。

original: When a smaller country gives up its independence to join a greater realm, there is a lot of adapting, and while some parts are easy, the administration of the realm will still need to expand to accommodate all possibilities.
translation: 当一个小国家放弃自己的独立地位加入与我们合并时，有很多东西要去适应。虽然有些方面很容易，但是新领地的管理还是要能适应各种可能性。
整合国家是一个缓慢的过程。

original: Some members of our parliament feel that we're not putting enough focus on national trade. It's pretty clear to everyone that we're not exactly dominating trade in this area but we could certainly do worse, at least that's what the other members are claiming. If our previous track record is anything to go by, our parliament are not very likely to come to any sort of agreement anytime soon unless someone is able to talk some sense into them.
translation: 一些国会议员认为我们没有对国家贸易给予足够的关注.每个人都清楚地知道我们并没有支配这一地区的贸易，但是我们有可能做的更糟糕，至少其他的议员是这么宣称的.如果我们之前的会议记录靠得住的话，我们的国会不太可能在短时间内达成共识，除非有人可以给他们讲讲道理清醒一下.

original: Local trade is where our focus should be
translation: 地方贸易是我们应当集中的

original: Perhaps it's time to broaden our horizons
translation: 或许现在是时候拓展我们的眼界了

original: Our parliament seems to have some real difficulties coming to terms with how to govern our nation, whether it's agreeing on a budget, taxes, port duties or trade and customs policies. This time it's the budget, should more money be invested into research or be set aside for unforeseen expenses in the future?
translation: 我们的国会在决定如何管理国家的问题上争论不休，特别是关于预算，税收，港税，贸易和风俗政策. 现在我们应当投资更多的钱到科研上，还是为未来储存起来呢？
保留一些作为未来的花费

original: Try to mediate between the two parties

A few members of our parliament are convinced that we're putting too much focus on military operations instead of concentrating on expanding our trade. They are complaining that too many investments are being directed into financing our military but almost nothing to improve our trade conditions.
translation: 我们国会的少数成员觉得我们太国注重军事扩张而非贸易扩张. 他们抱怨过多的钱被投入到军事中，而几乎没有资金来改善我们的贸易状况.

original: Perhaps our focus has been a bit misdirected
translation: 或许我们的重心有点小错

original: $STATESMAN$ has been quite busy lately, proposing new changes, one after the other. Although you could argue that they are only doing their job, their constant interference and attitude of 'knowing it all' in any matter even remotely related to politics is causing quite a rift in our parliament, there are even those that think we would do better without $STATESMAN$.
translation: $STATESMAN$最近非常忙碌，推行一个又一个改革。也许你会说他们只是在做自己的工作，他们持续不断地干涉以及‘我要知晓一切’的态度已经使国会出现分裂，有些人甚至认为没有 $STATESMAN$我们会做得更好。

original: Some members of the parliament are having some concerns regarding our increasingly bad reputation, they are claiming that it's having a negative effect on our trade relations. This question has been raised numerous times in the past but not that many have thought it of any consequence. This time the matter is causing some really heated debates though, perhaps we should try to settle things before they get out of hand.
translation: 一些国会的成员抱怨着我们日益增加的坏名声，他们宣称这会给我们的贸易带来坏的影响。这个问题被提起来无数次，但是没有足够多的人认为是有意义的。现在它真的导致了一些激烈的辩论，或许我们应当在它失去控制之前解决掉。

original: The ongoing war has led to some serious conflicts in parliament. On the one side there are those arguing that there is nothing to be gained by allowing the war to drag on while others are convinced that there's no turning back. Unfortunately their inability to come to some sort of agreement does nothing to improve our current situation but rather the contrary.
translation: 正在进行的战争在国会中引发了严重的冲突.一方认为战争继续拖延下去并不会有任何收获，另一方认为战争必须进行下去，已经不能回头了.不幸的是由于他们不能达成某种共识，我们的处境不仅没有得到改善，反而变得更糟.

original: Offense is probably the only option
translation: 进攻或许是我唯一的原则

original: Defense sounds better at this stage
translation: 现阶段防守看起来更好一点

original: It seems there is always a small group of the parliament that can't agree with the others. Regardless of the matter at hand this particular group always have a different opinion than everyone else.
translation: 貌似总是有小部分国会议员不同意其他人的意见. 这个独特的组群有不同于别人的意见.

original: It's probably best to leave things as they are

There is a spy among us! Somehow a spy has managed to infiltrate our parliament and all of a sudden everyone is a suspect. We haven't managed to find out who sent him yet but since our relations with some of our neighbors are somewhat strained at the moment it was probably one of them.
translation: 我们中出了一个叛徒！一个间谍以某种方式潜入了我们的国会，突然之间每个人都变得可疑.我们还没有找出是谁派出的间谍，但是由于目前我们同周边国家的关系紧张，很可能就是它们中的一个.

original: It would appear as though a member of our parliament has been selling secrets to our enemies. How would you otherwise explain the fact that they all of a sudden seem able to predict our every move? These were decisions that were never discussed outside the Parliament building.
translation: 看起来我们国会的一员正把情报卖给我们的敌人，否则你怎么解释他们可以预测到我们每一个动作？ 这些可都是我们没在国会建筑之外讨论过的事情.

original: Of course it was one of them
It's better to play it safe until we know more
translation: 在我们知道更多之前最好谨慎行事

original: Our Parliament's indecisiveness and inability to make any kind of decision has created near chaos. Every member is trying their utmost to get their voice heard but refusing to acknowledge the opinions of anyone else.
translation: 我们国会的犹豫和无法作出任何决议导致了我们陷入了混乱的边缘. 每个成员都在竭尽全力说话，却没人愿意聆听别人在说什么.

original: That's just the nature of politics
translation: 这只是政治的自然现象

original: It has been brought to your attention that a certain member of our Parliament has been accepting bribes from several different sources for influencing all kinds of national decisions.
translation: 你注意到了国会的某些成员接受了各种来源的贿赂，影响了各种国家决议.

original: Our economy isn't what it has been. The treasury is almost empty and our parliament can't seem to figure out how to handle the situation or the reasons for it to happen in the first place. Minting more money is always an option of course or raising taxes, either way they are waiting for you to make a decision.
translation: 我们的经济并不是看到的样子. 国库已经空掉了，我们的议会似乎也不清楚如何处理这种状况，也不知道这是怎么发生的. 铸造更多的货币或者提税，要用哪种方式由你来决定.

original: Some members of parliament are complaining that we're spending too much money on our military. Many of them are convinced that our production and trade will suffer if we don't cut back on military expenses.
translation: 我们国会的一些成员抱怨我们花费了太多的钱在军事上. 他们说如果不削减军事花费我们的生产和贸易就会遭到损失.

original: Well, trade and production aren't as important
translation: 不，贸易和生产没这么重要

original: Our Parliament is divided in regards to our military focus, some of them are advocating for a grand navy while others are more interested in a large army. Although some sort of middle way would be possible, most of them would prefer that we increased the size of our navy.
translation: 我们的国会在军事重心上发生了分歧，一些人认为我们应当建立强大的海军，而另外的人支持陆军. 虽然一些中性的手段可以被进行，但是他们中的大多数还是希望扩充海军的数量.

original: A large navy is the only option
translation: 强大的海军是唯一的选择

original: A large army would be more beneficial
translation: 强大的陆军或许会更有利

original: Some members of our parliament feel that we are too lenient when it comes to asserting control over what is rightfully ours. They can't understand how we can allow a core province like $PROVINCENAME$ to be controlled by some other country and just sit idly by.
translation: 我们国会的一些成员觉得我们在关于本属于我们的土地的控制权问题上显得太过宽容了. 他们不明白为什么我们可以让一个像 $PROVINCENAME$ 这样的核心省份被控制在其他国家手中.

original: They fail to see the bigger picture
translation: 他们并没有更大的前景

original: It's not of any interest anymore

A few members of our parliament are of the opinion that $MONARCH$ has been taking a few too many liberties lately when it comes to governing our nation. Some are even claiming that $MONARCH$ seem to lack any respect whatsoever for both the constitution and the rest of the parliament.
translation: 我们国会的一些成员觉得 $MONARCH$ 自从最近执掌我们政府以来获得了太多的自由. 有些人甚至称 $MONARCH$ 缺乏对宪法和国会成员的尊重.

original: Our parliament is constantly exploring different ways to bring more money into our state treasury but as always there are disagreements regarding the best strategy. A heavy tax raise would improve the state of our treasury considerably but it is also very likely to upset the populace, a small raise on the other hand wouldn't improve our finances as much but wouldn't cause that many protests either.
translation: 我们的国会不断地找寻着为国家赚钱的方法，但是关于经济的策略方面又发生了分歧. 一次大幅提升税收会充实我们的国库，但是人民不会高兴，小幅的提升又不能带来太多好处以改善我们的财政.

original: A short-term solution is probably the best option
translation: 短期解决方案可能是最好的选择

original: Several members of our parliament are complaining that the costs of maintaining such a large army are too big for our current budget.
translation: 我们国会的一些成员抱怨说，维持这么庞大的军队的花费对我们现在的财政来说负担太过沉重.

original: Convince them that we can afford it

It would appear as though a few members of our parliament still sympathize with the former government. Neither of them will admit it of course, but their behavior is rather suspicious at times. It might be a good idea to investigate where their real allegiances lay.
translation: 我们国会中的某些成员好像仍然支持着之前的政权.当然，他们中没有人会承认，但是他们有时候的行为确实可疑.调查他们真实的效忠对象也许会是个好主意.

original: Despite the considerable time and effort dedicated to the establishment of a new constitution, our parliament can't seem to agree on a common goal. So far, not a single proposition has been accepted by all parties and all normal activities have come to a standstill.
translation: 尽管已经投入了大量的时间和精力在编写一部新的宪法上面，我们的国会仍然不能达成一项共识.到目前为止，没有一项提案得到所有党派的支持，所有正常的活动都陷入了停滞.

original: It will be solved soon enough
Every member of our parliament is requesting more money to be invested in a different area. Our army needs funding but so does our trade and production and let's not forget about our navy.
translation: 每个国会成员都要求在不同的领域投入更多资金. 我们的军队需要资金，贸易和生产也是，还不能忘了我们的海军.

original: An even spread should do the trick
There's no need for any extra investments

Some members of our parliament seem to think that $MONARCH$ has held his office long enough and are arguing for a new election. Apparently the reason for this is grounded in a disagreement they had with $MONARCH$ a short while ago regarding the implementation of a new financial reform.
translation: 我们国会的一些成员认为 $MONARCH$ 掌控了政府太久了，他们要求一次新的选举. 显然他们不认同 $MONARCH$ 的原因是他最近推行了新的财政改革.

original: Agree to hear them out once more

$SPYMASTER$, always being a rather suspicious person has managed to convince several members of parliament that a counter revolution is under works. $SPYMASTER_CAP_ADJ$ doesn't have any real evidence so far but most members seem to take $SPYMASTER_S_PRONOUN$ seriously and are therefore demanding appropriate measures to be taken.
translation: $SPYMASTER$，一直是一个多疑的人，他成功地说服了一些国会议员相信反革命活动正在进行。虽然$SPYMASTER_CAP_ADJ$现在没有确切的证据，但是大部分议员都愿意慎重考虑$SPYMASTER_S_PRONOUN$ ，他们要求采取一定的措施。

original: It's better to be safe than sorry
translation: 保持安全才不会有遗憾

original: Our parliament seems to have some difficulties understanding who's in charge of our government. They seem to think it's fully acceptable to make decisions without either informing or discussing the matter with you first. Whatever gave them that idea?
translation: 我们的议会似乎很难理解正在执掌我们政权的人. 他们觉得无视你而通过一些决议是完全可接受的. 你能给他们出点主意么？

original: Make it a bit more clear to them
Let them think they have a say in things

$TREASURER$ has been complaining constantly for the last few weeks that we're spending more money than our budget allows. $TREASURER_CAP_ADJ$ has always been a bit overdramatic of course but this time $TREASURER_ADJ$ has even managed to convince some of the other members of parliament that it's a real problem.
translation: $TREASURER$一直抱怨最近几周我们花了太多的钱，超出了预算允许的范围。当然$TREASURER_CAP_ADJ$总是有点反应过度，但这次$TREASURER_ADJ$成功说服了很多国会成员使他们也认为这是一个问题。

original: It's becoming more and more clear to you that there aren't that many members of the parliament that you can really trust. One of your closest advisors has just been exposed stealing money from the state treasury.
translation: 你越来越清楚地发现许多国会成员根本不可信任. 一个你最亲近的顾问刚刚被揭发挪用了大量公款.

original: There's probably a good explanation for this
According to some fairly trustworthy sources a few members of parliament are planning a coup to have $MONARCH$ replaced. It might be wise to investigate the matter further.
translation: 从一些可靠的来源传来消息说一些国会成员计划着重立 $MONARCH$ . 深入调查这件事是很明智的.

original: You can never be too careful
There are some rumors floating around that certain members of our parliament are actually spies sent by a rivaling nation to infiltrate our government. Apparently you can't trust anyone.
translation: 有传言显示，我们国会中的某些成员实际上是由我们的敌国派来渗透进我们政府的间谍.显然你不能相信任何人.

original: Send a few spies of your own

For reasons unknown, some of the cardinals have begun to question your decisions more and more lately, it almost seems like they are beginning to lose faith in your ability to govern the Catholic Church.
translation: 因为某些未知原因，一些枢机开始对你的决议有更多的异议，貌似他们已经对你统领天主教庭的能力产生了怀疑。

original: Hire someone to investigate the matter
Just try to prove them wrong

According to one of your closest advisors, a spy has managed to infiltrate the Sacred College of Cardinals. Unless you think you can trust the advisor, perhaps you should ask them to provide you with some evidence?
translation: 根据一位最亲近你的顾问的证言，一位间谍已经潜入了枢机团。你是否该相信他？也许让他给你再提供一点直接证据？

original: One of your advisors has asked you to consider the matter of religious freedom a bit more thoroughly. They are claiming that having a large group of people that doesn't adhere to our state religion is having a severe impact on our national stability.
translation: 你的一位顾问劝说你更加彻底地思考宗教自由问题。他们声称有不信仰国教的大量人群会严重危害国家的稳定。

original: It has become a real issue for you that some of your neighbors refuse to accept the one true faith. Your relations are already far from ideal but this only makes matters worse.
translation: 你的一些邻国拒绝接受真正的信仰，这已经成为你面临的一个现实的问题.你们之间的关系其实已经很差了，但是这一点使得问题变得更加严重.

original: Make your opinion clear to them
translation: 让他们清楚地知道你的想法

original: Make preparations for a future attack

The missionary we sent to $PROVINCENAME$ hasn't had much luck so far, news have just reached us that he has fallen ill. Any further work on the new church has come to a standstill and without his guidance the chances of converting the locals are rather slim.
translation: 我们派到$PROVINCENAME$的传教士不太走运，我们刚刚得知他生病了.新的教堂的建造工作陷入了停滞状态，没有他的引导，想要转化当地人的信仰几乎是不可能的.

original: It is proving much harder than anticipated to convert the citizens of $PROVINCENAME$. Although a few of them showed some clear interest in the beginning, the majority don't seem that willing to embrace a new religion.
translation: 事实证明转化 $PROVINCENAME$ 民众的信仰比预想地要艰难得多. 虽然有小部分人对新的信仰抱有兴趣，但大多数人还是不愿接受新信仰.

original: We have just received news regarding the missionary we sent to $PROVINCENAME$. According to the report he and his followers were attacked by natives just a short while ago. Unfortunately it's not clear if they managed to drive the attackers away or if they still pose a threat.
translation: 我们接到来自 $PROVINCENAME$ 的传教士的消息. 据报告他和他的追随者最近被土著袭击了. 现在仍然不清楚他们是否击退了进攻者或者这些原住民依然是威胁.

original: Send some troops and supplies just in case
translation: 派遣一些部队和补给以防万一

original: They can probably handle this themselves

According to the governor of $PROVINCENAME$, the citizens are in uproar because of our missionaries' complete lack of respect for any religious practices or traditions different from their own. He is asking us to consider canceling all further missionary activities in the area or at least send some more troops until things calm down a bit.
translation: 根据$PROVINCENAME$总督的报告，由于我们的传教士缺乏对当地宗教活动和传统的尊重，当地群情激奋。他提议放弃所有进一步当地的传教活动，或者至少派去更多军队直到事态平息一些。

original: There are some very disturbing rumors circulating regarding the missionary we sent to $PROVINCENAME$. According to the rumors he never used the money we gave him to finance the construction of a new church but kept it all to himself. Who would have thought such a godly man could be capable of such a thing.
translation: 有关于我们派到$PROVINCENAME$的传教士的流言正在四处流传，造成了很坏的影响. 根据这些流言，他从来没有用我们交给他的金钱去资助一座新教堂的建造，而是自己吞掉了这笔钱.谁会想到这样一个虔诚的人竟会干出这样的事情.

original: There's no reason to doubt a man of god
translation: 没必要怀疑神的代言人

original: The situation in $PROVINCENAME$ is getting close to unbearable. The citizens are refusing to accept the preaching of the missionary we sent there a short while ago and now he fears for his life. A revolt seems imminent unless we do something soon.
translation: $PROVINCENAME$ 的状况已经变得无法容忍了. 当地民众拒绝接受我们派过去的传教士的说道，现在他正为自己的小命担心. 如果我们不做什么，可能一次叛乱马上就要来了.

original: The missionary we sent to $PROVINCENAME$ is complaining that the area is too unstable at the moment. Despite our neutral stance, the war that is currently going on in the neighboring country is having an impact on $PROVINCENAME$ too.
translation: 我们派到$PROVINCENAME$的传教士抱怨说现在该地区极不稳定.尽管我们保持中立，但邻国正在进行的战争仍然对$PROVINCENAME$造成了影响.

original: Our theologian is complaining that not enough money is invested in missionary activities. One missionary is hardly enough to convert the whole population of $PROVINCENAME$ for instance.
translation: 我们的神学家抱怨我们没有投入足够的资金在传教活动上，这使得我们的传教活动很难转化 $PROVINCENAME$ 的所有人

original: There is a man, who to be honest is not quite a gentleman, preaching ideas about our colonies being self-sufficient and capable of governing themselves on their own. It is sad when children behave this way, or as they say spare children, don't spare the rod.
translation: 有一个没有什么绅士风度的人，正在宣扬我们的殖民地可以自给自足并且自治的观念.殖民地就像小孩子一样，不拿棍棒教训他们就会把孩子惯坏.

original: An illiterate preacher who doesn't seem to understand his Bible is preaching a message that contradicts Jesus' true message about showing deference to true authority.
translation: 一个看上去连圣经都没有读懂的文盲牧师正在宣扬背离基督真正意思的关于向真正的权威表示尊敬的观点.

original: And the people listen to him...
It seems that our governor in $PROVINCENAME$ has been taking his office for profit under the crown a little too far...
translation: 我们在$PROVINCENAME$的执政官在他的办公室赚了太多不正常的钱了……

original: Replace him, and repay the people
translation: 找人代替他，并把钱还给受害的群众

original: As time has gone by we have realized that the Popery Act doesn't really have any relevance anymore so we have decided to revoke it. Instead we will be focusing on promoting Catholic influences.
translation: 随着时间的流逝，我们认识到Popery Act并不再有现实意义，因此我们决定撤销这一法案.取而代之的是集中精力推广天主教的影响力.

original: These so called pilgrims are following the [heretics_from_here.Religion.GetName] faith, which is an abomination to our $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ church. They are following a wicked faith and will most likely perish in the colonies.\nStill they have managed to gain the support of many of our settlers and have made a new home for themselves in this faraway land.
translation: 这些所谓的朝圣者正在追随的[heretics_from_here.Religion.GetName]信仰，这是定居者对我们$COUNTRY_RELIGION$教会的厌恶。尽管他们已经获得了我们许多定居者的支持并在遥远的土地上建立了自己家园，但邪恶的信仰很快会在殖民地中消亡。\n

original: The natives will deal with them.
translation: 原住民会好好招待他们的.

original: They are not part of our Colony!
translation: 他们不是我们殖民地的一部分！

original: These so called pilgrims are following the Protestant faith, which is an abomination to our $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ church. They are following a wicked faith and will most likely perish in the colonies.
translation: 这些所谓的朝圣者追随着新教的信仰，这是我们的$COUNTRY_RELIGION$的一大心病. 现在这些家伙应该会在殖民地毁灭掉吧.

original: These so called pilgrims are following the Catholic faith, which is an abomination to our $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ church. They are following a wicked faith and will most likely perish in the colonies.
translation: 这些所谓的朝圣者追随着天主教的信仰，这是我们的$COUNTRY_RELIGION$的一大心病. 现在这些家伙应该会在殖民地毁灭掉吧.

original: The mint is functioning at full efficiency and the coinage has never been so pure, $MASTER_OF_MINT$ is the person responsible.
translation: 铸币厂正在全力工作，钱币的成色史无前例之高。$MASTER_OF_MINT$为此做出了重大贡献。

original: $MASTER_OF_MINT_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$MASTER_OF_MINT_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.
The reputation of $NAVIGATOR$ is second to none, our sailors can sail further than other comparable nations thanks to $NAVIGATOR$'s talents.
translation: $NAVIGATOR$的声誉响彻海内外，因为他的才能我们的海员可以比任何国家行驶的更远。

original: $NAVIGATOR_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$NAVIGATOR_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.
Troops feel good when they know a good person is directing operations. $GRAND_CAPTAIN$ is probably the greatest military mind our country has ever seen.
translation: 如果有一个出色的指挥官，军队会非常满意。$GRAND_CAPTAIN$也许是我们国家军队历史上最出色的长官。

original: $GRAND_CAPTAIN_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$GRAND_CAPTAIN_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.
A first rate organizer, $ARMY_ORGANISER$ has done fantastic work with our armies. Tales of $ARMY_ORGANISER$'s abilities have spread far and wide.
translation: 作为一位一流的组织者，$ARMY_ORGANISER$为我们的军队做出卓越的贡献。 $ARMY_ORGANISER$的传说流传到很远。

original: $ARMY_ORGANISER_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$ARMY_ORGANISER_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.
A drillmaster par excellence, $COMMANDANT$ has turned our army into clockwork automatons that don't flinch on the battlefield.
translation: 一名卓越的教官，$COMMANDANT$把我们的军队训练成了在战场上永不退缩的精密机器.

original: $COMMANDANT_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$COMMANDANT_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.

To many in the army, especially those that end up dying due to various things outside battles, the quartermaster seems to do nothing. However to those that understand the complexity of logistics $QUARTERMASTER$ is a true genius.
translation: 在军队的许多人看来，尤其是那些死于战争因素之外的人来说，军需官似乎完全无用。然而对于了解后勤复杂性的人来说，$QUARTERMASTER$是一个真正的天才。

original: $QUARTERMASTER_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$QUARTERMASTER_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.

Joining the army is usually an automatic death sentence. If you actually survive the various illnesses and poor rations, then someone will come along and shoot you in a battle (usually enemy troops). With this in mind people aren't that keen to sign up, but $RECRUITMASTER$ uses their talents to 'persuade' yet more men to join the colors.
translation: 加入军队通常就是一个自动的死刑宣判。就算你能从各种疾病和糟糕的给养下存活下来，你最终基本上还是会在战斗中牺牲。由于这个印象人们通常不会乐意从军，但是 $RECRUITMASTER$ 运用他们的才能，成功说服了更多人加入军队。

original: $RECRUITMASTER_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$RECRUITMASTER_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.

To our enemies the effort we put into defending our fortresses seems cowardly. However $FORTIFICATION_EXPERT$ gets the last laugh as attrition slowly eats our enemies away while we sit snugly inside our fortresses.
translation: 对敌人来说我们在防御工事上的成就看起来是懦夫行为。然而$FORTIFICATION_EXPERT$笑到了最后，战争损耗慢慢的吞噬了我们的敌人，而我们舒适地呆在防御工事里。

original: $FORTIFICATION_EXPERT_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$FORTIFICATION_EXPERT_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.

Always knowing just the right questions to ask, $INQUISITOR$ strikes fear into the hearts of those that would spy upon us. $INQUISITOR$'s presence alone is enough to plant the seed of failure before the mission has even begun.
translation: 永远知道如何正确的讯问，$INQUISITOR$把恐惧根植在那些间谍心里。$INQUISITOR$的现身本身就可以代表着敌人任务的失败。

original: $INQUISITOR_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ efforts will be admired throughout the nation.
$INQUISITOR_CAP_POSS_PRONOUN$ reputation will reach further than our borders.

Rumors have reached $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ about riches beyond the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ borders. Factions within $COUNTRY$ have been arguing that certain cities should rightfully belong to us. Or at least be sacked...
translation: $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$听到了关于国界另一边的$COUNTRY_ADJ$非常富有的传言.$COUNTRY$国内的各个派别已经进行了激烈的讨论，结论是该国的部分城市自古以来就是我们的固有领土.或者至少应该洗劫一遍...

original: Smaller realms should be ruled by $COUNTRY_ADJ$. We definitely need to expand the size of $COUNTRY$.
translation: 弱小的邻国应该接受$COUNTRY_ADJ$的统治。$COUNTRY$是时候开疆拓土了。

original: We have been way too long at peace, and that means that we are growing decadent. This is not the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ way, and some individuals have started to proclaim themselves are the new $MONARCHTITLE$.
translation: 我国承平已久，人民贪图安逸，尚武之风不再. 这不是$COUNTRY_ADJ$的道路，某些人开始宣称他们是新的$MONARCHTITLE$.

original: It is time to show strength

It is clearly a sign of weakness and decadence that we are letting our tribe fall into a long period of peace. Clearly $DYNASTY$ is no longer fit to rule $COUNTRY$ anymore. A new heir would be a bit more acceptable.
translation: 我们的部落陷入了长期的和平，这明显是软弱和颓废的标志。显然$DYNASTY$王朝不再适合统治$COUNTRY$了。一个新的继承人会更容易被接受。

original: The tribe is losing respect for $DYNASTY$

With the lack of a proper heir, and no battles to fight, the clansmen of $COUNTRY$ are spending way too much time considering if the house of $DYNASTY$ is truly a proper house to lead the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ forces.
translation: 由于没有合适的继承人，以及没有战争的威胁，$COUNTRY$的族人把太多时间花费在考虑$DYNASTY$家族是否是领导$COUNTRY_ADJ$的合适力量.

original: This has do be dealt with quickly
translation: 需要迅速的解决这个问题

original: $FROM$ has fallen to our forces, and $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ is allowing the troops to do as they like with the city. This is greatly increasing the popularity of him amongst the men.
translation: $FROM$落到了我们的军队手里，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$允许军队在这个城市中为所欲为.这使他赢得了军人的拥戴.

original: The armies of $CONTROLLERNAME$ have sacked $PROVINCENAME$, plundering it of its wealth.
translation: $CONTROLLERNAME$的军队洗劫了$PROVINCENAME$，抢走了它的财富.

original: The disputed succession of $HEIR$ has caused a Pretender to raise an army and march for the capital!
translation: 因$HEIR$继承王位而引发的争议，导致一个篡位者召集了一支军队，并向我们的首都进军!

original: Peasants are always superstitious, and the appearance of a comet in the sky has caused panic among our people. They are convinced that this is a sign that the end of times is near or that something bad is going to happen in the near future.
translation: 农民都是迷信的，当有扫帚星出现便足以引起恐慌. 他们认为这是末日的先兆，以为即将会有大祸临头.

original: I wish I lived in more enlightened times...
translation: 我希望生活在更开明的时代.......

original: Sacrifice a human heart to appease the comet!
translation: 献祭一颗活人心脏来驱逐彗星！

original: If only we had comet sense...
translation: 我们要是有对彗星的常识……

original: Oh Comet, devil's kith and kin...
translation: 啊，彗星，恶魔的亲朋好友……

original: In the year of our lord, $YEAR$, the most serene Augustus §Y$EMPERORNAME$§W, Romanorum Imperator, crowned by God, has again convened the Estates of the Holy Roman Empire. The Diet has agreed to a motion to centralize foreign policy and warfare by having all member states submit to a direct vassalage under the Emperor.
translation: 公元$YEAR$年，由上帝加冕的罗马皇帝，最开明的奥古斯都§Y$EMPERORNAME$§W，重新召开了神圣罗马帝国会议。会议通过了一项议案，加强了皇帝在外交和战争方面的权力，所有的成员国将向皇帝宣誓效忠，成为皇帝的直接附属。

original: The reform has been passed and our time as an independent country is no more. Our only choice is to submit to vassalage under the Emperor or turn against the Empire and fight it in a war.
translation: 改革已经通过了，我们不再是一个独立的国家了.我们唯一的选择就是效忠皇帝或者同他战斗.

original: He may take our lives, but he will never take our freedom.
translation: 他可能可以杀了我们，但夺不走我们的自由.

original: In the year of our lord, $YEAR$, the most serene Augustus §Y$EMPERORNAME$§W, Romanorum Imperator, crowned by God, has again convened the Estates of the Holy Roman Empire. The Diet has agreed to a motion to unite the disparate states of The Empire into a nation state and recrown the Emperor as its hereditary ruler.
translation: 公元$YEAR$年，由上帝加冕的罗马皇帝，最开明的奥古斯都§Y$EMPERORNAME$§W，重新召开了神圣罗马帝国会议。会议通过了一项议案，皇帝将再次加冕，所有的成员国将向皇帝宣誓效忠，成为一个统一的世袭制国家。

original: The reform has been passed and our time as a state is no more. As our provinces pass into the hands of the Emperor, we take comfort in being part of something greater.
translation: 改革已经通过了，我们不再是一个独立的国家了.在把我们的省份交接给皇帝的时候，我们由于成为了一个更加伟大的国家的一部分而感到欣慰.

original: Could her lips be any redder? Doubtful. Hollow, in the back of your mind, echo the cautioning words of priests and preachers. Is this what the sermons spoke of? The Devil in a woman's body, and the temptations of the flesh? Strange. As devils go, this one looks a lot like an angel. Either way, you'll have to bring this up in your confession on Sunday.
translation: 她的嘴唇敢再红一点儿么？不确定的迷茫使你陷入沉思，脑海中回响着神父和牧师告诫。这就是布道中所提到的？女人身体中蕴含的恶魔或是肉体的诱惑？好奇怪。其说是恶魔，这更像是一名天使。不管怎样，你都要在礼拜日的告解中将这个提出来。

original: The need of an heir goes before the need of forgiveness.
translation: 得到一位继承人要比获得救赎更重要。

original: Forgive me, Father, for I have sinned.
translation: 主，请原谅，我犯下的罪孽。
一个受宠爱的继承人死去了

original: A strange fever has claimed the life of your beloved heir, $HEIR$. As the court sheds its clothes for blacker garments, it strikes you what a frail and transient thing life can be. Just as your thoughts are about to turn to the eternal, a young maid catches your eye...
translation: 一场怪病夺取了你心爱的继承人，$HEIR$的生命。当廷臣为其脱下衣服换上丧服时，你体会到了生命是多么脆弱。就在你悲痛欲绝时，一个年轻的侍女吸引了你的目光……

original: In the arms of the Lord, I find solace.
translation: 上主的怀抱给予我慰藉。

original: In the arms of the maid, I find solace.
translation: 侍女的怀抱给予我慰藉。

original: '$MONARCH$,' $HEIR_S_PRONOUN$ says, $HEIR_ADJ$ sword pointing at you. 'Your rule has brought this nation to the brink of destruction, and shame to our family.' $HEIR_CAP_S_PRONOUN$ looks nervously at $HEIR_ADJ$ co-conspirators. An other-worldly sense of fatigue washes over you. Betrayal in your own midst?'
translation: 「$MONARCH$」$HEIR_S_PRONOUN$将$HEIR_ADJ$剑尖指向你说道。「你的暴政已使国家濒临毁灭，给家族带来无尽耻辱。」$HEIR_CAP_S_PRONOUN$紧张地看了看$HEIR_ADJ$同谋者。你突然感到看破红尘般的厌倦。我们中出了叛徒？
你这个被宠坏的小畜生！

original: The war has taken a heavy toll upon the mothers and wives of your nation, and as you pass this ragged old widow where she sits, her face buried deep in her palmed hands, your heir asks: 'Oh Father, why are all the women weeping?'
translation: 战争使你的国家的每一位母亲和妻子身背重负。当你走过一位衣衫褴褛的老寡妇，她将脸深埋于手掌之中，你的继承人问道：「父皇，她们为何哭泣？」

original: They are all weeping for their men...
translation: 她们都在为了她们的丈夫与儿子哭泣……

original: She giggles. - 'Your majesty...', she says. You look at her. Her beauty is unmatched in your realm, and even in realms beyond yours. You say nothing. Spring is in the air, and as you lean in toward her, with the intoxicating scent of her perfume painfully present, a thought crosses your mind...
translation: 她咯咯地笑着说. - '哦，陛下...'. 你凝视着她.她的美貌在你的国家，甚至邻国都极为罕有. 你沉默不语.春意盎然，当你倾身向前，鼻腔里充满她飘散的香水味时，一个念头出现在你脑中...
只是用来讨价还价的筹码而已...

original: The chandeliers blaze shadows and light across the grand ball room of your palace, and the music of a hundred dancing violins fills the air. 'Your Majesty!', 'Your Excellency!', 'My $MONARCHTITLE$!', the foreign guests and local dignitaries greet you. Everywhere is conversation, laughter, discussion, and the breathing, pulsating rhythm of life. Your eyes gaze across the assembled myriads. Who should you talk to tonight?'
translation: 水晶吊灯在宫殿的圆形大厅投射出交织的光与影，一百把小提琴奏出的音乐充斥着空气. '陛下!'，'阁下!'，'$MONARCHTITLE$!'，外国客人和本国显贵都向你致敬. 四周充斥着谈话，笑声，讨论，还有呼吸声，汇成生命的旋律. 你凝视着人群.今夜你要和谁交谈？'

original: The heir, [Root.Heir.GetName], breathes heavily. $HEIR_CAP_S_PRONOUN$ has been lying in bed for three days now, and reflected in the beads of sweat on $HEIR_ADJ$ forehead is the fear in $HEIR_ADJ$ attendant's eyes for [Root.Heir.GetName]'s life. [Root.Heir.GetName] might not make it through the night unless something is done.
translation: 继承人[Root.Heir.GetName]呼吸沉重。$HEIR_CAP_S_PRONOUN$至今已卧床三日，在$HEIR_ADJ$前额的汗珠上反射出$HEIR_ADJ$侍从为[Root.Heir.GetName]的性命担忧的眼睛。得做点什么，不然[Root.Heir.GetName]可能活不过今晚了。
去请一个训练有素的医生来.

original: Suddenly something startles the animal and, before you have time to fire, it is long gone. You look around you. The water in the small creek reflects the sunlight of a perfect day, and the reeds wave slowly before a light breeze. Is that laughter? You realize now what had startled the animal. In a cradle, floating among the reeds, lies a laughing little boy. Judging by his smile, you'd say that he has never known fear in his life.
translation: 突然什么东西惊吓到了你的猎物，在你开枪之前它就跑远了。你看了看你身边。天气很好，小溪中水光粼粼，芦苇随着微风轻轻摇动。忽然你听到一声轻笑。你意识到到底是什么惊吓到了你的猎物。在摇曳的芦苇丛中飘荡着一个摇篮，里面躺着一个笑嘻嘻的小男孩。通过他的笑容可以判断，他还不曾知道害怕为何物。

original: The proud banners of our nation flutter in the wind, and gilded trumpets blow four blast salutes, honoring our equestrian elites. The air is filled with the smells of roasted almonds, horses and intrigue. Our cultural and military prominence are truly boons to our nation, and nowhere is this fact more real than here today. How do you wish to spend your day at the tournament?
translation: 我国的国旗在风中飘扬，镀金的小号吹响了四次礼乐，来向我们的马术精英致敬. 空气中充满了烤杏仁，马和阴谋的味道. 我们的文化和军事精英是上帝对我国真正的恩赐，这一事实在今时今日前所未有的体现出来. 你希望怎样过你的这一天？
夸耀一下我们的文化成就。

original: $HEIR_CAP_ADJ$ body has been draped, by whom you do not know, in a white cloth now stained red by $HEIR_ADJ$ lost vitae. They say $HEIR_S_PRONOUN$ was found by $HEIR_ADJ$ horse, in a clearing in the woods. You know the place they speak of. $HEIR_CAP_ADJ$ face is calm, almost serene. You reach out to touch $HEIR_O_PRONOUN$. The terrible reality of the situation dawns on you. The cold you feel is that of death.
translation: $HEIR_CAP_ADJ$身体已经被谁用布遮盖上了，白色的布已被$HEIR_ADJ$鲜血染红。侍从们说$HEIR_S_PRONOUN$是被$HEIR_ADJ$马在一片树林中的空地上发现的。你知道他们说的那个地方。$HEIR_CAP_ADJ$脸很平静，甚至可以说是安详的。直到你伸出手去轻轻抚摸$HEIR_O_PRONOUN$，你才意识到了现实的残酷，感觉到了冰冷的死亡。

original: The first time you brush it off, but when it happens a second and a third time, you do begin to wonder. Why are people laughing at you when they think you can't hear them? After you've asked around, for more than a bit, you finally manage to get an answer out of a chamber maid. It appears that your heir has been running about town in a most unchristian fashion, and that your family is now becoming the laughing stock of Europe.
translation: 一开始你不在意，但是当事情一而再再而三的发生，你的确产生了怀疑。为什么你的人民在背后嘲笑你？ 你一再向左右追问，终于从一个侍女那里得到了答案。似乎你的继承人到处游历，完全不像一个基督徒应有的样子，你的家族已经成为全欧洲的笑柄。

original: The settlement policy we have enacted in this province seems to have been met with success. With the province safely within our cultural sphere, we can now end the policy.
translation: 本省推行的移民政策似乎获得了成功. 随着本省人民对我国文化的理解. 我们可以终止这一政策了.

original: Seizing power? Certainly not. This is simply a normal assumption of the executive office, as laid out in form 32B, on the administration of the Kingdom, whitepaper 48:53-D, on the transfer of power under certain circumstances, as modified by protective clauses 3, 8 and 12b, law 48-9 and edict 3W-4. What is there not to understand? Your majesty has signed all of them.
translation: 抓紧权力不放？ 当然不是. 这只是简单的代行职权措施，根据王国行政白皮书第，48:53-D，的32B条款，在特定情况下进行权利交接，再根据保护条款第 3，第8 和 12b款，以及律法 48-9 条和第 3W-4 号皇室敕令进行修正. 还有什么不明白的吗？ 陛下您可亲自签署了那些条例啊.

original: Well... yes... Yes this does seem to be all in good order.

...meanwhile, in another country, a different branch of the $DYNASTY$ family is in dire straits. With their country destabilized, they now struggle to cling on to power. If we do not help them now, their situation might worsen significantly. What is the best course of action?
translation: ...与此同时，在另外一个国家，$DYNASTY$家族的旁支面临困境.由于国家的不稳定，他们正在艰难的守护着权力.如果我们不从现在开始帮助他们的话，他们的情势会变得更糟.怎样做是最好的？

original: I already gave at the office, brother.
translation: 兄弟，我已经提出官方干涉了.

original: Sic oculos, sic ille manus, sic ora ferebat! The $YEAR$ graduating class at $PROVINCENAME$ University is exceptional. As the graduation festivities die down, whole classes of fresh graduates report for duty across the country. Where shall we direct them?
translation: 容光焕发，器宇轩昂！$YEAR$届毕业生已经从$PROVINCENAME$大学毕业。随着毕业典礼的结束，全国各地的应届毕业生都开始求职。我们要怎么安排他们？

original: The veined marble is of the finest $COUNTRY_ADJ$ quality. In the cool display room at the $PROVINCENAME$ Fine Arts Academy, it seems almost alive. Life inspires art, but you know in your heart that this particular piece of art has outdone all sources of original inspiration. The feeling that rushes through you as you touch it is almost sacrilegious.
translation: 这是一块$COUNTRY_ADJ$出产的最好的带有纹理的大理石.在$PROVINCENAME$美术学院的凉爽展厅内，它看上去栩栩如生.生活是艺术的来源，但是你知道在你的心目中，这件艺术品带给你无与伦比的感动.当你触摸它的时候你甚至感到这是一种亵渎.

original: The common heritage of mankind is richer for it
translation: 这是人类社会的共有遗产

original: Well. That was fun. Sell it
translation: 好吧.这很有趣.卖掉它吧.

original: '...and thus it must be,' he looks out across the crowd assembled in the grand lecture hall at $PROVINCENAME$ University, '...that we come to the aid of our country now, in its time of need, as it has always come to ours, in our times of need. The pen is mightier than the sword, they say. I do not know if that is the case, but if it is... then $COUNTRY$ need not fear. Long live $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$! Long live $COUNTRY$!' Jubilant are the cheers when the students, as one man, march off to join the army.
translation: ...因此，就应该如此去做，他眺望着聚集在$PROVINCENAME$大学讲堂大厅的人群，'...现在是我们报效国家的时候了，国家需要我们，就像我们需要国家一样.枪杆子不如笔杆子，他们说.我不知道事实是否如此，但是如果真的是这样的话...那么就没必要畏惧$COUNTRY$.$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$万岁！$COUNTRY$万岁！' 学生们齐声欢呼，前去参军.

original: March this flower of youth off to war
translation: 让战争带走这些花一样的青春

original: War is no excuse to drop out of school!

The $HEIR_DYNASTY$s have been nothing but bad news ever since they ascended to the throne. If you were to ask me, and I think you should, these good times are nothing but a sign, from almighty God himself, that my regency holds divine favor. With God on my side, I shall, therefore, assume the throne for myself. Good Night, Sweet Prince.'
translation: $DYNASTY$家族自从获得王位之后就没有什么好消息. 如果你问我怎么办，我觉得你应该想想，那些好的事情都是，万能的神给我们的预示，说明我的摄政获得了神的喜爱. 因为神站在我这边，我应该，由此，自己去接受王位. 晚安，我可爱的小王子. '
你这叛徒，给我去挖矿吧!

original: The thread of fate is fickle, and balances on the razor's edge between the sublime and the eternal. Fickle, are the vagaries of destiny. Jupiter ascendant, and the moon is in the seventh house. Who he is, I do not know, but the stars foretell that a man born to a royal house on this day, shall one day be the ruler of a mighty kingdom.' Thus the astrologer spoke. Today, the Queen gave birth to a child.
translation: 命运之线总是变幻莫测，在荣誉和永恒的锋利边缘维持着平衡. 莫测的，是命运的狂想. 木星的星位，和月亮都在第七宫内. 我不知道，他是谁，但是星象预示了今日在皇宫内诞生的一个孩子，有朝一日将会成为一个强大王国的国王. ' 占星师如是说. 今日，王后刚生下了一个孩子.
我应该为他起名为亚历山大
我要给他取名为伊斯坎德尔
我要给他取名为锡根德尔
这个孩子将冠以“成吉思汗”之名
我要给他取名为古恩纳尔
我要给他起名为奥伊佐特
我要给他起名为帕查库特克
我要给他起名为德坎纳维达
我要给他起名为卢辛达
我要给他起名为卡西凯
我要给他起名为鲁斯坦姆
我要给他取名为锡根德尔
这个孩子将冠以“阿育王”之名
他的名字将是伊兹柯阿特尔
他的名字将是维拉科查

original: Sire! Sire!' the herald doesn't even attempt to hide his excitement. 'Great news!'. 'A son of our family is next in line to the [marriage_policy_paid_off_here.GetAdjective] throne!'
translation: 「陛下！陛下！」这位传令官难掩他的兴奋之情说道：「真是天大的好消息呀！我们家族的一位王子成为下一任[marriage_policy_paid_off_here.GetAdjective]王位的第一继承人！」

original: All is as it must be.
It seems that the government that governs the least governs the best as far as those outside the capital are concerned. Our non-involvement has proved beneficial, and the local economy is booming.
translation: 善政需无为的思想似乎在首都以外的人群中流传甚广。 我们的不干涉政策卓有成效，国内经济也蓬勃发展。

original: They can do things on their own...?
Our family in $FROMCOUNTRY$ have sent us aid in this troubled time.
translation: 我们家族在$FROMCOUNTRY$的分支在我们困难的时候送来了援助

original: Our kith and kin, our own flesh and blood, in $FROMCOUNTRY$ have declared that they have no intention of coming to our aid in our time of trouble. May God have mercy on their souls.
translation: 我们的亲戚在$FROMCOUNTRY$宣布他们没有在我们的困难时期援助我们的打算.愿主怜悯他们的灵魂.
一个不团结的家族将不会长久

original: Despite our promises to maintain sound monetary policies, we have debased our currency. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Ducat is now being dumped in banks and merchant houses around the world, and the value of it is sinking faster than a scurvy-ridden, rat-infested galley in a typhoon.
translation: 尽管我们曾承诺会保持坚挺的货币，但我们还是得让它贬值. $COUNTRY_ADJ$的金币已经被各国的银行和商人们所抛弃，它的价值正在狂跌.

original: But I was only printing a little!
translation: 我才印了一点点钞票而已!

original: The transformation of this nation's government is unconstitutional and unlawful. We demand the restoration of the Constitutional Monarchy.'
translation: 这个国家的政府转换是不合法的，我们要求重新建立君主立宪制

original: Why don't you forget about that.
translation: 为什么你总记着这些小事

original: Well, when you put it that way...
translation: 好吧，既然你这么看的话...

original: Things are slowly returning to normal in $COUNTRY$. These days, it is almost safe to profess religious belief, or even support for a non-decimal calendar. The sleep of reason gives birth to demons, but the cult to father most demons may very well have been that whose expressed purpose was the worship of reason.
translation: $COUNTRY$ 的人民的生活正在渐渐恢复原状，在那些日子里信奉其他信仰甚至支持其他的日历都是十分安全的. 当理智沉睡的时候会产生恶魔，但是当理智觉醒的时候会比恶魔更可怕

original: Maybe it is for the best

Twilight is always the worst. The clouds racing circles across moonless skies, cruel stars suspended like grains of broken glass, and chandeliers throwing strange shadows across the Royal Chambers. Lately, a strange sense has come upon you that there is something wrong with the place. The geometry of it seems... unsound. Thinking back... it all started with the birth of $HEIR$.
translation: 黄昏总是最糟糕的时间，没有月亮的天空飘着环状的云，残星就如碎玻璃一样布满天空，吊灯在房间内投射出奇怪的阴影. 之后，人们总会有一股奇怪的，不对劲的感觉. 这图像看上去总是有一股.... 腐烂的样子. 回想起来，这一切都开始于$HEIR$出生之后

original: All work and no play, makes $MONARCH$ a dull, dull boy.
translation: 总是工作而不娱乐，即使是聪明的 $MONARCH$ 也变傻了

original: Lord God our Father, thou who art in heaven!

My $MONARCHTITLE$...' you sense instantly that there is something wrong. There is something in his voice, right below the surface. Hidden contempt, and fear. '...the new brick wall in the eastern cellar. It wasn't built for insulation, was it?' You remember it clearly now. How small the body felt. Carrying it down into the damp cellar, laying the bricks. It made you sick. Sick to the core. Killing your progeny wasn't the catharsis you had expected it to be. For an instant, the flashing glimpse of an insight blows across your mind...
translation: “我的殿下$MONARCHTITLE$...”，你立即察觉到有什么不对劲。在他的声音之下影藏着轻蔑与恐惧。“...东边地窖中的新建的砖墙，那之后没有藏了什么东西吧？ ”你全都记起来了，身体感觉起来多么小呀，放在潮湿的空间内，躺在砖上。那让你觉得发自内心的疾病感。杀死你的子孙并不是你预料之中的发泄。在那一瞬间，有什么东西在你的脑中闪过...

original: The Royal Chamber is a swirling mist of scents and shapes, coming and going into and out of existence like colorful snowflakes. You are hungry. So very hungry. As if you hadn't eaten in months. The stars looking down on you, still suspended in a moonless sky, laugh and dance. They seem free, and wild. There is something about those stars. They seem so... right. You have gone quite insane.
translation: 宫廷中充满了时有时无的古怪气氛. 你非常饥饿.就像一个月没吃过东西一样饥饿. 残星残星在无月的天空中嘲笑着你，又笑又闪.他们看起来又自由又狂野.  那儿有一些关于 这些星星的一些东西. 她们看起来如此的...嗯.你已经变的相当疯狂了.

original: Not by the hair of my chiny-chin-chin!
translation: 那与我的我的血亲继承人无关!

original: I'd give my god-damned soul for just a glass of beer.
translation: 我愿意用我被诅咒的灵魂去换一杯啤酒

original: Maybe it is for the best

Sire...', again the advisor interrupts you, their furrowed brow telling tall tales of concern and sleepless nights. '... the succession does not secure itself, your majesty...' On they go. This dusty old study, and your advisor's dry voice resonating of boredom and wasted potential, accentuates the brightness of the clear day outside. '...which is why it is of vital importance that...' - Doesn't they ever stop? 'In nature', you find yourself saying in interruption. 'the first step, leading an animal into the grave, is always procreation.' You're not sure if you believe it, only that there is nothing in their voice to convince you that marriage is preferable to the promise of a clear sky.
translation: 「陛下……」顾问又一次打断了你，他们紧锁着眉头，谈论令人担忧的传言和不眠之夜。「……继承并不能保证其本身，陛下……」声音持续着。这个布满灰尘的书房和顾问回荡的喑哑都那么令人厌倦，屋外的阳光更加明媚了。「……之所以它最重要……」他们能不能闭上嘴？「本质上，」你发现自己被打断。「动物走向死亡的第一步是繁育。」你不确定是否相信他们所说的，他们的声音中没有什么让你相信婚姻比外面的晴天更好。

original: Nevermind. Nature always finds its course.
translation: 没关系，船到桥头自然直。

original: While it is not uncommon among a certain type of young men to wish to remain outside the inevitable bonds of wedlock, the bonds are inevitable nevertheless. Looking out from your eagle's perch, you have spotted prey. The ruler of this foreign country has for a long time been postponing his marriage, and his throne lacks a secure succession. This might be the perfect time to form a dynastic bond between our countries. Should we dispatch an embassy to try to marry one of our dynasty's young girls into this foreign royal house?
translation: 虽然一些年轻人希望保持婚姻之外的关系，但婚姻是不可避免的。从鹰的栖木向下望去，你锁定了猎物。外国的君主长期推迟婚姻，他的位置缺少继承人。这可能是两国形成王室纽带的最佳时间。我们要遣使和亲吗？

original: We have better things to do.
translation: 我们还有更重要的事要做。

original: A rose from a foreign land

The ruler of $FROMCOUNTRY$ has sent you a painting, depicting a young girl in his court. Her eyes are green, her hair is black, and your eyes are drawn to the painting as if to a vacuum. A cunning smile find its way to your advisor's face. The noise of the room dies down. You do not know how long you stand there looking. She is beautiful.
translation: $FROMCOUNTRY$的君主给您送来了一幅女孩的画像，她有着碧绿的眼珠和乌黑的长发，深深吸引了你的眼球。你的顾问脸上浮现出一丝狡黠的微笑。万籁俱寂，你盯着她，不知过了多久。她真漂亮！

original: What is this foul witchcraft? Begone!
A thorn from a foreign land

While the poor quality of the painting might explain away some of it, the fact remains that The Creator was not being overly generous when he endowed this girl with her looks. The ruler of $FROMCOUNTRY$ has offered her hand in marriage, and you are not sure if you should laugh or feel insulted. Then again, there is the succession to consider.
translation: 画像上画得实在是不怎么样，上帝对那个女孩也非慷慨。$FROMCOUNTRY$的君主希望您能和她结婚，这真让人哭笑不得。不过，这也是继承领土的好机会。
她是一个不错的$COUNTRY_RELIGION$姑娘，我确信。

original: 'Our last war was an abject failure, and you know it!', the anger in your heir's voice is unmistakable. True, mistakes were made during the war, but all of them were hardly yours. Besides, $HEIRNAME$ also commanded troops. 'I believe it is time for you to retire.' 'The audacity...'
translation: 「我们上一场战争是一个悲惨的失败，你是知道的！」你继承人的声音中的愤怒是显然的。诚然，战争中确实有了失误，但那些都不能归咎于你，而且$HEIRNAME$也在指挥军队。「我觉得你应该退休了，父亲。」「大胆……」

original: I will not be met with insolence in my own house!
translation: 我绝不容忍如此大逆不道的行为！

original: The garden is bathed in the cool light of a full moon. Turning a corner to come across this sight was not what you had expected, but here it is. Before you stands a monument to $RANDOM_OLD_WAR$. The beauty lies not in the exquisite marble, or even in the craftsmanship of the thing, but in the fact that even now, many years later, the monument is still strewn with thousands and thousands of fresh flowers. Here, if nowhere else, the memory of $RANDOM_OLD_WAR$, and the memories of the fallen, still lives.
translation: 花园沐浴在满月的冷光下。转过角落，你见到了一个意想不到的东西，你站在了$RANDOM_OLD_WAR$的纪念碑前。它的美丽之处并不是它那精美的大理石，也不是其精巧的技艺，而是在这么多年只有依旧有千千万万朵鲜花环绕着它。$RANDOM_OLD_WAR$与沦陷的记忆依旧在人们的脑海中。

original: Our sorrow proves the justness of our cause.
translation: 我们的悲伤之心证明了我们的正义

original: She turns around. She looks at you. - 'Have you prayed lately, $MONARCH$?' The question underscores the distance between you that, for the past year, has been growing. - 'I think you should. I do. Almost every night.' You laugh. For all her human flaws she is still your wife. She draws closer, the hint of a smile spreading across her face. - 'What are you laughing at, $MONARCH$'?
translation: 她转过身来看着你。「后来您去祈祷过了吗，$MONARCH$？」这个问题反映出你与她之间在这几年渐渐拉开的距离。「我认为您应该去，我几乎每晚都会祈祷。」你笑了起来。毕竟她是你的妻子。她走近，微笑着看着你的脸。「您在笑什么呢，$MONARCH$？」

original: I just realized how much you mean to me.
translation: 我才知道你对我有多么重要啊。

original: The economy is doing laughably good! Haha!
translation: 现在经济增速让人高兴呀！啊哈哈！

original: With traitor armies raising their flags in rebellion across our empire, $LIKELYREBELS$ Rebels think they can smell blood in the water and have joined the other malcontents in revolt.
translation: 随着叛乱在我国风起云涌，$LIKELYREBELS$ 叛军认为他们嗅到了深渊的血臭，联合了其他叛乱者。

original: Our monarch has died, and considering the strange things he was saying toward the end of his life, perhaps it is for the better.
translation: 我们的君主驾崩了，由于他晚年的古怪行为，这或许对大家是好事。
愿他的灵魂能进入天堂

original: With our reputation, our neighbors think we are the spawn of the Devil and are all plotting our downfall. $LIKELYREBELS$ conspirators are spreading lies and igniting rebel sentiment in $PROVINCENAME$...
translation: 由于我们的名声，我们的邻国认为我们是邪恶的诞生地，它们都想通过阴谋诡计来让我们国家衰落。$LIKELYREBELS$阴谋家正在$PROVINCENAME$散布谎言并挑起叛乱……

original: The citizens of Venice want their independence back.
translation: 威尼斯公民要求恢复独立。

original: Close contact with settlers, traders and missionaries has influenced our population to such an extent that they are gradually giving up their old religious faith and are converting their customs and beliefs.
translation: 与移民，商人和传教士的密切接触影响到了这一地区的人民. 他们渐渐的放弃了旧的宗教，转变了生活习俗和宗教信仰.

original: Honor the beliefs of our ancestors

Close contact with settlers, traders and missionaries has influenced our population to such an extent that they are gradually giving up their old religious faith and are converting their customs and beliefs.
translation: 与移民，商人和传教士的密切接触影响到了这一地区的人民. 他们渐渐的放弃了旧的宗教，转变了生活习俗和宗教信仰.

original: Honor the beliefs of our ancestors
Civil War Brings our Nation to its Knees
translation: 内战击垮了我们的国家

original: Political conflicts have tormented our nation for far too long. We are at an evolutionary standstill and drastic measures must be taken to reclaim our nation's prominence and put an end to the infighting before it is too late.
translation: 政治冲突使我们的国家陷入了长久的痛苦. 我们正处在发展停滞的状态，必须施行严格的法律来恢复国家的威严，并在一切变得太迟之前结束内部的争斗.

original: There is nothing we can do
Start negotiations to minimize the damage
translation: 开始谈判以使损失最小化

original: Minor political conflicts have tormented our nation for some time now. We are at an evolutionary standstill and drastic measures must be taken to reclaim our nation's prominence and put an end to the infighting before it is too late.
translation: 小规模政治冲突已经使我们的国家陷入一段时间的困境了. 我们正处在发展停滞的状态，必须施行严格的法律来恢复国家的威严，并在一切变得太迟之前结束内部的争斗.

original: There is nothing we can do
We will stop this at any cost
translation: 我们将不惜一切代价阻止这一切

original: In the midst of the ongoing chaos small but powerful factions have emerged and each one of them is trying to gain the upper hand by swaying important nobles from our court to side with them and their cause.
translation: 在正在持续的混乱中，小而有力的政治派系纷纷涌现. 它们之中的每一个都在试图通过争取我们宫廷中举足轻重的贵族对他们和他们的主张的支持来取得优势.
政治派系要求经济援助

original: The war chest is beginning to run low for several of the combatants and as a result some are asking for financial support. If we invest our money wisely our favored faction may be able to overcome the other opponents and put and end to the turmoil.
translation: 几个参战派别的战争资金就要消耗光了，因此它们正在寻求财政援助.如果我们精明的使用我们的金钱进行投资，我们倾向的阵营将有可能战胜对手，并结束这场混乱.
倾向的派别威胁要搞分裂

original: It has come to our attention that an individual of unknown origin has managed to sway the opinions of the leader of our favored faction. As a consequence we are now facing two new groups thirsting for individual power instead of one.
translation: 我们注意到某个不明身份的人成功动摇了我们倾向的派别的领导人的想法。由此引发的后果是我们现在面对的是两个新的渴望个人权力的组织，而不是一个。

original: Side with one of the new factions
Summon the faction leaders to begin negotiations
translation: 召集派系领袖们开始谈判

original: What initially began as minor clashes between different factions has turned into pure mayhem. We don't have much time to turn this around, if we are to act this is the time or our nation will likely crumble before us.
translation: 不同派别之间最初看上去微不足道的冲突，现在已经变成了彻头彻尾的骚乱.我们没有太多的时间去改变这个局势，如果我们要采取行动的话那就马上开始，否则我们的国家很可能分崩离析.

original: We can't do anything about it
Try to suppress the worst spots
translation: 试着去阻止最坏的事发生

original: The chaos that has engulfed our neighbor is slowly creeping closer to our own borders. You would think that they would be able to handle their own petty problems but apparently that is not the case. Should we try to help them?
translation: 吞噬邻国的混乱正慢慢的蔓延到我们的国境.你本以为他们可以自行解决他们自己的小问题，但是事实并非如此.我们是不是应该帮帮他们？

original: We can't afford to help them
translation: 我们没有力量帮助他们
仅仅确保我们的边界安全

original: Secure our own borders and send aid
translation: 确保我们的边界安全并送去援助
我们的国家已经土崩瓦解了

original: The strong disagreement between different political groups has splintered our nation into several smaller fragments. Unification seems unlikely at the moment but we shouldn't give up so easily.
translation: 不同政治派别之间的分歧将我们国家分裂成几个碎片.统一思想在目前来看似乎是不可能的，但是我们不应该轻易的放弃尝试.

original: Consolidate our forces and forget about them
translation: 增强我们的实力，然后忘了他们

original: We will have our revenge someday
translation: 总有一天我们会回来的

original: The conflict has taken a most unexpected turn, some of the smaller factions have increased their power and influence immensely during the past few weeks. These groups could pose a serious threat if not handled carefully.
translation: 在冲突中已经发生了一个最让人预料不到的情况. 在过去的几个星期里，一些小派系极大的增强了他们的实力和影响. 如果不小心处理，这些组织会造成严重的威胁.

original: Negotiate a settlement between all major factions
translation: 在所有大派系之间达成妥协

original: The strong and vocal will of each faction makes negotiation talks almost impossible. To make matters worse their pride seems to rule over common sense more often than not.
translation: 让各派系重新回到谈判桌上似乎是不可能的. 他们时常让骄傲来支配他们的常识，这使得局面大大恶化.

original: After several months of negotiations all involved parties finally seem to have come to a conclusive agreement. A time of peace now finally lays before us...or does it?
translation: 在几个月的谈判后，所有参与的党派达成了最终的协议. 和平终于降临了，希望如此.

original: Make changes to the fine print
A Bailiff in one of our provinces has earned a reputation as a greedy and cruel person. The local populace have gathered a petition to have him removed.
translation: 我国某省的执行官有贪婪残暴的名声，当地的群众发起请愿让他下台。

original: Rumors talk about several priests who have been preaching a heresy which is clearly against our one true faith. The local populace seem to follow their words, and this may become troublesome in the future.
translation: 传言几名传教士正在传播异端邪说，公然反对我们的真正信仰。当地民众看起来被他们的言语所蛊惑，这将来可能会引发麻烦。

original: Concerned about spiraling inflation, your government strongly advises you to abandon the old coinage and begin using a new, more stable currency. While beneficial in the long run, this would immediately cause severe unrest in your country, along with a loss of prestige.
translation: 为防止螺旋上升的通货膨胀，政府强烈建议你放弃旧币，使用更加稳定的货币。这会在国内立即引起严重的动荡、造成威望损失，但可以换来长期收益。

original: In periods of prosperity and peace, while people were happy and secure, there was a tendency for them to gradually become less productive and lazier over time.
translation: 在繁荣与和平的时期，人民幸福安定。随着时间的推移，人们有一种逐渐低效和懒散的趋向。

original: Opposing factions in the military are advocating different tactics. We need to back one of them, to end the bickering.
translation: 军中两派主张不同的战术而对立。我们需要支持其中一方来结束这场争端。

original: The $MONARCHTITLE$ committed an absolute faux pas today in front of the court and a few foreign dignitaries. The repercussions of this will take years to repair.
translation: $MONARCHTITLE$今天在宫廷和一些外国达官显贵面前完全有失礼仪，这次事件的影响将要耗费数年来恢复。

original: The state has lived off the contribution of the nobles for a long period of the time. Now the country is doing well, so the nobility is eager to get their cut of the cake.
translation: 国家靠贵族的贡献支撑了很长时间，现在国家走上正轨，贵族希求他们那一块蛋糕。

original: Our treasurers are arguing that we need to enact some reforms in our economic policies. A new master of mint will also be needed to take care of the economy.
translation: 我们的财务官都认为，我们需要改革一些经济政策，并需要一位新铸币顾问管理经济。

original: There is no need for reforms.
Our realm has been ravaged by war, and the people, from the highest noble down to the poorest serf, are tired of it. We need to enact some temporary laws to let our country recover quicker.
translation: “我们的国土被战争所破坏，上到地位至高的贵族下到最穷苦的农奴都已经对战争感到厌烦.我们需要颁布一些临时性法律让我们的国家恢复得更快.”

original: Our recent wars have given the rise to competent leaders, even from the peasant stock. We could prosper from their skills, or we could reject them as they, after all, are not noble. Accepting them may upset factions in our country though.
translation: “我们最近的战争产生了富有才干的领导者，甚至有出身自农民阶层的.我们能够因他们的技术而繁荣昌盛，或者我们拒绝他们因为他们终究不是贵族出身.接受他们可能会让我们国家的派系感到不安.”

original: The only thing that can truly create a good commander at sea is the experience of being at sea. Competent people can be promoted, and this is what creates a strong navy. However, some factions in the country truly dislike such egalitarianism.
translation: 只有一件事能真正培养出优秀的海上指挥官，那就是在海上的经验. 人才能被提拔，才能建立强大海军. 然而，国内一些派别很讨厌这样的机会均等.

original: A cabin boy can become Captain!
translation: 一名船上的服务生成为了船长！

original: $MONARCH$ has fallen ill, and cannot handle all aspects of ruling $COUNTRY$ for the time being. How shall we handle this?
translation: $MONARCH$已病倒，暂且不能处理$COUNTRY$所有的国务。我们应如何处理这种状况？

original: Local Nobles are not satisfied with their granted privileges. They demand more rights, and are willing to back this up with a rebellion against the $MONARCHTITLE$.
translation: 本地贵族并不满足于他们已被给予的特权。他们需要更多的权利，并且有意支持一场叛乱反对$MONARCHTITLE$。
给他们更多的地方行政权利.

original: Clergy condemns a philosopher as heretic!
translation: 教士判决一名哲学家是异教徒！

original: A prominent natural philosopher is forwarding new claims that contradict religious truths. The clergy demands that he be stopped and turned over for punishment. Either way, this will cause great turmoil in the realm.
translation: 一个杰出的自然哲学家正在提出新的主张，否认宗教的真实性. 牧师要求这位科学家停止传播他的学说并惩罚.不管结果如何。在这个领域已经引起了很大混乱.

original: It seems as if serfs are moving out of the provinces and aim to earn a living in the capital. This is creating turmoil in the country, but our capital may benefit in the long run.
translation: 似乎农奴更倾向于从地方省份迁出，去首都谋生。这会对国家造成动荡，但我们的首都可从中受惠。

original: The serfs belong on their turf.
translation: 农奴应被束缚在农田上。

original: Some sort of propaganda text is circulating in the court about how $MONARCH$ is a ruthless powermonger. This might impact our relations with other countries.
translation: 某种形式的宣传文字正在宫廷中流传，描述$MONARCH$是一个如何无情的权力贩子。这可能会影响我们与其他国家的关系。

original: We have managed to produce very legitimate documents which show that we have a historical claim on one of their provinces!
translation: 我们设法制造了非常正统合法的文件，证明历史上拥有他们的一个省份的宣称权！

original: The nobility of $COUNTRY$ is up in arms over our decision to limit their privileges and have vowed to stop us. Perhaps we should have considered this before taking action.
translation: $COUNTRY$ 的贵族正进行武装斗争，因为我们的决议限制了他们的权利，他们发誓必须阻止我们. 也许我们应该在采取行动之前深思熟虑.

original: Strengthening the burghers and merchants at the cost of the gentry lessens our prestige in the eyes of the world. We are losing face, and risk becoming a nation of greedy moneygrubbers.
translation: 增加中产阶级和商人地位的代价，就是减少我们在贵族中的威望. 在世人的目光中，我们很丢面子，并且有变成一个贪婪的守财奴国度的危险.

original: When the position of burghers and merchants is strengthened in a country, there will be more competent people available for state duty. Sometimes a country can benefit even from the talents of the common folk.
translation: 当一个国家中产阶级和商人的地位得到加强，将有更多的人才可以为国家效力. 有时候，国家甚至能够受益于出身卑贱的人.

original: One Great Man will serve us!
translation: 一个伟人将有利于我们

original: This strengthening of the privileges of the nobles is severely upsetting the burghers and merchants. This is creating turmoil in our realm, and may prove disastrous in the long run.
translation: “这项贵族政治的强化特权使市民和商人严重不安.我们的国家产生了动荡，并且长期来看可能会被证明是灾难性的.”

original: The Burghers are rising against the changes in our country, which have limited their powers. Clearly, they are not happy with having the privileges of the nobility strengthened.
translation: 每当限制其权利的时候，我国的中产阶级都会反对这些改变. 很明显，他们不乐意看到贵族特权进一步加强.

original: With the increased privileges of the aristocracy come additional duties. A true nobleman is expected to serve in the army as an officer and a gentleman.
translation: 随着贵族们的特权提高带来了额外的税收.真正的贵族被期望作为军官与绅士在军中服役.

original: Our decision to strengthen the state at the cost of regional interests has left a bit of a gap in local politics. Since there are no local potentates to tell them everything is fine, the people have started to believe they are being badly governed.
translation: 我们决定加强国家政权，代价为地方政府会失去一些政治活动方面的兴趣. 由于没有本地官员和他们的沟通，人们已开始相信他们正受到更糟糕的统治.

original: Although we are well aware that no one likes paying taxes, you would think that people would have the sense to realize that glorious victories on the battlefield require a little more taxation. It seems we will have to explain it to them.
