translation: “尽管我们十分清楚没有人喜欢缴付税金，但是你要考虑人民将意识到战场上的光荣胜利需要更多的征税.看起来应该让他们搞清楚这点.”

original: In order to ensure the glory of our country we have had to restrict local privileges. The problem with privileges is that people get very attached to them for sentimental reasons. Now, some power hungry idiot has declared himself the true ruler of our country, and many hopefuls flock to his banner because he has promised to restore local privileges.
translation: 为了确保我们的国家的荣誉，我们不得不限制地方权力. 问题是，人们因为感情非常重视他们的特权. 现在，一些被权利欲冲昏头脑的白痴已经宣布自己才是我国真正的统治者，许多人聚集到他的旗下，因为他已承诺恢复当地的特权.

original: One of our local provincial governors has skilfully used his authority to increase the tax base in his province.
translation: 一位当地省长已经很娴熟地利用他的权力来增加税收基数.

original: Our decision to ensure that local privileges will be honored has meant that peasants are keen to defend their villages. This in turn has the added benefit of people being less resentful about serving in our military.
translation: 我们承诺保证本地特权的决定意味着农民们将热切地保卫他们的村庄.那些心甘情愿在军中服役的人们的额外利益都指望着这个了.

original: Our decision to give more power to local magnates has ensured that people of importance feel good about our government. So, they have been telling everyone else how well they are being governed.
translation: 我们决定给地方权贵更多的权力，确保重要的人们对我们政府感到满意。因此，他们一直在告诉其他人他们受到了多好的统治。

original: One of the good things about serfdom is that by ensuring that peasants cannot move around they become easier to tax. However, some peasants seem to have issues with this just and natural policy, so they have foolishly decided to revolt.
translation: 农奴制确保农民不能迁徙，他们变得更容易纳税. 然而，一些农民自己似乎有更公正而理想化的念头，所以他们愚蠢地决定起义.

original: By assisting our nobles in confining the serfs to their lands we have greatly enriched the landed aristocracy. A wealthy nobility is one that can devote time to life's higher pursuits and the lesser sons of any house of respect will count a great number of loyal and able artists, administrators or other men of quality among their scions. Some are quite eager to pay the state back for the service it has done to their families.
translation: 我们决定改善众多农奴的生活状况，确保他们得到适当的照顾，以创造更多的机会展示他们能够做些什么.

original: Our Peasants are deeply upset at the news that their freedom of movement is to be further restricted. In fact, there have been massive revolts across our country because of this... Perhaps if they took the time to care for their personal hygiene they would not be so revolting?
translation: 农民们深深的令人心烦，他们的行动自由将进一步受到限制. 事实上，因为这个在我国各地出现了大量的起义...也许如果他们愿意多花点时间照顾他们的个人卫生，他们就不会如此令人作呕？

original: Since we have made it easier for the peasants to move around in search of better farming opportunities, it has, unfortunately, been more difficult to track them down when the army needs recruits.
translation: 我们允许农夫随心所欲的迁徙，寻找更好的耕作机会. 但不幸的是，在需要新兵时更难以找到他们.

original: With our new laws that tie the peasantry less firmly to the land, it seems that they are also getting strange new ideas about their precise role in the grand scheme of things.
translation: 有了不那么坚定地不准农民离开土地的新法律，他们也似乎以奇怪的新思路来确认他们在各种宏大目标中自己的精确定位.
这事态令人不安的发展

original: By reining in the nobility in their ruthless exploitation of the peasantry, so called 'gentleman farmers' have become surprisingly common in the administration. This, in turn, has improved general conditions in our country.
translation: 通过抑制贵族残酷剥削农民，'绅士农民'出现在政府里已经变得不那么令人吃惊了. 这反过来又全面的改善了农村的状况.

original: Our slightly less dogmatic thinking has led to new and strange notions of 'humanism'. This is a cause for deep concern, since people are starting to question the proper order of things.
translation: 我们缺少教条式思维导致了新的和陌生的概念，人文主义. 这令人深感忧虑，因为人们开始质疑神学的宇宙秩序.

original: Properly civilized countries do not allow petty commoners to attempt any kind of serious thought. The eyes of the world are upon us, and the world does not like what it sees.
translation: 真正文明的国家不会允许平民尝试攻击任何严肃的思想。世界的目光注视着我们，他们不想看见这样。

original: Our generous policies allowing people more freedom of speech have created a fertile breeding ground for promising new ideas. Some of the prominent new thinkers might become great men, who will eventually leave our nation with a lasting legacy of intellectual growth.
translation: 我们宽容政策给予人们更多的言论自由，这将是滋生有前途的新思想的肥沃土壤. 那些最终将万古留名的智者将他们的精神遗产留给我们的民族，杰出的新思想家将成为伟人.
我们做出了明智的选择

original: Somehow, it seems like for every nest of heretics we root out and purge, another two spring up.
translation: 不知何故，似乎每清除摧毁一个邪教庇护所，又会迅速出现两个新的。

original: Not everybody agrees with our religious doctrine. Some people are complaining loudly, calling our approach to modern ideas narrow-minded and arguing that clinging to ancient philosophy is regressive nonsense.
translation: 并非人人都同意我们的教义。有些人大声抱怨，宣称我们对待现代思想态度狭隘，固守古代哲学是一种无意义的倒退。

original: Alas, some might have to burn...

A person from a holy order arrived at court today, impressed with our harsh, but just and Godly, punishment of heretics and unbelievers. They have asked for an advisory position, stating that a [Root.GovernmentName] that prays together will stay together.
translation: 一位圣职人员来到我们的朝廷，对我们严厉公正的异端和不信者的惩罚印象深刻，他们要求一个顾问的职位，证明全国的信徒们都会站在一起。

original: Our nobles with estates close to the frontier are concerned that we are neglecting our defenses. They have voiced their worries to all and sundry.
translation: 边境附近拥有地产的贵族担心我们疏于防务.他们向所有人表明了他们的忧虑.

original: But attack is the best form of defense!
translation: 但是攻击时最好的防御！

original: Our increasing focus on offensive doctrine has made it harder to find brave peasants to fill the ranks. Ridiculous complaints about being cannon fodder are frequently spouted to our recruitment officers.
translation: 日益重视进攻的理论已难很找到勇敢的农夫来补充军队. 荒谬的关于炮灰的投诉常常喷向我们的新兵招聘人员.

original: The fools are missing out on glory
Our decision to focus on offense has led too many of our neighbors looking enviously and worriedly at our glorious troops, who stand ready to give our enemies a taste of cold steel.
translation: 我们咄咄逼人的决定导致许多邻居对我国荣耀的军队又嫉妒又担心。我军时刻准备着让敌人尝尝刀剑的冰冷。

original: Our Aristocrats are becoming reluctant to serve in our army since we are focusing on defensive tactics. They are concerned about the lack of opportunities for glory while cowering behind fortifications.
translation: 因为我们专注于防御策略，贵族正在变得抗拒在军中服役.他们担心当蜷缩在防御工事之后，获取荣耀的机会渺茫.

original: A little gold will convince them
translation: 给点黄金应该能让他们回心转意

original: With our increasing focus on defense, we have been clearing land around our fortifications to dig moats and create clear fields of fire. The people occupying some of the land have reacted in a most disloyal manner.
translation: 随着我国日益重视国防，我们一直在清理防御工事周围的土地，挖护城河，并建立开阔的无障碍的火力覆盖区. 农民用不忠的态度占据一些土地来反抗我们.

original: Well, the fort should hold out till relief arrives.
translation: 好吧，堡垒应该撑到援军到达。

original: Since we have started to focus on more defensive philosophies, a humble engineer (a position usually at the bottom of the rung in the military) has had a chance to impress with the mark of true genius.
translation: 自从我们开始更多趋向于防守，一个卑微的工程师(通常是低层军官)有机会作为真正的天才而给人留下深刻的印象.

original: He is pretty good I guess...
Let him improve defenses in his home province.
translation: 让他去改善他家乡的防御。

original: With our attention shifting further from the Navy to the Army, some of our master shipwrights have decided to seek employment elsewhere. This has caused our shipyards to suffer.
translation: 随着我们的注意力从海军部队移开，我们的一些大师级造船者已决定在其他地方谋生. 这是我们的船厂的灾难.

original: Our decision to start favoring the Army more has led to a crop of promising young naval officers to retire from service. They claim that there are not as many opportunities for advancement as there used to be.
translation: 我们给予陆军更多支持的决定导致了一批年轻有前途的海军军官退役.他们宣称不再有像以前那么多的晋升机会了.

original: As the Army is starting to enjoy the fruits of our increased favor, many young officers are looking for opportunities to distinguish themselves. One captain in particular stands out - he even cuts a striking figure!
translation: 陆军正在享受我们提高重视的成果，很多年轻军官正在寻找表现自己的机会。一名上尉格外引人注目——他极为出风头！

original: Since we have decided to increase our focus on naval matters, our military arsenals supplying the Army are being deserted. Experienced craftsmen are seeking employment elsewhere.
translation: 既然我们已决定我们要将重心放在海军上面，我们的陆军兵工厂已经开始荒废了. 经验丰富的工匠们正在寻求其他的就业机会.

original: The recent decision to favor the Navy more has caused several generals to seek retirement. They feel that there will be less glory for them.
translation: 最近给予海军更多支持的决定引发几名将军寻求退伍，觉得不再有很多荣耀等着他们了.

original: Since we have felt it necessary to tighten up the quality standards of our army, a whole host of potential recruits must regrettably be declared unfit for duty.
translation: 我们认为有必要加强我军的兵员质量，所以一批不合格的新兵必须令人遗憾的被淘汰掉.

original: We must separate the wheat from the chaff
translation: 我们必须从谷壳里选出小麦

original: With our army increasingly focused on quality, there are concerns that the traditional army - loyal to them first and the country second - is gone forever. Fortunately, they are even more worried that this new model army will prove a most compelling argument against any overly loud complaints... [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] are especially worried that their positions may be threatened.
translation: 随着我军日益注重质量，贵族感到关切的是，传统的军队-首先忠于他们其次忠于国家-一去不复返了. 幸运的是，他们更担心的是，这种新型军队的实力将是反对任何无理投诉的最有力的论点...

original: There is nothing to worry about
Since we are looking for a more disciplined army, our commandants are working hard at making sure our troops are drilled to perfection. One man in particular shows real promise.
translation: 既然我们正在建设一个纪律严明的军队，我们的指挥官正努力确保部队接受完备的训练. 一个军官显示出他大有前途.

original: Although the decision to go for a massed army makes sense to many inside our country, uncouth foreigners are laughing at us, saying our army is nothing but an undisciplined mob.
translation: 尽管大规模的军队对我国意义重大，但无礼的外国人嘲笑我们，说我们的军队不过是一群缺乏训练的乌合之众.

original: We have made the wise decision to favor quantity over quality. However, the new larger army has the unforeseen problem of finding it harder to spot officers of talent among the masses.
translation: 我们明智地决定支持数量胜于质量。然而，新生的更为庞大的军队拥有难于预料的问题：在如此数量之下难以找出军官人才。
事情无疑会得到改善的

original: Some thought that our decision to favor quantity over quality was foolish, that it would lead to a decline in leadership, or even make our army a bit of a joke - but they were wrong. Our new larger army has unlocked the talents of our military minds, leading to ever better levels of organization.
translation: 一些人认为我们支持数量胜于质量的决定是愚蠢的，它将会导致领导层的衰退，或者甚至让我们的军队变成一个笑话——但是他们都错了。更加庞大的新军没有让我们的军事人才僵化，反而会引领至更完善的体制。

original: The glory of our capital has long been neglected. We now have an opportunity to improve the city and make it a beacon of cultural pride. This may prove costly, but there is an alternative solution.
translation: 我们首都的荣耀长期受到忽视. 我们现在有机会改善城市，并使它成为文化自豪感的灯塔. 这可能很昂贵，但有一个替代解决办法.

original: Several prominent men in our country are pointing out that the path we are going when it comes to army research is utterly foolish and will amount to nothing. They demand that we stop the current approach and stick with what was good enough for our fathers.
translation: 一些我国的名人指出，我们关于陆军的研究是愚蠢至极的，将一无所获. 他们要求我们停止目前的做法，并做那些对上帝有益的事.

original: It seems as if a leading shipwright in our country has written a very convincing document detailing how the new ship technology, that his rival has been trying to get funding for, will never work, and may even cause the ships to sink before they leave the harbor.
translation: 看起来似乎我国一名技术高超的造船匠写了一份令人信服的文档，其中详尽地说明了他对手资助的新船技术将不会有用，甚至将在离开海港之前就会沉没。
新的贸易研究是异端行为

original: We have had complaints from several dignitaries in our country that the new practices of our merchants are clearly heretical, and that we should put a stop to them.
translation: 我们已经接到几个我国权贵的投诉，商人们新的做法显然是异端行径，我们应该制止他们.

original: The new techniques in our production are rumored to be flawed, and several leading nobles argue that we should discard them and go back to the old and tried methods instead.
translation: “我们生产中的新技术传闻是有缺陷的，几个贵族领导人争论是放弃这项技术恢复原样还是试着用用看.”

original: There should be a Stable Government
translation: 应该建立一个稳定的政府

original: Several of the leading members of the government are deeply worried about some changes proposed to how the realm should be ruled. They demand a stop to such outrageous reforms, based on our tried and proved traditions (naturally avoiding mentioning how the changes would impact their own power base.)
translation: 几位政府官员对关于国家该怎样统治的一些富有革新精神的建议深感忧虑. 他们要求停止这种荒谬的改革，重返旧传统(自然避免提及变化会怎样影响自己的权力).

original: Many long years of peace have caused a disturbing lack of manly virtues in the common man. This could be disastrous, since far too many of our recruits turn out to be cowards...
translation: 多年的和平造成了一种令人不安的状况：男人们普遍缺乏男子汉的美德。这可能是灾难性的，因为太多的新兵都表现出了懦夫行径……

original: One of the greatest and richest men in $COUNTRY$ has died without an heir. He was a well known patron of religion and the arts.
translation: $COUNTRY$的一个大富豪在没有继承人的情况下去世了。 他是一个妇孺皆知的宗教和艺术的赞助人。

original: Use them as he would have.
translation: 依照他的意愿花掉这笔钱。

original: It seems as if there is a great man in one of the provinces, who has some rather intriguing ideas on how to create better fortifications. However, he is reluctant to leave his hometown.
translation: 我们的一个省好像出现了一个伟人，他就如何创造更好的防御工事有一些相当有趣的想法. 但是，他不愿意离开他的故乡.

original: A close member of the family of our ruler has proven utterly naive, and keeps telling foreigners vital information publicly. This is technically treason, but executing a member of the royalty might cause unrest.
translation: 我们发现统治者的某亲密家庭成员天真透顶，对外国政要公然的散播机密。这从严格意义上说是叛国，但处决一个王室成员可能导致动乱。

original: He is a relative after all...
The Pope has just announced that one of our ruler's most esteemed and revered ancestors was actually a saint. This is a cause for great celebration!
translation: 教宗刚刚宣布，我们统治者最尊敬和崇敬的祖先是一位圣人. 这是一个庆祝的好理由!

original: People are finding lots of ways of getting around paying taxes and fees on moving goods. This is cutting into our income, but stopping it would cost quite a lot in the short-term.
translation: 人们发现了很多的方式为货物流通规避缴纳税费. 这侵蚀到我们的收入，但阻止他们的做法将在短时间内付出较大的代价.

original: Since the invention of the printing press, more and more books, about an ever wider range of subjects, have been published. We can now see the benefit of this, since knowledge spreads faster and more ideas are appearing amongst our philosophers and natural scientists.
translation: 随着印刷机的发明，越来越多的书籍比以往任何时候都更广泛出版传播. 现在，我们可以看到这些好处，因为知识的传播速度更快，我们的哲学家和自然科学家有了更多的新想法.

original: We are at war, and our manpower reserves are slowly disappearing. Our great and competent ruler has come up with a plan to recruit more men for military duties. However, this may cause problems in the countryside.
translation: 我们正处于战争，我们的人力资源储备正在慢慢地消失. 我们伟大而称职的统治者出台了一项计划，为军队征募更多的人. 然而，这可能会在农村引起问题.

original: Only take what can be spared.

The high war exhaustion in our country is wreaking all sorts of havoc with the state. Everyone from the highest noble to the most common serf is feeling the strain of continuing this clearly pointless war.
translation: 我国过高的厌战情绪正造成各种混乱的状态. 上至贵族下至百姓都从继续这样显然无意义的战争中感到压力.
我们应该签署一项和平协议

original: Is is clear that we are fighting a losing war, and that we should cut our losses and sign a dignified peace. Continuing to fight like this only makes us look insane.
translation: 很明显的，我们正在打一场失败的战争，我们应该减少我们的损失，并签署一个有尊严的和平协议. 继续这样的战斗只会使我们更疯狂.

original: The abysmal handling of this war has caused several pretenders to emerge. One of them is now even taking up arms against us in the middle of a war.
translation: 对这场战争的糟糕处理导致了几个篡权者的浮现.他们中的一个现在甚至已经拿起武器开战反抗我们.

original: He would not be able to win the war...

The local authorities in $PROVINCENAME$ have no problem adapting to the new rules and laws of the occupier. Now, due to the disastrous progress of this war, they have already accepted the foregone conclusion of their transfer at the peace table, and have defected.
translation: $PROVINCENAME$ 的地方当局没有办法适应占有者新的法规和法律. 现在，由于这场战争灾难性的进展，他们已经在和平谈判桌上签署了单独媾和的条约.
我们应该签署一项和平协议

original: The local authorities in $FROM$ have no problem adapting to the new rules and laws of the occupier. Now due to the disastrous progress of this war, they have already accepted the foregone conclusion of their transfer at the peace table, and have legally defected over.
translation: 在$FROM$当地政府毫无疑问接受了占领者新的统治和法律。现在由于这场战争灾难性的进程，在谈判桌上他们已经接受了这无法避免的结果，合法地叛逃了。

original: It is a useless piece of land.
Our country has now recovered from the disastrous fractions of religious turmoil and is now together in one piece.
translation: 我国正在从严重的宗教动乱中恢复，现在的局势正在变得稳定.

original: As the revolutionary war between our rival and their enemies in the New World continues, more and more people in our country voice their opinion that we shall not stay idle, but help those who struggle for freedom in the colonies.
translation: 当我们的对手和他们的敌人在新大陆上展开革命战争，在我国有越来越多的声音表示我们不应再袖手旁观，而是应该去帮助那些殖民地获得自由.

original: We cannot let the people in America be crushed
translation: 我们不能让美洲人被碾碎

original: It has become apparent that an elected member of our government is aligned and aiding the opposition during the war. We would expose and execute him for treason but he is widely supported within the community and it could cause instability.
translation: 显而易见的是我们政府中的一员在战争期间与反对派结盟并帮助他们.我们本当因叛国罪揭发并处死他，然而他派系强大并且这将引起国家动荡.

original: Our peasant rabble is performing strange rituals involving some kind of ...balls? We have to prevent another religious turmoil!
translation: 我们的乌合农民在进行奇怪的宗教仪式涉及到某种...球？我们不得不防止另一场宗教骚乱！

original: At least keep our universities clean!
translation: 至少保持我们的大学不要受到污染！

original: My advisors haven't even heard of football?!
translation: 我的顾问从没听过足球？！

original: Recently people have begun to doubt the legitimacy of our reign. We need to remind them of our right to rule!
translation: 最近人们开始怀疑我们统治的正统性.我们要让他们想起我们统治的权力！

original: Glory to our ancestors! Build the biggest monument thinkable!
translation: 荣耀归于先祖！建造有可行性的最巨型的纪念碑！

original: Build a nice statue of one of my ancestors
translation: 建造一座我先祖之一的美丽雕像

original: Don't make me remember my grand-father...
translation: 不要让我想起我的祖父...

original: A new champion of the joust

During a recent jousting tournament, an unheralded commoner surprised all in attendance by besting everyone who faced him until he was declared the champion. Now we face the awkward decision of what to do with him.
translation: “在最近一场竞赛大会上，一名未被料到的平民用最精湛的技艺震惊了全场，直到他被宣布为冠军.尴尬的是现在我们应该怎么对待他.”

original: The man must lead our armies!
translation: 必须让那个人领导我们的军队！

original: Tighten the rules to make sure this doesn't happen again!
translation: 让规定更加严格以确保这不会再次发生！

original: Our fleet can't be complete without a glorious flagship.
translation: 没有一艘荣耀的旗舰我们的舰队就不是完整的.
一座金质船首像听起来不错！

original: The cheapest design available sounds appropriate
translation: 可行的最便宜的设计听起来挺合适

original: One of your advisors argued with the Bishop during your last banquet and now the Church has sent an inquisitor to question the advisor about their ideas. You could spend your influence to defend them or bow to the Church to gain the Pope's benevolence.
translation: 我们上一次宴会上有个顾问和主教争辩，现在教堂派出一位检察官来审查那位顾问的思想。你可以运用你的影响力去保护那些顾问或者遵从教堂的意见，这样可以得到教皇的欢心。

original: Poison the Bishop's lunch, next time!
translation: 下次在主教的午餐中下毒！

original: One of our military experts has been working for our enemies for years and he's now offering his help to defeat them in this blessed war.
translation: “我们军事专家之一已经为我们的敌人工作了数年，他现在在这场受祝福的战争中为打败他们提供了帮助.他能牺牲自己让我们征服一个要塞或者给我们一些敌人的机密.我们该怎么做，大人？”

original: Ask him to sabotage that fortress!
Let us know what he built for them!
translation: 让我们知道他给敌人造了什么！

original: Your most feared privateer decided that enemy vessels were not enough to satisfy his lust for loot and glory, so he started to attack your own merchant fleet. The merchants are asking for his head, but your treasurer suggested that you could find an arrangement with him, since your exhausted coffers could benefit from some extra money.
translation: “你最令人恐惧的私掠船长判定敌人的船只不够满足他为了战利品和荣耀的欲望，因此他开始攻击你拥有的商船队.商人们正在悬赏他的人头，但是你的财务主管建议你应该为他安排一下，因为你精光的国库将能从一些其它渠道来钱.”

original: We must protect our merchants, sink that greedy bastard!
translation: “我们应该保护我们的商人，把那贪婪的杂种沉到海底！”

original: Our country is at war, but our leadership is not ready! Today a foreign military expert arrived in our court. His reputation precedes him and has a reasonable grasp of our language but his prices are steep. What should we do with him?
translation: “我们的国家正在战争，但是我们的领导人还没准备好！今天一名外国军事专家来到议会.他名声在外而且我们的语言也说得不错，但开价实在太夸张了.我们应该拿他怎么办？”

original: Ask him to train our officers
translation: 要求他训练我们的军官

original: Put him in command of our armies
We do not need foreign aid!
translation: 我们不需要外国的帮助！

original: We've managed to get hold of a holy White Elephant, a symbol of royal justice and power, and peace and prosperity for our kingdom.
translation: “我们设法获得一头神圣的白象，对于王国象征着王家的正义和权力，和平和繁荣.”

original: My $MONARCHTITLE$, an unusual number of nobles and merchants from all across the Islamic world have made their pilgrimage to Mecca this year. The increased traffic of these wealthy persons has bolstered local trade! How should we collect the taxes?
translation: “我的$MONARCHTITLE$，今年一大群跨越了整个伊斯兰世界而来的贵族和商人开始了他们向麦加的朝圣之旅.这些富人们提升的往来交流加强了本地的贸易！我们该怎样征税呢？”

original: Recently, a young female troubadour who has won fame across Europe for her unconventional music was invited to perform at your court. The sight of her costume prompted the entire room to gasp. Her songs had countless instances of thinly-disguised innuendo and references to unconventional sex acts - at one point the archbishop turned scarlet and stormed out of the room. The performance concluded, all eyes turn to you to hear your response.
translation: “最近一名以非传统的乐曲赢得了全欧洲名声的年轻女吟游诗人被邀请在你的宫廷中表演.见到她所穿的服装整间房的人都倒吸一口气.她的歌曲中有着数不清的地方暗示着非传统的OOXX，大主教一度脸红脖子粗的冲出房间.表演结束时，所有的目光都转向你并听候你的回应.”

original: Provocative and mesmerizing commentary on romance and gender in contemporary society!
translation: 这是当代社会中对浪漫和性的令人兴奋和着迷的阐述！

original: Ridiculous trash for stupid people! Get out of my sight!
translation: 给傻子看的荒谬垃圾！滚出我的视线！

original: An argument has broken out in court over the importance of Musket compared to the traditional archery regiments. With the hopes of convincing $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ that their role in the army is not becoming obsolete a group of veteran archers have put on an impressive demonstration. Their grace, skill and accuracy was admired by many who were present.
translation: 宫廷中爆发了一场争论，比较滑膛枪和传统弓箭兵团的重要。为了向$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCH$证明没有过时，一队弓箭手老兵作了令人印象深刻的展示。他们的荣誉、技巧、精准被在场的许多人赞赏。

original: Of course archery should serve a primary role
It's time for these old men to retire.
translation: 是时候让这些老头退役了。

original: My lord, a prominent privateer is able to avoid the blockade and get essential supplies into the country, but to continue the runs he is requesting increasingly large sums.
translation: “大人，一名卓越的私掠船长能够避开封锁向国内提供必要的补给品，但是为了能够继续经营他提出的数字提高了一大笔.”

original: We shall not parley with such rogues

The villagers in $PROVINCENAME$ have caught a witch red-handed as she attempted to cook some children in an oven... the town is in outrage and it seems she is likely to be out to the stake. Should we condemn or condone this trial by fire?
translation: $PROVINCENAME$的村民抓住了一名残忍的女巫，她试图想把一些孩子做成菜肴……镇民愤怒了，看起来似乎要把那女人施以火刑。我们应该定罪还是宽恕这场火之审判？

original: Burn the witch, burn to ash and bone!
translation: 烧死这个女巫，烧成灰烬为止！

original: Everyone knows there is no such thing as witches. Free the poor woman
translation: 每个人都知道女巫不会做这种事。释放那个可怜女人

original: Our efforts to develop $PROVINCENAME$ go on, but now some of the settlers have rejected our capital city and begun establishing a new settlement quite far from the original one. Now people flock to that second settlement, and we are left to split our efforts.
translation: 我们不断地努力开发$PROVINCENAME$，但是现在一些移民拒绝了我们的中心城市并且在远离那的地方开始建立新的定居点。现在人群正在向另一个定居点迁徙，这会让我们事倍功半。

original: That settlement will have to be abandoned

translation: 更多的人意味着更多的税

original: Two of our settlements in $PROVINCENAME$ have begun a fierce competition, trying their best to establish their sway over the entire province.
translation: 我们在$PROVINCENAME$的两个定居点开始了激烈的竞争，以让自己的影响力扩大到整个省份。
有竞争才会变得更强大
任命不相关的官员解决

original: We have two significant settlements in $PROVINCENAME$, and many days of travel between them. This has compromised our ability to defend the province effectively!
translation: 我们在$PROVINCENAME$的两个重要定居点相距多天的路程。这使得我们难以有效地防守省份！
好吧，他们能够自我保护

original: I suppose we'll have to build another fort
translation: 我想我们应该再建造一座要塞了

original: Our young men living in $PROVINCENAME$ are at best half-civilized. They learn from and admire the nearby native people, and many yearn to cast aside their home to become wanderers and hunters in the great wilderness beyond our borders.
translation: 我们生活在$PROVINCENAME$的年轻人最多是半开化的。他们学习和欣赏附近原住民，而且十分渴望离家出走成为流浪者和猎人，跨越边境去大荒野。

original: They might as well explore a bit
translation: 那就让他们稍稍探索一下

original: As long as they bring back some furs...
translation: 只要他们能带回来些皮草……

original: As civilization marches on, the beasts of the woodlands from which we take our fur have become scarce, and fur hunting is no longer possible in $PROVINCENAME$.
translation: 当文明的边界扩展，我们获取林间野兽的毛皮变得极为困难，在$PROVINCENAME$捕猎毛皮的活动不再可能了。

original: If the forests are empty I guess we can cut down the trees...
translation: 如果森林没资源了我想我们能砍树了……

original: Maybe they'll finally settle down on their farms!
translation: 也许他们终于能够安心的在农场里干活了！

original: A monastic group from the Society of Jesus has traveled to the New World to establish a mission in one of our colonies, to Christianize the natives there.
translation: 一名来自耶稣会的传教士旅行至新世界，在我们的殖民地建立了教区向原住民传播福音。

original: Our colony has been struck by Roman Fever!
translation: 我们的殖民地遭受了罗马热病的冲击！

original: Illness has struck our colony in $PROVINCENAME$. It is so devastating that there is a serious risk our colony will disappear. The natives seem immune but our colonists are dying daily.
translation: 疾病冲击了我们在$PROVINCENAME$的殖民地。我们的殖民地有很高的风险会从地图上抹去，这几乎是毁灭性的。原住民看起来对此免疫但我们的居民每天都有人死去。

original: Send someone to organize a response
translation: 派人去组织起来应对这件事

original: Coffee has become a product very much in demand as people just can't seem to get enough of it. The climate and the vast expanse of the New World seems like the perfect place to grow coffee. Perhaps we should consider steering the production in [Root.GetName] towards it?
translation: 咖啡成为了人们供不应求的产品，新大陆的宽阔和气候，看起来像是适宜咖啡生长的完美之地。或者我们应该考虑在[Root.GetName]生产它？

original: Some call it the black gold, why not?
translation: 它有时被称为黑金，为什么不呢？

original: The growth of our colony in [Root.GetName] has always been closely associated with the Natural Harbor in the area and over time the province has come to act as something of a local trade hub.\nAs the settlement has grown so has the importance of its port. The settlement has come to act as the entrepôt for the entire region and foreign as well as local traders all go there to conduct their trade.
translation: 我国在[Root.GetName]的殖民地的发展一直与该地区的自然海港密切相关。随着时间的推移，该省已经成为当地的一个贸易中心。\n随着这一殖民地的发展，其港口也变得越来越重要。这里已经成为整个地区的转口港，当地及外国的商人都前去那里进行交易。

original: This must be the the result of our wise policies.
translation: 这一定是我们英明施政的结果。

original: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] has not listened to our protests and increased the tariffs on our economy.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 没有听从我们的抗议而且提高了我们经济的关税.

original: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] has listened to our protests and reduced the tariffs on our economy.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 听从了我们的抗议而且降低了我们经济的关税.

original: People in the colonies think that the prices of goods are too high. They blame the inflated prices on our tariffs and demand they should be lowered.
translation: 殖民地的人们认为货物的价格过高.他们指责价格膨胀在我们的关税，而且要求将之降低.

original: Better show them who rule the colonies!
translation: 最好告诉他们谁在统治这个殖民地!

original: Despite our protests, [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] has temporarily imposed harsher tariffs that will bleed our economy.
translation: 尽管我们提出抗议,[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]已经开始征收暂时的严苛关税,这将使我们的经济流血.

original: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] has listened to reason and decided to temporarily lower the tariffs that were slowly strangling our economy.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]聆听了理由而且决定暂时降低关税,这将缓慢地增强我们的经济.

original: A colonel in the army is making a name for himself as a strong proponent of armed resistance against [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]. Besides being a gifted soldier, he seems to be an inspiring and charismatic leader and more and more people seem to listen to his ideas of independence.\n\nShould we brand him a traitor and rebel or might he be the one who can help us throw of the colonial shackles and lead [Root.GetName] towards freedom?
translation: 一个因为强力支持使用武力对抗[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]而出名的军队上校，除了是个有天赋的战士外,他看起来像个鼓舞人心的领袖而且越来越多的人民看上去听从了他的独立理念,我们是应当指控他为卖国者和叛逆，又或者相信他能帮助我们打破殖民地的束缚而且领导[Root.GetName] 走向自由？

original: A colonel in the [From.GetAdjective] army has been making a name for himself as a strong proponent of armed resistance against [Root.GetName]! Besides being a gifted soldier, he seems to be an inspiring and charismatic leader and more and more people seem to listen to his dangerous ideas of independence.\n\nBut instead of immediately beheading this upstart, the local authorities in [From.GetName] have promoted him to general!
translation: 一个[From.GetAdjective]军队的上校因为他强力支持武力对抗[Root.GetName]而出名!除了是个有天赋的战士外,他看起来像个鼓舞人心的领袖而且越来越多的人民看上去听从了他的独立理念,这个出头鸟不但没有被立刻斩首，[From.GetName]当局反而将他提携成了将军!

original: A colonel in the [From.GetAdjective] army has been making a name for himself as a strong proponent of armed resistance against [Root.GetName]! Besides being a gifted soldier, he seems to be an inspiring and charismatic leader and more and more people seem to listen to his dangerous ideas of independence.\n\nFortunately, [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] dealt with the matter swiftly by removing his head. This action, however, seems to have stirred up more even desire for liberty [From.GetName]...
translation: [From.GetAdjective]军中的一个上校因为强烈支持武装反抗[Root.GetName]赢得了名望! 除了作为一个有天赋的士兵，他也一个善于鼓舞人心和有魅力的领袖，越来越多的人似乎在听从他那危险的独立想法。\n\n幸好，[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 通过砍掉他的头迅速的解决了这件事情。然而这个行动似乎激起了更多对于自主[From.GetName]的欲望…
也许是个最迅速的解决方案

original: \nOnce [Root.GetName] becomes an independent nation, this tariff will be removed.
translation: \n一旦[Root.GetName]成为一个独立国家，关税将会被移除。

original: If we are interested in building up good relations and possible alliances with the native tribes of the New World, we might need to restrain some of our Colonies from declaring Colonial Wars.
translation: 如果我们有兴趣和新大陆的原住民部落建立良好的关系和可能的同盟，那么我们可能需要去抑制我们的殖民地发动殖民战争.

original: Keep them on a tight leash!
It is not in our interest

In order to preserve their good relations with neighboring native tribes, [From.GetName] has sent [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] a proclamation forbidding us to attack native tribes without a valid reason!
translation: 为了和邻近的原住民部落保持良好的关系,[From.GetName已经发送了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]一份宣言禁止我们无故进攻原住民部落.

original: Careful not to upset their relationship with the neighboring native tribes, [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] has restricted our colonial expansion.
translation: 当心不要破坏了他们和邻近原住民部落的关系,[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]已经限制了我们的殖民扩张.

original: Diplomats in our New World colonies report unrest along the frontier. The continued rapid expansion of settlers has greatly angered neighboring native tribes. If it is in our interest to keep good relations with these tribes, we must restrict our colonies' expansion.
translation: 在新世界殖民地的大使报告边境动乱.定居者的快速扩张极大地触怒了邻近的原住民,如果我们有兴趣和这些部落维持良好的关系,我们必须限制我们的殖民地扩张.

original: The casus belli §YColonial Conquest§W will not be available for 10 years.
translation: 战争理由§YColonial Conquest§W将在10年内不可用。

original: The continued rapid expansion of settlers has greatly angered neighboring native tribes, and in order to retain good relations with them, [From.GetName] have decided restrict our colonial expansion!
translation: 定居者的快速扩张极大地触怒了邻近的原住民,为了和这些部落维持良好的关系,[From.GetName]决定限制我们的殖民地扩张.

original: Our recent war has left the country exhausted. Perhaps some of this burden should be shared by our colonies?
translation: 我们最近的战争使得国力疲惫,或者部分负担应该由我们的殖民地分摊

original: The recent war of [From.GetName] has left her exhausted. Since the war involved one of our neighbors, [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has now decided that part of the burden should be shouldered by us!
translation: 最近[From.GetName]的战争让它们国力疲惫,自从战争牵涉到我们的邻国,[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 决定把部分的负担转嫁到我们头上.

original: After having successfully broken free from the tyrannical grip of [Root.ColonialParent.GetName], we have become a beacon of hope and an inspiration among the colonies of the New World that strive for independence. Perhaps it is time to spread the revolution to the neighboring colonies and support them in their struggle?
translation: 自从成功地从[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]的暴君手中解放,我们在争取独立的新大陆殖民地中,成为了象征着希望和鼓舞的灯塔,也许是时候把革命传播给邻居去支持他们的奋斗了？

original: Gets two regiments of revolutionary soldiers.
translation: 获得两个革命军团的战士

original: An emissary from [From.GetName] has arrived. After their successful war of independence against [From.ColonialParent.GetName], they wish to spread the revolution throughout the New World and offer to give us a helping hand in our struggle against [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]. At the border awaits two regiments of revolutionary veterans ready to join our army. Should we accept their help?
translation: 一个[From.GetName]的大使到来.自从他们赢得了对抗[From.ColonialParent.GetName]的独立战争,他们打算在整个新大陆传播革命，还有向我们伸出援手对抗[Root.ColonialParent.GetName].在边境有两个革命军团的老兵等待着加入我们的军队.我们应该接受他们的帮助吗？

original: Embrace these ideas and their help!
translation: 欢迎这些理念和他们的帮助!

original: Liberty desire runs high as revolutionary fervor sweeps across the nation. The people in [Root.GetName] are tired of having their lives dictated by some [Root.ColonialParent.Monarch.GetTitle] over in [Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]. The New World must also be a free world, governed by locally elected officials. The people cry out for freedom and many volunteers await permission to join the army. Could [GetYear] be the year that we break free from [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]?
translation: 自由愿望作为革命热情席卷全国,[Root.GetName]的人民厌倦了处于[Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]的[Root.ColonialParent.Monarch.GetTitle] 支配下生活,新大陆也必将是个自由的世界.人民为自由呐喊,许多志愿者等待获准参军.在[GetYear] 我们能摆脱 [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]吗？

original: In a desire to win their freedom, many volunteers have joined the armed forces.
translation: 为了他们赢得自由的渴望,许多志愿者已经加入了陆军.

original: If [Root.GetName] are to win their independence from [Root.ColonialParent.GetName], we must get rid of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and set up a strong and stable government of our own. We should choose carefully, as this decision will shape the future for our young nation.
translation: 如果[Root.GetName] 从 [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 处赢得独立,我们必须除去[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]和建立一个属于我们自己的强力而稳定的政府.我们应该慎重选择,因为这项决议将塑造我们这个年轻国家的未来.

original: The War of Independence for [From.GetName] is over. Their rebel forces have been utterly crushed by our victorious army, and they are once again a colony of [Root.GetName]. Should we execute [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] and exact harsh war reparations to cover the damages inflicted during the war? Or should we take a more lenient approach so as to not stir up more trouble in the New World?
translation: [From.GetName]独立战争结束了.我们凯旋的军队已经彻底地碾碎他们这些叛军,他们将再一次成为[Root.GetName]的殖民地.我们应处死[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]和迫使严苛的赔款来弥补在战争造成的损失？又或者采取更宽容的方法来避免在新大陆激起更多的麻烦？

original: The War of Independence has tragically failed and [Root.GetName] is once more under the boot of [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]. Our short-lived government under [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been dissolved and [Root.Monarch.GetName] sentenced to death. A new governor or viceroy has been sent over from [Root.ColonialNation.Capital.GetCapitalName] to take charge and [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] is demanding harsh war reparations to cover the damages inflicted during the war.
translation: 独立战争已经悲剧收场,[Root.GetName]再一次被[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]踩在脚下,我们在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]掌权下的短命政府已被肃清而 [Root.Monarch.GetName]本人被判决死刑,一个新的省长或者总督正从[Root.ColonialNation.Capital.GetCapitalName]赶来监管我们,而且[Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 索取了严苛的战争赔款来弥补他们在战时的损失.

original: The War of Independence has tragically failed and [Root.GetName] is once more under the boot of [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]. Our short-lived government under [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been dissolved. A new governor or viceroy has been sent over from [Root.ColonialNation.Capital.GetCapitalName] to take charge. Fortunately, [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been pardoned and [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] has agreed not to demand any war reparations for the damages inflicted during the war.
translation: 独立战争悲剧性地失败了，[Root.GetName]又一次处于了[Root.ColonialParent.GetName]的脚下。我们在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 下短命的政府被解散了。一个新的总督或执政官已经从[Root.ColonialNation.Capital.GetCapitalName]出发。幸好，[Root.Monarch.GetName] 已经被特赦，而[Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 同意不要求任何战争赔偿。

original: I guess we should be thankful...

The grain production in one of our colonies has come into focus. It seems that it generates quite a lot of money. Perhaps too much without being properly taxed. In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their grain through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.
translation: 谷物生产是我们殖民地一项重要的收入.它看起来很能赚钱.或者当中流失了太多合理的税收.根据重商主义精神,我们应该强迫他们和我们的港口贸易,我国商人将从中极大地受益,并且将为皇室金库带来大量的收入.

original: Bad news from the Old World! [From.GetName] has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a new tariff on Grain.
translation: 来自旧大陆的坏消息！通过推行一项新的谷物关税，[From.GetName]加强了对我国经济的掌控。

original: Perhaps we should throw the grain into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们该把谷物倒进海里...

original: The wine production in one of our colonies has come into focus. It seems that it generates quite a lot of money. Perhaps too much without being properly taxed. In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their wine through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.
translation: 酒类生产是我们殖民地一项重要的收入.它看起来很能赚钱.或者当中流失了太多合理的税收.根据重商主义精神,我们应该强迫他们和我们的港口贸易,我国商人将从中极大地受益,并且将为皇室金库带来大量的收入.

translation: 来自旧大陆的坏消息！通过推行一项新的酒类关税，[From.GetName]加强了对我国经济的掌控。

original: Perhaps we should throw the wine into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们该把酒水倒进海里...

original: Perhaps we should throw the fish into the sea instead...

original: Perhaps we should throw the fur into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们应该把毛皮扔进大海……

original: Perhaps we should throw the salt into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们应该把盐倒入大海……

original: The naval supplies production in one of our colonies has come into focus. It seems that it generates quite a lot of money. Perhaps too much without being properly taxed. In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their naval supplies through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.
translation: 船具生产是我们殖民地一项重要的收入.它看起来很能赚钱.或者当中流失了太多合理的税收.根据重商主义精神,我们应该强迫他们和我们的港口贸易,我国商人将从中极大地受益,并且将为皇室金库带来大量的收入.

translation: 来自旧大陆的坏消息！通过推行一项新的船具关税，[From.GetName]加强了对我国经济的掌控。

original: Perhaps we should throw the naval supplies into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们该把船具倒进海里...

In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their copper through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.

In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their iron through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.

In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their ivory through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.
translation: 象牙生产是我们殖民地一项重要的收入.它看起来很能赚钱.或者当中流失了太多合理的税收.根据重商主义精神,我们应该强迫他们和我们的港口贸易,我国商人将从中极大地受益,并且将为皇室金库带来大量的收入.

original: Bad news from the Old World! [From.GetName] has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a new tariff on Ivory.
translation: 来自旧大陆的坏消息！通过推行一项新的象牙关税，[From.GetName]加强了对我国经济的掌控。

original: Perhaps we should throw the ivory into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们该把象牙倒进海里.

original: The tea production in one of our colonies has come into focus. It seems that it generates quite a lot of money. Perhaps too much without being properly taxed. In the spirit of mercantilism, we should force them to trade their tea through our ports instead. This will greatly benefit our own merchants and add a lot of income to the crown's coffers.
translation: 茶叶生产是我们殖民地一项重要的收入.它看起来很能赚钱.或者当中流失了太多合理的税收.根据重商主义精神,我们应该强迫他们和我们的港口贸易,我国商人将从中极大地受益,并且将为皇室金库带来大量的收入.

original: Bad news from the Old World! [From.GetName] has tightened their grip on our economy by introducing a new tariff on Tea.
translation: 来自旧大陆的坏消息！通过推行一项新的茶叶关税，[From.GetName]加强了对我国经济的掌控。

original: Perhaps we should have a tea party...
translation: 或者我们应该开一场茶会.

original: The chinaware production in one of our colonies has come into focus. It seems that it generates quite a lot of money. Perhaps too much without being properly taxed. original: Perhaps we should throw the cocoa into the sea instead...
translation: 也许我们该把可可倒进海里.

original: The result will influence the Liberty desire in [Root.GetName].
translation: 这结果将影响[Root.GetName]的独立倾向。

original: The tariffs on grain imposed on us by [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] are cutting deep into the profits of our merchants. They demand that we send a delegation to [Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName] to protest these taxes or they will turn to smuggling.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]强加于我们的谷物关税严重损害了我国商人利益,他们要求我们发出代表团到[Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]去抗议关税,否则他们将转向走私.

original: Our tariffs on grain have caused great upheaval in the colonies. Outraged traders threaten with smuggling to avoid the taxes cutting too deep into their profits. We should demand that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] quickly puts an end to this nonsense.
translation: 我们的谷物关税在殖民地引起了巨大骚动.愤怒的贸易者用走私威胁我们去撤销这严重损害他们利益的税收.我们应该要求[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 迅速地终结这场闹剧.

original: The tariffs on cotton imposed on us by [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] are cutting deep into the profits of our merchants. They demand that we send a delegation to [Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName] to protest these taxes or they will turn to smuggling.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]强加于我们的棉花关税严重损害了我国商人利益,他们要求我们发出代表团到[Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]去抗议关税,否则他们将转向走私.

original: Our tariffs on cotton have caused great upheaval in the colonies. Outraged traders threaten with smuggling to avoid the taxes cutting too deep into their profits. We should demand that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] quickly puts an end to this nonsense.
translation: 我们的棉花关税在殖民地引起了巨大骚动.愤怒的贸易者用走私威胁我们去撤销这严重损害他们利益的税收.我们应该要求[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 迅速地终结这场闹剧.

original: The tariffs on sugar imposed on us by [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] are cutting deep into the profits of our merchants. They demand that we send a delegation to [Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName] to protest these taxes or they will turn to smuggling.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]强加于我们的糖类关税严重损害了我国商人利益,他们要求我们发出代表团到[Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]去抗议关税,否则他们将转向走私.

original: Our tariffs on sugar have caused great upheaval in the colonies. Outraged traders threaten with smuggling to avoid the taxes cutting too deep into their profits. We should demand that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] quickly puts an end to this nonsense.
translation: 我们的糖类关税在殖民地引起了巨大骚动.愤怒的贸易者用走私威胁我们去撤销这严重损害他们利益的税收.我们应该要求[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 迅速地终结这场闹剧.

original: The tariffs on tobacco imposed on us by [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] are cutting deep into the profits of our merchants. They demand that we send a delegation to [Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName] to protest these taxes or they will turn to smuggling.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]强加于我们的烟草关税严重损害了我国商人利益,他们要求我们发出代表团到[Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]去抗议关税,否则他们将转向走私.

original: Our tariffs on tobacco have caused great upheaval in the colonies. Outraged traders threaten with smuggling to avoid the taxes cutting too deep into their profits. We should demand that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] quickly puts an end to this nonsense.
translation: 我们的烟草关税在殖民地引起了巨大骚动.愤怒的贸易者用走私威胁我们去撤销这严重损害他们利益的税收.我们应该要求[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 迅速地终结这场闹剧.

original: The tariffs on cocoa imposed on us by [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] are cutting deep into the profits of our merchants. They demand that we send a delegation to [Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName] to protest these taxes or they will turn to smuggling.
translation: [Root.ColonialParent.GetName]强加于我们的可可关税严重损害了我国商人利益,他们要求我们发出代表团到[Root.ColonialParent.Capital.GetCapitalName]去抗议关税,否则他们将转向走私.

original: Our tariffs on cocoa have caused great upheaval in the colonies. Outraged traders threaten with smuggling to avoid the taxes cutting too deep into their profits. We should demand that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] quickly puts an end to this nonsense.
translation: 我们的可可关税在殖民地引起了巨大骚动.愤怒的贸易者用走私威胁我们去撤销这严重损害他们利益的税收.我们应该要求[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 迅速地终结这场闹剧.

original: The delegation to [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] returns unsuccessful. [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has declared that the tariff is here to stay and ordered [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] to immediately put a stop to any smuggling.
translation: 前往[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的特使带回了失败的消息。[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 宣布将保留关税并且命令[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]立刻停止一切走私行为。

original: The delegation to [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] returns successful. [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has declared that the tariff should be removed and has asked [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] to immediately see to it.
translation: 前往[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的代表团不辱使命..[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 宣告关税将被取消,并且要求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 立刻去执行新的政策.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, grain merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,谷物商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, wine merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,酒类商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, wool merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,羊毛商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, cloth merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,布料商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, fish merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,鱼类商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, fur merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,毛皮商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, salt merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,盐商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, naval supplies merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,船具商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, copper merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,铜矿商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, iron merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,铁矿商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, ivory merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,象牙商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, tea merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,茶叶商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, chinaware merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,瓷器商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, spices merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,香料商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, coffee merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,咖啡商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, cotton merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,棉花商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, sugar merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,糖类商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, tobacco merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,烟草商人开始进行走私.

original: To avoid the loss of income due to high tariffs, cocoa merchants have turned to smuggling.
translation: 为了避免高额关税造成的收入损失,可可商人开始进行走私.

original: With the successful declaration of independence from [Root.ColonialParent.GetName] we are finally free from the burden of tariffs that has long plagued our economy.
translation: 随着成功地宣告从[Root.ColonialParent.GetName] 下独立,我们的经济终于在关税负担的长久折磨下解放了!

original: All tariff modifiers will be removed.
translation: 所有关税修正将被去除

original: Across our country there is outrage that we would ally with a nation who holds provinces which are rightfully ours!
translation: 我国竟与非法占有我国土地的敌邦缔结同盟，使朝野上下大为震怒！

original: Perhaps a policy change is in order...
translation: 也许是推行新政的时候了……

original: Put a positive spin on things!

'Our rightful provinces are held by other nations and our government seems to be making no effort to recover them! What use are they anyway?' proclaims the broadsheet.\nWidespread dissatisfaction with our failure to recover our claimed provinces is sweeping the nation.
translation: '我们的合法省份正被他国占有,而我们的政府看起来对夺回它毫无作为,那它们还有什么用？'报纸上的宣告.\n我们夺回宣称省份失败的引起了整个国家的广泛不满.

original: Ignoring the unrest caused by high taxes, and cultural and religious differences, has only increased the unhappiness of our citizens.
translation: 无视高税收、文化和宗教差异带来的骚乱结果进一步造成了人民的不满。

original: We have managed to increase the happiness of our citizens by lowering the taxes.
translation: 通过减税我们成功地提高了人民的幸福度。

original: The birth of an heir draws nearer, and the astrologer has just completed his work. He proclaims that a child born to a royal house on this day shall rule a mighty kindom and is about to continue when the feeble sound of a newborn's first scream is heard. 'A daughter,' the midwife announces, 'You have a healthy, sturdy daughter, my [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].'
translation: 继承人的出生临近了，占星家刚好完成了他的著作。他宣称此日在皇家出生的婴孩将统治一个强大的王国，并将延续其强盛。新生儿微弱的哭声传来，“一个女儿，”助产士宣布，“您有一个健康、强壮的女儿，我的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。”

original: People rejoiced when they heard the news that a young princess had been born. They have celebrated for days and nights, but you have not named your young daughter the new heir yet.
translation: 听闻小公主的出生，民众欢呼。他们日夜欢宴，但您还未指定您的女儿为继承人。

original: I declare her my new heir.
translation: 我指定她为我的继承人。
我想要一名男性继承人！

original: The lack of an heir is worrying both the people of [Root.Country.GetName] and your advisors. You have an ambitious and talented daughter who has impressed both diplomats, foreign nobles and your personal advisors with her wit and cunning. Is it not time to consider her as the heir to the throne?
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]的民众和你的顾问们都在担忧没有继承人的问题。你有一个才志双全的女儿，让外交官和外国贵族们都很吃惊，你的私人顾问也评价她聪明伶俐。是不是考虑让她当你的继承人的时候了？

original: She would make an excellent ruler.
translation: 她会成为一名卓越的统治者。

original: I am not dead yet! I can still sire a son or two.
translation: 我还没死！我还能搞出一两个儿子来。

original: The old ruler left this earth without a male heir, but their daughter is a talented and intelligent woman. She has a claim to the throne few others can compete with, and the wit needed to keep it. There is a man from another county who have also made a claim on the throne, and although it is not as strong, there are those who would prefer to see a man on the throne rather than a woman.
translation: 老统治者离世，没留下任何男性继承人。但他女儿天资聪颖。她有王位宣称权，只有少数几名竞争者，还有保住王位的智慧。从他国来了一名王位宣称者，虽然宣称权不强，但还是有人希望能看到一名男性登上王位，而不是一个女人。
为前任统治者的女儿加冕。

original: Few marriages in this time are based on romance, on passion or even friendship. Most are political, where the parents seek to join together two farms, two dynasties or two kingdoms. Without an heir and without a spouse, many have suggested that a marriage between our country and [nameless_neighbor_no_more.GetName] would be adequate, or even necessary.
translation: 这个时代的婚姻大都不是基于爱情、激情甚至友情。多数都是政治联姻，新人父母的目的是合并两家庄园、两个家族或是两个王国。由于没有继承人或配偶，许多人认为我们与邻国的联姻是不错甚至是必要的选择。

original: Send a herald to the monarch and suggest this political marriage between us.
translation: 派一名信使去邻国君主处，提议我们之间的政治联姻。

original: If I am to marry, it will be based on love.
translation: 我要结婚的话，对象一定要是真爱。

original: A herald from [From.Country.GetName]'s [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has arrived, suggesting a marriage between them and [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 一名由[From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]派出的信使到了，提议和[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的联姻。

original: A Political Marriage - Accepted or Not?
translation: 一桩政治联姻——成还是不成？

original: It was not with abated breath [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] awaited the answer from [From.Country.GetName]'s [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName], but [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] hands still trembled when the herald delivered the message.
translation: 等待[From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]的回复时，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的胸中并不平静，但信使回来报信时，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]手仍在颤抖。

original: A country without a secured succession is a country in peril. Not daring to wait for a royal heir of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own making, [Root.Monarch.GetName] has appointed a relative from [From.GetName] as the designated heir.
translation: 一个没有确认的继承人的国家是一个处于危险中的国家。来不及等[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]生出皇室继承人，[Root.Monarch.GetName]已经指定了一个来自[From.GetName]的亲属作为 指定的继承人。

original: At least it is not the Habsburgs.
A member of the §Y[From.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]§! family has become the designated heir of [GetDefiniteArticleBeforePluralCountry]§Y[Root.GetName]§!.
translation: 一位§Y[From.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]§! 的家族成员已经被确认为[GetDefiniteArticleBeforePluralCountry]§Y[Root.GetName]§!的继承人
拒绝将女儿列为继承人

original: The people are concerned about the lack of succession after you did not name your newborn daughter your heir.
translation: 没有指定你的新生女儿为继承人，民众仍然关心缺少继承人的事。
拒绝本王朝成员当继承人
选择本王朝成员当继承人
拒绝接受我们的联合统治

original: As the civil war that has plagued our land has come to an end we stand at a crossroad. Some feel that this would be the ideal time to re-establish a monarchy in our lands, albeit one governed by a strict constitution and laws to prevent the situation that lead to our recent turmoil. Others argue that the time has come to do away with the monarchy altogether and establish a modern republic built around the old principles of the English Parliament.
translation: 蹂躏国土的内战结束了，我们站在十字路口。有人认为这是重建我国君主制的绝妙时机，只是君主将会被限定在严格的宪法和法律下，以防再出现近来的动乱。其他人主张是时候全套摒弃君主制，建立一个基于英国议会传统的现代共和国了。

original: Let us found a Constitutional Republic!

With the death of our Lord Protector the question remains how our country should progress. Some feel that this would be the ideal time to re-establish a monarchy in our lands, albeit one governed by a strict constitution and laws to prevent the situation that lead to the Civil War we have just left behind us. Others argue that the time has come to do away with the monarchy altogether and establish a modern republic built around the old principles of the English Parliament.
translation: 护国公死后，我国将驶向何方的问题仍然存在。有人认为这是重建我国君主制的绝妙时机，只是君主将会被限定在严格的宪法和法律下，以防再出现向我们刚刚经历过的内战。其他人主张是时候全套摒弃君主制，建立一个基于英国议会传统的现代共和国了。

original: Let us found a Constitutional Republic!

Having abandoned the religion of our ancestors we are also changing some of our administrative customs. Rather than relying on the Islamic establishment for legitimacy all power now comes from the Monarch and the circle around [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] instead.
translation: 除了摒弃了先祖的旧宗教之外，我们还改变了我们一些行政惯例。现在我们的所有权力来自君主和围绕[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的群臣，而不是像过去那样依赖伊斯兰教建立合法性。

original: By our conquests we have proven that we are every part as powerful as our Western neighbors and our political influence in the west is already substantial. It is now time to take our rightful place among the Great Powers and to make them recognize our part in the culture, economy and politics of Western Europe.
translation: 我们开疆扩土的伟业已经证明，我们和我们的西方邻居一样强大，而我们在西方的政治影响力已经十分可观。现在是时候跻身列强，让他们认识到我们在西欧文化、经济和政治上的重要地位了。

original: The world shall tremble before us!
translation: 世界将在我们面前发抖！

original: This will trigger a §Rnegative§! ending to the §YCourt and Country§! disaster.
translation: 这将最终导致一个§R负面§!的结果，触发灾难§Y“宫廷与外省”§!。

original: Resistance to the growing centralization in our country has culminated in a period of general crisis and conflict between Court and Country.\n§YDepending on how we handle this time of crisis we might come out of it a stronger country than before.§!
translation: 中央集权的强化在国内遭到了强烈的抵制，并最终导致了宫廷与外省之间全面爆发的危机与冲突。\n§Y但如果我们对这一危机处置得当，之后我国将比之前更为强大。§!

original: The encroachment of the [Root.GetAdjective] state on domains that have traditionally been dominated by regional aristocrats, local courts or other interest groups has led to a widespread resentment of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] court. These groups have now united and formed alliances to combat central authority.\nToday we have received a number of objections to our latest tax decree, citing ancient rights and immoral conduct by the representatives of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. It is clear that continued attempts to strengthen our power will be obstructed at every opportunity.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]中央政府的权力正在延伸，侵占了一些传统上由乡绅、胥吏或其他利益集团把持的领域，这也招致了对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]宫廷的普遍不满。这些团体现在已经团结起来，组建联盟来对抗中央。\n今天，我们收到了一堆针对新税法的异议，大谈“古老的权利”，痛斥[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]御前大臣的奸佞之举。显然，继续搞中央集权会在每一处都受到抵制。

original: Attempt to negotiate with these Frondeurs.
translation: 尝试跟这帮投石党谈判。

original: Local [Root.GetLocalPowerStructure]s in [local_court_location.GetName] and surrounding provinces are refusing to acquiesce to a number of recent ordonances and taxes. Instead the [Root.GetLocalPowerStructure]s have sent a formal request to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] asking us to replace a number of [Root.GetLowLevelOfficialForCountry]s in the state, citing abuse of power and a disrespect of their old privileges.
translation: [local_court_location.GetName]及周边省份的[Root.GetLocalPowerStructure]拒绝执行最近的一批法令及税目。不仅如此，[Root.GetLocalPowerStructure]还往[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]送出了正式的意见书，指责我们滥用权力且不遵传统，要求我们撤换多名国内的[Root.GetLowLevelOfficialForCountry]。

original: Our attempts to unify the legal traditions, taxes and obligations of the provinces in the [Root.GovernmentName] of [Root.GetName] has led to the leaders of the [separatist_province.Culture.GetName] people to call their compatriots to arms. They claim we have violated the rules we swore to uphold when the [separatist_province.Culture.GetName] lands came under our control and that they have no choice but to once again raise the [separatists_wanted_country.GetAdjective] banners.\nOur local representatives implore us to strike a deal before it is too late. If we guarantee to uphold some of the [separatist_province.Culture.GetName] privileges they may yet be convinced the abolition of others.
translation: 我们尝试在[Root.GetName][Root.GovernmentName]各省统一法律传统、税收和兵役制，这导致[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]人的领袖召集同胞发起了武装反抗。 他们声称，我们在得到[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]的土地时曾定下规矩并发誓遵守，而今我们出尔反尔，他们不得不再次举起[separatists_wanted_country.GetAdjective]人民反抗的大旗。\n我们在当地的代表恳求我们趁而今为时未晚，赶紧与他们达成协议。 如果我们承诺给予[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]一些特权，他们可能会同意放弃其他的要求。

original: All other §Y[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]§! provinces will get the same local effects as §Y[separatist_province.GetName]§!.
translation: §Y[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]§!的所有其他省份会得到与§Y[separatist_province.GetName]§!相同的效果。
我们会收买他们的忠心。

original: All other §Y[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]§! provinces will get the same local effects as §Y[separatist_province.GetName]§!.
translation: §Y[separatist_province.Culture.GetName]§!的所有其他省份会得到与§Y[separatist_province.GetName]§!相同的效果。

original: Then they have no place in our realm!
translation: 他们在我国将无立锥之地！

original: Recent years have seen a number of new taxes and obligations put on many [Root.GetAdjective] cities and guilds. So far we have received all what has been asked for but our [Root.GetLowLevelOfficialForCountry]s report an increasing dissatisfaction among them.\nWith the growing resistance to the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] edicts and taxes the most powerful cities in the province of [city_league_demand_rights_province.GetName] have banded together around the mayor of [city_league_demand_rights_province.GetCapitalName]. They now demand their rights to levy their own taxes and privileges to uphold their own laws and they have violently evicted our [Root.GetLowLevelOfficialForCountry] from the area.
translation: 近年来，一些新的税目和兵役额在[Root.GetAdjective]的诸多城市和行会得到了施行。到目前为止，我们的要求都已得到了满足，但是我们的[Root.GetLowLevelOfficialForCountry]汇报称民众中正在滋生不满。\n针对[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]方面发布的法令和税收的不满在与日俱增，而[city_league_demand_rights_province.GetName]最强盛的几座城市也以[city_league_demand_rights_province.GetCapitalName]为首联合了起来。现在他们要求得到独立的征税权和立法权，并强行驱赶了我们派往那里的 [Root.GetLowLevelOfficialForCountry]。

original: We can make exceptions for the cities of [city_league_demand_rights_province.GetName].
translation: 我们可以给[city_league_demand_rights_province.GetName]的城市一些特权。

original: Some nobles have come to resent the new ideals of nobility. They have lost influence and power in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] but they still command considerable local influence, with vast estates to their name and deep pockets. Longing for the time when they were the pillars of the realm instead of the servants of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ministers, they have grown increasingly quarrelsome and obstinate.\nIt seems one such group has been preparing a plot to restore their old privileges and bring tradition and dignity back to the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] court. Using their countryside holdings as a base they have assembled an army to force their will upon us.
translation: 一些贵族开始对新近的限制感到愤懑不平。虽然他们已经失去了在 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的影响和权力，但他们名下的大量地产和雄厚的财富使得他们依然在地方上拥有相当大的影响力。他们渴望着重新成为国家的栋梁，不再受[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]大臣的差使。他这些人变得固执而又火药味十足。\n似乎有一个这样的团伙正在筹划一个密谋，意图恢复他们旧时的特权，将传统和尊贵带回[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的宫廷。他们利用自己在乡下的资产作为基础筹建了一支军队，妄图逼迫我们就范。

original: We will meet them with sword in hand.
translation: 我们将以手中的利刃招待他们。

original: Let us see try to meet their demands.
translation: 我们要试着去满足他们的要求。

original: In times of war the army allows advancement like few other places. In a period of inward strife such as this, however, we must not forget that these men of ability still have ties to the disenfranchised and disloyal groups of the realm.\nCan we really trust our armed forces? Close ministers to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] are asking us to purge all men with ties to the groups and families that oppose us.
translation: 在战争时期，军队是少数几个能获得晋升的地方。在现在这样的内乱时期，我们不能忘记这些有能者依旧与国内那群被剥夺了公民权的背叛者们存在着联系。\n我们真的能信任我们的军队吗？[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的近臣要求我们清除所有与反对我们的集团和家族存在联系的人。
我们禁受不起这样的折腾。

original: Not everyone stands to lose from the new order of the [Root.GovernmentName], some can now make a salaried career out of military service or as a functionary in one of the many new institutions of the state. Others yet remain loyal to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] out of their sense of honor and tradition.\nWhile the resistance to the increasingly ironclad rule of the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] court is widespread in our country we have recently seen a [Root.GetGovernmentSupporters] surge.
translation: 并不是所有人都会在[Root.GovernmentName]的新政策中受害，一些人现在能够在军中服役或在众多新的政府职能部门中供职以谋生，其他人则依旧遵从着荣誉感和传统而忠于[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。\n对于[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]宫廷日益牢固的统治，国内的不满情绪仍在弥漫，但我们看到[Root.GetGovernmentSupporters]的势力也在剧增。

original: An excellent opportunity to strengthen our ranks!
translation: 提升我们国力的好机会！
他们的忠诚会获得回报。

original: An End to Hostilities between Court and Country
translation: 宫廷与外省之间的敌对走向终结

original: The period widespread obstruction of authority in the provinces has finally come to an end. The way we have handled this crisis will shape the way local power structures interact with the government in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] for the foreseeble future.
translation: 各省普遍抗拒当局权威的时代走向了终结。在可预见的将来，我们解决这场危机的方法将会成为地方势力同[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]政府之间交往的范例。

original: Perhaps we can now finally work together.
translation: 也许我们现在终于能携手共进了。

original: Influenza can spread from non-quarantined provinces into adjacent provinces.
translation: 未隔离的省份的流感能够传播到邻近省份。

original: During [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] education our [Root.Heir.GetTitle], [Root.Heir.GetName], has come to be very close to our royal advisor, [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName], forming a special bond both to [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim] and to the [Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName] people of [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] homeland.\n[Root.Heir.GetName]'s travels in our [Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName] lands have done wonders for the popularity of our dynasty, but it has also raised more than a few eyebrows in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Our nobles, led by the demanding [Root.capital_noble.GetName], are starting to worry that [Root.Heir.GetName] will favor [Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName] subjects when [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] becomes ascends the throne and have begun to plot against [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] and [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] at court. They demand that we chastize the [Root.Heir.GetTitle] and guarantee the rights of the nobility.
translation: 在[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]受教育期间我们的[Root.Heir.GetTitle]，[Root.Heir.GetName]，和我们的皇家顾问，[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]，走的非常近，并形成了一种[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim] 和 [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]的[Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName]人的特殊纽带。\n[Root.Heir.GetName]在 [Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName]土地上的旅行让我们的王朝更受欢迎，但在[Root.Capital.GetName]引发了一些人的反对。我们的贵族们，在[Root.capital_noble.GetName]的带领下，开始担心当[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]登基后，[Root.Heir.GetName]会偏袒[Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName]的臣民，并开始密谋在宫廷里反对[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]和[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]。他们要求我们惩罚[Root.Heir.GetTitle]并保证贵族的权利。

original: Best let [Root.capital_noble.GetName] guide our young [Root.Heir.GetTitle] instead.
translation: 最好让 [Root.capital_noble.GetName] 来指导我们年轻的 [Root.Heir.GetTitle] 。

original: All countries of §Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§! religion will have their opinion of us increase of us by §G35§!.\nAll countries of §Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§! culture will increase their opinion of us by §G35§!.
translation: 所有信仰§Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§!的国家对我们的好感度将提高§G35§!。\n所有§Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§!文化的国家对我们的好感度将提高§G35§!。

original: All countries of §Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§! religion will have their opinion of us increase of us by §G35§!.
translation: 所有信仰§Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§!的国家对我们的好感度将提高§G35§!。

original: All countries of §Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§! culture will increase their opinion of us by §G35§!.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§!文化的国家对我们的好感度将提高§G35§!。

original: All our provinces of the §Y[Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName]§! culture will get §G-3§! unrest for §Y10§! years.
translation: 我们所有 §Y[Root.given_teacher_culture.GetCultureName]§! 文化的省份将在 §Y10§! 内获得§G-3§!叛乱度。

original: The ascension of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been very well received by the [Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName] people in our [Root.GovernmentName] but the [Root.Culture.GetName] view their new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] with some distrust. To them [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is in many ways a [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] of strange customs and foreign mannerisms.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的继位被我们[Root.GovernmentName]的[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]人民所普遍接受，但[Root.Culture.GetName]的人民对他们的新[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]有所猜忌。对他们来说，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]在很多方面是一个有着外国的特异习俗和行为的人[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]。

original: The ascension of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been less than well received by the [Root.Culture.GetName] people. They consider [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] manners foreign and strange. While some distrust to a new ruler is only natural it seems that for the time being our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will mostly have supporters at court, where [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] surrounds [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] with [Root.new_ruler_religion.GetCultureName] friends from foreign lands.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的继位不太能被[Root.Culture.GetName]人民接受。他们认为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的特异行为不属于这个国家。看起来作为我们的新统治者，受到一些猜忌是很自然的。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的支持者主要来自宫廷，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]的周围主要是[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]的来自[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetCultureName]的外国朋友们。

original: The ascension of [Root.Monarch.GetName] to be the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of [Root.GetName] has shaken the [Root.GetAdjective] court. Our new ruler openly patronizes the [Root.new_ruler_culture.GetReligionName] faith and has taken a circle of like minded friends with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to rule the country. This has proved too much to swallow for many of our righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects and some, lead by the prominent preacher [Root.rebel_preacher.GetName], have come out in open protests against us
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]登基成为[Root.GetName]的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]动摇了[Root.GetAdjective]宫廷的根本。我们的新统治者公开宣称庇护[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetReligionName]信仰的人，并纠集了一群有着相似观念的朋友和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]一起统治国家。这使得我们许多忠实信奉[Root.Religion.GetName]的臣民难以接受，以著名教士[Root.rebel_preacher.GetName]为首的人士对我们做出了公开抗议。

original: The ascension of [Root.Monarch.GetName] to be the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of [Root.GetName] has shaken the [Root.GetAdjective] court. Our new ruler openly patronizes the [Root.new_ruler_culture.GetReligionName] faith and has taken a circle of like minded friends with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to rule the country. This has proved too much to swallow for many of our righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects and it seems that for now our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] have few friends outside the gates of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]登基成为[Root.GetName]的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]动摇了[Root.GetAdjective]宫廷的根本。我们的新统治者公开宣称庇护[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetReligionName]信仰的人，并纠集了一群有着相似观念的朋友和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]一起统治国家。这使得我们许多忠实信奉[Root.Religion.GetName]的臣民难以接受，目前看来我们的新[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的大门之外似乎没有多少朋友。

original: The rise of [Root.Monarch.GetName] is one that many of our subjects and [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] have watched with concern and distaste. The new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] seem foreign in every meaning of the word. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] does not speak the language of the common [Root.Culture.GetName] man or noble, nor does [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] worship in the same way.\nThe few years that have passed since [Root.Monarch.GetName] took up office has only allowed [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] enemies to prepare...
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的继位被我们的许多臣民和[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]视为是一件令人担忧并且值得怀疑的事情。新[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的各方面看起来似乎都像一个外国人。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]不说通常在[Root.Culture.GetName]人或贵族间通行的语言，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]和他们也没有共同的宗教信仰。\n[Root.Monarch.GetName]继位后的数年来只是为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的敌人创造了机会...

original: Recent years have been both chaotic and full of turmoil. With power now in more stable hands however there is hope that things will return back to normal shortly.
translation: 最近的几年是混乱的，但随着权力现在被更有力的手所掌握，我们相信一切很快会恢复正常。

original: They will learn to love me in time.
All §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+2§! Unrest for §Y3§! years.
translation: 所有的 §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! 省份在 §Y[Root.GetName]§! 会获得 §R+2§! 叛乱度 §Y3§! 年。

original: All §Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §G-2§! Unrest for §Y3§! years.
translation: 所有的 §Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§! 省份在 §Y[Root.GetName]§! 会获得 §G-2§! 叛乱度 §Y3§! 年。

original: All §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+2§! Unrest for §Y5§! years.
translation: 所有的 §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! 省份在 §Y[Root.GetName]§! 会获得 §R+2§! 叛乱度 §Y5§! 年.

original: All §Y[Root.new_ruler_culture.GetCultureName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §G-2§! Unrest for §Y5§! years.

original: All §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+2§! Unrest for §Y7§! years.
translation: 所有的 §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! 省份在 §Y[Root.GetName]§! 会获得 §R+2§! 叛乱度 §Y7§! 年.

original: They will learn to love me in time.
All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+5§! Unrest and §R-5%§! Missionary Strength for §Y5§! years.
translation: 所有在§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!省份会获得§R+5§!叛乱度和§R-5%§!传教强度§Y5§!年。

original: All §Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §G-5§! Unrest and §R-5%§! Missionary Strength for §Y5§! years.
translation: §Y[Root.GetName]§!所有的§Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§!省份会获得§G-5§!叛乱度和§R-5%§!传教强度§Y5§!年。

original: All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+5§! Unrest and §R-5%§! Missionary Strength for §Y7§! years.
translation: 所有的 §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! 省份在 §Y[Root.GetName]§! 会获得 §R+5§! 叛乱度和 §R-5%§! 传教强度 §Y7§! 年.

original: All §Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §G-3§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for §Y7§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§!省份会获得§G-3§!叛乱度和§R-5§!传教强度，持续§Y7§!年。

original: All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+5§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for §Y10§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!省份会获得§R+5§!叛乱度和§R-5§!传教强度，持续§Y10§!年。

original: All §Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §G-5§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for §Y10§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]§!省份会获得§G-5§!叛乱度和§R-5§!传教强度，持续§Y10§!年。

All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+3§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for §Y5§! years.
