original: They will learn to love me in time.
All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! and §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+5§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for up to §Y5§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!和§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!省份会获得§R+5§!叛乱度和§R-5§!传教强度，持续§Y5§!年。

original: All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! and §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+5§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for up to §Y7§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!和§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!省份会获得§R+5§!叛乱度和§R-5§!传教强度，持续§Y7§!年。

original: All §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! and §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! provinces in §Y[Root.GetName]§! will receive §R+5§! Unrest and §R-5§! Missionary Strength for up to §Y10§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.GetName]§!的§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!和§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!省份会获得§R+5§!叛乱度和§R-5§!传教强度，持续§Y10§!年。

original: The faith of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has long been the cause of consternation among the leading [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] of our [Root.GovernmentName]. Over time however [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] influence has lead to some 'new men' and even some of our older families adapting the [Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName] faith. The fact that [Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName] rite opens doors in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], together with a generally increased visibility of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s worship, has lead to the rite growing increasingly commonplace throughout our country, attracting new converts from within as well as from other parts of the world.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的信仰在很长一段时间内都是在我们[Root.GovernmentName]的[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]领袖当中引起不安的原因 . 但随着时间的流逝，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的影响使得一些“新鲜血液”甚至是我们的一些古老家族接受了[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]的信仰。 由于[Root.new_ruler_religion.GetReligionName]的仪式在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]公开举行，以及[Root.Monarch.GetName]明显的坚定信仰，使这种仪式在我们的国家的影响力逐渐扩大，吸引了来自国内和世界其他地方的信徒。

original: We must attempt to stem the subversive powers of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 我们必须阻止[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的颠覆企图。

original: Many among the righteous clergy and the [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] have long been in agreement that the apostasy of [Root.Monarch.GetName] is a bad influence on the country and is putting our people in peril.\nTogether with the local priests of [rebel_province.GetName] [Root.noblezealot.GetName], a very pious scion of one of our older families, has assembled an army and is now marching on the capital to depose the vile heretic in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 许多正直的神职人员和[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]都认为[Root.Monarch.GetName]的叛教行为对国家有着不好的影响，并且把我们的人民置于了危难之中。 \n[Root.noblezealot.GetName]一位来自我们的一个古老家族的虔诚旁系贵族，和当地的教士一起在[rebel_province.GetName]组织了一支军队并正向首都进发以试图废黜[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的异端统治者。

original: The presence of an openly heathen [Root.heathen_ruler.GetReligionGroupName] in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] has not gone unnoticed among the [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects in our [Root.GovernmentName]. Among the orthodox this has come to be a common matter of irritation and discussion and in areas with existing religious tensions it has lead to even greater frequency of conflicts. A priest named [Root.antimonarchistpriest.GetName] is reported to have attempted to further inflame the situation by repeatedly returning to the 'corruption of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]' in agitating speeches to the people of [rebelprovince.GetAreaName]. At this point it might be hard to remove him from his position without extensive use of force.
translation: 在首都[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]公开出现的[Root.heathen_ruler.GetReligionGroupName]异端并不是没有受到我们[Root.GovernmentName]信仰[Root.Religion.GetName]的属国的注意。这在正统信仰当中引起了一些刺激和争议，并且对于那些已经存在宗教争端的地区尤其严重。据称一名叫做[Root.antimonarchistpriest.GetName]的神职人员试图通过煽动性的演说在[rebelprovince.GetAreaName]的人民当中宣扬[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的腐败来激化矛盾。此时不动用一些蛮力可能很难把他从他的演讲台上拉下来。

original: Extensive use of force is only fitting.
Let us not escalate the situation.

While there are many who find the faith of [Root.Monarch.GetName] to be an affront to all that is holy, [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has made [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] court a veritable haven for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] sisters and brothers in faith. Using the contact network built this way we can reach many that we would never have been able to attract otherwise.
translation: 即使许多人认为[Root.Monarch.GetName]的信仰对正统是一种冒犯，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]仍然将[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]宫廷变成了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]相同信仰的人们的一个名副其实的避风港。通过这样建立的社交网络，我们可以吸引一些在相反情况下接触不到的人们。

original: Their talents are needed in our [Root.new_monarch_religion.GetReligionName] Provinces
translation: 我们[Root.new_monarch_religion.GetReligionName]的省份需要他们的才能。

original: It is no secret that [Root.Monarch.GetName] hold the [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] people dear to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart and that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] speaks the [Root.Culture.GetName] language with a distinct [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] accent.\n[Root.Monarch.GetName] even surrounds [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] with [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] advisors and courtiers, something that has not gone unnoticed by the old [Root.Culture.GetName] families in our country. Our court [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle], an old champion of traditional [Root.Culture.GetName] values have increasingly come to be at odds with [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s policies and is now about to withdraw from the Royal Council.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]宠爱[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]人民，并且[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]说着一口[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]口音的[Root.Culture.GetName]语言的事实已经不再是一个秘密。\n[Root.Monarch.GetName]甚至将[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]的顾问和廷臣笼络到[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]身边。这引起了我们国家一些传统的[Root.Culture.GetName]的家族的注意。 我们的宫廷[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]，一位[Root.Culture.GetName]观念的捍卫者对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的政策有很大的意见，即将被逐出议会了。

original: It is no secret that [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] hold the [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] people dear to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart and that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] speaks the [Root.Culture.GetName] language with a distinct [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] accent.\n[Root.Monarch.GetName] even surrounds [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] with [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] advisors and courtiers, something that has not gone unnoticed by the old [Root.Culture.GetName] families in our country. original: We must try to remedy this situation.
translation: 我们必须试着缓和局势。

original: There is nothing we can do.

[Root.Monarch.GetName]'s blatant favoritism of [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] culture has not gone unnoticed among the [Root.Culture.GetName] people of our [Root.GovernmentName]. Obstructionism is becoming ever more widespread as those that have the power to do so make their frustration with recent policies known through whatever means they have available.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]对[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]文化不加掩饰的推崇并没有逃过我们[Root.GovernmentName]内[Root.Culture.GetName]群众的眼睛。对最近政策感到沮丧的人们尽己所能地利用各种方法阻碍这股潮流，这种阻碍也愈加广泛。

original: We must be seen to make some amends.

[Root.Monarch.GetName]'s preference for the [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] culture and language is seen as a bit of an eccentricity by many, but it has also opened doors for us in the wider community of [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] countries. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been doing what [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] can to form closer bonds with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] compatriots.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]对[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]文化和语言的喜好在很多人看来是一种怪癖，然而这让[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]诸国对我们敞开了大门。 [Root.Monarch.GetName]正在尽[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]所能来强化与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]同胞的纽带.

original: One can never have too many friends.
Let us study the ways of the [advanced_country.GetAdjective] [advanced_country.GovernmentName].

A [Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName] official, [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]'s rise to high office has angered many of those closest to [Root.Monarch.GetName]. [Root.prominent_noble.GetName], a member of one of the oldest [Root.Culture.GetName] families in our country, has approached our monarch demanding that we relieve [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] of [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] position.
translation: 一名[Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName]官员， [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]的高升惹怒了[Root.Monarch.GetName]的身边众人。 [Root.prominent_noble.GetName]， 我国[Root.Culture.GetName]家族里最古老的家族之一， 已经来觐见君主要求我们把[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]调离[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]的位置。

original: A [Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName] official, [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName]'s rise to high office has not been easy and has angered many of those closest to [Root.Monarch.GetName]. [Root.prominent_noble.GetName], a member of one of the oldest [Root.Culture.GetName] families in our country, has approached our monarch demanding that we relieve [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName] of [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHis] position.

original: A [Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName] official, [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName]'s rise to high office has not been easy and has angered many of those closest to [Root.Monarch.GetName]. [Root.prominent_noble.GetName], a member of one of the oldest [Root.Culture.GetName] families in our country, has approached our monarch demanding that we relieve [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName] of [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHis] position.

original: We must listen to the [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] of the Realm.

As a leading figure of the [Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName] community, [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] has both good insights and a strong influence far beyond the council which [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] is part of in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]. A fact that [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] has used to our advantage, strongly increasing the popular support for both our [Root.GovernmentName] and the [Root.Culture.GetName] people that rules it.
translation: 作为[Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName]群体的领袖， [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] 在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]不仅洞悉情势，并且在[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]身处的议会之外也有强大影响力。 [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]已经习惯于我们的优势了，因为[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]正致力于提升人们对[Root.Culture.GetName]人统治下的，我们的[Root.GovernmentName]的支持。

original: The [Root.other_advisor_religion.GetReligionName] faithful have watched the rise of our [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] with both interest and enthusiasm. To many [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] has become proof that it is possible for someone to do well within the [Root.GetAdjective] state despite not belonging to the state religion.
translation: [Root.other_advisor_religion.GetReligionName]的信众们好奇而又热切地关注着我们的[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]。 对人们来说， [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]已经成了一种榜样，证明即使你不是国教信徒，也能在[Root.GetAdjective]之地出人头地。

original: One day you might all rise to be like [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName].
translation: 有朝一日你们都可能变得像[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]那样。

original: The clergy have long objected to our use of heathen in high positions. When [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] was made [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] they objected loudly, and their objections have not grown any less adamant over time. Some leading religious scholars, both at home and abroad, are now denouncing the [Root.GovernmentName] for its blatant favoritism of non-[Root.Religion.GetGroupName] officials.
translation: 教士们长久以来都反对我们重用异教徒。 当[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]被委以[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]时他们强烈反对，并且毫无妥协之意。海内外的一些知名宗教名望人士也纷纷谴责[Root.GovernmentName]公然任用非[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]官员。

original: It is time we let [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] go.
It is time we let [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName] go.
It is time we let [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName] go.
We do not bow to the demands of petty dilettantes.
translation: 我们不会理会这些牛鬼蛇神的。

original: Widespread condemnation will hurt our relations with all other §Y[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]§! countries by §R-35§!.
translation: 昭彰的恶名会使我们与所有 §Y[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]§! 国家的关系下降 §R-35§!.

original: Many of the faithful [Root.Religion.GetName] of [Root.GetName] see our [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle], [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName], as a threat to the theological purity of the government. It is feared that through [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] influence [Root.Monarch.GetName] will be convinced to favor the [Root.other_advisor_religion.GetReligionName] in government or indeed that [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] might turn the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] away from the true faith.
translation: [Root.GetName]的许多虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信者将我们的[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]，[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]看作是一个危害统治的宗教纯洁性的毒瘤。担心在[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]蛊惑下[Root.Monarch.GetName]会转而青睐政府中的[Root.other_advisor_religion.GetReligionName]，又或者[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]将把[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]引向邪道。.

original: Many of the faithful [Root.Religion.GetName] of [Root.GetName] see our [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle], [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName], as a threat to the theological purity of the government. It is feared that through [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHis] influence [Root.Monarch.GetName] will be convinced to favor the [Root.other_advisor_religion.GetReligionName] in government or indeed that [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetSheHe] might turn the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] away from the true faith.
translation: [Root.GetName]的许多虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信者将我们的[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle]，[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName]看作是一个危害统治的宗教纯洁性的毒瘤。担心在[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHis]蛊惑下[Root.Monarch.GetName]会转而青睐政府中的[Root.other_advisor_religion.GetReligionName]，又或者[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetSheHe]将把[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]引向邪道。

original: It is time we let [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] go.
It is time we let [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName] go.
It is time we let [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName] go.

[Root.foreign_leader.GetName] is a powerful landowner and political influencer among our [foreign_culture_province.Culture.GetName] subjects and we have long had a working relationship with him. He has always been quick to know what it is that the state needs and what it could perhaps do for him in return. His name is often mentioned when discussing candidates for the council of state. While he would in many ways be a good fit for such a position it would undoubtedly also greatly increase the influence of an already powerful man and his clients.
translation: [Root.foreign_leader.GetName]是我们[foreign_culture_province.Culture.GetName]派系中一位强大的领主和政治人物，我们也早就与其有合作关系。他深知国家之所需，也知道能从国家那里得到什么回报。说到国家议会的候选人时他总是被提到。诚然，怎么看他都很适合那个位置，但这样一来毫无疑问的会让这位强人和他的幕僚们威信大增。

original: [Root.foreign_leader.GetName] will be a welcome addition to the cabinet.
He serves us better as a local leader of our [foreign_culture_province.Culture.GetName] subjects.

Throughout his career [Root.rising_star_advisor.GetName] has left a strong impression on everyone he has met or worked with. From his time as a promising student to his rise to positions of increasing responsibility he has consistently done well and found new solutions to whatever problems he has faced.\nIt is clear however that for someone of his background, both as a commoner and as a [wrong_religion_province.Religion.GetName], he has now reached about as high as he can come. It would raise quite a few eyebrows to have a man, no matter how talented, assume the highest offices of state with such a background.
translation: [Root.rising_star_advisor.GetName]在他的整个生涯当中给无数与他见过或共事过的人们留下过深刻的印象。从他还是个前途无量的学生到现在身居高位肩负重任，他始终如一地在面临问题时屡出奇策。 \n然而很明显，像他这样的人，一个平民，[Root.wrong_religion_province.Religion.GetName]信徒，他已经走得足够远了。无论他是何等天才，让这种人成为国家的股肱之臣也还是会让很多人为之侧目。

original: Let us make an exception for the good of the country.
A remarkable individual, but we all have our place in life.
translation: 是个奇才，但应该摆在合适的位置。

original: Our relations with our [wrong_culture_province.Culture.GetName] subjects have been mishandled for some time by a variety of state officials. A series of land surveys to additional taxes and musterings, have made the locals feel that the leadership in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are anything but understanding of local affairs.
translation: 我们和我们的[wrong_culture_province.Culture.GetName]同胞们由于这段时间的种种国家事务产生了一些误会。一系列的土地测量，加税和徭役已经让当地人感觉到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的统治绝无可能体察下情。

original: We have ministers who can communicate with these Barbarians.
translation: 我们的官员可以和这些野蛮人沟通。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] might be able to sway them.
[Root.Heir.GetName] has always had a way with these people.
Perhaps [Root.Consort.GetName] can convince them of our good will?
translation: 也许[Root.Consort.GetName]能以我们的好意劝服他们？

original: Best send in soldiers before this escalates.
translation: 最好在出乱子之前派兵。

original: Perhaps some tax exemptions could ease their burden.
translation: 减税大概能给他们减轻点负担。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] has taken a strong interest in [Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName] teachings. As the Heir-Apparent [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] is of course expected to know all our subjects but perhaps not to the extent of discussing theology and hosting debates [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]. [Root.leading_religious_person.GetName] a leading member of the Clergy has now approached [Root.Monarch.GetName] to voice their concerns. He does not foresee a future for our [Root.Heir.GetTitle] in high government if we do not force [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] to come to [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] senses.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]对[Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName]产生了浓厚的兴趣。作为继承人，显然[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]知道我国国教的那一套，但也许还未达到讨论神学和主持辩论[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]的程度。[Root.leading_religious_person.GetName]——一个神职领导人员向[Root.Monarch.GetName]报告了他们的担忧。他预测我们的[Root.Heir.GetTitle]不能指点江山，如果我们不强迫[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]让[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]恢复对圣灵的认知。

original: It is time to have a talk with [Root.Heir.GetName]
Last I looked [Root.leading_religious_person.GetName] was not the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of this country.

Ever since [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] younger years [Root.Heir.GetName] has taken a great interest in the religion of our [Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName] subjects. As [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] grew up this has not faltered, instead it seems that the [Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName] is taking up more and more of [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] thoughts and dreams. [Root.Heir.GetName] is now often seen surrounded by [Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName] friends, and frequently even in the [Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName] quarters.\nMany, both among nobles and clergy, have begun to question how proper this is and some have openly begun to ask of [Root.Monarch.GetName] that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] talk sense into the [Root.Heir.GetTitle].
translation: 自从[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的青少年，[Root.Heir.GetName]就对[Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName]的事物产生了浓厚的兴趣。随着[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]的慢慢长大，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]对此也没有丝毫隐瞒，反而似乎[Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName]越老越多的霸占着[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]大脑。[Root.Heir.GetName]现在交了海量的[Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName]朋友，甚至频繁的在[Root.potential_heir_religion.GetReligionName]聚集区处居住 。\n许多贵族和僧侣开始质疑他的这般行为，有的人还公开的要求[Root.Monarch.GetName]，让[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]来开导[Root.Heir.GetTitle]。

original: What harm could come of this?
This is something [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] will have to keep to [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself].

The lack of an heir-apparent for the [Root.GetAdjective] throne is a pressing matter, not only for [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] but also for the realm at large. It has been suggested that [Root.young_heir.GetName], a young and promising scion of a distant branch of the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family could perhaps be introduced in the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] court, and in time take the place as [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s successor.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的王座没有法定继承人真让人头大，这不仅仅是[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]的事情，而是整个国家的大事。不过来自[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族远系旁支的[Root.young_heir.GetName]，也许够资历进入[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]朝廷，及时担任[Root.Monarch.GetName]的继承人。

original: We will never see a [family_holdings.Culture.GetName] noble on our throne.

For a long time now the personal convictions of [Root.Monarch.GetName] have been at odds with the religious establishment of [Root.GetName]. This has caused both friction and conflict, with the clergy and leading nobles often questioning [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] rule. There are, however, many that now support [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] in his devotion to the [Root.new_monarch_religion.GetReligionName] faith, both in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and the [Root.GetAdjective] countryside.\nPerhaps the time has come to make a great change to how the [Root.GovernmentName] of [Root.GetName] functions to its very core? Surely the defenders of the old would not go out willingly but if there is a will there is a way...
translation: 长久以来，[Root.Monarch.GetName]的个人信念与[Root.GetName]的信念相抵牾。这造成了不少的摩擦与争执，许多神职人员和上层贵族质疑[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的统治。不过现在，从[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]到[Root.GetAdjective]的乡间，许多人很多人支持[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]对[Root.new_monarch_religion.GetReligionName]信仰的无私奉献。\n也许现在正是[Root.GetName][Root.GovernmentName]做出伟大变革的最好时机？当然，保守派不会轻易接受，不过想做的话就一定会有办法...

original: We could never take such a risk.

Ever since the start of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s reign it has been clear that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart lies with the [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]. In time the palace halls of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] have come to echo in merry conversations entirely held in the [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] language as even the [Root.Culture.GetName] nobles have taken to using the language of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].\nPerhaps it is time to codify the special status of the [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] culture?
translation: 自[Root.Monarch.GetName]登基以来，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]心就一直与[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]同在。最终，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的宫殿里全部谈话都是用[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]语进行的，甚至[Root.Culture.GetName]贵族都用起了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的语言。\n也许现在就是将[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]文化的特殊地位写入法典的最好时机？

original: We could never dishonor the legacy of our ancestors.
translation: 我们永远不会玷污祖先的遗产。

original: Ever since the ascension of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] we have seen an increasing influx of [Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName] immigrants into our country. These are people from all walks of life who are attracted to the opportunities in our [Root.GovernmentName]. The province of [cultural_migration_province.GetName] in particular has come to be home to a great number of these immigrants.
translation: 自从我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]登基以来，[Root.new_monarch_culture.GetCultureName]的移民大量涌入我国。这些各行各业的人大都是被我们[Root.GovernmentName]丰富的机会所吸引。[cultural_migration_province.GetName]省已经成为了这些移民的大本营。

original: Let us spread them out a bit among our people.
translation: 让他们跟我们的人民稍微分散开来。

original: $PHILOSOPHER$ must certainly be one of the foremost philosophers of our time. [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap] is probably best known for [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] philosophical empiricism and skepticism. [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap] has concluded that no theory of reality is possible - there can be no knowledge of anything beyond experience.
translation: $PHILOSOPHER$毫无疑问是当代一流的哲学家之一。[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap]最广为人知的哲学思想就是[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]经验主义和怀疑论。[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap]认为没有知识是可以被推导的，只有实践才能出真知。

original: The term is up for $MONARCH$. With enough support [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] can stay in office, but then [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] must defeat [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] three primary competitors...
translation: $MONARCH$的任期已满。且已有足够的支持者支持[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]留任，但[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]必须击败[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的三个主要竞争对手……

original: As time goes by the ties between the our former homeland and the colonies grow weaker. The settlers in [american_province.GetName] barely associate themselves with their ancestral home any more. They now prefer to think of themselves as Americans, and this sentiment is beginning to spread throughout [american_province.GetAreaName].
translation: 随着时间流逝，我们的故乡和殖民地之间的联系越来越弱。 [american_province.GetName]中的定居者几乎已经不与祖族联系。他们现在更愿意将自己视为美国人，这种情绪开始在整个[american_province.GetAreaName]中传播。

original: As time goes by the ties between the our former homeland and the colonies grow weaker. The settlers in [brazilian_province.GetName] barely associate themselves with their ancestral home any more. They now prefer to think of themselves as Brazilians, and this sentiment is beginning to spread throughout [brazilian_province.GetAreaName].
translation: 随着时间流逝，我们的故乡和殖民地之间的联系越来越弱。 [brazilian_province.GetName]中的定居者几乎已经不与祖族联系。他们现在更愿意将自己视为巴西人，这种情绪开始在整个[brazilian_province.GetAreaName]中传播。

original: As time goes by the ties between the our former homeland and the colonies grow weaker. The settlers in [mexican_province.GetName] barely associate themselves with their ancestral home any more. They now prefer to think of themselves as Mexicans, and this sentiment is beginning to spread throughout [mexican_province.GetAreaName].
translation: 随着时间流逝，我们的故乡和殖民地之间的联系越来越弱。[mexican_province.GetName]中的定居者几乎已经不与祖族联系。他们现在更愿意将自己视为墨西哥人，这种情绪开始在整个[mexican_province.GetAreaName]中传播。

original: We should maintain our traditional culture.
translation: 我们应当维护我们的传统文化。

original: All §Y[Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName]§! provinces will get §G-2§! Unrest and §G+10%§! Production Efficiency for §Y10§! years.
translation: 所有§Y[Root.other_advisor_culture.GetCultureName]§! 省份将得到§G-2§! 叛乱度和§G+10%§! 生产效率§Y10§!年。
